links_reviews_title: Looks okay but nothing special. True to size and light summer skirt.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size (I'm a 2/4 and in this I wore a 6 which is the equivalent of a 2). Fabric is a little see through. Looks cute and classy but nothing I'm in love with or would rent again.

This is a beautiful skirt, but it is not fitted at the waist. If you are looking for a skirt to sit fairly low on your waist, go with your regular size (British sizing, I'm a 4 and ordered an 8). I really wanted to wear this with a nice blouse from RTR but because the waist isn't fitted, I didn't get the popover effect I wanted, so I didn't end up wearing it. I may try going down a size and wearing it higher up. Length was fine on me, but 5'3.5"

It's pretty rare for me to strike out on my rentals but this was a no-go and I sent it back right after trying it on. I should've read the reviews beforehand. Even with the British sizing, the skirt runs large and is super frumpy (Ie i'm a size 0, equivalent UK 4). The skirt sits at the lower part of the stomach accentuating any pooch area, and is wide with excess fabric on the hips. Does not look tailored at all. Very surprising for a Victoria Beckham piece.
The extra material on the front ended up sitting weird. It was cute but a bit bulky.

links_reviews_title: I tried this on and it was WAY too big.
links_reviews_text: I read reviews saying it ran really big and sized down about 2 sizes, I should have gone one more.

Though this brand runs really small, ordering up to the size recommended by the site ended up being gigantic. If the sizing were correct, maybe the odd overlapping fabric would have looked better, but trying this on the odd lengths of overlapping squares and half a cinched belt (which was super tricky to even get looped) was TOO awkward for me. I didn't end up wearing it after trying it on and thinking the big size and extra fabric overlap looked too bulky to pull it off even with a tucked, fitted shirt.

links_reviews_title: I wore this skirt to work.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the equivalent of a US 6. I am usually between a US 6 and 8 and have worn Victoria Beckham dresses that run small in the past. This looks great sitting right at your waist, but it was too big on me and fell in a weird place. The skirt itself is beautiful.
I would have liked this if it was smaller. I don't know why it told to me get a 8UK size. I am a 4 usually. I should have sized down. It made me look bulky and very conservative.
Hits mid calves for 5'6". Runs large.

links_reviews_title: Ran too large, could not wear
links_reviews_text: Runs very large
Too big
The skirt fit fine; however, there was a lot of material which led me to look larger than I would've liked.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it bc it was too big. You all sent a size 12 instead of a size 6.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear it bc it was too big. You all sent a size 12 instead of a size 6.
Order your normal US size as the UK is equivalent in this one. I'm US size 4 so ordered UK 8 as per sizing listed. It was like a US 8.

links_reviews_title: LOVED! So fun and many compliments
links_reviews_text: Perfect small cross body bag for everyday, or a night out! Super versatile. Love the color. Adjustable length for the strap as well which was great or you can hold by the handle!

links_reviews_title: Very cool, looked very luxe, it is small tho!
links_reviews_text: Loved it -- but it is very small! That may not be a bad thing, but I was surprised by how small it was.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, high quality, good small size
links_reviews_text: Someone asked if it was a Celine. That's a compliment to the design!

links_reviews_title: Fun bag a few steps from the traditional
links_reviews_text: this bag was a really great size and color. this is a good baby step into a more funky bag look when you are used to more traditional bags. The only con with this bag is it sometimes popped open (maybe the magnetic snap wasn't that strong) but this was just as I was closing it and realize it did not snag correctly.
Ordered this for vacation at an all inclusive resort!! Was perfect for lipgloss, cellphone and id! Obsessed with this bag.
Very cute print and bow tie at the neck but kinda baggy in the waist and wrinkles so easily. Linen-blend fabric. Wore it once with bright blue pants but that's it.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt but runs a little small...
links_reviews_text: This shirt was cute, but it was too small in the bust and not long enough to tuck in. I do not have a large bust so I was shocked by that. If I got it again I would size up, but I think the other parts of the shirt might then be too roomy. If you try it, I still suggest sizing up. I couldn't wear the shirt as I planned. Returned it immediately.
Love this comfy, linen type top. It's airy and great for work. The pattern is not overly feminine but pretty with blue tones. Short sleeves & tie neck give it a nice clean modern look

I really enjoyed wearing this top at work. It feels a little old school in a good way. Keep in mind, this is a linen fabric, so it does tend to wrinkle over the course of the day. May be best tucked in with a high-waisted bottom.
True to size. Material feels like linen. Beautiful colors. Tie at neck adds a nice detail. Got lots of compliments.
The sleeves were tight around my non existent guns. The pattern was nice, but couldn't wear it.
This shirt fit well but it was wrinkled and needed to be ironed. I also thought the material was more casual than I was expecting.
The blouse fit true to size. Paired with jeans for casual day at work.

It's cute, but nothing to write home about. The fabric is good thick cotton. The style is cute but the pattern is a little too little girlish for my taste. I think I would have worn this all the time if I were a college woman, just not very good for professional day wear.
It looked like it would be a super cute shirt but the material was really stiff and it fit me weird.
Nice shirt, cute for spring or summer!

links_reviews_title: Want to feel like a badass? Rent this.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a difficult day at work when I needed confidence and it sure delivered! Looks feminine, but like a boss lady. Neckline was a tie, so it was adjustable. Really loved this one - would rent it again any time!

Sometimes it's hard to find a chic, tailored, fashion forward too that falls into the casual category. This top checked all the boxes. Fabric was of a thicker linen quality - held its structure but also easy enough to tuck without being bulky. The tie neck was a great touch. Sized fit exactly as expected. Perfect with jeans and sandals, or shorts and sneakers. Love.
Liked this top tucked into light wash jeans. Fabric wasn't my favorite. A little rough. But good overall'

links_reviews_title: It can be dressed up or down. Nice linen fabric for summer. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. Too short.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it too short.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt for work or weekend wear
links_reviews_text: Good fit. The buttons held over the chest which is not always the case
To small for my chest and the this ran short. Could not tuck in and barely hit my pants.

Looks really bright and polished in the photos but in reality it's a faded cotton, could be from wear and wash but wasn't what I expected. Could be nice for a casual outfit but I rented for work so I didn't wear. It ran small and short so if your tall or have a chest I would recommend sizing up.
Pretty colors and a nice linen material. Machine washable which is great.

Thin linen material. I didn't knot the top but I tied it once. Not constricting on the neck. Slightly loose around the chest if you're smaller. So while I usually get a 6, this was perfect for my arms (I've got some biceps)! Got lots of compliments. My one tiny issue is that if you leave it untucked, the bottom of the shirt curls up over the course of the day.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and flattering top for summer
links_reviews_text: Would rent again !
Loved these pants! They can be work appropriate and they are very flattering and comfortable. Would rent again!

Great with heels and leather jacket for party and perfect for lounging at home, paired with jean jacket and t-shirt (and slippers - as pictured)! They definitely stretch out after two wears so after wearing them with high heels to a party and feeling trendy, and one additional time to work, my third time I just wore as casual pants. Nice thick material and structure (for an intentionally slouchy pant) for those of us looking to cover some extra lumps ;-), but laid nicely!

links_reviews_title: Love these pants even if my face says otherwise
links_reviews_text: Perfect for mom life! I can fit everything I need in these huge pockets, honestly want to wear them every day! I didn't expect to love them as much as I did
Nice pants but wouldn't go out of my way to rent!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering- can be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: I love the fit of these joggers! I usually have problems finding pants like these to fit my thighs and butt but these were great. Also liked how they didn't stretch out. The fabric is stretchy and there is some give but they don't stretch out the moment you sit down. Wore them dressed up for a casual date night and with a tied up T-shirt for during the day.

I really hoped these pants would work, but they were just way too big in the crotch area. Maybe if I were a few inches taller it would have looked ok, but even then I'm not sure. Too bad because the color and everything else about them were what I was looking for!

This was my first time wearing joggers. I was surprised when I saw them in person; I thought they would be more of a linen or even sweatpants material. But they are a thicker cotton pant. The waist has some flexibility but not unlimited - with that in mind, I would order your regular size and not try to size down. Still very comfortable with big, roomy pockets.
These pants were so comfy and cute! I wore them to work and received many compliments. Fit great!

links_reviews_title: Dry clean only was a bummer for these casual pants
links_reviews_text: I did not love that they were dry clean only. I rented for normal wear and with two small kids, dry clean only meant I could only wear once.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fabric, fit and color. They stretch a bit so we’re comfortable all day. Great pants .
links_reviews_text: I seriously considered buying these pants because they looked so nice. I’m short. The crotch hung a little too low making my legs look even shorter. That’s the only reason I’m returning them.

links_reviews_title: Not a great fit for my body type.
links_reviews_text: Cute and comfy. Just not on me.

links_reviews_title: Were just too tight for my liking
links_reviews_text: They were cute but definitely should've sized up
Super comfy and versatile. Not to heavy, not too light.
These joggers were super baggy in the butt & a little too long for me. The material is sort of stiff and rough. I didn't find them attractive or comfy, so I didn't wear them.

links_reviews_title: I took these on a family vacation and they were great!
links_reviews_text: These fit true to size and are easy go-to pants for a variety of occasions. I wore them with my kids, on a date with my husband and while running errands. They are easy to dress up or down and a great color for a variety of tops and shoes.
Comfy and look great!

links_reviews_title: SO comfy! Big pockets. Nicely tapered leg and length.
links_reviews_text: I liked the weight of the fabric - not to thin, not too heavy to be hot. The length was great on me to - hit low calf - I'm 5'3". I often find this style of jogger looks weird/silly on my petite build if too long - wasn't the case. Gave my little bootie a nice pop too... and there ain't much to be poppin' - so thumbs up!
Pockets!

links_reviews_title: They fit perfectly! These pants can go with any outfit. They can be dressed down and up. Love them.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! True to size. They can be worn for all seasons.

links_reviews_title: Slightly awkward fit but otherwise chic
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit baggy in the crotch and waist but otherwise nice pants. Great look, fabric
Soft and comfy
Fabric runs thicker than I expected, shirt was a bit stiff. Recommend sizing down
This is great for everyday wear. It's very soft and cozy!
Rented this for casual Friday at work and it was incredibly comfortable! I appreciate a long sweater that I'm not swimming in and this one checked all the boxes. Will absolutely rent again!

I was worried it would be shedding everywhere based on a previous review and almost didn't rent it, but I didn't have that problem at all. Felt like chenille fabric. Neckline is wide, needed to wear a tank for it to not look funky.
Super cozy cardigan however the sweater does shed.

links_reviews_title: Good fit! Loved the colors and length!
links_reviews_text: Wore it to work and out on the weekend too! Loved this one.
Great colors, cute with jeans.
Love this sweater. Great quality and colors are lovely in person.
I wore this a couple of times. I really liked it and received many compliments. Comfortable and soft.

links_reviews_title: Super soft! Perfect combination of feminine & comfort.
links_reviews_text: Warm and comfy sweater for cooler temps or airplane shivers!

Sleeves were a little the short, so I just pushed them up...maybe they were meant to be 3/4 length. I still loved this sweater; lots of compliments and it's so soft and cozy. I'm 5'9.5", 160lbs and the LARGE fit everywhere else perfectly (length & shoulders).
Nice, warm layer. It's not wool so no itches. I worn it with nearly everything for a month
Super soft fabric. I wore this to work dressed down a bit, but perfect for a casual fall Saturday as well.

a good fit, nice way to dress up a basic outfit as the weather changes to fall. only issue was it shed fuzzy balls all over everything. my black tote bag and my chair at the office were completely covered in fuzz.
Softest sweater. It feels like a cotton ball.

The bright gold colour is eye-catching and the material is a nice thick ribbed style. Not itchy. The fit is good but not great. The shoulders are dropped (I think?) and I had to steam them before wearing because the hanger had left indents that made me look like I was wearing shoulder pads. Overall I would say it's a good sweater for every day, but probably not an item to gush over.
Very soft, beautiful color. Short, cropped length on me (May be longer on smaller chested women). Nice, but not show stopping.
Wore to work and loved this. I wore a tank underneath for work but could also be worn without for a cute out of office look. Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Great fall look if you're looking to add a splash of color
links_reviews_text: Overall fit was perfect. The material was a great combo of light and heavy fabric, didn't feel like it was weighing me down. It is more on the mid length side, however I wish it was a bit more above the waist. Recommend pairing with high-waisted jeans. Low cut in the front so I would wear sticky boobs or a tank underneath if you don't want to show cleavage.

The color on this cardigan is beautiful and it's incredibly soft. That being said I was expecting to wear it more as a top like the model is. It's a heavier sweater than I expected and the V in front in very low. There was no way I could wear this without something underneath. It fits true to size but I would say it's not fitted like you might expected and it is definitely cropped which I liked but may be a turnoff for others.

I'm not usually a big fan of ties at the neck, but this worked. Got compliments all day, as I transitioned from work to a night out with the girls. Terrific color, a really deep green, almost teal, a great change for me since I usually find myself in black and navy. But keep in mind the neck is deep so maybe wear a camisole or size down. Definitely would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Even my husband commented how pretty this blouse is! It's very loose and boho, but very pretty!
love it. Great color and flows nicely.
links_reviews_text: forgiving shape.

This is a cute shirt for jeans, slacks, skirt, etc. It's definitely a loose fit, but even so I thought it ran a bit big. Wore it to work and got tons of compliments; the colors are great and the material is very flowy.
This blouse is gorgeous but runs SO big. I'm a 6-8 and got the Medium. I'll rent again but in an XS.

links_reviews_title: This is a great blouse for holiday parties.
links_reviews_text: It is very festive, comfortable and colorful.
The color and print were "on", but the fit just wasn't flattering for me. I like a shift style, but this was even too boxy for me. Maybe because I'm short?

links_reviews_title: Cute but overwhelmed a shorter person
links_reviews_text: Very blousy in chest area, overwhelmed me at 5'3"
The fabric is beautiful but the shape is wide and blousy. Looked like a maternity top on me!

I rented this for every day. The shirt is nice, nothing super special. It runs HUGE and was probably too big to wear, but I was being stubborn and wore it anyway. The sleeves are a little short and ride up while wearing to be more 3/4 length than the model's photos.

This shirt is beautiful! It's got a lot of fabric though-I think I could almost wear and XS, and I am never an XS (well, expect maybe with Anthro's vanity sizing). I would not recommend going up a size.
Amazing shirt that surprisingly fits my DDD chest without puckering or looking weird. Would buy it if it weren't so expensive. Worth the price though. Matches black or navy which is a plus.
Beautiful floaty fabric and colors. Lots of compliments and easy to dress up or wear with jeans.

I LOVE Badgley Mischka, and wanted to love this shirt more than I did. I liked it, but the proportions were just a little too big on me. The shirt is completely sheer, so I paired with a bralette. The pretty pattern and bell sleeves were my favorite features of this top.
Lovely print & fit. Note: the material is sheer, so it needs something under it. Would rent again.
Beautiful and feminine. I actually got ooohs and awwwws when I walked into work. So many compliments and felt super professional.
Beautiful Top with sheer sleeves. Professional but sexy and perfectly lovely top for work. Ruffles and flowers make it very feminine as well!
The blouse is so much prettier in person. Love it!!

links_reviews_title: Great shirt, but issue with buttons
links_reviews_text: The shirt is beautiful and flattering. The top two buttons would not stay buttoned no matter what though - it fit loosely across my chest, but was annoying to keep redoing all day. I normally wear a L and went with XL based on other reviews - XL fit great.
Received compliments every time I wore this blouse. It's sheer, so a cami was necessary for me. Runs true to size. SOOOO cute.
This blouse fit me perfectly. The sheerness of it was sexy while the overall look of the shirt made it very professional. I loved everything about it, from the cut to the print.

links_reviews_title: very comfortable, loved the flowy sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Fit well in shoulders, flowy across stomach, good length.

Thought this would be a cute work top but pleasantly surprised at the overall fit and look. It was the right amount of flowy while still giving you a shape. Was perfect to go from work to our with friends. Would rent again. Easily wearable with work slacks, skirt, jeans or leggings. Paired with a colorful blazer made it pop.
The sleeves are long but looked great peaking through my black blazer
It's a great day to night blouse. Flirty and professional!
It's a super cute top. Way too see through for work so I had to use another top under.

I am very busty and this buttons up. Usually that's an issue for me but not with this. Plenty of pretty flowy room. Wear with black cami as it is sheer. Wore with black skinnies and booties. Im 5'7" and weigh 170 and wore large.

links_reviews_title: I loved the sleeve details and ruffled front. Great construction.
links_reviews_text: Feminine & flattering blouse. This top runs true to size. I got it for work, but it would be great for every day and the weekend. The construction is very good. The ruffles lie flat and didn't make me look top-heavy.
Very nice details, pretty pattern. The tie neck made it more conservative, as it was a bit sheer. Wore for work and it was just fine.

links_reviews_title: Super cute & flattering shirt for work or a night out!
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Pretty blouse, XL was too big but still looked nice.
links_reviews_text: It was large on me so I wore it with leggings and received many compliments. It was more flowing than fitted. So depending on what look you want would determine your size.
Perfect work top with a cami underneath. Will definitely rent again.
I think I may have got a size too big and the cuffs kept getting in the way... but it was appropriate for work and after work. I felt pretty in it. Good fabric and cut. Pretty design.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and out to dinner with a pair of light jeans and a leather jacket
links_reviews_text: Great shirt- easy to wear and feel super cute and stylish! Perfect for fall!
Very cute flattering top. It is completely sheer so it will need a cami.
Great fit!
nice fit, nice material. unique details.
Pretty and sheer. Lovely everyday blouse. You can size down if you want it more fitted, up for more flowing. Lovely longer sleeves.
Is oversized but still flattering. I would go a size down if available!

links_reviews_title: I looked for every reason to wear
links_reviews_text: This has been by far my favorite rental! Fun flattering sexy warm versatile....all the things. I could have gone down a size however it was nice to be a little oversized.

This coat was SO good. I never write RTR reviews but I felt compelled for this one since it's my favorite thing I've reented. Wore it to a winter wedding and was so cozy and definitely warm enough in 30-40 degree weather. It's SUPER SOFT and luxurious... feels like you're wearing the most perfect weighted blanket if that makes sense. Color was a nice neutral pinkish. I got a L and it was definitely an oversized fit for me (5'9", 160 lbs, and long arms haha) but I didn't mind that it was huge since it made it that much cozier. So tough to send this one back!!!

links_reviews_title: Huge but also super furry and fun!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is gigantic and cozy and fuzzy which means it feels like you're wrapped in the comfiest bath robe while you run your errands. I love this jacket even though it may look a bit ridiculous for everyday wear!
It runs large. I really need a large or maybe even a medium.

links_reviews_title: The feel says, 'bathrobe.' The color says, 'muppet fallen on hard times.'
links_reviews_text: Confession: I rented this because seemingly every mom in lower Manhattan has a similar jacket-- and now I understand why. It's giant, it's fluffy and it's a hug magnet for every kid you come in contact with whether you gave birth to them or not. The dusty purple is slightly worrisome because in poor lighting it can appear grungy and dirty. Great rental; on the fence purchasing.

links_reviews_title: Like being wrapped in a warm, classy blanket
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat. It was so warm (great for a 30 degree night) and incredibly soft. The gentle pink color was so pretty, and the lining was just beautiful. Every time I put it on I felt just a little more dressed up, even if I was wearing jeans. It has a button at the left collar so you can wear it without a scarf and still stay warm, and the pockets are very deep. I had a hard time sending this one back. Fit is TTS, though it's meant to be a bit oversized for sure.

links_reviews_title: It was super warm and soft.
links_reviews_text: Cozy AF.
Loved it! Wore it every day for a few weeks. Rented it for a vacation and kept it for weeks after. So cozy cuddly soft.

links_reviews_title: Very nice and stylish but it was too big.
links_reviews_text: Large fit but in style and nice
Super warm coat. Oversized in fit. I think I would have preferred sizing down in this.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to give this back
links_reviews_text: Adore this coat. Color and fit perfect. It's oversized but meant to be. Just love it. Don't want to let it go

links_reviews_title: Fun piece for everyday wear or for a night out.
links_reviews_text: This jacket was perfect for NYE. It kept me warm on a pretty cold night (maybe 40 degrees) and was super soft and fun to wear. It runs large, so I sized down and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: This coat is the real deal. Every human wants to touch it and I have received a zillion complements
links_reviews_text: It's forgiving - you can cram thick sweaters underneath or just wear a thin shirt. It's warm and the satin lining is sublime.

links_reviews_title: I looked like a furry box.
links_reviews_text: If you're a little broad shouldered, I highly advise skipping this jacket. I looked like a box the second I tried it on (it doesn't help that I received it dirty). Went immediately back in the bag.
Loved the fit of this jacket. Very oversized and super warm.
Too big overall. Very warm. Will try a smaller size
Love this comfy and stylish coat I'm considering purchasing. I've gotten so many compliments on it!
This coat is incredible! It's kept me warm through all of the recent snow storms in the area, and the color is perfect! Definitely rent this if you can! Runs large.
It was way too big on my frame to wear, but the fabric and color is incredible!! Will order smaller again.

links_reviews_title: Want to feel like a JLo in "Hustlers"/a mafia queen? This is your dreamcoat
links_reviews_text: The Giant Teddy Coat Conundrum is a mathematical ratio that describes how simultaneously boss/ridiculous you feel in an oversized luxury teddy coat. The lining is super soft satin and the teddy fur itself is very cozy. I wish the color was a little less dingy, it reads as slightly dirty to me. I kept this coat for the better part of a month because I liked wearing it that much.

I loved the color and texture of this coat, from the pink satin-y lining to the unbelievably soft faux fur. It was super warm too, could easily wear it in below-freezing temperatures, and it came down almost to my knees. The only thing was the medium was almost too big - treading the line between "chic oversized" and just ridiculous. Gotta wear it with swag or else be engulfed.
Super easy dress to throw on! Could dress up or down. Would definitely rent again!
Fits well, the material is corduroy and was thicker than I expected. The color is more of a brown/black than a true black.
I wore this three times, I liked it so much. I wish I could make the corduroy work for more outfits. Very comfortable jacket.

links_reviews_title: Cute, chic, fits like a glove. So in love.
links_reviews_text: This blazer fits like a glove. The color is more like a greeny-brown than completely brown but I love it. It is perfect for work but I could definitely pair it with jeans for a chic look on a casual day out. LOVE LOVE LOVE

I was hoping to wear this to Thanksgiving but I didn't pay close attention to the length. I think it's better for work, it's a little too thick to look chic (the way a suede or thinner corduroy would fit slim to the body).

links_reviews_title: Fabric makes it hard to style.
links_reviews_text: Maybe it's just me, but the dark brownish green corduroy makes this blazer very difficult to style nicely. I felt like I was wearing my grandpa's coat or getting ready for a horseback riding lesson. My friend described it as being "very heavy" on me even though the size I rented fit me perfectly. Runs slightly large, so I'd recommend sizing down one.
Fit well, comfortable and versatile.

links_reviews_title: Great blazer, a bit tight in the chest.
links_reviews_text: Overall made for an excellent look. Casual yet still classy. Was a bit tight in the bust, but overall looked just fine! Loved it!
Feels like it's already tailored and is perfect on the waist.
Nice soft corduroy.
Rented this for day to day and I love it!! I'm really thinking about buying it. It's so cute and comfy. Looks great with jeans or dressy pants. Such a fun unique shirt!
Nice enough, wore it for casual Thanksgiving. The fit thru the body is rather straight & boxy, tucking the front helped a little. Sleeves add interest, but don't try to help with Thanksgiving dishes!
Wore to work and loved the extra kick the sleeves added. Elastic around the wrists was a little snug. I'm tall with longer arms and they went almost to my wrists - still looked great.
True to size. Nice burnt orange color.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and versatile top that can be work at work or fun! Super flattering as well

links_reviews_text: Really loved the fun sleeves. I loved the elastic at the wrist that kept the sleeves from being too overwhelming. Fabric was gorgeous and fit was amazing. I almost kept it!

links_reviews_title: Super fun. Got to wear it to an evening out with friends, and work.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, great weight, great hang.

This shirt made such a statement while still being a classic. I paired it nicely with the Gas Bijoux Mariza earrings and it was a great look. Highly recommend! Also the sleeves are definitely large and in charge (super cute though!)
Very flattering. Sleeves are HUGE. But fun. Great fit for busty girls.
Such a cute top, fit true to size! It was cute for a date night out with jeans and booties but also was fine for work with dress pants and heels!! Loved the ruffles on the sleeves
I received so many compliments on this top and really considered buying it. Looks great tucked into high wasted pants or untucked!

I received so many compliments on this shirt! It was perfect for Thanksgiving!! The ruffles on the sleeves seriously reminded me of turkey feathers. The color is rich and the material is super high quality. I was initially going to wear this shirt to work, but I thought it was a tad too fancy with the sleeves. Anyway, loved it for a family gathering! I would definitely recommend, but I would recommend personally going a size up, but I am a woman with a thicker upper arm.
I rented this for work and it was a nice fit, though I would have preferred more length so that I could do a front tuck. The material is nice, but overall I didn't find it to be very social of a top.
Loose boxy fit. Sleeves were bracelet length on me. Looked nice tucked into a mid to high waist skirt, also cute with jeans. Dressy but not over the top.

Didn't wear. The shirt was kind of short for me and I'm only 5'2. Also there's ruffles down the front, which is hard to notice in the pictures. My husband called it the black version of the ruffled white Seinfeld shirt. It just wasn't for me.

It was a nice top but the buttons around the bust popped open multiple times. I had to pin it whilst I was wearing it. I am not a busty person either and there was room in the top around the bust area. Button holes seem to big for the top.
Loved wearing this. Wore it a few times - it was easy to dress up for the evening or with jeans for the day. Very comfortable and pretty!
Wore this several times - with a suit, with jeans, with a sweater on top. Nice fit, beautiful fabric, very polished look.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments! Easy to wear with jeans and skirt.
links_reviews_text: Fit was good.... I have a larger chest and it was roomy enough and not too big. Hit right at hips on length so was perfect to wear with jeans too

I'm a college professor and I wore to teach class, which, due to the current pandemic, was conducted online via zoom in the comfort of my living room (slash classroom). The sweater dress was very comfortable and the color looked great on camera! Great for video calls and nice and stretchy for those walks to the kitchen for pandemic panic snacks.
Beautiful, warm sweater dress in vibrant colors. Cozy and warm, yet stylish. Very narrow in the waist.
I'm 5'3 and this was so beautiful but definitely short on me. I wore with black tights but still could have used a few more inches. Got lots of compliments on the colors - look amazing in person.

don't be fooled by the model's picture. It's so short that you really have to wear tights/pants under. It's extremely short. I can't go out of my door without pants under this sweater, but it's comfy and great looking. Love it.

This fit and flare style dress truly accentuates the bust and waist and falls nicely around the hips/rear. The fabric is comfortable, thick, and warm - perfect for a cold day or evening. I am between a 4 and 6 (depending on the designer) but went with the Medium and it fit well. It wasn't too tight or loose anywhere. Highly recommend and would rent again!

Beautiful knit with unique features like the bell sleeves, flattering boat neckline and color pops in sleeves and skirt make this dress a conversation piece. Warm for fall /winter. Fitted in the middle so be aware as it will high a muffin top! Loved overall!
Comfortable beautiful fit. Got a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: The colors and fit of this dress are perfect
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small or a medium. I'm a true size 6. I thought the medium was going to be too big because it's a knit stretch dress, but it was actually perfect. I loved this with navy blue boots. I should have kept and bought this dress in hindsight. Just everything about this dress is perfect for fall.
Super comfortable and cute! Tons of compliments! The colors really pop and it makes your waist stand out...super sexy

The dress looked good and was easy to wear. If you have braid shoulders/hips it might be hard to get it on. The waist does not stretch so there's no way I could have pulled it up, and it took a little maneuvering to get both arms + shoulders through the waist while putting it on over my head.
Absolutely love this dress. Quality fabric. Fabulous colors. Perfect for the fall.
Simple dress with a little skirt-flare for the office. Nothing too special, but a great fit, nice material and vibrant color. Nice change on the typical sweater dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect winter to spring transition dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress has the perfect pops of color. Flattering fit and super comfortable. I will definitely rent again unless I buy it first!

links_reviews_title: HOT DRESS!! The material is great quality.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like it was made just for me. I loved the movement of the material.
Though a bit overworn for my liking, I wore this to a brunch at Bergdorf's and received a lot of compliments. It was colorful and comfortable.
Like all RTR items I've worn to work, many compliments. The fit was good for my early postpartum physique. Definitely would wear again!
Received so many compliments! Fit great, very flattering at the waist. Only complaint is it runs short for work, so I wore it with tights. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: So many people commented on this dress. It was comfortable and flattering. It was a little short but wore it to a dinner and not work so it was fine. The sleeves and detail are beautiful. I enjoyed wearing this a lot and will rent again.

Lovely structured sweater dress, perfect for a regular office days in the Fall/Winter. I love the colors! I'm usually size 0/XS and size S just fit perfectly. Will rent it again before winter is finished!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors, not my favorite fit
links_reviews_text: This was a crowd pleaser at work. Got lots of compliments but I didn't love it. The center band was a little high if I recall (renter this a while ago but review never appeared) making it more A line than depicted. But the colors are so vibrant!

links_reviews_title: Kind of itchy and runs small
links_reviews_text: This dress is really pretty, but it's itchy and runs small. It's well made though, would rent again in the correct size.
Could use a little more stretch and softness. Overall though I loved it!
My husband loved this when i tried it on and i did too! Super flattering and fun but way too short for work unfortunately which is why i had ordered it.
Beautiful fall dress for work but fits very tight.

links_reviews_title: Super cute & comfy, tons of compliments from strangers
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size small--if anything, slightly big, so if you're a smaller size 4 or not especially curvy you might consider the XS. I wore it to a conference in Chicago and with sheer dark tights and boots that pushed the envelope a bit it was the perfect combination of edgy yet professional (the boots have a bit of pink with the blue). People stopped me all day to compliment my look.
Definitely runs small. Love the colorful weave, good for fall or spring because the fabric is rather thin.

I rented this with my unlimited and ended up giving it to my daughter to wear. I have a straight build and the skirt poufed out in a weird way on me. My daughter is much curvier and it was extremely flattering on her. Loved the colors and ribbing - very comfortable. You just need some hips to make this work.
WAY too short.

I liked this dress when I received it and kept it around and finally wore it to work today. It's casual and wrinkles easily as you can see from the picture, and it really doesn't do anything for me because it's a little long on my 5'4" frame. In this pic I'm running out the door to work with wet hair. I do think it looks a little better in person than it does in the picture.
Dress is just as pictured. Bottom is lined. Worked well with a strapless bra. Straps are adjustable. This has a flexible fit and will be great on all body types.
I'll be keeping this one for a long time! Easy to dress up or just wear around town with flip flops. I'm usually an XS in this brand but it wasn't available, and I was happy the Small fit so well!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but does not WOW
links_reviews_text: The fit was fine, but there was not anything exciting about this dress. The fabric felt a little heavy for my sunny vacation and the dress did not look as good as the other items I had rented. You could dress it up with the right accessories, but I did not like it enough to make room for it in my suitcase. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Nice comfortable vacation dress. Nothing special.
links_reviews_text: Fit well.
Wore this on a trip to islands. So comfortable and airy. Loved that you don't have to wear a bra with it

links_reviews_title: Super cute but long for short girls
links_reviews_text: Very casual and nice. The dress is lined so it's actually warmer than you may need for a linen dress
Wish I could buy this dress! It's so easy - throw on a blazer and flats for work or over a bathing suit for the beach. Absolutely love.
I love the fit but I couldn't wear it for long periods of time. With a big chest the top rises up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, beach cover up or summer staple
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and was tempted to buy it. I'll rent it again. Perfect for summer everyday - to the beach or pool. Can be dressed up or down. I am breastfeeding and it was easy with this dress too (that can be hard to shop for!)
Needs to be a few inches shorter for midi or longer for maxi. Strange length. Did not use it

links_reviews_title: Looks so much better in the photo than in real life
links_reviews_text: This dress looks so cute in the photo, but unfortunately in real life its pretty frumpy looking. The length is awkwardly long (I'm 5'11" and I found it long) and the waist is not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and cute dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: For true to size.
Cute dress for daytime. Was a bit long for flats and I'm 5"7
has a bit of stretch so that's good bc it does run small ... normally I'd wear a small, but the med was perfect . Contemplating buying it, i do love it!
It is a bit short on the torso so if you are taller maybe size up but I was able to make it work!
Loved this jumpsuit! Fitted and flattering. Highly recommend especially for petites like myself. Usually am in between XS and S, definitely recommend going a size up. Great look for everyday.

I enjoyed wearing this! The jumpsuit reminded me of the movie Top Gun, with a little chic. I wore it on New Year's Eve - accessorized with silver pumps, some rhinestone bracelets for a little sparkle to elevate the look. The fit was true to size on my petite frame. It was not tight at all nor too short in the rise. Loved it!

Are you petite like me and want a trendy perfectly fitted traipse-around-the-city outfit? Look no further!! This was absolutely one of my favorite rentals. I'm very petite and this fit like a glove. Wore it with black ankle booties and then dressed it up with stilettos, one extra button open, and layered gold necklaces for a funky evening look!

links_reviews_title: LOVE but not for the tall or long torso'ed
links_reviews_text: I love a good jumpsuit - one piece to slip on and I am out the door looking put together! This piece is structured in all the right places. The cap shoulders are slightly ruched which I wasn't expecting, I guess it added a little bit of a girly touch. If you are tall or have a long torso you probably don't wear jumpsuits - and you won't want this one. It's short in the torso. All-in-all, I love this and might just have to keep it!
Great fit, stylish and fun.

links_reviews_title: Cute but careful if you are long waisted
links_reviews_text: The style was super cute but I wish I'd ordered the bigger size. The snug fit was ok for a night out with my husband (he liked it) but not comfortable for a day at work. I am short-waisted and this was close to a wedgie feeling. Definitely beware if you are long waisted.

I wish I would have listened to another reviewer and sized up. I don't know why I thought I was the exception. This runs 2 sizes too small. I'm a size true size 4, occasionally a 2 in jeans and this jumper is ridiculously tight. If I stood up straight I would have had to censor the photo. I could have taken a size medium to fit regular/fitted or a size large for a oversized look.

links_reviews_title: Form fitting jumpsuit for every day
links_reviews_text: Love this jumpsuit. Most of times that I've rented jumpsuits, they been baggy and unflattering. Not this one! Very snug and form fitting. Definitely runs on the smaller side. It's also a pretty, dark/olive green. There's a zipper where jeans would have a zipper, one button above, and the remaining buttons are all snaps. Pants are cropped (I'm 5-7 and it hit me like Capri pants).

links_reviews_title: The best work from home outfit
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and great for Zoom meetings; also great for petite women!! I'm only 5'1" and the length of this jumpsuit was perfection!
Usually wear a size 28 jean/6 pant and the medium wouldn't even go over my booty...and my booty ain't that big!

links_reviews_title: Way too small and too short in the torso.
links_reviews_text: Does not accommodate large shoulders. Typically I'm an M in tops and an S in pants (size 4-6 or 27 waist). I had to size up to the large just to properly snap this up, but even the large was too short in the torso. No thank you, cameltoe. I don't have a terribly long torso, either! If you are short and have narrow shoulders this would work better for you, but it's definitely not for the broad-shouldered.
I got many compliments on this! I have a long torso, so it just fit. If you tend to be long in the torso, size up.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute and flattering jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: This is adorable and comfortable. The problem is it runs small - I ha e to return my XS for an S as the XS doesn't fit

links_reviews_title: So cute but tight in the middle
links_reviews_text: Length is perfect for a petite gal of ~5'2 like me. The middle of the jumpsuit is VERY fitted. Probably should have sized up to a small as I don't love a tight fit. Otherwise very cute and comfortable fabric!
Great fit, comfortable and pockets.
I'll rent this again but just in a larger size. Cute but very very snug.
Rented a small. Very cute jumpsuit. However, if you are tall this is not for you. If I stood up straight I would Hulk tear out of it.
I wear a size 26 jean consistently (I'm 5 8) and this was too short in the torso! I was sad because I loved it so much..so size up!!!

I was able to wear this once but it was a tight squeeze! The jumpsuit was a tough short for me (5'8) which I could have dealt with but the torso length is also very short and made sitting pretty uncomfortable. It's probably best on girls 5'5 and under but it is really fun! Love the little puff sleeve.
I love this jumpsuit. It fit absolutely perfectly. I am 5'4', and about 125ish, 32 DDD. This fit like a glove. Sexy, feminine military look.
Cute, tight in the bottom. Heads up for any of my fellow RTR peeps with a booty. Fun and comfortable with a little stretch.

Unfortunately I didn't see the other review until after I ordered this. This thing runs super small. I'm 125#, 2/4, and got the small. Couldn't zip it up. Conversely, the the top part was over sized and I had plenty of room through the bust, shoulders, etc. If you're curvy at all on the bottom size up two sizes. If most of your curves are on top you can probably go with your normal size if you want it tight, but go up a size if you want it to fit like on the model. It's super cute! Just weird sizing.

Great fit but short in the torso, arms, and legs. Didn't mind the cropped legs and sleeves so much as how hard it was to get in and out of this because it was short in the torso. Loved the fit through the waist. Would size up if you have a longer torso or want a more relaxed fit

This is really cute and came new with tags which is the best, but was too small and I couldn't wear. I rented a small and I am a true size 4. Would have done better with at least one size larger. If you like an oversized fit, go 2 sizes higher!

This jumper was very comfy but well worn. The fabric was a bit faded and tired feeling - like it's been rented a lot. However, for a more casual look, it's very comfy and once you figure out how the ties look best (loose or tighter for a more fitted look) it can be a really cute look. I wore it with a black satin jacket & heels at work but threw some sandals on after work for an on-line HH with girlfriends-still got lots of compliments.
Omg this thing is so comfortable. Not sure it was the most flattering, especially on my backside. The three ties are a little annoying to re-tie everytime you use the restroom but not the worst.

Love the print and comfort of this jumpsuit. I received several compliments at work! I took off on star because the fabric is different than most of Banjanan's other pieces. This one is flowier and reminded me of pajama fabric.

links_reviews_title: Fresh floral to spruce up daywear
links_reviews_text: The ruffle sleeve and tie neck add detail to the top without making it bulky. I thought the top was very flattering. The bottom was a bit fuller than I need, but with the drawstring I could easily adjust some gathering to keep the backside more fitted. Was a colorful fun piece to wear during the day.

links_reviews_title: Enjoyed wearing, but not figure flattering
links_reviews_text: Wore this jumpsuit to an event at botanical gardens. Very comfortable. Has a pajama feel with soft fabric. Was great for a cool summer day. Liked the fabric print. Not too short in torso. Wish it was a little tighter in the pant area. Enjoyed wearing, bit I think it made me look thicker than I am below waist. Wish was more form-fitting in the pant.
I didn't get to wear it just being at home. I rented for work
This was SO comfortable! Such a beautiful print!

Does feel a little like pajamas, but not in a bad way at all. I agree that the ties make it a little more flattering and give it some shape, but all the ties and buttons make it super annoying to go to the bathroom.
The size runs a little big, but still very cute. Can't wait to wear this to work this week.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable!!! I got a lot of compliments on the outfit I would totally wear this again
This felt and looked like pajamas!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was so soft and had no shape, I almost did not wear it. It felt too casual, but I went for it and did receive quite a few compliments. It was VERY comfortable and the fabric was very soft and thin, but no show through.
King of looks like PJs but super comfy. Don't let the ties scare you - they actually help the jumpsuit to fit better! Would wear again.

At 5'8", finding a jumpsuit that is long enough in the body can be tricky. This fit so well! Another inch in the pant legs would've made this perfect, but wasn't a dealbreaker. I worried that the all-over pattern would be a bit overwhelming, but I received so many compliments. Wore twice - once for an all-day look (lunch, errands, etc.) with sandals, once for dinner with kitten heels. Will rent again.

This jumper really feels like a pair of pajamas. If you need something cute but comfy- this is it. Like other reviewers, had a hard time getting it off and on in the bathroom- so many ties and buttons. Fun but not exactly date night material. Wore a few times.
This was completely unflattering and the proportions were just way off. It had funky ties on the top. I sent it right back. Positive comment.... super soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Not as dressy as the picture makes it seem. Fabric is like a comfy pajama which was a nice surprise!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy! You do have to button from your waist to your neck as well as three ties, which is not ideal but also makes it that much more unique! I am 5'9 so it was a bit cropped for me as well. Will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Fun print, flattering, and so comfortable
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments wearing this to work. The fabric is more casual than I thought it would be. Very lightweight and perfect for work or everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but too many ribbons
links_reviews_text: Fit really well but I didn't like the ribbons. There are three ties on the front that must be tied to close the jumpsuit. Too much fabric and also too much work when you need to take off the entire jumpsuit in order to go to the bathroom.
Great pattern but pretty baggy fit
People were stopping me in my tracks, asking where I got this jumpsuit. LOVE.

For some reason I thought this company was going to run small so I got a large. Are usually wear a size 8. And the large really is quite big and I should've had a medium. The fabric is absolutely lovely and I would be happy to try it in a size smaller.

links_reviews_title: Perfect vacation night out! Fun pattern and great flattering fit!!
links_reviews_text: So easy to wear and surprisingly flattering for a maxi-dress. Soft fabric, great pattern, can't wait to rent again for summer.... would consider buying... perfect for any occasion!!

This is a pull-on dress with an elastic chest band. Weight of the material is nice and it does not wrinkle. Not very breathable so it would be too hot if it were very warm out in my opinion. I'm a 32B/C and 5'7" - chest and length were perfect (wore flats).
Stretchy, comfy, flattering and fun! Loved it!!

I was looking for a nice but casual dress for an August bridal shower that also works with my 6 month bump...this dress was super flowy and nice to wear in the summer heat, I imagine to the beach etc. The tightest point is in the rib cage, below the bra line, and is super stretchy so I think it would work with many different body types and pregnant tummies. A little on the longer side, it was a bit long to me in my flat sandals at 5-9" but it could be dressed up with some heels too. All in all a nice dress and fit and looked just like what I expected from the picture.

links_reviews_title: It looked great for a night out in Playa Mujeres! So comfy and loved the fabric. Wore it twice!
links_reviews_text: Great Fabric. fit great
beautiful drape and not clingy, very comfortable
So pretty and flattering. Length is just right - I'm 5'7". Thought it ran a little large.

I intended to wear this on vacation in Hawaii but it was too nice for day time at the beach/pool in a bikini and it did not provide enough support to be worn at night without a bra. If I had a good strapless bra, I'd have loved this for a vacation evening
Very stretchy and comfortable but a little bit long. Nothing extraordinary but definitely a wardrobe staple or great for vacations

I didn't ended up wearing this on vacation but not because I didn't love it. It's a beautiful comfortable dress. I almost bought it but it's winter and I have no use for it. But it's a great dress, perfect for a vacation.

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable, beautiful, and the fabric was amazing in the hot Cabo evening!
links_reviews_text: Perfect length for flat sandals (I'm 5'8) or low heeled shoes
Cute dress but not so flattering on top for me. I was supposed to get for my vacation but it came late ski wore tobrunch with a cardigan. Long but good length for sandals.
Runs large.

links_reviews_title: It just made me feel dumpy. It was comfortable but not anything special
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. Runs true to size Colors were pretty but just nothing to write home about.

This fit really well and looks really great. The fabric is good quality and not see through. It is quite long though. I wore it with 2” heels and it was still a little too long. It was fine for just a night at sitting around at a brewery and then dinner. Would not have worked if I did a lot of walking.

A great maxi that I wore over my suit to the pool and to run errands. It was very comfortable and flattering. It probably wouldn't work for shorter people. I'm slightly taller than 5'8 and it was a similar length to the featured picture when I was barefoot.

links_reviews_title: Cute!! Can dress it up or wear it as casual.
links_reviews_text: Wore over a black bathing suit with some hoops for walking around near the beach and having lunch. I'm only 5' tall but was able to knot it on one side and it looked cute. I could definitely see dressing it up with fancier jewelry and wedges. Very stretchy. Found that it ran a little big.
Nice long dress. Flattering top. Had to wear a strapless bra to fill it out or else it would've kept slipping.
This dress was a bit blah. On the upside, it's very long and is great for tall girls.

I'm 5'8" so this was a nice long dress without having to choose a long size. The material was kind of stretchy and a tad bit shiny. There are no pockets. You can wear with or without a bra because of the way the top criss crosses.
Flattering, warm, and a great length!
Tight fit, pretty colors. Knocked one star because material was a bit itchy.

links_reviews_title: I felt comfortable in this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a winter brunch. I loved the thick sweater knit fabric. It kept me warm and looked stylish. The arms were a little long, but I rolled them up.

Loved this dress! Rented it for a winter vacation, but ended up wearing it to work first. Sooooo many compliments on the fit, pattern, and cut! Would definitely rent again. I would normally have rented a small, but the medium was available and fit beautifully so I would say it runs slightly small, but it's a stretchy fabric so it depends on how tight you like it. I'm 5'8" and it hit me below the knee so it's pretty conservative as well.
Perfect dress for a holiday party. Hugged all my curves in the right way. Would def rent again!
Good maternity dress, probably looks better on a taller, slender person but I enjoyed throwing it on with a pair of OTK boots. Material is a little scratchy.
Everyone thought it was a two piece. Lots of compliments. Comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Love the look of this dress. It is a bit tight so glad I got the small. Excellent quality.
links_reviews_text: Fits snug to the body but not skin right. Very nice quality. Loved the ruffle at the bottom

links_reviews_title: Better for curvy gals but ok with a belt
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and found it a bit hard to style. I didn't love it with sneakers nor with heels. I don't have a very defined waist so I think I wouldn't rent again since I would look pretty straight-and-narrow without the assistance of a belt.
Comfortable and warm dress that looks good enough for a party.
This dress was great for work and pretty comfortable. Agree with the other reviewers who said it seems really tight at first. It was also nice and warm for my overly A/C'd office.
I received a lot of compliments when I wore this dress. It is comfortable, warm and stylish. Hugs your curves yet is professional. Highly recommend.
Fit very well, except for sleeves. Sleeves were too long, so needed to cuff.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress for a dressed up casual environment
links_reviews_text: Loves this dress for an elevated casual look. Very flattering, not too tight around the hips, just figure skimming. Great for curves! The only issue I had is that the top was oddly tight. I would still rent it again because it loosened up during the day, but beware- the top was more form-fitting than the bottom.
Nice work fit

links_reviews_title: It is cute and nice for work.
links_reviews_text: It is very warm and comfortable. Over the course of the day the dress stretched out. It is great for winter.
Perfect for work >> dinner on a Friday
Like other reviews said, it's super tight when you first put it on but it loosens up fast and fits so snugly it's like wearing a hug. Loved this dress and got loads of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. Wildly flattering on an hourglass shape.
links_reviews_text: Great for short curvy girls! The material is comfy but nice and thick so I felt like it held me in and hugged my hips in a really flattering way. It also accentuates the waist really nicely. I felt both warm and sexy.

links_reviews_title: A flirty sweater dress perfect for cold weather
links_reviews_text: I loved this garment! Anytime I can pull on tights and boots and get out the door makes for a winner of an outfit. Sleeves were a tad long, but otherwise this dress fit like a dream.
This is my first RTR item EVERRR!! Very pleased with the dress fit..at first it was a little snug but in a few minutes it loosened up. Overall, a beautiful dress and will rent it again :)
The dress fit great and the sleeves are nice and long for those with long arms.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel great!
links_reviews_text: I felt great wearing this. I wore it both to work and to a few holiday parties. It does show any lumps underneath so I recommend shapeware. It is quite warm.

I wore this dress on Thanksgiving and got so many compliments on it! I wore an XS which is my usual size and it fit perfectly. As someone else mentioned, it definitely feels tight when you first put it on but it stretches slightly as you wear it but if you're concerned about sizing I'd suggest sizing up. It was a freezing cold day but the dress was very warm and soft. I'd definitely rent again and would recommend to others!

links_reviews_title: Great feel, unique sweater dress style!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for work or outing! I wore it to Sunday service! Loved the fit and the way it enhances my curves! Great spin on the sweater dress! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Its tight at start & then its fit!!!
links_reviews_text: I almost sent it back, i though it wad to tight & needed bot jus S, but M may be , I usually get XS in this designer, it was so tight, i went with less push up bra possibly,& then 30 min later its stretched to be just perfect...,not sure if dry clean do that or yarn itself, but may be go 1 size up, but give it 30 min- it will get to size its need to be
Really comfortable, stylish, and flattering!

I'll need to upsize next time to be able to wear it. The knitted pattern on top does not have much give and was too tight to wear comfortably. Narrow shoulders may not have the same issue. The rest of the dress had a lot of give, so it really was just the very top.
Thinner than expected fabric. Sleeves were extremely long. But still cute!

I enjoyed wearing this chic sweater dress, which was perfect for work wear on cold winter days. As noted by other reviewers, it is very tight fitting and sucks everything in. I loved the extra long length and paired it with tights and booties.

I was skeptical about this dress but it was amazing! Like the other reviews, it was tight to get on but once I was wearing it, it was flatting and beautiful!! It's longer but I'm 5'6 and wore it with tights and booties. Loved!!
All you'd want in a sweater dress--warm, fit well, and had a fun print to spice it up.

Was worried that being in my third trimester the size (SR) might be too snug but it wasn't. It allows a good amount of stretch around the belly so it was flattering. Being 5.2" in height getting a medium wouldn't look nice length wise.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for work, holiday parties, and family pics.
links_reviews_text: Loved the way this dress fit throughout and flared at the bottom. I would buy it had it not been heavily worn already.

I got this too late to wear for Christmas, but it fits like a glove! It is a little big tight like other people have said when you first put it on, but once you have it on for a few minutes, it fits perfectly! The tightness almost conforms to your body but in a flattering way! The dress is on the longer side which is nice for the winter and the flare on the bottom is not too much. The detailing on the top is so nice and the colors are beautiful. This is great for a holiday party or during the winter for work! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Festive for holidays, super warm and cozy.
links_reviews_text: Super thick material and holds it all in. Super form fitting and booty-licious. Wouldn't have worn it to work, because of the super tight fit (on me) but wore it to a birthday dinner in December with tall black boots and it was both warm and cute. Kind of a totally-covered up but still sexy in Winter look. If you're between sizes, I'd size up.
Such a great fit. Hugs you in all the right places
The sleeves ran long, but tight. The flare at the bottom is a nice touch. The thick material is too warm (and a bit itchy) for a Texas winter.
Goes on pretty tight but remains comfy throughout the day and doesn't stretch.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but tighter than expected
links_reviews_text: Sweater material more restricting than expected - I would size up for a more comfortable fit

links_reviews_title: A winner for this busty gal!
links_reviews_text: This generous fit gave me the nice loose fit I wanted to have for a Valentine's day lunch date.. The shoulders of he XL are just a touch wide and my sleeves might look a bit too long but I found it undistracting. Beautiful colors and sequins!
This is a gorgeous color! The appliqué detailing is beautiful. Perfect work sweater. Just the tiniest bit itchy. This picture does not do it justice.
Really loving all the PG sweaters for winter! The floral sequin details is just so adorable!
Really nice fit. A little itchy. Perfect for work lunch.
Like the bright color and the design. The S fit me well.

Love the sequin details and the deep navy color but this sweater is short. Went down to the top of my hip and I didn't feel comfortable without a camisole underneath. It runs a little small. I might have felt more comfortable in a Medium.
Cute top. I'm tall, so I was surprised the arm length worked, but I would have loved a slightly longer length. That said, it was fun to wear and a really nice blue.

I love these sweaters! I rented the teal blue/black sequined one before and had to get this one! The sequin color scheme is way prettier in person! Fit is cozy for jeans, but you can dress it up with slacks or a skirt.
The length is a little short, so I wore a lime camisole underneath to play up the sequin details. It is a little itchy, but had a nice sleek fit.
This sweater runs very small but the color and detailing are lovely. Wish it had fit!

links_reviews_title: Item had body odor upon receiving
links_reviews_text: Item had B.O. upon receiving.

PROS: I bought this to wear with a skirt I rented, but it didn't go. I couldn't find anything else to wear with it in my closet so I sent it back. I may rent again though. It is a great vibrant blue and the details are very pretty. CONS: It was a bit more snug that I would have liked around the waist. Was not flattering on my curves, so I would have liked it to be longer.
This is a very close fitting sweater and I found the fabric itchy and hot. The beadwork is interesting , with different shaped sequins composing the appliques. I recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Was planning to wear it out for lunch and outing and/ or to work.
links_reviews_text: Really want to like it as it is a beautiful blue and fits quite well. However, I find the material slightly itchy, so had to change it out to something else more comfortable after 2+ hours.

Gorgeous sweater, it fits true to size but is definitely fitted. Size up if you're concerned. I was sad not to wear it, one of the appliques had a loose thread with a sequin dangling, so I returned it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt that's a gorgeous shade of blue (that is trendy now). Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore with a turtleneck underneath, as I am allergic to wool products. Though this may not be wool, in case you suffer from allergies, take note.
Nice beading detail. Sweater is a bit itchy, but wore a tank top underneath.
Loved how it looked on but got to be pretty itchy by the end of the day. An undershirt would help I think. Got lots of compliments!
Runs smaller than typical sweater- material is extraordinary which makes it run a little smaller than typical sweater. Compliments all day each time I wear it!
The color and detail of this sweater were beautiful. It was too short for me though, and I ended up having to wear a cami underneath it.
Fits great and hits at the hip. Very flattering and nice weight for cold weather. Would wear again especially for work.
A bit short in length, kind of itchy. Beautiful color but the sequins feel off my the handful and I was constantly tucking threads back into the sequins.
Loved this sweater. Well made, fits prefect, and very confortable. Loved the color and sequins accents. Will definitely rent it again.
Great colors and fit but so itchy! Couldn't wait to take it off at the end of the day. Maybe would've been better with a tank underneath.
This is a well made beautiful sweater.

links_reviews_title: The design on the front stood out.
links_reviews_text: Great overall fit.
The color is beautiful and deep. The sequins are a nice accent.
Nice fitted crew neck look. Appliqué is pretty. Makes it pop. Be warned it's slightly itchy - if you're sensitive to that it's a no go.

links_reviews_title: Too short and thought on the chest
links_reviews_text: The sweater is too short and it looks like is a petite size rather than regular size. The material is itchy as well.
I got so many compliments on this sweater! It's perfect for everyday wear and was extra warm.
I knew the sweater was a bit big when I rented it , but I was in love with the pattern and brightness for winter. It was so cozy and the bubble sleeves were so fun
Beautiful color. Tough on love handles.

This sweater was different and fun, and kept me super warm on a chilly fall day. I usually don't like having the neck up as high as this one, but it ended up not bothering me! It was super comfy and I would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves on this sweater are everything!
links_reviews_text: I am right on the edge of fitting into designer clothing. I point this out because I hope that I will see more people my size review the clothing that they rent. I am always nervous when I try a new brand because it may be a wasted rental for me. I was not sure what to expect when I selected this sweater from Stine Goya. This sweater exceeded every expectation that I had for it. It was comfortable, soft, and gave me plenty of room in the arms. I highly recommend it for anyone in my size category. It is a piece of clothing that you can count on to fit. The bell sleeves are beautiful and I find the soft pink and winter white color combination to be very fresh. I've already been on the Stine Goya website, they have a new customer in me. Thank you, RTR for the find.
Comfy and beautiful pattern/colors, but did nothing for my shape.
This sweater is beautifully made and very unique but torso is a bit short and a bit tight across the chest. Sleeves are a nice touch and make the sweater special. It fit just enough to get one wear!

I really liked this sweater - it's ultra-feminine, soft and warm. It was a tad shorter than I would have liked, but otherwise I thought it was a comfortable fit. The fabric and color are great. I felt a tad puffy in it, but I didn't mind due to the overall cuteness.

This sweater is very soft and warm. The sleeves are very dramatic, and they are nice and long. I like this for a cold day. The pattern and color is very bright so it does get attention. I am not sure if I like it, but overall this is a nice sweater.

This is the cutest sweater! The color, pattern and style are adorable! It is super warm without being itchy. the sleeves are such a fun detail but note it is hard to wear a jacket with them unless they have loose fitted sleeves. Also keep in mind it fits short, I wore with high waisted jeans but if you prefer longer styles, I would skip this one.
This sweater is adorable! It's more on the fitted side but it's so comfortable and the sleeves are such a fun detail.
cute well made

This sweater is perfect for me. I'm 5'2 so it was perfect for my small torso! The sleeves and the pattern make it playful! A fun piece to wear in the winter when everything seems to be boring... with this sweater you get to be the pop of color and fun in your day!
This was a fun work sweater that I wore with similar light wash jeans as picture. It is very flattering but I like my sweater more slouchy so if I order again, I would size up to a large.
Love this super wear sweater. It's beautiful and looks expensive. It doesn't have a lot of stretch though so it's not as a forgiving as it might be otherwise

links_reviews_title: Fun sweater; runs a tad small.
links_reviews_text: I stuck with my usual size and it was fine, but it's borderline snug.
Fits a little small and is a little itchy, but SUPER cute on! Loved this sweater.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color and design but short
links_reviews_text: I rented this for everyday to wear with jeans to some casual meetings. It is cut shorter than appears in photo. If wearing high rise jeans I think it works best -- otherwise might show skin and ride up awkwardly in back. Also it's very warm and definitely for cold cold weather.

I've had my eye on this sweater for months and as soon as it dipped to a temperature of acceptable sweater-wearing, I rented. It is very cute but I felt SO extremely girly in it all day (even paired with vans). It reminded me of a sweater I would have worn as a little girl in the 90s and even a co-worker said the same thing! It is cropped so you'll want to wear high waisted jeans to make sure you don't show mid drift. I think I would have liked it even more if I got a small instead of xs.
The sleeves are fun, the fabric great...cute print.
It is exactly as pictured… But a little puffy for me. Probably will not rent again as it was borderline clownish (for me).
I love this sweater I wore it 3 times and it's just so cute with jeans and tennis sneakers. It's preppy and charming
This sweater gets attention but not in the wrong way. It's fun without being way too over the top. A bit casual for work.
Loved this - wore many times while i had it. So pretty and unique. Tons of compliments
Wore this multiple times. Perfect go to sweater.

This sweater skims the body, but isn't tight. It looks great on - my husband thought a looked great and a friend asked if I'd lost weight! Truly magical. Can be a little itchy, but not bothersomely so.

links_reviews_title: Looks like a stay puff marshmallow.
links_reviews_text: Really long sleeves. Not flattering at all.
Ran a little smaller than I expected - sleeves were short too.

links_reviews_title: Wasn’t for an event. Just everyday ware.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. Super soft and warm without being too hot. Love the sleeves.

Very fun and unique. The bottom of the sweater is tighter than the top and a little bit longer than expected (I'm 5'4".) feels like an oversized chunky sweater at the top and a tighter fitted sweater at the bottom. I tucked the bottom under to shorten and it looked fine
This sweater is very heavy and I wore it with a thin tee shirt as there was a slight itch. Fit was good.
Loved the weave and color of this sweater, however I wasn't able to wear it as it ran about one size too small. Would look great with jeans.
It's okay. Nothing that special. Felt more like I was wearing a sweatshirt - a little too casual for me. I thought it was a bit small, also.

This sweater was cute but a little worn looking. I ended up wearing it to dinner with my husband on a freezing cold night. I wore it with cute high wasted tan suede leggings. The leggings gave it a dressier feel.

Beautiful sweater, but if to carry your weight around your arms and middle, this will just accentuate the areas. Sweater was tight on my middle. It was also shorter than I expected and I'm 5'6". The color is beautiful. Wish it would have worked.
Not flattering at all. Did not wear. Very stiff.

links_reviews_title: I like the sleeves on this sweater, also the design is very pretty. A pop of pink in the northeast!
links_reviews_text: Wear a jacket or coat with a wider sleeve opening, as the bell sleeve will annoy you if you wear a narrow arm. Very nicely made, not itchy.
Thought it was a little short. Lovely quality and color. Just I'll fitting for my body type
This sweater was so unbelievably cozy and warm, such a statement piece. Great for winter
Not to big, good to fit essentials
very nice quality! room for only a few essentials. great for a party or date
Orange isn't as bright as I incisions but I still like the purse and it has a magnetic close which is helpful. Very original and classy looking

links_reviews_title: Comfy casual but a bit of a statement
links_reviews_text: Rented for NYE; I was only going to a house party so I wanted something comfy but also a big statement. I'm 5 months pregnant so this was the perfect option! Stretchy and comfortable but the slit added some flair. It did ride up and I was pulling it down a lot (not sure if that's the fabric or my big belly) but otherwise I liked it a lot! Great color

links_reviews_title: Needed leggings but a comfy maternity look
links_reviews_text: The slit really is VERY high and revealing -- probably my 30-week bump didn't help. Very comfortable and adorable when layered with thin leggings; otherwise might be best for a night out.

I loved the color and style of this dress! The perfect combo of elegant yet casual. Made me feel awesome for our anniversary date night.The slit is really high so size up if you're tall and be comfortable with showing some skin.
Loved it! Form fitting dress. Slit on the side is pretty high, but makes the dress that much more fancy and appealing! Got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Amazing casual dress with a sexy twist
links_reviews_text: Lightweight knit fabric dress. Comfortable for summer months. If you're tall and have a butt be aware that the slit is pretty high and you might show a little side/under butt. got lots of compliments and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and casual with a cool color!
links_reviews_text: Very lightweight. Perfect for something casual although could be dressed up. I stuck my leg out so you can see how high the leg slit is! Loved!!
Loved the cut and color of this

I think I like A.L.C dresses. This simple t-shirt dress is anything but simple. The fabric is soft and stretchy. The split is daring. I take risks with my clothing so the split was no problem for my 6' self, but I can see how some might feel it is 'too high'. I would have bought it had it been a bit cheaper and considered keeping it the whole summer, but I know I'll definitely rent it again.

This dress is super sexy. I originally rented it for work, but the slit is very high, so I opted to wear for a night out. I have a booty and this dress highlighted my curves fantastically. Trendy color as well!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a girls night out!
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering, the slit can be a little much of you got a lot going on in the "trunk"
This was a great rental! Being 7 mos pregnant, it made me feel like I looked good!

links_reviews_title: Rented for work (no!), wore for fun!
links_reviews_text: The slit on the side is SO high. I thought I'd be able to wear to work, but it went all the way up my thigh. Worked well for a day of wine tasting in Napa!
Love the color and lightweight fabric but the slit is high and curious if I can wear during day. Would tights help? Tempted at first to return but unsure.

links_reviews_title: Love, but the slit is waaaay too high
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and fit of this dress. Unfortunately the slit was much higher on me than the picture. I am not sure I could have pulled it off even on a night out, but definitely not during the day. I tried it with leggings rather than sending it straight back.

Loved this! The material is quite light so you can definitely wear in the spring. Fabric not most comfortable but also not scratchy - just doesn't make me feel like it would be worth it to buy for this price. However - loved the shape, the length, and the slit is fun. Maybe wouldn't wear to work but would wear on a weekend or even out to drinks. The small fit well and wasn't too form fitting. But because the material is rather thin, the dress in general is not as forgiving / flattering. Would love to find something similar to this at a lower price point !
Awesome dress, though the slit is so high I wore it as a shirt. Very cute though.
The slit is a little high, but cute!
Very cute color and shape but it is a SMALL fit. I couldn't actually wear it for my pear shape because my booty would show.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small in hips
links_reviews_text: This dress shows basically everything, so be ready to have it be clingy to your body. I love that and think the vertical lines are flattering. It is a little dough on someone who has wide hips and a big butt though - the slit on the side is really short because of the way I'm built. Probably won't wear to work but will throw on a jean jacket and wear it to brunch.
The diagonal cut across the side and bottom was way to angled and the slit was too much! wanted something comfortable and sexy but this just accentuated my thighs in a bad way.

As other reviewers have mentioned, the slit on this dress is crazy high. It reached all the way to my butt, and I'm not even tall!
