(5'5") It was however very comfortable and stretchy and worked well for 2nd trimester, but I had to wear leggings underneath for it to be even somewhat appropriate for daily life.
This was so cute in theory, but showed every bump and wobble. I was too self conscious to wear it more than once.
So cute and wanted to love it. But, had to return immediately because of the slit. I got the medium to wear while 7 months pregnant-- fit was great, but my bump made the slip ride up way too high.
I'm 5'9 and couldn't wear this item, the slit goes to the crouch essentially

links_reviews_title: I did not wear but it was cute on
links_reviews_text: The con of this dress is the split up the side. It comes up higher than the picture

links_reviews_title: Too tight and slit too high
links_reviews_text: I probably should have ordered a size up (since I'm in my second trimester of pregnancy), so it was just too tight. But the real issue was the slit. I don't mind showing a lot of leg, but it kept riding up and I definitely couldn't bend over without my butt cheek coming out. I did like the color and material.

I got this dress after Shawn Johnson recommended it during her pregnancy. I'm only 5 feet tall, but I still felt like the slit was too high for my comfort zone with a third trimester belly, so I returned.

This was a thin, show ALL them curves kind of dress. I loved the color and the fit, but the slit wasn't just a slit - it was a gaping slit that rode high up on the thigh and exposed horizontal and vertical. Too much for this girl.

links_reviews_title: Versatile and works for many bodies.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I'm a 6-8 and got a MR. The material is pretty stretchy but not tight. The dress is thin and shows underwear easily. It's also a lot shorter than I thought. I'm 5'0" and the dress didn't look too different from the model. All in all, not appropriate for work without the right undergarments but definitely cute for the weekend. Easy to wear and it looked cute with flat sandals.

links_reviews_title: Will flash if no slip worn under
links_reviews_text: Cool dress but will show all the way to the underwear line at the slip and let it all hang out.
This dress is not wearable. Even after reading other reviews, I thought I could make it work, but the slit is way too high. Don't be tempted!

links_reviews_title: The slit is really high but it's sexy and beautiful
links_reviews_text: #datenight
I didn't wear this dress because it had a big hole on the side. Furthermore, it doesn't really fit a pear frame person. The shorter side rises a lot and doesn't look good at all.
The color, design, fit... everything is great! Definitely needed leggings underneath though.

This dress grew on me the more I wore it, probably because I received so many compliments and so much attention. Do be warned: the slit is Very high. If you are wearing control top pantyhose, the control top part may show if you are not careful. I wore it with a belt and booties.

links_reviews_title: The slit was higher and material thinner than expected
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and think it would be really lovely on the right person. However, for me, the slit came to an unflattering part of my thigh. The lightweight material was good for a light spring garment but I also felt a little self-conscious in it.
Looked great with a tan leather jacket! Good travel dress too. Ran small! Usually a Small but got the Large for a looser fit.

I'm usually a medium on top (sometimes small) and larger on the bottom. This dress is stretchy so I was able to put it on and it was comfortable and looked good except the slit went all the way up to about 2 inches below butt! Gonna try sizing up. The fabric is more of a rich brown than orange and it's a very lightweight knit so good for spring or fall weather (or year-round here in Los Angeles)!

links_reviews_title: Very small and super high slit
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in an XL and it was NOT wearable - very very tight. In addition, the side slit goes WAY up and even if it hadn't been skin tight I wouldn't have felt comfortable wearing that in public.

links_reviews_title: It was just a nice evening at a birthday celebration
links_reviews_text: Love the color, fit is body skimming and comfortable. The slit is high, so I chose to wear it with skinny jeans as a tunic.
Serious top and funky cheetah jeans that can't be seen on Zoom! Soft and comfy. A little fun when working from home.
Fit well and very soft/comfortable! Will want to try this jean brand again.
Wore these twice - for date night and to lead worship at church. Worked great with a black turtleneck and moto jacket. I'm typically an 8/29 but the 28 fit great I these. Will rent again.
They were so fun! I loved the look, but they we a little loose in the legs. Fit great around my waistline. Overall I loved them.
Thought they were great, I'll be trying other styles of from this brand
Wore on a girls trip to Nashville! They stretched, I got at 27R and usually am a 28R. They button up so you can control your tummy ;) so many compliments

These jeans fit my curvy body to a T. I love the print and the cropped length, although I am not a massive fan or the raggedy hem. This is the second time I have rented them. Can't wait to wear them while on vacation, too.
Wore multiple times and great fit. No stretch but loosened up as day went on
Loved these jeans. They were so comfortable! They run a little big but add a belt just in case.

Wore these to a concert and they were so comfy. They stretched out quite a bit throughout the night. I could have gone down an entire size with how much they stretched. Overall would rent again. Follow me @jaimers_7 for all my RTR Unlimited Looks
Perfect. Not too thick. Run a little tight at first and loosen up throughout the day.
Loved the pattern and the colors. These pair of jeans will definitely stand out; However, they're a little baggy at the top. Probably best to wear with a belt.

links_reviews_title: LOVED these pants. Almost didn't send them back
links_reviews_text: These pants are amazing. They run absolutely true to size - they feel like they may be tight but once I got them on I was totally comfortable. They definitely get baggy in the waist with wear (I HAD to wear a belt after 1 wear) but they go with literally anything and everything. I wore these like 5 times in 3-4 weeks.
Very cute, not super tight.

Loved these pants - only gave them 4 stars because the denim stretches out like nobody's business. Started off true to size, but stretched so much with wear that they would need to be washed and dried with each wear. I'd rent again - so easy to wear and extremely comfortable!
These were fun and wild - definitely out of my comfort zone and a bit big but with a belt it worked super well. Recommend these for anyone and everyone that needs a little spice in their life!

links_reviews_title: Love the button details and obviously the leopard
links_reviews_text: What else can i say? I love leopard. Size up 1 size :) @thanksitsrtr

I sized up, but wish I didn't because it ended up being too baggy around the butt and through the legs (so everywhere). I'm still giving it 5 stars because it was super cute, and something I would never buy but would absolutely rent again.
Definitely runs a little small and unfortunately no stretch

Ugh I read the reviews for sizing and they said to size down because they stretch out... i am usually a 27 in jeans but got the 26 and they were WAY too small. Wouldn't even button. So stick to regular sizing!!
Fun pants
Was kinda of tight at the upper thigh region
Fun and comfortable. I sized up based on reviews and really didn't need to. They were a little loose.
Love these jeans! So cute, chic, modern. I wore them a bunch with different tops to dress them up or down and got tons of compliments.
Runs small. Fabric looks faded in person. Not a great length or fit for booty and small waist
Looked great with denim jacket and white tee. Looser fit. A fun understated way to play with animal print.

These run a little small! They are so cute, they were a little too tight in the butt for me to keep them. Usually wear a 28 in madewell/jcrew jeans so I would size up one for the curves. Going to order in next size!

These pants were super cute, but the fit was a bit funky on me. It fit tight on my stomach, but then there was gaping in the back, so I'm not sure how that happens. But, maybe just throw on a belt to avoid the gaping!

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, not great if you have any curves
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love these pants, but they're lower rise and the pockets and fit in the butt was very unflattering. Probably not good for a curvier figure.

I own a pair of AMO jeans and when these came in my usual size they did not fit. They were cute but unwearable because they were so tight at the hips. I could get them buttoned but there was absolutely no way I could sit down haha. May rent at a later date in the size up.

links_reviews_title: These were great fun. Lots of compliments. Comfortable
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love these jeans! They were perfect for everyday wear!
links_reviews_text: These fit me perfectly, the button fly is a little annoying, but other than that I loved them! A little tight in my thigh area, but not too bad.
Everything was super cute - soft fabric and fun!
fit perfect

links_reviews_title: The fit and pattern are perfect
links_reviews_text: Girlfriend style jean so expect to be a tiny bit bigger than regular jeans.
These fit so true to size and are extremely cute. I got tons of complements on them and am planning to rent them again in the future. So trendy and so cute!
the pants were absolutely great but as you wear them they become loose. i did wear them from morning to night but as the night ended they were getting saggy.

A cute athliesure pullover, but I'm usually between a M and L and was swimming in the L. I'm wondering if the M would fit me like the model, but I might have to size down even further. Another note- you definitely should plan to wear a shirt under this for comfort's sake. It's more outer layer than comfy sweatshirt.

I had two weeks off from work and wanted a few comfy items to wear everyday. This pullover provided the warmth and relaxed style I was looking for. Could wear easily with jeans or leggings. Was great for a hike or just walking around the city.
Runs large but it's comfy! Perfect for work from home

So meh. I was rly excited about this rental. But as I had read, I have to agree inside is not soft. It's unfinished fabric feeling.. CHEAP!! There's no stretch and the arms are so long. Loved the color blocking, but the faux Sherpa isn't even faux it's for REAL cheap fabric. Returned, didn't wear.
Good for casual wear. Nothing outstanding
nice color block detail but too boxy to wear more than 1x
Never would have spent that kind of money on a pullover sweater so was fun to have it as a rental. Wore it out while running errands and felt lazy chic.

This was a fun athleisure piece. Loved the color-blocking and fit true to size. Only complaint was that the inside was not half as comfortable as the outside- if worn with long sleeves this won't be a problem!
Wore this around the house during the snowstorm and it was so cozy! Too pricey to purchase but I loved it and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fun glasses during a weird time
links_reviews_text: I loved these glasses for running to the grocery store or daily walks. They have made a weird time a little more enjoyable. Would 100% rent again.
These glasses were cool, but not very comfortable to wear. The lens was also more see thru than I like. I prefer a bit darker of a lens. I didn't wear them anywhere. But I did take a pic.
Yes it was low cut, but my office doesn't mind. Flattering style for the sexy office girl. Thick fabric kept me warm. Many compliments. Not your average boring grey dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit but low cut in front
links_reviews_text: This dress was super cute. Flattering and classy. Only issue was the front was a little low cut. You may need to use a safety pin or tape to keep it together. Would rent again for sure

I wore this for a big work meeting and I got so many compliments. A woman there was so thrilled by this outfit she signed up for RTR lol. The reason I'm doing 4 instead of 5 stars because (as other reviews have noted), this can be quite low cut. As a more endowed woman, this made me uncomfortable for work without an undershirt. Hence the undershirt. I also am dinging the score a little because the zipper was pretty tough to work. With all that said, would wear again

You know those outfits that make you feel like a million bucks? This is one of those. The fit was perfection, the fabric weight was luxe. EVERY person I saw the day I wore it complimented me. I decided it was too perfect to send back.

The dress is really comfortable and great for work, although I had to wear it with a slip underneath to prevent the top from showing too much. The sleeves are just the right amount of poofy and the shape of the dress is really flattering.

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for a formal meeting!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. It's such a nice mix of business professional and style. Really well made. I probably could have gotten away with an 8 in the waist/hips, but I have broad shoulders and the 10 was necessary for the shoulders to be comfortable and not feel tight. Because I needed the shoulder room, it was slightly big in the bust and I used a safety pin to keep it closed so I wouldn't worry about it during the meeting. Got lots of compliments from both male and female coworkers!

links_reviews_title: Classic work dress for a curvy figure
links_reviews_text: This dress will grow on you. I liked it when I first put it on, but it wears great throughout the day, no wrinkles and hugs your curves as you move. Shoulders are a tad much and you definitely need a cami underneath for work - it's not even close - but material, color, length and waistline are fabulous.
I liked the fit everywhere but the bust. I may just be too high in the chest. I had to pin the wrap closure higher. But so many compliments in this one!
Loved this piece to wear to work
Very professional but sexy
Would be really cute if it had a way to fasten the top. Huge gaping at the chest.

links_reviews_title: It’s a classy dress for work
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, I could have gone down a dress size but I don’t think it would fit my arms.
It fits true to size. Loved it but could wear it apparently I'm a 12 in dresses and event was cancelled. Very classy dress.
The top is wide open and needs a safety pin. I left my house quickly and didn't have one and my bra was showing all day.

links_reviews_title: I work it to the office
links_reviews_text: Super cute, working gal vibes.
Fits big in all the wrong places. The hips didn't sit right on me and the whole thing just made me look like a frumpy 1980s secretary.

links_reviews_title: i receive so many compliments every time i wore it
links_reviews_text: the top is a little big, but i love it

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Couldn't wear to work because the bustline turned out to be too revealing.
links_reviews_text: Turned out to be a great date night dress with just a hint of sex appeal.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for work. Unfortunately, it needed modifications.
links_reviews_text: While the silhouette and waist on this dress were beautiful, the fit in the bust was loose, low, and definitely not appropriate for work. I needed to keep things closed with a brooch. Someone who wears a C or D cup might have better luck, but my A cup self struggled. For a date night this dress would have been a winner, but it should not be listed under wear to work.

links_reviews_title: It was nice and I got one compliment on it
links_reviews_text: Its very low cut and you have to wear a camisol underneath otherwise your breasts are popping out of that thing

This dress was true to size with a good amount of stretch and still structured. The cut is very low in front (36C) and the zipper was sticky towards the middle so I had to have help zipping it up. Otherwise it was perfect. Wore it with black tights and knee boots. The cut made it easy to skip the Spanx!
Fit great but needed to wear a camisole underneath as the top was very low cut, even for going out (I'm a 34D).
Cute but conservative

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, but was afraid to wear it because the zipper seemed like it had been abused.
links_reviews_text: AMAZING dress! I would buy it if i thought the zipper would hold up. I couldn't even get it open when I took it out of the bag for nearly 10 minutes.

The fit is what you would expect, unless you have a long torso you will need a cami underneath to be office appropriate. I carry my weight in my stomach and used a shaper to get a streamlined shape. It was longer than I would like but still wearable.
Loved this dress. For me the top was too big and had to wear a black tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a work event in NYC.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a work event in NYC. Fit comfortably and looked professional with some style all day long
Great length, heavy fabric that is perfect for fall/winter. The only down size is the chest is very open, I had to pin it closed to make it work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this dress!
links_reviews_text: The top of this dress was problematic. It just didn't close properly and I felt exposed. The rest of the dress fit beautifully. I wish there was a way, maybe a button, to close the top.
IT wasn't flattering - perhaps just on my body type. the sleeves were a bit too poofy and it looked odd. I didn't end up wearing it

links_reviews_title: Compliments from strangers at a conference
links_reviews_text: Oh my gosh, this is the best work dress. Fits like a glove, nice mix of feminine and professional. Really well made. Love this dress and will definitely rent again
Looks great, very peofessional, and doesn't wrinkle!
Great dress. Perfect fit!!
I wore this to a board meeting and it was perfect. Classic silhouette and heavy fabric are great. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Dress was very business appropriate and classy
links_reviews_text: A bit low cut for work, wore a cami under; sized up two sizes, glad I did. My boobs wouldn't have fit into a smaller size.
The overall fit and the material was good but The neckline was very low and also the zipper was not working properly
The top was a little large and needed a tank top underneath. Otherwise great, including the length

links_reviews_title: just overall perfect favorite dress rented for work
links_reviews_text: fit was great, i'm a size 4 and it was perfect lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Unique high waisted take on jeans
links_reviews_text: These were amazing! Loved the high waisted fit & cinched leg at the bottom. The drawstrings drag a bit but didn't bother me. I wore 3.5in wedges and we're fine. Wore on the plane and during the day. Perfect travel outfit if you need to go somewhere immediately after your flight

links_reviews_title: SO COMFY! Love the draw strings! Wish I was a little bit taller (I wish I was a baller...)
links_reviews_text: These pants are so comfortable. It felt like I was wearing pajamas to work. While I did like the overall look, I definitely think it would look better if I was a few inches taller. I wore it to work with a tight fitting tank, and a sweater, then at home with just the tank. Love love loved the draw string bottoms! Give this rental a chance! You might be surprised.

links_reviews_title: Hard to rock these mom pants
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of compliments because they are unique but they wrinkle a lot.

links_reviews_title: Jeans are boring, wear these pants!
links_reviews_text: I love any pant that isn't jeans but can be smooth just as casually. Wore these once with white boots and once with white Birkenstocks. I'd recommend sizing down if you are between sizes, I got a large at first and they were much too big.

Wrinkles easily, did not get a great picture so not posting but these pants are so chic. Summer material. Wore a cropped white tee and vans for a dressed down comfy Friday work look. Loved that they were so high that I could wear crop top without showing any tummy - I usually don't feel comfortable wearing a crop top so this was exactly what I needed. Sssslight mc hammer vibes and I liked it.

love these 90's vibe pants got a ton of compliments from women but the men in my life seemed to be confused by the pants. Some fashion is just over the average dude's head. These are really great and add a little bit of fun to any causal look.

Such cool pants!! They're lightweight and pair great with a tank or simple bodysuit. They have a utility vibe to them, but it's still a feminine style with the drawstring detailing on the ankles. Just as a warning, this style is straight and a little long; it worked out fine for me because I'm tall, but they might run big on shorter people.
waist runs big, so size down. fun, beachy pant.
The tie dye print and loose fit was perfect for summer! Paired with a crop tee and white booties. Will certainly rent again.
I did not live the fit of these. They were a bit large and lacked structure

links_reviews_title: Wore these to a concert; very comfy!
links_reviews_text: Fit a bit baggy, I wish I would've gotten a small. The ties at the bottom drag on the ground and I was constantly stepping on them which was annoying. Other than that they are really comfortable and are surprisingly stylish!

links_reviews_title: Tried L and XL on in NYC
links_reviews_text: These are a beautiful linen. Unusually wear a Med/large in pants (narrow hips, wide waist). The L fit my hips beautifully but are tight on the waist. The xl was gigantic all over. Great for tall gals. I'd say more like a 33" inseam.

links_reviews_title: Small waist, big everything where else
links_reviews_text: The fabric has no stretch. Halfway through the day I ended up unbuttoning them and hiding it :) huge everywhere besides the waist tho!

links_reviews_title: very long and not flattering . I am 5'4 120lbs
links_reviews_text: not cute.
Loved these! Rented for vacation but not ready to return. Material is super light and airy. Great casual spring/ summer addition

links_reviews_title: Very long but could be good for the beach.
links_reviews_text: These pants are more casual than the picture let on. They are a thin lightweight denim that would be great for a beach vacation if you have very long legs. I have a small waist and size 28/29 curvy hips and thighs and the medium was too big all around. The pants bunched up past the ankles way more than the style intended- def not meant for short legs.
Love this top- my only caveat is that it's on the shorter side. It hit at the top of my mid rise jeans. If it was a tad longer i would have worn it multiple times
Runs true to size, fit me great and loved the color and design!
light shirt, very flowy, the pin to hold the chest portion could be loose but overall very beautiful!
Perfect top to wear to work or go out. Loved the flare sleeves.

The fit is lose so I say if you're on the edge, go down a size. This top was great for work and I didn't have to wear an undershirt. Only flaw might be that the top snap holding the top together comes undone easily, nothing a tiny safety pin can't correct! If you have larger breasts, the safety pin might be crucial
Versatile cute top that works great with jeans or black pants. It's sheer, so you need a tank under it.
Wore this to a casual baby shower. Very flattering. Sheer and needs a camisole.

Rented twice, small too large so let my SIL borrow it during Thanksgiving break. XS fit perfectly although still lots of room, comfortable, easy to wear, chest snap keeps the girls in. Gorgeous Fall colors. Layers well with a long puffy coat for cold weather wear.
Loved the colors and print. Thin silk. Held together at bust with one small snap. Comfortable. Dramatic cuffs.

links_reviews_title: Went with everything in my closet for work and weekend!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable easy and effortless

links_reviews_title: On trend print in great colors
links_reviews_text: The print and colors were spot on with a nice style. It was a bit short for my long torso, but fit well in general.

I am quite small chested so the fit was nice. (5'8", 130lbs, 36A bra)... but the top button snap kept popping open at different times. Which, due to my small chest size, rarely ever happens. I can only imagine how frustrating this would be for women with bigger boobs.
Great colors, fit well, but the bell sleeves are much larger than they look in the picture. I was super excited about the colors and pattern, but when I put it on the sleeves felt a bit unwieldy.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Fit well and was comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_text: I did not like the fabric of this top and it was way too complicated to put on and it was a little too low cut as well. After struggling to put it on, I took it right back off!
The inside button needs to be reinforced.

Loved the colors and fit. The sleeves came to the perfect length. The small snap was in the perfect place but came undone a few times during the day when I put my jacket on or climbed out of the back seat of the SUV during wine tasting in Napa. A button would probably have been better to prevent the embarrassing moment in front of our driver. Overall a gorgeous blouse!
Perfect shirt for a date, for dressing up, for dressing down, it's highly versatile and so girly. My fiancé loves this shirt!

links_reviews_title: Small through hips if you're curvy
links_reviews_text: I was able to wear this but had to pin the bottom past the button. If you're curvier, make sure you have a safety pin on hand! Overall a beautiful top and color!
I'm usually can wear a medium in a blousy top like this , but ordered the large based on other reviews . It was fine , probably could have worn the medium .
I wore this to work with a black skirt and heels and also on the weekend with jeans. It was a tad bit snug in the arms, but otherwise fit well.
The print and material are beautiful; however, the overall fit was too big for my petite frame and looked sloppy on me.

links_reviews_title: a strange fit, but very cute pattern
links_reviews_text: love the sleeves
On trend style. I wore w purple velvet jeans and got many compliments. Fits TTS.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Top that can be paired with nice pants or jeans
links_reviews_text: Love this top--the fabric, the fit, the print! Lots of compliments!!
It was just ok. Wasn't crazy about the colors
This top runs true to size and I felt great wearing it. There is a snap closure at the bust which kept the "girls" hidden. I received several compliments wearing this.
I wore this for a date night. Beautiful material, fun print. It is a tad low cut and the sleeves are long. But overall, I loved it.
I loved this too! Fit was great, colors stood out nicely, trendy but still classy! Renting again for sure!

This shirt is adorable! It is a little bit low cut, but there is a button in the chest that makes it perfect. I wore this twice and got tons on complements and will be renting it again. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Worn with jeans for an everyday, chic look.
links_reviews_text: Really pretty, flowing and flattering. I wore it to work on a dress down Friday and received compliments all day. As it is pretty low cut, I wore a fitted tank top underneath. The fit was a little big and the sleeves a somewhat too long. I'd recommend going down a size. The small snap at the chest has a tendency to pop open and needs to be replaced or reinforced. I would buy this in a heartbeat if it wasn't so pricy.
Loved this sweater!! Such a fun twist on a neutral sweater. Warning - it does have decently high slits on the side so depending on where you want to wear it you might need a layer

I think this is a great sweater for petites...I didn't love the look on me. The mismatched length at the bottom wasn't flattering on the shorter side and the line across the top emphasized my chest. As mentioned in other reviews, it runs small and snug, specifically in the neck and arms. I prefer a more traditional oversized sweater, so this was a miss.
Loved this sweater! Wore casually with jeans and also dressed up with leather pants for a date. As others have pointed out it's open at the side and quite itchy so an undershirt is necessary.
A good oversized look, the neck is a little tight but overall fit great!

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, big slits on sides
links_reviews_text: I liked this sweater, but was unaware from the pictures that it has a slit up both sides under the sleeve. I also didn't realize it has gold threads through some areas, which is a nice fun detail. The neck is also really small, definitely would want to put on makeup and do your hair after you put on the sweater. Overall I thought it was really cute and would recommend.

links_reviews_title: No shape and sleeves too short for me
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this sweater. Out of bag it was funky in its design, the metallic threading on sleeve and back panel was pretty and the slits seemed edgy. But when I put it on it did nothing for me. It hung on me oddly and didn't flatter. The sleeves were too short (i do have long arms but these were weird length). I won't rent this again.

Rented for work, but its so beautiful! Lunch, coffee date, shopping, traveling -, its have metallic thread part- so its festive too. It have open sides design, so most of us will need small tank top under, i went with black- so from side legs looks longer, its comfortable warm( surprisingly ) for open sides design, i would re rent it for sure
Worn this out to dinner with friends so warm in a cold winter night. Paired nicely with heels and jeans

Fun sweater. There is some glitter in the fabric! It was also slightly itchy so I wore a tee under and tucked it in. The side slits are semi high which some ladies already noted, but also something to consider. I wore a 42 and it fit great normally a 4 or size small/med top. Would rent again !
I sized up and it fit well. Has some metallic shimmer in it. A little boxy and cropped.

links_reviews_title: Just didn't love the sweater. It has sparkles on the back that were a little too much for me.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, but I didn't love the glitter aspect to the sweater. Nice sweater, just not my style.
Loved, loved, loved this sweater. It is soft and cozy and flattering. Will likely rent it again.
open on the sides
Loved this sweater with jeans and stylish boots or leggings and Uggs/ Timbs. Wore it several times and couldn't get enough.

links_reviews_title: Love - dress up or dress down. Got a ton of complements on it.
links_reviews_text: Great fit - slits on the side can provide a funky look or wear a cami underneath and enjoy.
Runs huge. Slits so high you must wear something underneath. Beware it's sparkly. Didn't wear.
I really liked the style of this sweater and how it looked on. As other reviewers noted, it's not high quality yarn - a little rough.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, but the wool made me itchy.
links_reviews_text: Very cute sweater, I especially loved the metallic pop on select panels. The neckline was extra small, and I had a tough time pulling my head through, but made it :) I had to wear a long sleeve top under the sweater, as it included wool and I found it itchy, though I do have quite sensitive skin so this might not bother others.

This sweater is cozy and easy to wear. You can't really tell in the photos but there are slits up the side, which looks cool, but you need to wear something underneath. I found that bodysuit worked best underneath.
I didn't end up wearing this sweater. It has metallic threads that I didn't notice when renting. Looks very '90's and dated.
Baggy fit but that's the look. Good quality. Kept me warm in the midwest winter.
This sweater is very roomy, so size down unless you want that oversized look. It's sparkly and fun but also cozy and warm. I had fun wearing it!
Loved the look and feel of this sweater. I even layered it too to give it a different look. Super cozy A+ rental

Out of the box I really liked this sweater, the fit was good but I probably could have gone down a size. But after wearing this all day I couldn't wait to take it off. It was so hot and itchy! As other reviewers mentioned, the sides have pretty high slits, kind of like a poncho with sleeves.
Was nice but the slits up each side were a bit of a surprise

links_reviews_title: I wore it on repeat and it was fun
links_reviews_text: large, and it has slits up the side so something underneath is necessary

At first I wasn't sure about this sweater. I worry it twice between Thanksgiving and Christmas. The provided photos are deceiving - there is a slit up both sides. You would very likely need to wear a tank under this. Not sure I'd rent again. As others mentioned it is a bit itchy.
Fit a little boxy, but overall great everyday sweater. Loved the little bit of gold thread.
Loved this sweater! It has some sparkle and is slightly open on the side so I wore a white T underneath. Looks cuter on than in the photo. Some itch but you don't notice with a shirt under.

Love the different levels and the knit work is beautiful. Unusual w/ different knits in the sweater. The gold is a little scratchy so I wore a cami underneath and it was perfect. Warm, but oversized so it won't fit under a coat. I wore with black pants... I saw little fuzzies on them all day long!! But, if worn w/ jeans.. you won't see them.. ha. Great, unique take on a oversized, cream sweater.
This sweater was just gorgeous. I wore it twice and got lots of compliments and people asking me where I got it. Soft, comfy and warm.
I almost returned this because it didn't give me much of a shape but ended up wearing it and got tons of compliments. A little itchy :)

links_reviews_title: The fit and softness of the sweater was amazing!
links_reviews_text: The fit is more boxy but so cute! It was very soft and the sweater has a shimmery finish.
Comfy nice button up! Loved the print on the back

I love the crispness of a white button down shirt and the high/low shape and logo on the back made this one feel special. It does have a pretty oversized/boxy fit - I was happy with the medium but also could have easily sized down to make it a little more fitted.
Love the cut. Works for dressier outfits or with jeans for a beachy look. Great quality

links_reviews_title: Twist on the classic white shirt
links_reviews_text: White button downs are a staple in my closet so this was a fun twist to have. Very preppy masculine vibe, which I love!
Rented this for just an every day shirt for work, I like tailored button downs with jeans for casual days. This was 100% a boxy cut for the shirt but but Ralph Lauren is a classic so it was great

I love a classic button down! This one fit really well and although I didn't notice the "POLO" on the back when I ordered, I tucked it in to where it wasn't visible when worn and it looked like an all white normal blouse. Cant go wrong!

Loved this - I wore this for a day on the boat and it was a great light top to wear with shorts and as a cover up out on the water. I loved the logo on the back as well. Overall, ran slightly large (it is meant to be oversized) so I sized down.

links_reviews_title: The back lettering isn't ideal but the fit and front are great
links_reviews_text: Big fan. A classic. Will rent again. More on @thanksitsrtr!!

I loved this top it fit super well !! On the back I loved the flex of "Polo" , so cute people asked me where I got it ! I like that it's not your typical dress shirt ! Wish I had got a pic of the back but the model shows the cool logo perfectly! I would definitely rent again !

I really liked this and rented it a second time. While it's not form fitting or anything, it's crisp, classic and polished - great for brunch or a casual Friday at the office with jeans and flats or riding boots. This is probably a staple I'd end up buying.
Would not have ordered if I had noticed the large Polo decal on the back before ordering.

links_reviews_title: Hate the lettering on the back
links_reviews_text: I love the front of this classic shirt but didn't realize it said "POLO" in huge letters on the back! My fault for not looking at all of the photos but what a bummer.
Fit well. A little boxy but not too bad. Came a little wrinkled.

I rented this to wear to work for a causal Friday outfit that could transition to after work drinks. Little did I know that this shirt has the words "POLO" in giant font across the back. While this wouldn't have been an issue if I wasn't working it to work, it would have been nice to know before wasting a spot on it. It's a nice shirt - casual and cute, but if you don't want a giant logo on the back, don't rent it.
Def missed the logo on the back of the shirt when I picked it out but looked great with plaid pants and a leather jacket
Runs large so the small was very baggy on me but cute top for the weekends
comfy
This shirt was adorable. A dress shirt with some flare. Looked amazing with the blue Tory Burch pants. Want to own!
Shirt was cute but ran rather large. Especially in the sleeves. I didn't end up wearing it.
Very much the typical Ralph Lauren vibe. Looks good dressed up for work or dressed down with a boyfriend jean. Love and will rent again!
Such a fun jacket- love the high collar and fun print. Not the warmest but definitely the most unique.
I rented the S and M in this jacket and went with the M - the S was a little tighter in my shoulders. LOVED this jacket. So warm and so fun. I got so many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: So cute but wish it had zippers for the pockets
links_reviews_text: This was true to size and a fun ski coat! My friends could spot me and it was so cute. I wore a big sweater underneath and never complained about being cold even though it was 10 degrees. Only thing I wish the coat had was zippers for the pockets.
Super cute - sleeves are a bit short but I am very tall so I'm not surprised.
I wore this as my primary coat for a few days and I felt so cool. Everyone told me I looked like a cloud, and it's super comfy too!
longer than expected

links_reviews_title: Cute, Easy, Cool Dress for Day to Night
links_reviews_text: Adorable dress with such a fun, vibrant print! Fit TTS, with subtle stomach touching that allowed for easy wear. It's quite sheer and needs nude undergarments, but the fabric kept me cool. Wonderful staple for everything from day to night. Definitely recommend trying it, especially to look polished in the middle of summer!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not going to get the wow factor
links_reviews_text: Got it for work but was a little too informal for work. Ended up wearing for a date night. It was cute but I got some ehhh comments on it. I've felt better in other outfits.

Rented this dress for a conference in FL when it was nearly 90 degrees each day. I was worried about the sheerness due to other reviews but I rented anyway. The color is vibrant. Styled with a thin black belt to help with shape. I didn't find it to be see-through. I had an hour between meeting and decided to walk the beach. A gentleman stopped me and said I was the most elegant person he's even seen walking the beach. I give all the credit to the dress.
Gorgeous cut and movement on dress. Fabric has some stretch. Length perfect. Comfortable and light, perfect for conferences in Florida with neon yellow pumps!
Love how it cinches at the waist, the pattern is so cute, got a ton of compliments!!! Kinda want to buy, going to be sad to send it back
Flattering, cool color combo. Received compliments. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Paired with ripped jeans! Such a hit!
links_reviews_text: Colors are amazing! I got so many compliments
Great dress, super flattering for a larger bust and smaller waist. Got lots of compliments. I almost bought this!!

Can I wear all DVF for the rest of my life? Her dresses are flattering, well designed and manage to be appropriate for work and dinner etc. This one is no exception, plus easy to wear and super stylish. The small fit perfectly. I wasn't sure I would like the crepe fabric but it is just thick enough with an interesting texture.

Dress was so perfect! It fit perfect, it was incredibly comfortable for a whole day in the office and I loved the colors. Great transition from Summer to Fall. I wouldn't ordinarily wear a dress of this length (I'm 5'4") but I loved it! The dress came super wrinkled, but my steamer worked like a charm on it.
Super flattering and easy to wear. Hugged all the right places and hid all the wrong ones. Went out of my style comfort zone to try this one and am so glad I did. Tons of compliments!
So flattering and a great fit! I loved the green with the neon green. Felt great in it!

The fit was perfect for hourglass shape. Fitted at the waist with room in the chest and hips. Great print with vibrant colors. I did not have any issues with the buttons or hook/eye coming loose. This is a beautifully made dress that is worth the rent!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outdoor occasion
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly - so fun and great for an outdoor party!

links_reviews_title: Not your classic DVF, cool dress, kinda felt like a John Deere tractor based on colors.
links_reviews_text: Love DVF, so I jumped on it when I saw it. But the colors were strange, very John Deere. I'm sure some will love it. I just thought it was ok. Fit well.

Felt amazing in this playful print. From work to weekend, I got a lot of miles out of this dress. Can be dressed up or down. I am Typically between a 6 and 8 and the medium fit great with some too to spare. Rent this dress!

Easy, wrinkle free, ultra flattering DVF. The colors were a standout and I received a ton of compliments. Note: it does run large, especially for DVF. I always size up with her designs, but this was large in my normal size when I'm 4 months pregnant.

I admit, I hate midi length but this dress was still worth it! The fit is superb, gathered in the right areas. It was fun while still being appropriate for work. I'd rent again. Also super comfortable for hot summer days.
The flow of this dress was amazing! I wore it twice and wish I kept it. Rent it!

will definitely be renting again in the future and even considering to buy. Such fun colors and design, love the buttons down the front. It creates a very flattering figure. Usually i have to size up because I am on the curvier side, but I think I'd actually recommend going down a size in this.

links_reviews_title: This dress is why I do RTR Unlimited
links_reviews_text: This. Dress. Was. Amazing. I was in a panic to place my RTR Unlimited order before 2pm and I was afraid I was going to regret choosing this. But not only do I not regret the dress ... I'm obsessed. I barely liked it on the photo. I was scared of it when I saw it on the hanger (the midsection ruffles seem odd when it's hanging up) but I LOVE it on. I have an hourglass figure but im a little heavy in the middle these days and this was so flattering. The material is thin and airy (I didn't find it to be see-through as another reviewer did) and the pattern is so fun. It also looks great on a summer tan!

links_reviews_title: Great dress from office to dinner
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for work and ended up wearing it right out to dinner on Saturday night. The colors are really vibrant and beautiful. The dress runs large, a small probably would have fit better. A fun dress, would definitely rent again.
Nice work dress and fun summer print. I would recommend and rent again!
Wore this dress up i church and it was perfect. The animal pattern popped and the ruching in the midsection was a great touch. Great with sneakers or sandals. I even got a story repost from DVF!

what a GREAT DRESS! i want to buy it-trendy neon & leopard in one! feminine fit, fabric almost don't wrinkles( & you can not see it on the pattern that much.) Wore it to work, then sunday brunch & before sending back again to work ( even my husband saying: " you wearing it 3rd time- your rental ?") now will see when price comes down. ( sorry -could not help to post one with puppy)

I wore this dress to a celebration of life for a friend who had passed. The colors of the dress are bright and give a fun twist the the usual leopard print. I paired it with simple brown wedge sandals, and I got many compliments throughout the day. I am 5'7", 145lbs and the MR was quite roomy on me. I am typically a 6 or 8 depending on brand, but I could have easily sized down in this dress. Overall, I would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Fun, Bold print with a great fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress. It was structured with ruched detail in the midsection (super flattering). The fabric was light, and had a little bit of stretch to it. Loved the bright, bold color and cheetah pattern.

links_reviews_title: Love so much I want to BUY it!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress from the moment I pulled it out of the bag. It fits me perfectly. The colors make my summer tan shine. It comfortable. It wears well. I wore for work with heels but could wear on the weekend with sandals. I love it so much that I wanted to buy it. I also got compliments from the moment I stepped in to my office.

RTR recommended this to me in a L or XL--The large was not available so I first rented the XL, and I was swimming in it. I returned it for the medium and it fit perfectly, with the exception of needing a little safety pin to fix a gap between the top two buttons. I dressed this down with white converse for my wedding morning after brunch and then wore it on a four hour car ride. It was fun and comfy and could def be dressed up or down. Would have kept longer if the weather hadn't turned cold.

links_reviews_title: Great twist on a classic pattern. It's really fun and I highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: Great dress that you could dress up or down. I loved the bright, bold colors. Go a size smaller than our normal because it does run big.
Such a cool dress that you can dress up or down. Wore it so many times!

links_reviews_title: Fits wonderfully aside from a tiny gape at the chest
links_reviews_text: I am very busty, and it did gape a little but nothing some dress tape can't fix! I love the shape and it hugs your curves! I went for an L, even though I would normally wear a XL, I think either would have been fine.

links_reviews_title: Winner- Classy, Fresh and Fun. Must Rent
links_reviews_text: Sexy at the top but long enough work ready. Loved it.
I didn't wear this dress because the weather change from 82 to high of 59. So sad because I packed it to wear. Will rent again.
This is a GREAT dress. However, it runs a little large
Great fit. Lightweight and perfect for so many occasions.

links_reviews_title: Fun print, love this DvF dress!
links_reviews_text: Most compliments ever received on an RTR dress. I noticed after I came back from the UPS store, it was discounted to a reasonable price and I hit my head cause I would've bought it! Now I stalk the DvF website hoping it will go on sale as this dress is so difficult to rent on RTR (It's that awesome!)
LOVE this dress. Super comfortable, every detail thought of with fit. Wore it 3 times, seriously considered buying it.
Fit was body skimming, yet forgiving. I wore to a work presentation. Glam but appropriate

links_reviews_title: Simple and flattering- with pockets! Perfect for work

links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, great fit! Loved this dress, simple design but felt very chic!
Loved the style of this dress and color block. #ithaspockets

Really liked this Nicole Miller dress - super comfortable for work, visually sucked in all the things, and was cut correctly. Just didn't like the pockets when I sat down, there was a lining that was sheer and due to the placement over my hips made for an awkward slice (x2) right over an area I'd rather not have customers looking at. Eeek! Slightly stretchy but runs small, this is an XL and I'm normally a 12 or 14 in dresses.
Super cute fit and conservative enough for work. I loved the soft material and pockets. I got lots of compliments on it.
I wore this with black tights and booties. Fun, but still professional.
Fits great
I wore this with chevron black tights and knee high boots for a conference. It was comfortable and fashionable!

Love the color blocking and fabric - and It fit perfectly except the slit pockets, which pulled/stretched open and made the hips look awful. Great for women with slim, straight hips. But those with curves need to either stitch the pockets flat or try sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Decent dress for work but not super exciting
links_reviews_text: The drop waist makes this less A line than it appears in pictures so it wasn't the most flattering me. I was traveling (which it is very comfy but wrinkled easily) and it worked well with tights and short boots. Just a bit ordinary.

I liked this for work, though the pockets are such that I couldn't really put anything in them without a weird gape. The fabric is close enough to jersey that it's right on the borderline of too casual for my office, but it worked well with black tights and booties and a nice, substantial necklace.
This was the perfect combo of fun and formal for a concert/date. The pockets were great and had several compliments from strangers about the cut/color
Its cute but too big

Wore for couple work conferences. Very soft, stretchy and easy to wear all day. Needed to adjust to avoid drop-waist effect. Once fixed, the very slight blouson on the top was flattering in a subtle way. Can add a skinny belt to accentuate that too. Not especially interesting design, but solid basic and great pockets!
A bit short but I’m tall. Work it anyway and got compliments
I had rented this for work but didn't end up wearing it as it looked sloppy on. The top portion is a thin t-shirt material that constantly looks pulled and twisted, won't lay flat on.
it fit nicely. I am tall and it wasn't too short. It looked nice and I loved how thick the material was. it really made the dress look like quality.
Really wanted to love this dress. I sized up and the pockets yay didn't lay flat and the lining was mesh. Wanted to love but the pockets made it unwearable.
This dress fit great and super comfy too! The fabric was thick enough to hide any little bumps and bulges. I loved the pockets too!

links_reviews_title: Cute cut but poor quality fabric
links_reviews_text: The fabric was almost see-through and very, very thin; could not wear to work.
It was a little bigger than I thought it would be. I only wore it once.
The large fit me. And the dress was comfortable. But there was this weird gathering by the side of the chest and darts. Maybe I wasn't filling it out? I didn't wear it.
It bunches up a little bit and comes up really high when sitting - but standing up, it's PERFECT.

I wore this to a casual fundraiser. The top material is different than the skirt, but obviously all attached as one dress. The fabric is very soft. The pockets gapped open a little on my hips; I wish they had still been sewn shut since they're not really functional anyway.
I loved this sweater sooooo much! Got lots of compliments :)

links_reviews_title: A bright sweater for colder months
links_reviews_text: I loved the bright pink color. I rented this for February. It was casual Friday on Valentine's and this color was perfect. It his a heavier weight for a knit sweater. It is true to size.
It's a nice sweater. Fun sweater. Nothing super amazing to write home about.
The sleeves of this sweater and the fun color make it a great all around. I like sweaters that have more structure than normal sweaters, it makes me feel more trendy easily.

links_reviews_title: Great top for going to Enchanted DC, a Christmas light event!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Fits well. I usually wear a M shirt, size 12 pants. They sent me a large first which was too big. The M fit perfectly! I am pear shaped and smaller on top.

links_reviews_title: Dramatic berry color. Comfortable chic slouchy!
links_reviews_text: Love the rasberry color. I rented a size up for an oversized slouchy look. (Large would have fit nicely too.) I like how the sweater narrows at the wrists and forearms. Easy to wear. Looks great with jeans. The simple crewneck makes this sweater a great canvas for a dramatic statement necklace or scarf.

links_reviews_title: Power color sweater, fun for work or everyday
links_reviews_text: Loved this! I liked that the sleeves have some shape and the body of the sweater didn't lose its shape over the course of the day.
Fun color and look. Sort of an 80s feel. Overall a good sweater.
Good for LA weather as wasn't too hot. Great pink color. Sweater fit was on the large size so could be worth sizing down for a more form fitting look.
It was too short on me... and it didn’t hit me in the right place at the hips.

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little stretched out
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater, in a fun color. Just felt the neck and sleeves were a little stretched out

links_reviews_title: So comfy, perfect pop of color
links_reviews_text: Loose fit, fun sleeve details!
Gorgeous, happy color, expensive looking knit.
Very comfortable! Looking forward to wearing it in other colors.
Great fit, great color. A cooler tone than it appears in the photo, but still Hot Pink, just not as reddish as the photo shows.
Great sweater. Super fun color. Lots of compliments

I love this so much I wore it twice. I normally wear a small or medium and I like things big. The small was perfect in this sweater. Medium would have been too large Perfect length to wear with work pants Not at all itchy

links_reviews_title: Sweater was just ok. Not my favorite
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and look of this. However the material was rough and not forgiving on.
Cute sweater but it wasn't very flattering on my frame.

There was nothing special about this piece. It was soft but not something I would choose to rent again as it wasn't flattering and just wasn't something as fun as I thought it looked in the photo. Very plain - may be good for someone smaller but not bigger female.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pop of color on a gray wintry day!
links_reviews_text: Wore to work and over weekend. Nice pop of color.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a whatever sweater
links_reviews_text: Wore this once. It didn't wow me but it was cute and a great color
More texture than I realized. Pretty color and soft, good quality fabric.

I love this sweater! It came new with tags so I was the first person to try this style and it didn't disappoint. The color is gorgeous and the sweater is very warm. The thickness keeps you cozy but I think I also adds a few lbs. I would pair with wide leg pants to balance your silhouette. It didn't look good with skinny jeans. The sleeve are a nice designer touch.

links_reviews_title: Great fall /winter sweater for a big splash of color
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, a little brighter than the photo; very much a bright pick jewel color.
Got lots of compliments at work! Great fit.
Wore this one a lot to add to other outfits and for warmth. Was always very comfortable. Sits quite well and flattering. Looks better than on the photo
I wish it didn't have should pass, because of this I did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Distressed fabric, couldn't wear it to work
links_reviews_text: Wish I had known that it has multiple rips in it to give it a distressed look, I had rented it for a work event and it looked too sloppy so couldn't wear it for work. Might be better for the weekend with jeans, very comfortable fabric that has a slight stretch to it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but the distressed styling looks accidental not intentional
links_reviews_text: Honestly, when I first opened the bag I thought someone had snagged it -- when I looked it up online I saw that it was supposed to look distressed. So style accordingly! Also, no lining in the jacket.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality but more distressed than I was expecting
links_reviews_text: I love Iro jackets! This one was no exception. Great fit and very comfortable Only thing is that the jacket ended up being a bit more distressed than I thought it would be. Still very cute and appropriate for work, but I ended up wearing this to work on a "regular day" instead of on a day with an important meeting.
It's cute but there's a few oddly placed distressed rips and the jacket can't be worn open because the neck line flops over. Warm, not itchy and hits perfectly at the waist though!
Love this, wore it several times for work and play. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Smart Casual- just enough stretch in the fabric
links_reviews_text: Distressed look makes this a business casual blazer. Fit is amazing. I've worn to work, to dinner and drinks. Looks amazing with jeans!

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Wore it over and over in different ways. Dressed up jeans, a jumper, and wore it fancy
links_reviews_text: fit was great. I have broad shoulders and a large bust and it was just the thing. Loved the material and it felt like it made everything I wore with it much nicer, just like a jacket is supposed to do!

links_reviews_title: I've rented this before and loved it, but think I got the wrong size this time.
links_reviews_text: It was a little short and tight in the sleeve for me. Needed to size up.

links_reviews_title: It was just fine for what I wanted it for - easy to wear at work.
links_reviews_text: Looked a little more casual than I anticipated but worked fine.

links_reviews_title: Not structured fits somewhat like a cardigan.
links_reviews_text: Go for a larger size
Fit well just right for traveling
Definitely runs a small.
Runs small

links_reviews_title: Great transitional piece and appropriate for work. Got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Light jacket, good overall fit.
Super cute and trendy but definitely more distressed than the photos appear
office look!
Dress up or down. Tons of compliments.
I will definitely rent this again. The extra distressing makes this jacket perfect with jeans and a tee.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, fabric is surprisingly distressed
links_reviews_text: I ordered this to wear to work, where our "code" is pretty casual. I was happy to see an IRO jacket that actually closes, because usually they hang far to open for my tasted. This jacket is SO cute on! The one thing I would point out is that the fabric has a distressed look, so it appears that it has been snagged, or almost ripped, in several places. It startled me at first, because I thought I did it! But nope, it's part of the look. So it's probably not for a formal business environment. Highly recommend it anyway!
Definitely not my style. Felt sloppy and frumpy in it. Too much fringe and felt really big on me.
Lots of compliments on this jacket. Dress it up or down. Adds a bit of rock 'n' roll or any outfit. I wore it to work.
Classic and elegant jacket. Perfect weight for spring with just enough stretch for an active lifestyle. This might just be the one I keep.
Easy comfortable and fresh.
Felt a little large but kept me very warm with layers underneath on the coldest winter days! Will probably rent again next winter!
Wore for winter vacation in Nashville. Very feminine twist on a classic trench style
I LOOOOVED this coat. I wore it for a weekend in NYC and got no less than 2 compliments an hour. It's so comfy, so warm but not bulky, and so trendy. Rent this coat.
Super cute coat. It's so soft! If you are short, the coat is really long and it also runs big.
Warm pretty coat nice different color
I love this so much that I have rented it twice. Goes well with any outfits even with jeans and sneakers.

links_reviews_title: Felt fabulous while wearing this coat!
links_reviews_text: Rented this coat for the chilly weather day to day! The amount of compliments I received from complete strangers was incredible! Tempted to buy it!!
Rented this for trip to NYC and it was PERFECT! Received tons of compliments on it. It was warm and cozy. Will probably rent this one again!
Way too big and the buttons were loose, but still really liked the idea of this jacket. Not toooo warm, but did the trick for DC wintertime

links_reviews_title: Did not think I would LOVE this as much as I do
links_reviews_text: Considering buying this coat. I love in Midwest, and this is a great warm, heavy but not too heavy, coat that looks professional, fashionable and functional!! I am not obsessed with "baby pink" but paired correctly, it really is great!

Beautiful length and color. The structure is great too. I'm a 4 in coats and this is a small, which was a bit larger, but only in that I had room for sweaters. It's no parka, but with the right accessories it will keep you just as warm. I took it to NYC for Thanksgiving and didn't miss a parka.

links_reviews_title: I wore this several times! You can really dress it up or down depending on what you're looking for.
Super cute, just an odd texture
links_reviews_text: Love this coat, it’s warm, the color is stunning, and it’s a perfect length! Only complaint is that the texture was a little fur like, not what I was expecting.. would probably still rent again though!
This was a very cute coat. I wore it once and it was super warm. It ended up being too long for me.. near ankles

links_reviews_title: I love this coat and kept it several weeks!!
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments!! Stunning! Felt very rich! Great quality! For big, roomy. But I loved it!!
It was roomy with great pockets. I would definitely rent it again.
I loved this coat. So many compliments. Don't want to give it up!
Looked a little overworn but besides that a cute coat !
Great color
Thought it was a cheap material. Seemed like it had been worn many times. Was piling or maybe it's the material. Sent it back after trying on. I personally would recommend.

links_reviews_title: wore this to a wedding in NE in December. It is beautiful and fit the occasion perfectly.
links_reviews_text: wish I had ordered a M, this coat runs large and I ended up just pulling it closed because when I buttoned it it looked horrible on me ...
The fabric is super soft and luxe, the color is to die for, and it's plenty warm! Can't go wrong with this one!

links_reviews_title: Great length and fabric, but a little oversized.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric and style! The coat is very long even for a tall girl like me which I liked. It was too oversized for me though, I would size down.

links_reviews_title: Good warmth and color in NYC
links_reviews_text: Worked with daytime and evening outfits on my trip to NYC and was functional in terms of warmth.
A fun oversized coat with an unexpected furry texture. RTR reccomended a large, but I would size down to a M if I rented again.

Absolutely in love with this jacket. It's so soft and cozy! I purchased a large when I really should have gotten a medium, because that's what I normally wear, so I'd say this jacket is true to size !

links_reviews_title: Wore this to get my hair done at my usual downtown chicago salon and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It's incredibly soft and really a beautiful color.
Loved this coat- I normally wear a 6 and got a M in this coat (RTR suggested an S) - I like it a bit oversized, but an S would have fit great too with a thinner shirt underneath.

links_reviews_title: This coat is lovely; can be dressed down or up. I wore it over a cocktail dress for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: This coat runs a bit large, but that could also be how it is intended to fit. Surprisingly warm, and very classy!
This coat was thick enough to keep me warm on a DC night in the 40 degree range. Loved it!

This jacket reminds me of cotton candy. It's pink and I love it! Such a comfortable coat, warm but not too warm. Really soft and fun. The only reason I returned it was because a bird pooped on me in it- that's good luck right!? Will rent again!!

links_reviews_title: So hard to part with; LOVE
links_reviews_text: This blazer is gorgeous. It's a heavy fabric, so definitely rent for a cooler day. It's fun to pair with dark jeans, light jeans, and white jeans. I can't count the number of times I wore this before finally sending it back. A beautiful find!
I. Want. To. Keep. This. Blazer. I literally have no words. Just amazing in every designer way. Would rent 100 times over and over!
I like that this plaid makes the blazer less formal. Glad I sized up.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send it back
links_reviews_text: Veronica Beard and I are having a moment these days. Anything I rent from this label fits like a glove. I loved this blazer too much. Good for 50 degree days with a light weight shirt and jeans. I felt really polished in it but still casual.

Paired this with moto boots, black turtleneck and boyfriend jeans and felt like the blazer pulled the whole outfit together. It was a tiny bit small to button but I don't plan on buttoning. Hits nicely at the hips and great shape!
I received so many compliments on this jacket. Extremely well made, perfect fit and flattering
The fit and look of this jacket is all that. I can't wait to wear it again. And again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty Jacket but not necessarily flattering
links_reviews_text: This jacket was actually quite pretty but the double breasted design is not well suited for someone on the heavier side. It was also a bit big for me so it did not have a nice tailored look as intended. I still liked it and maybe would try a smaller size in the future

Loved this! All of the Veronica Beard blazers fit me perfectly as most blazers run large in the shoulders for me but finally found my perfect match. Loved the rich browns and got tons of compliments on this one. Will definitely be in my favorites rotation!
Beautiful Cut, Fit, and Pattern as expected from Veronica Beard. Would look better with a skirt since it's on the shorter side. Will rent again.
Looks great on, super comfy and easy to wear!
Another great Veronica beard blazer. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Best part of my Monday; Caramel plaid for the win
links_reviews_text: I did have a case of the Mondays when I wore this, but overall really liked this blazer. I was surprised at the material -- it was a weave that kind of felt like what a straw hat is made of... but it didn't make much of a difference with a shirt on underneath. I thought the colors were unique for a plaid blazer. It fits TTS
Sized up and was glad I did. Very comfortable and the details were beautiful. Loved the white buttons and color.
Loved loved loved this. Super interesting and adorable. Fit is great. So many compliments. Great rental BC not too easy to wear multiple times and pricey

I loved the blazer's color combination of brown, black and cream. Paired it with black jeans and brown boots for a casual look but could easily dress it up with skirt and heels. Didn't want to return it, but there are so many things to try!

Rented this for the second time for a Palm Springs/LA vacation. Received compliments constantly. It is an unusual fabric that is lightweight but has substance to it. Great with jeans, boots or heels, a tee or turtle neck. Would love to buy but too expensive. Will definitely rent again and again. True fit and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments with this jacket
links_reviews_text: I'm absolutely in love with this jacket. I don't want to return it. The material is hard to define, sort of like an even weave. It is unique and very comfortable. I liked the jacket both open and closed. It really just fits great and true to size. If you're thinking about renting this - don't think twice. You will love it.
Really loved this bold print and fall colors. It was one size too big, and would have ordered the size 0 if it had been available. Would look great with cream, black, tan, or denim.

links_reviews_title: Trendy & pretty pattern blazer that goes with everything!
links_reviews_text: Loved the look of this blazer with leather shorts and patterned dresses. Nice that you can wear it with black or brown. Material is breathable with a high quality structured fit.
Perfect transitional blazer.
Great jacket! Loved the fit!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, professional and a perfect knit for warm weather
links_reviews_text: Jacket is a beautiful and great quality. LOVE that it's not fully lined and a loose knit. Wore to casual to work and dressed up for two separate client meeting - many compliments all three wears. Do rent this jacket! #roomforboobs
When I saw this color was available I wasn't super excited (I gravitate more towards black over brown) but this TOTALLY changed my mind!!
Fit is great. Fabric is on the thicker side. Pattern makes a statement. Lots of compliments!

Wore it to work with a. Cute black blouse underneath, then wore it out with a t-shirt! Worked so well! 10/10 recommend. The arms were a little long for my petite build, but otherwise just so precious.

links_reviews_title: Not amazing - VB is usually better
links_reviews_text: Veronica makes the best jackets, hands down. I loved the idea of this one, but it was off. It didn’t look cheap, but it certainly didn’t look expensive, like her work normally does. It also didn’t have a complete lining on the back, which ended up working out ok but I was annoyed. Lastly, the fabric was almost plasticy. It sounds like I hated it, but I can’t hate anything she does. I just think she has better.

links_reviews_title: Wore this multiple times for work
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, looks great with jeans
This jacket is very well made and fits true to size. I wore an XS to work with jeans and it looked amazing. Got so many compliments.
This blazer is really cool and although the fabric is kind of strange, it makes it even more interesting. Lots of compliments.

My usual size 2 wasn't available so I got the 4 which fit fine. The 2 would have probably fit great as well since the 4 was not at all tight. I would say if you want this to be more fitted then order your typical size but don't be afraid to size up either. The fabric is very high quality and the trim makes it feel lux. I wish I could keep this one!
This is a great jacket with an interesting fabric and flattering cut. It fits very true to size.
I loved the colors of this blazer. It truly looks great with jeans, white and black pants. True to size. The reason I did not give it the fifth star was it did not keep its shape well.

I styled the blazer with a cream and black Breton-stripe-style T-shirt and leopard-print kitten heels for maximum pattern play, which made it cooler. It worked well, and it fit TTS, though I could have sized down because the shoulders are pretty padded and read as wide. I didn't love the specific shade of brown in the plaid, so for that reason I won't be renting again. The cut is flattering and the blazer is somehow both retro and modern at the same time.
Loved the pattern and cut. Can be dressed up or down.
I was incredibly sad to give this back. Typical Veronica beard amazingness. Loved this print for fall.
This blazer fit great! I wore it with a black t-shirt, jeans, and brown boots...and I felt cute and got lots of compliments!

Veronica Beard just dominates the blazer. Wow! Every rental has been fantastically constructed- I use to sew my own clothes, so I'm not easily impressed. Great fit, although a bit tight through the bust on me. The colors are a bit "halloween" but it works with jeans for a day of meetings. Great rental.

Wish I would have waited for the 0 to be available. I like blazers to fit very tight, and this was a bit loose through the arms. Would rent again in smaller size. The quality, colors and cut were great.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite VB jacket, but lots of good details
links_reviews_text: I love VB jackets, but this one really wasn't my favorite. I rented in summer (weight was fine for warm weather), but the colors might be better for fall. I liked the material (kind of a tight crochet/weave over lining that was a really neat detail), buttons were also unique, and fit was tts for VB.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, great for work. Very tight around the armpit area. Loved the velvet.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear XS but this was very tight around the upper half. My partner helped me take it off, very carefully. Otherwise, its a great piece. I felt very cute in it!

links_reviews_title: In love with this shirt, you can use it for going out, formal, work, anything!
links_reviews_text: They were all out of smalls and I got a medium, the V line had a more "dramatic" deep than I like. Overall I love this top, it's gorgeous

I thought this looked cute in the site but it was even cuter IRL-- sadly size small was way too small and I had no chance to wear it. I'm not sure a medium would fit me either given how small the small was....

links_reviews_title: Classy And Chic top, good for work!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this top. It was good to wear for work and was easily transitioned to after-work dinner and cocktails attire!

links_reviews_title: Bad fit. It looked nice but it was small
links_reviews_text: The fit was very tight and I was not able to wear it. It was also short in length at the body area and the sleeves.
I'm usually a small or extra small in tops. So ordered a size small to be safe and it was extremely tight. Would def have needed a medium. Such a cute and flattering top had it fit!

I really liked this top and got a ton of compliments when I wore it to work. The peplum is super flattering. It definitely looks velvet in person, which doesn't show as much in the picture, so it's a thicker fabric and good for cold weather. I would definitely rent again - I kind of felt like a pirate in a good way. There's a side zip to get it on - there's no stretch in the fabric. The medium fit me great, so I'd suggest sizing up if between sizes.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, wasn't able to wear
links_reviews_text: I wasn't able to wear the top as it wouldn't fit my bust. Really cute though and I love the material.
Tried a large although I'm usually a S-M in tops but peplums can be a tough fit. The placement of the waistline didn't work for me (I have a high hip/short torso). However it's a beautiful top.
I didn't wear this one. The sleeves are awesome and the fabric is soft but its very strangely tight through the middle. Would be better on a straight torso rather than curvy body type.
Velvet material with silver pinstripes and nice ruffle bottom. Bow tie on neck
Bummed at the tight fit. Will probably order again one size up
A little deep, but trendy feel; loved it.
did not fit---would have to size up two sizes to even remotely fit into it. the fabric though feels really nice! would consider re-renting with teh size up

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small but cute winter work top
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small, I didn't end up wearing it since I didn't realize the material was velvet!
This top always looked crisp fresh bright interesting classy. It's very high-quality. You're gonna love it.

links_reviews_title: Glamorous colors and pattern in a practical knit package.
links_reviews_text: Very easy and comfortable to wear, I had many occasions to wear. Great rental!
I received several compliments and loved it! Great fit and looked amazing on.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Hawaii day time look. Comfy and wrinkle free straight out of the suitcase
Gorgeous color, generous fit in the bust
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this dress, the colors are beautiful, however the gaping at the top/bust made it unwearable.
Fit great, wore it several times to different events. Lots of compliments except the bartender seeing only my the top part thought I was entering the Ugly Christmas Sweater Contest.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and colorful dress, totally different, and super flattering!
links_reviews_text: Wasn't sure about this when I rented it, but it looks great on, super flattering. I got lots of compliments on the cute print. Liked it so much I rented it again for another event.

links_reviews_title: Bright colors look great for winter
links_reviews_text: Wore this with a long sleeve black bodysuit and black tights and it was a great work dress for an event - the colors stand out and the shape and fabric are very flattering. I wish I could hang onto this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress is just vacation and happiness
links_reviews_text: The colors in this knit dress are perfection. I absolutely love it. I need more of this in my life. Runs a little big. Great length if you are tall. Will definitely rent this again.
Loved this dress!
I wanted to love this dress but it was ...: ok. Material was heavy and it actually made me feel heavier than what I am. It's a fun dress but not my personal favorite.
Super cute dress, pleasantly "heavy" fabric, great quality.
The dress was very comfortable and I love the bold colors. I felt the dress was a little too short.

This dress was a great fit. I loved that it was a nice heavy material that I could slip a nice turtleneck under on a gloomy rainy day and stay nice and cozy. Paired well with a blazer and knee boots. I would definitely rent this again.

I loved this dress. I am very disproportioned with a large bust and broad shoulders and several sizes smaller on the bottom. I got the large to fit my bust so it was big on the bottom. The knit is thick and lays very well but still stretchy. A medium may have looked better on me. Got lots of compliments regardless.
Loved the thick fabric on this dress. It had pleats in the skirt which helped the print stand out. Loved that it was bright and two different prints. So cute!

I hadn't been able to rent this dress during the summer so grabbed it when I saw it recently even though I wasn't sure how it would work for fall given the bright colors. It is still good! The knit fabric definitely extends the wear as does the black in the pattern. I was between a S and M and went with the medium which I think was the right choice although it gapped a bit under the arms. Great and fun rental!

I love the colors in this and it was pretty comfortable. I wore it with black tights and a sweater to make it more suitable for fall. It also gapped a bit under my arms - showing my bra - so the sweater was necessary for the office.
This lightweight and vibrant knit is perfect for a sunny, early fall day! Petite gals - keep in mind that the top is specious, but still flattering.

links_reviews_title: super cute bright dress - fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: got a ton of compliments - work appropriate but still fun and cute!
I wore this dress to work with a blazer and then also wore it on my honeymoon to go out to dinner and got so many compliments on it!

This is an all around great dress. I would say the arm hole/chest area was a little slack, but I imagine that's due to me leaving it on a hanger overnight. Or not. But it's an excellent dress and the shape and structure is very forgiving after a large lunch.

links_reviews_title: So flattering and unique! Colors were gorgeous and the material made the silhouette perfect
