links_reviews_text: Loved this, made me look thin! I loved the material, it was thicker, which hides any "bumps" and the colors were vibrant. Highly recommend, will rent again and hopefully purchase in the future.

Love this dress. Fit is great - just long enough for work, but fun enough to wear out after. I normally wear a 12, 36DD, and the L was perfect. It has light cheerleader uniform vibes, but I got many compliments at work and on the street!
Nice for work and to go out
The fabric is so flattering and I loved the colors. Perhaps the best dress I've rented so far

Stylish, flattering and comfortable. And so many compliments! Perfect for a pear-shaped body, no Spanx intervention required! The pleats make it super forgiving. Vibrant colors are fun without being overwhelming. Can wear a regular bra. The fabric doesn't wrinkle. The print makes it casual, but the overall design is suitable for my workplace, and the dress would also be fun for going out, party, etc. If I could afford it I would buy it in a heartbeat. Will be holding onto this one for a while!
This is a great number, though definitely would have liked a little bit more snugness in the top, where this piece runs big.

I rented this as part of my update membership and absolutely LOVED it. It is so eye catching and so comfortable. It also is a good one to bring if you are traveling, as it doesn't wrinkle at all. I highly recommend this one!
I wear an extra-small and it fit perfectly. Received several compliments. Colors were bold and print was perfect for the summer time.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for when you are physically at work but mentally on vacay
links_reviews_text: Love the colors and the fabric. I got tons of compliments. PSA: something about the pleats got me and extra pat down at the airport :/

links_reviews_title: It is very cute and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: It is easy to wear and very cute. It runs slightly big. Colors are bold and really pop
Perfect dress! Loved the mixed print.
This DVF dress got SO many compliments!!!! I wasn't sure it was work appropriate but it was great under a cardigan and then was also great for dinner. Super comfortable too. Highly recommend
perfect fit and comfortable!
I wore it to a concert and then work with a date after. It is stretchy and slightly heavier than I would have expected, but extremely comfortable. The colors are so fun, and I got lots of colors!
Loved this dress. Colors are very bright, good material, and fit. Wore this during day with blazer and heels.

Love this dress so much. My height is all in my legs so it was a tad on the short side but not in an inappropriate way. I got compliments on it all night and it was so comfortable! The only thing to note is that the arm holes are cut very generously. Not a big problem for me because I have a larger chest.
So great in every way!!!
This was a fun dress! Great material, patterns and colors! It was true to size and goes perfectly with black shoes, limited accessories and even perfect to pair with a denim jacket.

I was worried it be too short based on some reviews but it worked out perfectly. I got a ton of compliments and felt so pretty in this dress. The colors are vibrant and the M fit my frame nicely. I've worn it 3 times; one for work (here), date night and out with friends. I am keeping it a little longer. Contemplating buying it but it's a lot more than I would normally spend so most likely I will send it back and then plan to rent it again (if available).
The photo makes this look more aqua but it is very much a rich kelly green. It's stretchy and cute and comfy, but not lined and not forgiving of lines. Choose your spanx carefully.
loved the bright green color, a-line cut was cute but tight around hips for pear-shapes. fabric was soft and had some stretch but not breathable.

links_reviews_title: This was an amazing and flattering dress.

links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, hugs the body but has stretch, great color. I'm taller and wear most of my weight on my lower half and this is great.

The fit and design were nice. Maybe the higher waist stitching was the reason I didn't give this a better rating; as a tall woman, it was a little bit of a "baby doll" vibe, which isn't always the best vibe. But overall, easy to wear and good for work. Lovely color!

loved this classic RL dress, amazing color, easy comfortable fit (if a bit baggy up top). added a belt for interest. loved it and saw two newscasters wearing it the very night i did - ha! great color for the holiday season but could be a three season dress.
Color was pretty but nothing special. I did wear to church Christmas Eve before returning

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfy, flattering and versatile!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a great length for work. It was a perfect outfit for that weird time between winter and spring. Thinking about buying.

This dress is very flattering and looks good on. However it is not lined. I took lining for granted and wore it without great inspection. Was in the airport and you could see my tank / shaper underneath and the torso stitching of my tights. I thought wow I should have worn a slip but who owns those anyway? I'll be paying closer attention next time.

I have red hair and green is always a good color for me. The color was pretty, but the cut of the dress was disappointing. It ran a little large all over and was just plain and underwhelming, nothing special. Sent it back without wearing.
Stretchy fabric love the dress. Received so many compliments

The color and feel of the dress are dynamite, I didn't' wear this as the design had a seam that ran vertically down the back side - literally "cutting" my back side in half. Pretty, just wasn't the detail I could have used.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color and style, but very thin.
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and style of this dress (which fits TTS), but did not wear it because it was so thin. You could see the outline of my seamless underwear even with tights on top.
Flattering fit, great color, fits well!
This dress is very pretty and well made. The fit on me just wasn't as flattering as I would have liked, especially in the mid region. I wore it with a blazer for work and with tights.
The cut of these dress was extremely flattering! Lots of compliments.
This dress fits so well and holds up. I've worn it twice and would buy it in a heartbeat with a better discount.
The dress is a gorgeous shade of green however it might be better for a bustier person.
I loooove a cropped sweater so this was my vibe. Flattering on wider shoulders and hide thick material. I even debated buying it but it was kind of borderline over worn.
The shoulders and sleeves fit me, but it was really really short on me. I'm very tall, but I was still surprised!
I wore a small for weekend and work alike. So comfy and warm. I'm tall and it is a bit shorter in the front, so I wore it with high waisted jeans.
This is my favorite RTR so far. I wore it almost daily - it's an oversized fit, warm, soft fabric and is so comfortable.
I normally wear an extra small and this ran small. Would rent a size up next time

I was obsessed with this sweater! Soo sad to return it. It was super comfy, but also stylish. Goes perfectly with high waisted jeans - it's a little cropped, so that definitely prevents your stomach from showing. Wore this on the weekend & to work (casual office). True to size, just rolled the sleeves once.
Loved this sweater. Fashionable, casual, and comfortable. The sweater is cropped, even on a petite frame, so I wore with high waisted jeans. Loved it!
Adorable, loved this and will rent again

The medium was a little too big on me. It's got an oversized fit, but it runs quite long in the arms and wide in the neck. Nice material and cute classic style. Good if you need something casual / not a show stopping outfit.
This fit a bit cropped & oversized. Perfect for a fall day
This was perfect for a trip to Northern California. I wore it basically every day. Yes it's a little boxy but I love that style. Easy to dress up or down

links_reviews_title: Oversized but not in a good way.
links_reviews_text: This wasn't a flattering oversized look because of the way the sleeve was set and the thickness of the yarn.
Stretchier bigger and shorter in the front than I expected. But otherwise cute!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved how easy this was to wear and I wore it several time before returning.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Body was slightly oversized on me which I loved, but sleeves hit at a good length.

links_reviews_title: Not for an event but for daily wear.
links_reviews_text: The oversize fits works for this style but I probably could have gone down a size and been happy. Styled with The Great's gunny sack trousers for casual wear and also with a high-waisted slim cut black pant for work. Comfortable and on-trend.
Wore this multiple times. Loved it. But I also have a short torso so it worked for me. Considered buying it but wasn't sure how long the crop style will be in.
This sweater was heavier than I thought. Super cute boxy style though.
I generally like boxy/oversized tops but this sweater seemed super wide on me. I thought my shoulders looked very wide in it and it was pretty short in front. Liked the material though!
Baggy fit but sat nicely on shoulders.

Super cute sweater but instantly wished I ordered a medium. I would say this runs true to size but errs towards the larger side. It supposed to be oversized but it was just too big for me to wear comfortably without looking ridiculously big. May try to rent again and will try the medium. Otherwise, it was very soft and incredibly cute.
Cute sweater. There was a small stain center, front, bottom. This sat in my closet and meant to wear it but never did.
This is great for going out - you obviously can't put to much inside of it! I however love this designer and I got so many compliments everywhere to went. Not super functional- but funnnnnn!! Xo

I'm usually a medium but went down a size according to reviews. As a result, the sleeves were too short and while it fit well around my torso, the shape was too boxy to be flattering. I also expected the front draped more as shown in the model pic.
Fun twist on a sweater. Long fun sleeves. This sweater isn't long and looks cute open or buttoned.

I like the pattern and thought I'd wear it more than I did. It's pretty bulky and while it's great for winter, I didn't like the way it felt under my winter jacket so it stayed in the closet after a couple wears. But it's warm and cute with black or colored pants.

links_reviews_title: Just OK, Not my Favorite Rental
links_reviews_text: This sweater runs large and boxy and isn't overall the most flattering. It felt bulky and awkward to wear closed so I opted to wear it open over a turtle neck tunic and leggings. It is very warm and I didn't have to wear an additional coat to run errands even on a snowy day.
I received lots of compliments on this jacket and it was warm and comfy. I felt it was a little large and boxy for my body type.
Made me look gigantic
Too bulky. Will not choose again
Too warm for my area's weather, and perhaps too boxy for my body type.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and fashionable jacket that can be worn with jeans or dresses

links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater! I wore it twice - once out to a wintry dinner in Portland Maine and once to work in Boston. It's nicely cropped, so it shows off your bum and waist while still being incredibly comfortable.

links_reviews_title: wore several times. got lots of compliments on this unique sweater jacket
links_reviews_text: warm, comfortable and stylish. I wore this several times ranging from weekend in NYC to dinner out to work.
Great looking sweater/jacket! Elevated my black separates.

links_reviews_title: I fell in love with this little sweater coat. Casual yet classy. Got asked where I got it often.
links_reviews_text: Short and boxy but still with a flattering fit and structure. Great pattern and knit. Runs a tad large.
Fits true to size.
Boxy but cute

links_reviews_title: Looks OKAY not something i will reorder at all.
links_reviews_text: This jacket runs big. I like the pattern and the oversize design. However the material is rough and looks cheap.
Too itchy to wear for me. So sad.
Loved this sweater jacket! I wore it over a form fitting black dress to work.

I probably could have made this work in small because it does run boxy. Though, I like my sleeves just a bit longer. I returned before wearing, hoping to try the M size. I'm 6'0 tall and thin. This would probably work great for anyone 5'11" and shorter (sleeve length).
Cozy sweater, a little itchy the second wear.
Cute jacket but definitely runs or feels big (I think it's meant to be that way). The arms are cute, but drove me nuts at times. Very warm and cozy!
Very easy to wear and casual, but looks nice enough to go out to brunch. A good piece for plenty of situations, but bulky under a jacket.
Nice warm, chunky sweater. Snug-enough fit for my small frame

I initially didn't like this on. I thought it was too boxy but it actually was very flattering. Great graphic pattern and I got lots of compliments on it. The sleeves are very long ( intentionally I think) so I rolledld them up. Good weight.
Super warm and cozy, felt like I was wearing a blanket. In a cute way

links_reviews_title: love it, very warm. Very nice style.
links_reviews_text: love it, very warm. Very nice style.

links_reviews_title: I was testing the size. I could wear this jacket with a DD bust
links_reviews_text: I loved it. Fit nice, long sleeves which I like. Comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Comfy cozy but a bit itchy
links_reviews_text: Would recommend this over a thin long-sleeve only as it is kind of itchy on bare skin, but did not stop me from wearing it repeatedly in my freezing cold office!
The sweater is very cute. I wore it twice, had to carry a lint roller. The white left lint/shed all over the pants I wore. No worth the hassle.
Such a chic sweater, received tons of compliments.
Definitely do not size up this is huge. I put it on for work and live the look of it and style but it's way to big. Will get again in a medium.

links_reviews_title: Liked the sweater. Very heavy and too large for me though. Didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Heavy and a little large for a medium.
Super cute, wore it with a fitted black dress to work.

Darn, forgot a picture. I rented this for a ski vacation thinking it could be comfy at night but it was so unflattering. Too big/wide (even though i sized down) and too short (making it look more formal and less loungey if that makes sense?). It didn't make the cut into the suitcase.
Overall, very cute sweater. Great thickness for winter. You will need to pair it with something fitted on the bottom as it flares out a good bit if you are petite
Nice pattern. Sleeves run long and sweater very boxy. I would’ve needed a XXS.
Everyday
Sweater coat was too itchy for me to wear, also it felt bulky and heavier than expected.
Fits large. Cute jacket but the fit isn't flattering. I didn't end up wearing it.
I loved the chunky knit and black and white pattern. It's a cozy but chic layer for cool Fall days.

Pretty happy with these pants. They are thicker than anticipated but still ok for warm weather. I traveled with these and they weren't terribly wrinkly when I pulled them out of my luggage. Only negative is they were kind of difficult to button/clasp.

links_reviews_title: Super high waisted, pinstripes are brown
links_reviews_text: I wore these pants a few times and always with booties! Worn with a crop top and then a tucked in blouse. Many ways to wear, comfortable, and different!

links_reviews_title: So comfy and breezy! Perfect for summer.
links_reviews_text: Great summer pants. They're breezy, loose and so comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Did I feel like I was wearing circus pants? YES Did I enjoy every minute of it? ALSO YES
links_reviews_text: Fun and flattering. Makes the waist look tiny and the booty pop

These look stylish enough to dress up for the office or just wear casually with a tank and sandals. I loved these pants so much! Great for a hot day because they're light and airy. Usually between a 4 and 6 and the 4 fit great. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I'm a sucker for a wide leg pant
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. Cinched in high waist with a cropped wide leg.

Super high waisted, so I thought a 0 would fit. i can button them, but then my actual rib cage bulges over the sides:( ended up unbuttoning the top and wearing a large belt over it. Kind of cute, but made me look wide and my butt super long. Wore for just dinner with girlfriends.
I got the 8 bc 6 was not available. They are oversized anyway, so I don't think it mattered tho I had to belt them to sit at my natural waist. Loved wearing them. Felt like a million bucks!
Good cinch around the waist!

Looooooved these pants. They fit so well. I am rather small in the waste and larger in the bottom portion, this was perfect. I did size up to be careful and glad I did. Comfy and a classic look. These could easily be dressed up or down.

Something different and interesting to wear to work. The waist hits at an amazing spot. Wore a thin belt toe highlight the waist a little extra. Thick cottony material. I was surprised that even being white, it was not at all see through One con- gets wrinkled very very easily.
I wore these pants on a night out around the beach and they were so great! Comfortable, flattering & great fit! I will definitely rent again!

I am petite frame with a booty. I felt a little lost in these pants at first but pairing them with a crop top and heels definitely made the look work. Also they were VERY comfortable. I have a lower belly and they made me look like I have abs. Lots and lots of compliments.

Very wide leg, great length (true mid-calf crop). Stripes are brown, took me out of my comfort zone as I rarely wear brown. Fit is slightly large - only fitted in the waist and I didn't think the waist was tiny for a 0. Not fitted in the hips or thighs so size based on your waist size. I usually go to a 2 or a 4 in pants because of my hips but I'm glad I went with the smaller size here so it would fit high-waisted. Nice deep pockets.

I wore this for a work celebration in Sonoma. Paired it with a black, off the shoulder top with wedges. It got a ton of compliments! It can pass for vaca or work attire plus it feels like you're wearing pajamas. That's a win-win-win.
Great fit, great pants for work, conferences, or just going out with friends
Wore for a friend's birthday brunch, to work, and out for cocktails. Did not want to return!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on these pants, perfect for ladies night out!
links_reviews_text: Hit at a flattering spot on waist, cropped length was great with flats or heels. True to size. (5'4, 115 lbs - wore size 0.)
These pants were great for the office. Professional and light weight. They do wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: Happy new year in happy pants
links_reviews_text: Rented these big culottes with u limited to wear to Rosh Hashanah services. Pros: stiff fabric stands away from bossy- this is both a pro and a con. High waist was mostly flattering. Pants like this i= why I love renting. Cons: they are huge in volume, hard to hit flattering angles in them and it looked like I had a giant package when I was sitting. Styled as shown!

links_reviews_title: Please ignore my son's messy room.
links_reviews_text: Great for people (like me) that carry weight in the lower half. Great material.
Great fit. Can't wait to wear them again. Fabric is heavy and waist is high.
These pants are so fun! They do run just a bit large, but the fit works with the wide leg style. I would definitely rent again.
Wanted to try out the wide leg trend. Love these pants!
Edgy flare pants. it runs true to size. very comfortable. I would wear it to work, on vacation, night out with the girls, and a walk on the park.
Fitted in waist, with thicker band. Flattering on midsection and very comfy. Great for work and everyday!
Since they're high waisted, I could've gone down a size to fit waist rather than hips. Loved these pants and got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cool statement piece if oversized is what you're going for!

links_reviews_text: I went out on a limb renting this style of pant, since I'm normally very much a comfort zone person when it comes to my work attire. However, I LOVE these. They highlight the waist so well and create almost an executive look when worn with the right heel! Will rent this style again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Fun wide leg, to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: I was really excited about these pants, they are REALLY cute! I didn't wear them because they did look a bit used, like the kind of pants you've had forever and refuse to donate or get rid of because you love them. And I needed something a little more presentable. I would love to buy these if I could get my hands on a newer pair. Fabric is great, color is super versatile, fit TTS. I could see these as super easy to dress up or down. I love this wide leg style even for my height!
Way too puffy...especially in the crotch!
if you do not have an hour glass shape, the waist of these will be tight. that being said, they were great culottes and very lightweight pants to wear end of summer/early fall.
Absolutely loved these for work. Am between a 4 and 6 and even though I normally need a 6 for pants these ended up running a little big. Had I rented the 4 I would have bought on the spot!
A but large but I did go a size up.

It's a fine line between wide leg trousers and circus pants but i tip toed that puppy numerous times while I rented these!! i was obsessed! High waist is super flattering. they get wrinkly very easy but that's okay. I wore them to brunch with my hubby and got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Felt like I stepped out of a magazine
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, stylish and fun! Rented them for vacation and ended up wearing to work as well. High waisted pants typically don't work on me but these did and loved them. I have a straighter torso so not a super small waist so things can be tight. These were a tad tight when sitting (and after eating a ton) but not so bad that I was uncomfortable. Will definitely rent again.

I wore these to work and got a compliment as soon as I stepped into the elevator first thing in the morning....and they didn't stop coming all day! Adorable, very flattering, and comfortable for the most part (other than after I had just eaten lunch). I'd rent these again in a second and even considered buying them.
I loved these pants!

Super cute pants just didn't work for my body. Better fit for a longer torso. Waist is very cinched. Next size up I would have drowned in fabric due to extreme wide legs. Definitely cute for the right shape!
The fit was weird. It was high waisted and also really loose around the stomach area and tight in the waist. It wasn't a cute look. I tried them on and immediately returned them.

links_reviews_title: Looks a bit omish from front. Back is pretty & doesn't show bra. Wasn't crazy about it

links_reviews_text: The sleeves were fuller than I expected. I probably should've worn a large but the medium did accent my waist.

links_reviews_title: Wore this top to work, felt cute...
links_reviews_text: Loved this top, got so many compliments! I am usually between a small and a medium in tops. I wish I had gotten the medium because it ran a little tight and after a big lunch I was feeling a tad claustrophobic. I wore this to work but if you work in a more conservative office, this might be to tight/to risqué with the open back. All together, I felt cute in this and would recommend.

Sophisticated but versatile top. Wore to work with skirt & heels, out to dinner with slacks, while traveling on plane and on weekend with jeans and flat boots. Compliments every time. Soft thick knit is really comfortable. Love that I could still wear regular bra with the large keyhole on back. Always size up with this brand because it runs small. Just the right length on me, but might be a bit short on taller ladies.
The top back is completely open but worked with a standard bra. Runs tight. I thought this was very cute and flattering, but wouldn't have worn if I had any important meetings at work (a bit risqué )

It runs a little snug but not obscenely so, just careful pulling it on and off. The sleeves are awesome and the keyhole in the back is flirty but still work appropriate. You can definitely wear a bra without it showing. Love this top with anything from jeans to a pencil skirt!
This top had an open back (which I couldn't tell from the photo) and wasn't appropriate for my work place. I wish I had known that.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt but a little short for my body. Also tight around the tummy.
links_reviews_text: Love the open back and the sleeves and the fabric and color are beautiful. It would be nice with high waisted pants or a skirt but felt a little short and tight around the middle for me.

links_reviews_title: Business in the front and party in the back

links_reviews_text: Nice thick material. Runs small in size as well as being short in length.
This top is everything. Very tightly fitted but SO flattering. The sleeves are gorgeous. The open back is super sexy. I would considering purchasing this - it is a wardrobe staple.

links_reviews_title: It was a wonderful trip with my husband.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a romantic weekend with my husband. I wanted to wear it with some pants and a fur vest I already owned. The shirt was very well made and a beautiful color but it was very tight and the back was more revealing than I realized.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it. I wear an XS but would probably need a medium.
links_reviews_text: It's a quality top and really cute but will show every lump and bump.
Loved the back

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, sexy top, runs very small
links_reviews_text: Tight material with not a lot of stretch. I could barely get the top on over a bra. Unfortunately it showed every bulge and line so I did not wear. I wanted to love it. I received it new with the tags still on. The arms are so beautiful, its the body thats way too small.

links_reviews_title: Great for work, but open back!
links_reviews_text: Super cute top, great for the office or a night out. The back is OPEN so if you work in a conservative office space, be careful.
Such a cute top, but I need to re-rent this in a size small. The chest and waist were super tight.

I'm so glad I went with the medium.! Just perfect with a thick enough fabric that it is forgiving around the middle and high enough cut out that my bra strap is concealed. I'm 5'4 and 125lbs and this is perfectly snug!
Great top for work. The open back makes it interesting. Very form fitting, but the fabric is nice and thick so hides flaws.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful cut and color. Love the sleeves!
links_reviews_text: The cutout back is so much fun and a surprise given how covered up everything is with this. Wearing with a nu-bra, but it is high enough that a narrow back regular bra could work. Will wear with the Club Monaco blue print palazzo pants.

Wore this when working at the hospital (usually I work in an offsite department) After a 12 hour shift, this skirt was still comfy and crisp looking. would be great for a summer party with strappy sandals. Colors are amazing and so uplifting during this crazy time!

I can definitely see how this would be large on other reviewers. I got a medium based on that advice and it fit perfectly (normally would be a large). I am 5'10 with a long torso so the dress fit perfectly, which is pretty rare! Great color. Easy to wear for work. Wasn't my favorite but definitely a cute rental to switch things up!

Really loved this dress and got lots of compliments. I wore it twice before Returning. Once with a jacket. Color is vibrant and fun but still office appropriate. It runs a little large but is easy to wear with a belt.

links_reviews_title: Runs large but perfect for early pregnancy
links_reviews_text: This should be under maternity dresses because it's so roomy. I'm typically a large and the medium was still loose but I'm early in a pregnancy and the looseness of it made it really comfortable.
Picked this up in an XL. It was way too large and the fit was unflattering
The dress has a great print and the cut is adorable. However, I rented my normal size small and found it to be HUGE. Definitely size down in this one!
Comfortable, flattering
runs big
This dress was so oversized! Couldn't wear it due to being like three sizes too big everywhere!
Large in every way. I was swimming in a medium, and I am true 8. The waist didn’t even cinch because it was so drapey and oversized. Very sad. Great color.
It's pretty and appears comfortable. However, I did not wear it because it was too large. I normally wear 4-6 in size and the small was too big.

links_reviews_title: Runs very large. Nice pattern but quality isn't great.

links_reviews_text: This looked like I was wearing a pink garbage bag. Might me cute on smaller figures but did nothing for my curves, just hung there large and lots of fabric

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, just Way to big
links_reviews_text: I loved the color & the elastic waist, but I could have gone down 1, maybe 2 sizes! I was not able to wear it. Length was great, and it could have been cute with heels or flats. Just over all I felt like I put on a tent. I am going to try & Rent it again in a smaller size.

I feel like this may be better suited to someone taller than me (I'm 5'5"). The neckline hit me in a weird spot which is why maybe better for someone taller? It kinda suffocated me haha! The fabric is very light and I liked the pattern plus it was very flowy. Very roomy large in my opinion and there is elastic in the waist but it didn't do nearly enough to make it look like I even had a waist. Maybe you'll have better luck than me but I couldn't wear it whatsoever.
I am normally a 4/6 and I ordered the small in this. It was huge in the waist and not flattering because of this. I love the dress though and I will rent again in an XS.
I'm tall and have long arms and like other reviews said the sleeves were very long I had to fold them. It was comfy at first but got itchier through the day.
This is so ginormous I couldn't wear it to the office.

links_reviews_title: unwearable. sleeves down to my knees
links_reviews_text: this sweater was rough material, not comfortable. I still would have worn it but the sleeves are completely unreasonable. They are about a foot too long. You can't roll them, they just aren't practicable or wearable. I was not able to wear this sweater.
Was shorter than I wanted and very wide and sleeves were super long. Unflattering. Not a fan. Was going for oversized look but this was overboard.

This sweater was all around too large. The neck opening was large enough to be off the shoulder, the sleeves went way past my hands, and just very wide so I looked fat. Would definitely size down, especially if you're in between sizes like I am (usually M or L, went with L with this one... and was way off)

links_reviews_title: I've rented this sweater 3 times this winter
links_reviews_text: I literally couldn't love this sweater more. I essentially just send it back to be cleaned. It's a little bulky so it might not work great under slimmer coats. But it's warm and cozy - perfect for the New England winter.
Sleeves were a bit bulky but otherwise liked the fit and look
The sleeves are a little long and it's a little itchy. But i rolled the sleeves (of a medium) and got a cute oversized look which i loved! A little bulky to put under a jacket which was sad
Fits nice and oversized as the photo- expensive looking and elegant -- I'm an 18-20 and the XL fit me well. Cosy and warm but not too warm. I wore it with a black pencil skirt and short black boots!
Giant sleeves, a bit scratchy, but did the job
Fit the bill for warm. A little scratchy.
The sleeves are a bit long but otherwise this is true to size for a slouchy look.
Great knit but arms were too baggy to wear
This sweater is nice and comfy but it is much shorter than appears on the model and fits. It is 50% wool so it is very very itchy.
This was a huge and very heavy sweater. The sleeves are designed to hang past your hands, which I found to be annoying.
n/a
I loved this sweater! It's a pretty heavy and warm, which I liked. The sleeves were a little too big for my liking, but I liked the look of them.

links_reviews_title: interesting sweater oversized sleeves loved the look
links_reviews_text: kinda itchy but wore a t shirt under and was fine. paired nicely with black pants and boots for a casual work outfit.
Too big. Did not wear
The sweater is so cozy for a perfect chilly day. The oversized sleeves are adorable. I got so many compliments wearing this.
I was really nervous this would be really large after reading some reviews, but it was the perfect oversized sweater. Very comfortable and cute with jeans or leggings. I definitely recommend.
Cozy but a little big
Cozy, comfy and stylish. Very warm, super oversized but not in a frumpy way (which is an extremely rare combo). I love this sweater and have received tons of compliments!

This sweater is perfect for East-Coast living in the Winter! It's the right combination of warm, not itchy and big enough to wear an extra-layer underneath, if you want to. The sleeves are extra long to cover cold hands and look cute rolled up into cuffs too. I wore it with jeans but it would pair well with leggings too.

links_reviews_title: This is one of the most cozy items I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: This sweater is a little on the big/boxy side but it is also short so it is incredibly flattering. I wore this multiple times before returning it and would definitely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Felt like wearing a big hug all day!
links_reviews_text: This sweater was so comfy I didn't want to take it off. A tad itchy but goes without saying with any wool product. I don't know that it was the most flattering fit but it felt so cozy in it I didn't care!

links_reviews_title: Can wear it every day with everything
links_reviews_text: Loved this with jeans, black leggings and tall boots, long slim skirt. I rented this for a month and wore it over and over. A little scratchy--wore something under it (t-shirt or blouse) and runs pretty big--ended up folding up the sleeves a lot.

I wanted to love this sweater but the arms on my 5'2" frame were so much longer than they look on the model. I like an oversized fit through the torso, but unfortunately, there was no way I could wear this. I would definitely size down and maybe skip if you have shorter arms.
Very comfortable and warm. A bit bigger and not as soft as I anticipated.
I think this would be a really cozy sweater and look great with jeans and boots but it was WAY too big. I should have ordered a M which I would rarely fit in these days.

links_reviews_title: Not exactly what I was expecting
links_reviews_text: I should have payed closer attention to previous reviewers. This sweater dwarfed my petite frame and the sleeves were quite long. I would have also preferred it be slightly longer in the back. Material is uncomfortable and needed to wear something under it.

I liked the style and design, but tried the XS (my normal size) and was swimming in it. Know the fit is supposed to be more relaxed, but it was so large on me that it looked very frumpy and unflattering. This would probably look good on a much taller person/frame. The fabric is a thick but scratchy wool, so even if it had fit, not sure I would have worn it for comfort reasons.
I loved this sweater so much I bought it. It's so soft and has a boxy type of fit. So cute!
Rented this to wear on casual friday with jeans. It would be short for leggings but worked nicely with jeans. The material is very soft and warm but not at all itchy. Overall a great rental
Loved this sweater! So easy to wear and was cute with jeans or black pants. Would rent again and again!
I was so surprised and happy with this sweater! I didn't think it would like it and took a risk but it has become my favorite!! great fit and super cute on.
Perfect fit. Perfect colors. Perfect, comfortable fabric. This one is a must.
Super comfortable, easy to wear to work. I'm 5'8 and was hoping it'd be a little slouchier/longer, but other than that I'm happy with the fit.
This sweater is super comfy. I got a few compliments on it during fall. It is true to size and makes a great statement piece.
I sized down to an XS and it was still pretty roomy. Super comfy sweater, definitely recommend for the fall season

links_reviews_title: Simple pattern in bold colors makes this slightly oversized sweater stand out
links_reviews_text: Such a versatile, bright, and comfortable sweater. Debating on purchasing because I like it so much. Slightly oversized fit, but would recommend to stick to your usual size.
I loved this sweater! My office is pretty casual so I was able to wear it to work tucked in the front with a "Gucci" style belt and jeans.
Super cute but very short and boxy. Not flattering for me.

links_reviews_title: Cute for work and casual wear
links_reviews_text: I really liked this sweater! The colors are vibrant and it's very soft. My only concern is that the sleeves were slightly long (and I have veryyy long arms at 5'9) and the neckline was wider than anticipated. I had to wear a tanktop under it to cover my bra straps at work.

links_reviews_title: Love! Cozy and not too big or heavy.
links_reviews_text: Wore this sweater so many times. Not big enough for leggings but cute with jeans and not heavy which I loved.
Would probably buy if I got this into my rotation again.
Loved the colors. A bit cropped. If it hit a bit lower, I would consider buying it!!

links_reviews_title: Nice autumn feel with this sweater for Thanksgiving weekend!
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater! Was ideal for wear for an extended Thanksgiving weekend celebration with the family!

This was a great sweater for the office, playing with my niece and nephews, and going out to brunch with friends. I wore it with black jeans and blue jeans, boots and sneakers. Very versatile. Will rent again if not, just buy, because you can never have too many sweaters in NYC.
Comfortable fabric, easy casual pattern. I'm 5'10 so it was a little cropped for me, probably a cuter fit and style for someone shorter.
I wore this three times in the week I had it, got compliments, and felt great!!! Super soft and comfy, while being super stylish and versatile !

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater but it felt a bit short. Overall super soft and cozy, would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty well--was baggy, but I sized up intentionally. The length is about at the hip if not a bit above.
Fun and cozy oversized sweater. I could have gone medium but the large gave the right slouchy look. Received several compliments on it, would definitely recommend.
This sweater definitely has a comfy oversized fit to it. It's soft and cute.
Amazing, soft, fun colors, bought this from another site that was half the price of what RTR was asking it was that good.
Nice material, nice slouchy fit!
This sweater was so soft and cozy. Such a good staple to have and wear to work or errands or around the house.

links_reviews_title: Arrived with tags - great quality sweater!

links_reviews_text: I loved this snuggly warm sweater. It was the perfect spring WFH item. I always get chilly between 10:30a and 4:30p when my heater if off. Not in this fashionable wool sweater. Looked great with leggings and jeans and tracks pants! Styled to work from home with the above noted bottoms and either rose gold superga sneakers or sorel joan of arc booties.
This sweater scored me lots of compliments, and kept me warm during a very cold New York City day

I loved this warm and thick sweater that livened up my daily outfit. It's little short on the torso, and the turtleneck comes pretty high, so probably could be little problematic if you have a slightly fluffier belly area. I thought the item was slightly over worn to consider purchasing it. Overall, a fun rental for grey and cold winter days.

links_reviews_title: High quality wool! Not itchy at all!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, loved it!

links_reviews_title: Most comfortable sweater I've ever worn - order a size up
links_reviews_text: I wore XL when I would normally order M/L. I'm glad I did, I was happy with the fit. This truly was an incredibly comfortable sweater - from the fit to the fabric. I would have kept this sweater if I could afford it. I got a lot of compliments on its uniqueness - definitely recommend renting this!
This sweater is awesome! I received nonstop compliments when wearing it. It's extremely warm, too! Pardon my selfie-realized I didn't have a pic for the review lol
Really soft cozy sweater. Slightly cropped. A little right in the neck.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater! Quality was high end. Soft not scratchy.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect!
So many compliments on this sweater but holy crap, it gets tight on your neck. Wonderful quality and super cute but def only wear this on a freezing day.

I was obsessed with this sweater. It is extremely soft and very chic. Slight crop was great for my short torso. I am a solid medium so I got that size but wish I would have gone up a size for a looser fit. I felt the neck was a tiny bit tight but the softness made it so comfy.
Loved this piece. Got a ton of compliments- great for cold weather as it is super heavy! I wore it w ripped up jeans
Cute dress! Was a little tight in the chest area.
Since I have a full bust and am petite, this wrap dress had quite an unusual fit and I wasn’t comfortable wearing it for my intended date.

This dress fits so strangely. It was HUGE in the crossover in the front and I would have needed a cami underneath, but the fabric is thin so it would have bunched and looked bad underneath. Wouldn't suggest.
Loved the print and style of this dress, however fit was off :( top was a bit big and the bottom wrap portion was also a little loose. Made it work for one night but won't wear again.
Wore to work and loved this dress. Great pattern and comfortable to wear all day.

links_reviews_title: I LOVEd this sweatshirt during the month of February- fun alternative to red Valentine's attire.

links_reviews_text: SO CUTE! A tad cropped. Wore it a ton on vacation. Bought it.
My friends, this is cozy af. Super soft despite being fairly heavy-weight. Feel like it runs a bit large across the shoulders, but I wanted it to be long(er). In LOVE.

This was fine for a casual unlimited Rental. The material was quite soft, not that itchy scratchy type that can sometimes come with the sweatshirt rentals I have had. Not as long as I would like for leggings, but worked well with jeans and shorts for late summer.
A little boxy and the material is very thick, but, cute and I'd try it again but would need a much bigger size!!
Super soft and comfortable. Bright cheerful graphic. Only drawback was neck opening is a bit narrow and won't stretch.
Very comfy. 5'4, 125, rented medium but could have gone with large for a looser more relaxed look
Super comfy and cute sweatshirt that was a nice alternative to my more sporty sweatshirts. Great fit and true to size. Loved it!
The "LOVE" words are in a soft felt - super cute. I didn't expect to get compliments on a hoodie but I got tons. Great trendy casual look with leggings and athletic shoes.
Super comfy. Wish I could have bought it.

Rented this for work. Fits true to size, and when standing it hits at a good length. But when sitting, it does ride up quite a bit. Wearing tights or something are necessary if you are looking for this to be work appropriate. Huge plus though, IT HAS POCKETS!!!

links_reviews_title: Just didn't fall right on me and a little big

links_reviews_text: Heavier material than I initially thought, this skirt ended up being perfect for my trip to Japan in early October. It fits wonderfully and the buttons are cute and unique. For someone self conscious about their thighs, this was the perfect length.

Who doesn't have a little black skirt in their closet? This Tibi skirt stands out, though, because of the details in quality and design. The thick fabric, asymmetrical buttons, and (yay) pockets that can actually function all make it one step above the usual. I especially loved the length, which was just right on my petite frame, neither too short nor awkwardly long.

links_reviews_title: Great, go-to work skirt w/ detail
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt for work. Hits about 1.5 inches above the knee, if worn high waisted. I am usually between a 0-2, so went with the 2 and had a little room in waist/hips but overall fit well. Material is thick but has a little stretch.

links_reviews_title: Ideal Summer to Fall Transition Skirt
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 4 in Tibi but since I wasn't wearing this in the office and was wearing it for a trip I was able to squeeze into the 2. It was definitely short but has a nice thick material w/ pockets and can be dressed up or down. Highly recommend this skirt!

links_reviews_title: Amazing skirt - fun and versatile; runs small.
links_reviews_text: Found this at the RTR store and thank goodness there where 3 different sizes to try on. Very well made, thicker material that lays well and will not blow up in the wind, this skirt runs small. I'm usually a 4 with 27 inch waist and sized up to an 8. I love the silver buttons giving the skirt a military flair. Worn here with a striped nautical t-shirt for the weekend. For work I dressed it up with a silky blouse that I tucked in to show off the waistline. This skirt would make a great staple piece - you can wear it with so many different tops. It may be too short for some, but for me, I like my skirts on the shorter side. Have fun renting this!
It fit very well! I love the high waist. Material felt great, it was overall an amazing skirt!

I think this is the first time I've tried on something from RTR and immediately wondered the cost to buy it. It was really flattering on me. Because it's high waisted, you'll initially think it runs small. The fabric is a little stiff, so it got a little wonky after sitting in it all day at work. It would be adorable with tights and boots in winter as well.
This was super cute and fit great but I unfortunately didn’t get to wear it out of the house due to a button missing. I may try to re-order later if they can fix it.
I am typically a 4-6 and the 6 was super tight
Loved this skirt. Unique, but still versatile. Appropriate for work, but also cute with boots and a sweater. Will rent again.
High waisted, true to size, fun unique skirt...perfect length...very well made, thick material. Also love the pockets

This skirt is incredible. True to size, very flattering fit, and I love the detail on the buttons. I wore it a couple different ways over a weekend trip, with a crop top for going out and with a blouse for a dinner date the next day.
great fit and super flattering. so many compliments! going to get this as a closet staple.
The skirt was really cute for work. Fit well!

Very easy and comfortable to wear. I paired it with black tank and a hot pink blazer. Received compliments throughout the day. I love the buttons and the pockets. Wish I can keep this piece but not willing to spend $350 for it. The tag was still on when I rented this from the store so it was brand new.

I wore this wine tasting with friends. I think it would also be good for work. It's definitely on the shorter side so you need high waisted bottoms to pair with it. It's definitely a standout top and I really liked the "poofy" shoulders.
The puffed shoulders give this piece the perfect flare! It was pretty short though, almost too short to stay tucked into high waisted jeans.

This simply black and white turtleneck turned super chic with the structured shoulders. I love it! Fits true to size. I wore it dressed up to work with a rented leather skirt and casually on the weekend with black skinny jeans and sneakers. Will totally rent again!
Great fit and statement attitude. Bolder sleeves than you expect,, but I'm into it!
Wore this three times in one week!!! Loved the pop in the shoulder since my shoulders are so narrow

Obsessed with this shirt! It's such a great fit without being an uncomfortable tightness, just the right amount of stretch. Shoulders are dramatic in the perfect way. I paired this with pants, a skirt, and threw on a leather jacket when it felt just too showy for a grocery store run. ;) Contemplated buying!
It was a conversation starter and got tons of compliments.
Fit well but I felt silly wearing it with the big shoulders. Usually get so many compliments on my RTR pieces but nothing about this one. Won't be renting again.
This shirt is comfortable, fashionable, stretchable and breathable. The puffy sleeves give it a great renaissance touch. Perfect for a cloudy, cool day.
Loved the puffy shoulders ! I'd rent the Large next time just to be a little more comfortable
This shirt is adorable! Dresses up any outfit with the fun sleeves. Super comfortable too!
I LOVE THIS TURTLENECK! Soft, stretchy, flattering and fun!

I love this shirt. Its comfortable and a total show stopper. I wore this during Mardi Gras all through the Quarter and the garden district. I got compliments all day and night. One woman actually pulled her car over, stopped and yelled out the window that she loved my outfit.
Very cute top for night out. Sleeves are definitely a conversation piece!
I absolutely loved this top. I kept it for over two months and wore it numerous times. I loved the shoulders and the style. I really wanted to buy it but ultimately sent it back. So stylish!
Slim fitting, a little short but a drink tucked worked!
Super comfy and can dress up or down
Loved this top! Wore it for garden club during the day and swapped shoes for a dinner party straight to the evening.

I love this too so much I want to purchase! The exaggerated puff sleeves are super fun and pair well with high waisted pants to create s fun silhouette. The material is thick and stretchy and of the high quality you come to expect from a.l.c. Total winner!
Great fit and looks great with just about any denim wash & style. Received a ton of compliments on it!
This shirt is exactly as you would expect. I went a size down to minimize the puffy shoulders and it worked out. I'm usually a size small but the xs worked for me just fine.
Very fashion forward. I was a little embarrassed to wear to work but rocked it anyway! Love the style! Thick material, perfect for fall and winter!
This has a great stretch to it and it's interesting. I probably would have gotten a small, but only a medium was available and I was happy to have the extra breathing room. Great for WFH zoom calls!
Idk why they make sweaters so incredibly short but this was like a baby shirt.

This is absolutely one of my favorite pieces yet! The sleeves are everything. Edgy, without being costumy. Endless compliments - I don't want to send it back. A little shorter than the pic, but not a crop top. Easy to wear to work and out for fun.
Great and unique shirt. The shoulders are the best part. It's very flattering on all sizes. Highly recommend.
Such a sweet shirt. Works so well with high waisted pants because it lays flat and doesn't bulk. So cute

links_reviews_title: I got so many complements on this shirt. Also, Leah Remini wore this exact shirt on The Ellen show!
links_reviews_text: fit perfect, shoulders stayed up all night. LOVE this!!
I loved this sweater. If you don't like big shoulders, it's not for you. Fabric had a lot of give. I could have gone with the small.
This sweater was super cute! The sleeves are pretty exaggerated so beware. The length is some what short. I was able to just barely tuck it into my high waisted jeans. Over all loved it!
Love the shoulder details, I got so many compliments. It fit perfect and just the right length too.
Everyone loves this top. I love this too! Heck, I feel like a superhero when I wear it!!
This top was so adorable. I really loved how form fitting it was
The poof in the sleeve was more than I was expecting. If you are in between a small and medium go with the medium.
Run a little big...i'm usually a small ans the XS was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Loved the look but not for me.
links_reviews_text: A little short for those with longer torsos. Also, if you have broader shoulders, I would not recommend as it accentuates them.
SUPER flattering

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Super cute look, definitely a statement top!
links_reviews_text: I wore this with high waisted, belted black pants it was adorable. I got SO many compliments. The puffy sleeves were a little intimidating when I first put it one, but once I got used to it (and got all the compliments), I wanted to wear it again! Super cute for business casual offices OR going out.
Very short. Worked well with high waisted pants!

this top has a lot of stretch and the shoulders really do pop up as shown, however, the sleeves came up to nearly mid-lower-arm on me, which was fine because i could wear a black and white bracelet and have it stand out.

Comfy, cute and colorful! Perfect for working at home during quarantine. Came with tags on and I put it on the minute I got it. Planning to wear it a few more times over the weekend too! It's a little boxy but not too much so.
Love the pink color. The coat is oversized in a good way - you won't want to button it and it is very comfortable. Sleeves are a tad short but work well with a sweater and longer sleeves on.

links_reviews_title: Was so fun for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big, but very cozy and warm.

SOOO PRETTY! found the coat at the RTR store with the tag and all. Beautiful color and material. Def a statement piece! The coat runs BIG! I got a size small and had plenty of room for layering if needed.

links_reviews_title: Endless compliments on this fun "teddy bear " coat
links_reviews_text: Everybody loved this funny bright pink oversized creation that vamped up my floral brewery outfit. It's the warmest thing I've ever worn and exceeded my expectations . It is , notably, HUGE

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and so easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Not to heavy (weight wise) and stylish but it doesn't close tightly so you need a scarf of it's really cold and sleeves were on short side.

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was wearing a robe
links_reviews_text: I didn't find this flattering. Sleeves were shorts and overall large
Ran large, but V warm & comfy in the cold weather! Made wearing a dress simple because I could wrap this coat around me like a blanket. V dramatic & lots of compliments received.

links_reviews_title: I wear this EVERY DAY! It's a big ball of happy.
links_reviews_text: I love love love this coat. It's fun, soft, cotton-candy fun for January. It does, however, look a little like a bath robe!

links_reviews_title: Cozy and stylish soft light pink coat
links_reviews_text: Makes any outfit look interesting, wore in NYC winter and felt warm, big pockets with super soft fine faux fur.
I really wanted to love this jacket. It feels like great quality and it's warm, but unfortunately it's MASSIVE. I was seriously drowning in it and I ordered a small. Unfortunate :(
This sweater is SO pretty, I love the ruffle! But it was quite itchy to wear. Fit TTS.
This sweater made me smile, I loved it! A little scratchy, very warm, got lots of compliments.
Wore a size S and it was still a little oversized. Cute w/ blue jeans and sneakers

links_reviews_title: Got huge approval from a 10 year old I met- so I'd say that's a win
links_reviews_text: Kind of a frumpy shape- but at the same time there are ruffles and rainbow pastel sooooooo ....it's cute. I wore it twice - casual and warm and not itchy
This is the softest sweater I have ever touched. I wore it with the rainbow Stine Goya skirt for thanksgiving and loved the rainbow on rainbow look

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend said this was hideous but I liked it!
links_reviews_text: Something about the ruffles is a little odd about this sweater but I thought it was cute! I think the flounce is a little dramatic but for a casual day or fun addition of color I like it.

Had high hopes for this sweater, le sigh. This sweater gives off major grandma vibes, even the rainbow colors couldn't change that. Loveshackfancy is a brand that creates beautiful vintage inspired pieces but sometimes I find the pieces a little too precious for modern life.
I got a large becuase it was all that was available but still made it work for a cold weekend in NYC! Such a cute sweater!
I love the idea of the sweater… But it's not terribly flattering. It's a little on the short side and the ruffle made my shoulders look very broad.

links_reviews_title: So so cute and great material!
links_reviews_text: This dress felt so chic and was so easy to wear. I'm a 10 and the L fit fine, though it was a bit roomy in the waist. I think a M would have hugged a little too much, though. Short but not TOO short, super flattering. I'm renting this one again!
Rented this for a work trip and it was the perfect summer dress in the humid city. Made me feel like I was going back to school. So cute!
I love this dress. Super comfortable, perfect flattering cut, deep pockets, and great length for work. Loved it, would like to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Runs small in the chest - overall cute
links_reviews_text: Cute work dress with POCKETS in the front pleats! Fit n flare so very flattering for hourglass shapes although the chest is a hair tighter than expected. It's stretchy fabric though. I usually wear a large in Kate Spade tops, so be aware this needs to be sized up.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but on the short side
links_reviews_text: I like the fabric and the pattern. Comfortable too. But this was on the short side for me, and I'm 5'0. Might still work for a not super conservative office, desk to dinner, office party, etc.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a friend's birthday party!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and casual, yet cute!
Great for work, just a bit on the short side at moments (wore thick tights and it was great).
Very pretty dress and great fit
Perfect!!!! So comfortable and it has pockets!!! Just do your hair or top knot AFTER you put it on since the neckline is snug. I may just have to keep this!
I loved this dress and I got so many compliments. I would have kept it but it was a little too short for my liking. The fit was great but I just wanted it to be a little longer!
At 5'3 this dress is just a bit short for work. But maybe could work with tights. Really cute otherwise
Well fit. Accentuates hourglass body. Cute because it's like a frock & also the arms are slightly frilly
Really cute and comfortable dress but beware it is REALLY short. I'm 5'3" and it hits mid thigh. It's cute, but def would not be appropriate to wear to work
Loved the optic look and fit through bust. Short on someone who is almost 5'8". Wore leggings the other times I wore it
This dress has a little stretch and was just so slimming and flattering. And pockets!! Im short but have a big butt and it was a little short in the back. Overall great for work or an event!
Fit is great! I love this dress so much. It is really comfortable too. My man keeps telling me to buy it!

This dress is fabulous but I wouldn't call it a dress - WAY too short- more of a peplum top Cute with leggings and boots or no boots Super soft pockets Very flattering fit and flare Pretty thick and warm not for summer - perfect for spring Runs true to size !

If you have a larger derrière, this will feel like you are flashing the world but no worries, you're not. It just rides up a little bit. Super flattering and since everyone at my office knows I do RTR, they were encouraging me to buy it. The pockets are fab and it is a super cute dress channeling mod '60's vibes. Loved it!

This is really cute but not flattering on me at all. The dress is too long (everyone else is complaining it is too short) on me and the waist hits in an awkward place and makes me look like a barrel. Next!
Too short to wear as a dress for work. I wore it as a tunic with leggings.
maybe because i have a long toros, but the waist seam hit high up on me, causing a weird boxy look. otherwise, cute dress - a little short. thick, comfortable fabric with great pockets!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect! I wore it to a Broadway show!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect! I wore it to a Broadway show! I am 5'1. This dress was not too short at all! I would definitely rent again! It is also very flattering in the fit!!

Very nice fabric and extremely comfortable. Pattern is nice to hide the extra belly fat ;) it does run a little short and I'm only 5'1". I had to pair it with knee high boots to not seem too short. Overall like it!

links_reviews_title: Kate Spade Dress for TV Interview!
links_reviews_text: I rented this Kate Spade dress for my interview on my talk show, Pieces of Victory. This plaid black and white dress flattered me while, it kept me looking professional for my show. I love the pockets, the flirty look and the way it made me feel on the set!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work meeting! Got so many compliments on this
links_reviews_text: Flattering on a pear shaped body

Just like almost everyone else, I rented this for work but it was way too short! I'm only 5'3" but have a big butt and the dress was so short, especially in the back. The fabric is stretchy and the bell sleeves are cute. And the pattern is on point. The dress was also tight in the chest, shoulders, and upper arms. I'm a pear shape and usually small or medium fits me for a dress with a full skirt but the medium was tight up top for me.

Not sure if this dress might've shrunk at some point prior to me receiving it but it was barely covering my butt. As you can see in my pictures my fingers are at least an inch longer than the them and the hem is shorter in the back. Fit well everywhere else except the length.
Comfortable and easy to wear. Such a gorgeous dress

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern, good fabric, but SO short
links_reviews_text: I like the fabric, I like the pattern, sleeves are cute, but this is so, so short. I decided it was okay with tights, but I'm second-guessing that decision. It's also very short-waisted. (I'm 5'9").

links_reviews_title: Great fit, well made, love it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work event in NY. It was cold out but I wanted to wear a dress. This was thick enough to keep me warm when paired with fleece lined tights and a thick knit scarf. Could easily dress it up with nice, chunky, costume pearls in a bold color (green, red, blue, yellow) and heels. The material has some stretch and is cut well to hide a little tummy. I'm debating buying it.
Fit really nicely, sharp pattern, sleeves are fun but not too long
Rented this as part of my unlimited plan as my thanksgiving backup dress. I received so my compliments. My only complaint is that it is a bit tight in the arms near the shoulders.
I was hoping to wear this to work and then a holiday party but it was a couple inches too short. I'm 5'5 and ordered the small but would try a medium next time.

Loved this dress! The houndstooth print and bell sleeves were perfect, and the cut was flattering and comfortable. The kangaroo pouch pockets were well placed and barely visible. Only complaint is that it was about an inch too short for my liking, but that was easily fixed with tights. Caution for those above 5'6" though - it will definitely be a non-work appropriate minidress on you.

This dress is comfortable, flattering, and so fun to wear. I wore this to the office, but could have easily worn it out to dinner or casually on the weekend. The dress just pulls on overhead (no zipper or anything like that) and the material is thick with plenty of stretch. I wish the length was slightly longer, but the shorter gals may appreciate the shorter skirt. I added a skinny black belt, but it can easily be worn without any adornment. The dress also has pockets which is so convenient, and since they are situated right in front, whatever you stow in those pockets (phone, key card, etc.) is camouflaged by the pleats of the dress. I would absolutely rent this dress again.

This dress was amazing!! It was brand new so I wore it around the house a bit before wearing it out. The material is heavy and kept it's shape. It has pockets - which is always a plus - but these were located in an odd spot - almost like a hoodie pocket. Paired with black tights and booties for a job interview. Received SO MANY compliments.
I wore this a few times - always with lots of compliments. It was incredibly comfortable- a pull over without a zipper. The bell sleeve made it stand out. Was great with tights and boots.
Very cute, but a bit short for work if you're pear-shaped. I did receive a few compliments though!
Loved this dress but it came at least six inches above my thigh (I'm 5'6"). Would recommend renting this dress for a date or weekend brunch but not for work unless you are below 5'2".

links_reviews_title: Too short for work, did not wear
links_reviews_text: It was too short for work, I put it on and promptly took it off. I did not wear it. I think this dress is better suited for a petite person with a thin figure.
Crisp, tailored and cool. This flattering suit is a must rent in warmer weather. It could not have fit me better. It was as if it was tailored just for me.

links_reviews_title: Great, comfortable pants with fantastic print
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect RTR rental: an item that is great, but because it's by an expensive designer, the retail price is way out of what I would ever pay for a pair of, what as other reviews mentions, is essentially pyjama pants. But it was so much fun to have them briefly! I had a "game night" themed event and the victorian board game print was perfect - on theme without being cheesy or over the top. Plus these are incredibly comfortable, and the length is perfect (I'm 5'6"). I wore it with the top shown in the picture and a Kate Spade bag, both rented with my RTR unlimited subscription for the occasion. Doing an entire RTR outfit felt very decadent but the asymmetrical, fitted geometric top is a perfect complement to the playful print and baggy pants.

This top is really cute and flattering. Stretchy with a bit of a sheen, it's like a dressy athleisure. I wore it with leggings to run errands and with jeans and heels to go out. Great for unlimited, but the MSRP is ridiculous for what it is.
The details are what make it unique, but I would not say others would notice that.
Awkward fit. Doesn't look cool, just looks weird.
This design might be chic on a thinner frame, but on my curves it just looked sort of sloppy. The white layer looked accidental.
I love asymmetrical designs. Top was super comfortable. Felt really stylish.
Double layered so a little heavier material but looked so cute on.. wore with jean shorts and also "leather" joggers

links_reviews_title: Quality Fitted Sweater w/ Unique Puff Sleeve
links_reviews_text: I loved the beautiful fabric and neutral colorway on this high quality knit. The style is definitely fitted/tight, so looks best tucked in to a high waisted bottom. Very soft, comfortable, and the puff at the shoulder gives it an extra flair. Would recommend!
Loved the colors in this knit! Looks better paired up with black booties than it did with a suede chestnut boot.
This shirt is really comfy and I loved the colors. It was a little short so I paired it with high-waisted jeans. I loved the puffy sleeves - they add a little flair. I will definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Tight should have ordered a medium or large
links_reviews_text: Nice colors, I liked the fit. Doesn't get bigger as you wear it
The quality of this sweater is top-notch. It has beautiful colors and it is warm. I gave it four stars because of the sleeves. They were too puffy on me.
Super comfy shirt. Nice and warm without being hot. Soft fabric. Beautiful colors. Would buy this for sure!
The length is flattering for wide hips and very figure flattering. The material is high quality

Fun color, great fit (it is cropped so you will likely need a high waist bottom to avoid exposing your mid-section). I wore this tucked into high waisted jeans and loved it. Fabric isn't too heavy/warm.

This light sweater has a fun, '70s-'80s vibe. A friend said that it reminded her of her favorite sweater as a kid. I definitely took that as a compliment. I ended up wearing it nearly every day, whether meeting friends for lunch or hitting a cocktail bar at night. It was as comfortable to wear as a t-shirt but dressy enough to upgrade a pair of jeans.

I love this type of fitted, ribbed, mock neck sweater in general so this was a winner for me. I also thought the color/mix of warm earth tones on this was super cute and flattering. Unlike others I did not think the puff at the shoulder was too dramatic. I will say that it runs pretty short, so just be prepared to wear something high waisted on the bottom!

I loved this! But it's SMALL! My chest is 33" and waist 26"- the medium was fitted and made my chest look huge! But so cute, so comfy, not very long. Plenty of stretch. The shoulder detail was perfection
This sweater runs small but fits very nicely in the larger size. Unfortunately I couldn't wear it because the underarms carried a scent. It's too bad because the sweater is very cute.
The fit was perfection--sleek, modern and still cozy and comfy.

This top was on and off my body and back in the RTR return bag in 5 seconds. Not at all flattering. Too small, way too short, and material is not quality. Possibly my least favorite rental ever, I should have passed it right on by. If you're considering giving it a shot, size up a couple of sizes. I am usually a small and should have tried the L or XL I guess?!
Flattering with a 79's vibe, I wore this with dark flare jeans. Very fitted, I could have sized up

I almost didn't even try this top on because it looked so tiny. It reminds me of those tiny scrunchie tops from 2002 but suddenly fits a normal person. Once I put it on it was adorable and very flattering. The fabric is thick enough to hide flaws. It was great for a date night with black jeans tucked in.
Fits really well. Just a touch short, so you have to go high waisted on your pants.
Just Ok

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater, but the sleeves are puffy
links_reviews_text: The long sleeve sweater is nice, but it comes short in the torso.

links_reviews_title: Love this as it's super comfortable, can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, was smaller then expected but fits well with stretch fabric
Ooooh lala this top is so chic and sexy! Without showing cleve! Love it!
The fit is very flattering - tight in the waist and with a flared skirt. The fabric is hard and structure. However, it does tend to wrinkle and pick up dust. Overall a great work dress.
Didn't like it buttoned up so loosen that top part and a little long for me but I could not go a size down it was fitted.

What you see is what you get. While it has a full front zipper, you can really unzip from above or below. Belt is attached. I would have preferred the option to remove it and wear without. I tied it in the back and wore with a sweater.
Item is not really denim...more of a navy canvas type material.

links_reviews_title: Loved the style but too tight
links_reviews_text: Definitely size up if you have broad shoulders or a large cupsize. I couldn't wear this because it wouldn't fit over my chest.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing it. Runs small.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to buy "big" just to be safe - said a 50 was equivalent of a 14. I normally am a 12, sometimes a 14, so I figured i'd be safe. But it was too small to wear, especially in the chest area. I'm only a 34D/36C, but it barely zipped up.

links_reviews_title: The fit was great, yet the fabric made it a bit less dressy.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work. Wore this with a grey suit jacket and comfortable flats. Good fit, but may need to keep a lint roller nearby due to the type of fabric.

links_reviews_title: One of the best rentals ever!
links_reviews_text: This fabric is so high quality and the dress is completely flattering. I think it's more of a spring/summer dress but I wore in late fall. I'm looking forward to the seasons changing to hopefully be able to rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Poor fabric choice but great design
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and true to size. Unfortunately the fabric picked up every piece of dirt and lint, and also was very stiff so it didn't hang well on the body. I wore it with a white turtleneck and a caramel colored Gucci gg belt and knee high caramel suede boots

The fabric is SO soft, which sounds funny, but it's actually soothing. The fit is gorgeous; tailored around the waist, with beautiful flair. It was just a bit long for my petite height; it hit well below my knees.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful dress. I loved the length and the color.
links_reviews_text: It was a very comfortable full front zip up dress. It was a little tight in the bust area. Overall beautiful dress.
Got the suggested size, could not zip it up. Would not suggest if you are busty. Runs very small! Good quality dress though!
This dress was a bit blah. Note that the material feels like heavy cotton -- not denim.
I usually wear dress size 8 and the 42 was great. Will rent again.
Clean lines, wrinkle-resistant fabric, elegantly casual. Perfect work dress!

links_reviews_title: would wear this to work with a blazer over
links_reviews_text: very long and cannot tell in the photos that the zipper goes all the way down
Fun take on a white top. Sleeves are cute and make it stand out in a good way. Would rent this again.
This is a really pretty shirt! I did feel a bit self conscious about the poofy sleeves though. I usually wear a medium in tops, but the large fit well.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this top
links_reviews_text: The tie detail on sleeve is so fun. However, the material is like a heavy stretch crepe which I don't prefer. It also runs small because I often wear a medium, this is an XL and so fitted through bottom especially. I don't think I will be wearing this one. If it was a lighter t-shirt material, I would kill this white top.
Love this top. Sleeve detail is great. Briefly read some reviews and was anticipating this to be of cotton/t-shirt material, but it's a nicer jersey crepe. Appropriate for work!
I like the fit was cute and received a lot of compliments. I would do a large next time tho! XL was a little odd looking if I didn't tuck it in

links_reviews_title: Simply pretty. Comfortable top. I enjoyed wearing both tucked and untucked.
links_reviews_text: Fits well. Comfortable. Cute top

links_reviews_title: This top is nice, but I just felt silly with the sleeves
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric, not sheer, good weight for cold spring weather. Looks better tucked in.
fabric is nice and opaque, puff sleeves stay puffed up! a bit roomy in the torso area, but not enough to size down since shoulders are TTS
Love the details in the rope sleeves. Fabric is soft. I have a long torso and the shirt still covers enough that I can tuck in. Material is thicker, heavy material so comfortable for cool weather
Really nice fabric, well fitted but ties were too bulky to wear under a jacket. Wore a boxy coat instead

links_reviews_title: It has a nice shape and thickness. Looks adorable
links_reviews_text: Nice material, great with work skirts. I wish there's a version without the tie-strings on the sleeves.
Comfortable. Felt fresh and easy to wear. Loved the small details of the rose gold ends of the tassels on the side.
Quality was great, not a fan of the sleeves. I was expecting something different. If you're into super puffy sleeves this shirt is for you!
Fits well. I ordered up bc I was worried about sleeves, but it was a stretchy material, slips right over your head easily. A little scratchy but the material was thick
While the shoulders are obviously oversized, the top was too large and the puffiness was further down than it should be, for an overall awkward fit.
The shirt was the proper size but it just laid extremely awkwardly unless I didn't move my arms around at all
Looks basic in the picture provided, but once in you feel very elegant!
The fabric is thick and hangs very nicely. The material of the ties just seems a bit too casual for the top.

links_reviews_title: Nice feminine top with awesome sleeves
links_reviews_text: Definitely size up with this one. I am a true medium and the large fit well. It's very heavy and in my opinion better suited for Spring or early fall - NOT summer. It was not breathable at all which is why I took off a star from an otherwise cute top.

links_reviews_title: great white shirt with fun sleeve details
links_reviews_text: Wore this multiple times during the month with jeans, a skirt and wide leg pants. Got compliments every time.
fit great, looked cute

links_reviews_title: Simple, but classy with a little flare
links_reviews_text: Front was very simple and therefore good for professional setting. Sleeve detail gave a little flare. Material was thick. Got a little more wrinkled than I would have liked but overall great top.
This shirt made me look like I was wearing shoulder pads, didn't like it :/
Such a cute shirt! That's it. There is nothing more to add. :)
Fabric was so heavy.
The strings on the sleeves will swing when you walk. It didn't both me, but it is noticeable.
Loved that it was not see through as so many white shirts are. The sleeves made more than a basic white top. Cute.

links_reviews_title: Not a great shirt for summer. Thick and hot.
links_reviews_text: Not a great fit. very rigid material. Better for winter
Love this little top. Dress it up or down, you'll look great! Fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Could wear this every day! Such a good classic
links_reviews_text: Fit is very true to size
Great fit and love the arm detail. Torso is a bit long for a 5'1 petite figure.

links_reviews_title: Cute sleeve details dresses it up
links_reviews_text: Cute top! I wanted to wear it with a lightweight midi skirt but the fabric is pretty thick so it didn't tuck well without seeing the seam. Wore it with a flowy shorter skirt instead to work and looked good. Ties are LONG so prepare to deal with them.

links_reviews_title: Tailored and sophisticated, love the sleeve detail.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a medium and this fit nicely, however, it is snugger on me in a medium than pictured on the model. Material is thicker and a little more textured than I imagined.
Great material with a bit of stretch. Great work piece.

links_reviews_title: beautiful top, easy and business casual. good structure and thick material
links_reviews_text: beautiful top, easy and business casual. good structure and thick material
Pretty top. Goes with everything. Fabric is thick and stretchy which it does not appear like from model photos. A little long on me, but I tucked in anyway.
