This top is precious! I got so many compliments. Love the sleeve detail without being a true cold-shoulder. IGreat fit. Great material.
I loved this shirt, but I wish I sized down.
Very cute, not my style but really a cute top
I absolutely love See By Chloe but the shoulders were way too puffy on this shirt. I felt like I looked like a football player wearing shoulder pads. I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy - a bit hard to button but once on is fab!
links_reviews_text: Fits well and gives you nice shape
I love this skirt! It's high-waisted and slim but has a stretch, which adds a layer of comfort. It's knee length on my tall frame, which is just right. I highly recommend!
Fun light summer skirt, however, it wrinkled instantly. Works great if you are curvy

Great skirt! Could easily be dressed up or down. Currently 28 inch waist and 39 inch hip, and the skirt fit pretty well. A little loose at the waist, but perfect at the hip. Think I may end up buying this one since it's such a versatile piece

links_reviews_title: Perfect as a swimsuit cover up as well! Great vacation piece.
links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt! Ordered for vacation in Mexico and it was perfect both for dinner with a black tank and wedges one night, as well as over my one piece swimsuit the next day. Runs a bit in the small side. Didn't wrinkle as badly as I anticipated, sturdy fabric with stretch. Oodles of compliments!
Feel like the skirt ran a bit large but was still wearable and comfortable w/o feeling like I was swimming in it!
I wanted to love this skirt excited when it arrived but was disappointed that it was stretched out around the waist. It's great for the rest of the fit but lacking at the waistline.

This skirt does not work if you have any sort of hips or butt. It is a true wrap skirt but I could not get any of the buttons apart from the one at the waist buttoned. This runs so small I doubt even a large would have fit me and I'm a size 2 or 4. Sent back immediately, bye.

links_reviews_title: Too small and slit too high!
links_reviews_text: Found the slit to be way too high up and too small. Should have size up.

links_reviews_title: It was really pretty, but unfortunately it was just too small for me and I had to return it.
links_reviews_text: It was really pretty, but unfortunately it was just too small for me and I had to return it.

High-waisted, and fun to wear before I ate anything and my stomach distended from eating/drinking anything. I'm curvy, so it was fun to play in front of a mirror but not so much in public. The buttons kept moving from the left side to the middle and twisting my shirt, and my shirts kept bunching up, so it was frustrating having to go and pull them down.

links_reviews_title: Nice skirt but received the wrong size
links_reviews_text: For some reason RTR suggested I size up in this item and it was way too big. Considering exchanging it for the correct size because it's very flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I rented this skirt for everyday/workwear
links_reviews_text: This skirt ran a bit too small for me. Very cute, but I probably should have rented the large.
This fit lumpy and the horrible stuff fabric did not help. I was hoping for a nice linen skirt and this is not that. It was horrible - bleh
I'm usually a 6 and ordered a medium in this skirt. Way too large! Would recommend sizing down.
This fit perfectly, however I was concerned that the slit was showing too much skin. I kept readjusting but it ended up being just fine. Would definitely rent again!
Couldn't wear. I usually wear a medium but larges look good too. This was gigantic. The waist was seriously 38 inches
Normally wear a small but decided to go Medium, was a great fit.
Didn't like this at all! The material is very stretchy so my regular size was just too tight. Definitely, size up.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Not flattering and runs very small
links_reviews_text: This skirt is actually a very tough and thick material which isn't great in the hot summer months. It ran very small and did not flatter me. I didn't wear it.

When I first pulled it out this skirt looked tiny but fortunately it stretches as you button it up. I wore it with a white top for a day of travel and found it relatively comfortable despite the super high waist. In saying that, I have a 24" waist and 36" hips & would probably size up to the S next time for a more relaxed fit. An easy way to tap into the neutral trend.

The material is thick but soft and hangs beautifully. However, the model doesn't do the length justice. It is VERY cropped. With even my highest waisted jeans, it shows three inches of belly. I ended up pairing it with Spanx leggings (which are very high-waisted), and you can still see a tough of skin peeking out. It not much. If you're looking for a crop top or have a high waisted pant or skirt to pair it with, this is a great choice. Otherwise, skip.
I went out on a limb after reading other reviews but decided I would try it with high rise jeans. It's super cute but way too cropped for this mommy tummy, so I never wore it out unfortunately.
Loved it so much! I did return it to get the medium size. I am short with a short torso and it wasn't as cropped as I'd liked it. Overall, loved it. Definitely recommend

I like this shirt so much! It looks really cool, fits well and is super comfortable. My boobs definitely make it shorter than it's intended so beware of that! But otherwise I think it's a great shirt and welcome addition for me because I love cool basics.
Comfy, super flattering t-shirt cut expertly out of heavy sweatshirt material. Just a tad bit of bellybutton crop to it but I wore with high waisted Levi's. Never giving it back!
Super cute top can dress up or down! Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Short sleeve sweatshirt with fashion appeal
links_reviews_text: I rented this little oddity for wearing to work. It is second spring in California so a short sleeved sweatshirt made sense. Pros: cute is totally unique and it was warm without being hot Cons: runs small, I had to layer over a tank even with extremely high waisted jeans to prevent midriff exposure Styled as shown!

This top is super cute and I absolutely loved the crop/ asymmetrical shape and the overall structure and weight of the t-shirt. It was a cool twist on a casual t-shirt and jeans look. This is one of the reasons I love unlimited RTR... I would never spend $350 on a plain blue t-shirt but would absolutely rent this again
This t-shirt is perfection. I might not return it for a long time since I can't afford to buy it!
Loved this shirt and got a ton of compliments.
it was super comfortable and cute! I am a little taller so my midriff was showing more than I thought it would have based on the other pictures I saw but I LOVED it!
I am 6'1" and this was too short to not be a belly shirt (a decent amount of belly exposed), no matter how high waisted my bottoms were. Cute and high quality otherwise. Heavy, weighty material
So cute and edgy, I felt so "now" with it on, a definite must rent. A little shorter than expected, but with high rise jeans looks perfect!
Love the fit! Very slimming style. Looked cute paired with high waisted leggings.

I seriously considered buying this one! It is perfect with high waisted white jeans. A great way to wear a crop top without actually showing much skin. The back is super cute as well, material is thick and flattering.
Cute, flirty, and sporty. Paired with dark denim cuffed at the bottom. Did wear higher wasted as belly is revealing
Def cropped, and unexpectedly a sweatshirt material. Cool weekend top
It's a little shorter than I thought. showed a lot of midriff
Great casual and cute look.
This didn't have the shape I expected it to. It was pretty boxy but not in a trendy way. Maybe I ordered the wrong size.
Wore a few times, both with leggings for a cute travel look as well as with jeans and sandals for a casual day in the city. Love the cropped look. Got the most wear out of this of any rental to date.
Thick, quality. Different but is a little short in front so unless you wAnt to reveal stomach, high waisted pants/jeans are best.
This was a boxy awkward fit. A crop top sweatshirt with huge armholes. Did not wear.

This was incredibly comfy, flattering, and a nice thick material. It was easy to dress up with stilettos and tight black pants, or dress down with sneakers and leggings. I really loved this top. Super casual, sexy, and seemed of good quality.

I guess I'm nota s comfy showing off some stomach skin as I thought I'd be. It definitely showed more skin on me than on the model. The material was thick which made it hang nicely. Almost like a denim hybrid.

links_reviews_title: The fabric was heavy for a shirt
links_reviews_text: The fabric was thick, stiff and heavy. Was hoping for the top to be more like a comfy t-shirt.
Total belly shirt. Way shorter than pictured.

such a cute top. The front is cropped and shows tummy. Longer in the back. It looks amazing with high waisted, wide leg pants. I had this for two weeks and wore it almost every other day. i wanted to keep it! So versatile and flattering.
Eye catching, comfortable, received many compliments. Will be renting again!

I rented these to fill a delivery but they ended up being my order MVPs. This color seems to go with everything, especially white, and I wore them all weekend. Contrary to appearances they are very lightweight. Would rent again in summer.
I really like the way it fit and everyone liked it at the offices

Rag & bone never disappoints me. This sweater is thick and warm. I wore it to a casual holiday celebration with my family. I have a short torso so fit was not too short for me. I think it fit perfectly. I also paired with high waisted pants.
I wanted to love this because it felt fun and festive for the holidays but it was just OK. Cute overall but a little boxy and a little too short for me. Still glad that I rented it in December.
I loved this sweater. This very warm. I have a long torso so I either needed to wear high rise jeans or a tank top under it. This picture doesn't really do it justice but the only one I took
Fit is a little boxy
This was a nice layer during cold days but really was just a normal sweater. I liked it, wore a couple times but it wasn't a stand out.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this bc it was too scratchy
links_reviews_text: Scratchy wool

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this piece! Was unique and fun, wore it to work and got so many compliments! Will definitely rent again.
Good thick sweater but a little itchy and boxy. Overall a good basic but it's nothing mind blowing.
Other than the torso length (would have preferred a couple more inches) it was perfect. Lots of compliments.
I was hoping for R&B edge, but just an ordinary, everyday sweater. Felt short in length.
I definitely would rent this again. It was thick and warm.
This was a great, versatile piece. Warm, but not itchy. I wore it from work to date night.
It was a super cute sweater, but just too thick and warm for what I wanted to wear it for. Maybe if it were a colder day but I was just too hot in it.

Rented to wear for a coffee date with my ex and dinner with friends on Xmas eve. Got compliments from everyone! Wore with black jeans and my high doc martens. It was not itchy for me like other reviews stated and I wore it with a fitted white tee underneath. Highly recommend for holiday or just to go out!
Very fun to switch up my usual work attire.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater for work or play
links_reviews_text: Was pretty true to size. Wore it with jeans but could have paired it with black pants for work. Got some compliments on it.
And warm - exactly as expected - nice fall/winter rental
Awesome sweater - warm, thick, beautiful. Perfect.
bright, just as pictured. A thicker fabric, warm.

I really liked this sweater. The material was thicker in person than I thought it would be--It's like a very thick wool. I had to send back because weather was too warm for how thick material was. I plan to rent again once winter arrives.
This sweater was MUCH bulkier than it looks in the pictures. A Medium runs true to size but very short in the waist. Overall, not a flattering or cute look.
Pros-comfy, warm, soft Cons-May be slightly large, or it's just the heaviness of the sweater so it stretches out. Not sure how flattering it is Could be too long if you are short. I'm 5'11"

The dress was super comfortable and work appropriate. The zipper embellishments on the sides and the sleeves add some cool funk to the dress. I got a lot of compliments on the dress and the color- really broke up the monotony of the winter blues you get in the Midwest. I did wear this with spandex to provide a slimming effect in the tummy section.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater dress. It's beautiful and is a perfect mix of classic and edgy. I've worn it a few times now and get compliments every time I wear it. I pair it with a thin turtleneck top, a belt, and black ankle boots. I didn't want to part with it - so I didn't!

links_reviews_title: Great and comfortable sweater dress with style
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater dress! The cut sleeves were a great little detail, and the zippers in the skirt were helpful to ensure the fit wasn't too tight while walking. At 5'8", I thought the length was perfect, but I could see how it might be long on someone shorter. At almost 7 months pregnant, it was super comfortable and made me feel great. And the color was fantastic. Would absolutely rent again.

Fit was very large, I would recommend sizing down 1-2 sized if you want a fitted look. This is me sized down 1 size to a Med and I felt it was still a little baggy for my taste. Stretchy, warm, and pretty great all around!
I received SO many compliments on this dress! Not only was it bump friendly (26wks) it was stunning on - not usually a green girl, but it was so flattering.

Loved this dress. Considered purchasing. I felt like i was wearing a snuggie all day. Love the zipper detail. Color was gorgeous. Would def rent again. I am usually a M and i rented a S and this worked.

I wore this dress on Christmas Eve with leopard heels. The color was beautiful and stood out in the sea of red everyone else was wearing. Plus, this dress was warm. I thought it ran a tad big but it may have been because the sweater fabric was rather heavy and drapey, but not in a bad way.

I wore this to a birthday part for an older family member. I went with the smaller size because it hugged my curves in a more flattering way than the XL. I am 14 weeks pregnant and embraced showing off my pooch, even if it is really more me than baby. I tried to take a few photos of just the dress but they didn't do it justice. I got lots of compliments but this dress is not the most photogenic. The slits are zippers so you can adjust them for how much leg you want to show. Overall I really enjoyed this rental.
It may have been a little too comfy for the office. I felt like I was wearing a snuggie, lol.

links_reviews_title: Odd mix of formal and casual
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a winter weekend getaway to Blackberry Farm to wear to dinner. I couldn't really tell from the photos how formal it was, but ended up not wearing it. It is a nice heavy sweater material and the side zippers give it a fun, more casual feeling. The sleeves just put it over the top though, and made it just a tad too dramatic for me. I'm 155, 5'8" and rented a MR and it fit nicely.

Rented this with my unlimited. Thought i might wear it to a dinner but I ended up wearing something else. It's super comfortable and warm. I like how the slits on the sides have zippers so that you can decide how much leg to show. As other reviewers noted, it's not fitted at all - so it felt a little shapeless at the waist. It falls into an interesting category of dressiness - it's too dressy for everyday but not fancy enough for a party. May be good for a dinner party or something like that.
Love this dress!!!
The zipper sizes make this even cuter, definitely size down!

I rented a MR because they were out of SR, and it was a little long because of it. Otherwise a great dress though! I got a lot of compliments on it and the sleeves & zippered sides are so cool. The fabric is comfortable & pretty warm - I wore it in about 50 degree weather and didn't need a coat.
Loved this one.
This was a cute dress and the fabric is really nice, but unfortunately it was too large on me. It you're on the taller side and like a roomier fit this would be a nice winter/fall dress.
Love love loved the look and am already planning on renting it again!

I have broad shoulders and am almost always a true medium in tops so I got the medium/ large. I like when jackets are oversized, but this was massive. I still wore it bc again I like oversized jackets, but I think the smaller size also would've still had the oversized look

The jacket is the perfect oversized fit. Sleeves are so comfortable and denim is structured but still soft. Literally feels like a $150+ jacket and looks amazing with denim or cool skirts. I'm 5'3 and it wasn't too short on my arms. Might purchase it!
This jacket is very light and comfy. Fabric is a soft denim light weight and flexible. I ordered a M/L and if I ordered it again I would do a smaller size.
Perfect jacket I wore it almost every day while on a work trip
Loose and comfortable. I'll be renting again for a weekend when I am out in the city.

links_reviews_title: Don't debate it, just rent it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfection. It's perfect for a day in the office, a work function, or drinks afterward. It can go anywhere and stands out. This is the perfect shape for my pear shape. It will be great for curvy girls too. Highly recommend. This dress won't see the last of me. I'll be renting you again!

links_reviews_title: Great fit... I felt polished and comfortable
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect dress for a lunch meeting. It is stretchy but holds you in. So you look polished and comfortable
I wore this to work and it was comfortable and slimming - got lots of compliments
Slimming cut and shape; flexible material; and makes you feel like you own the conference room table!

links_reviews_title: Ok for work but sort of shapeless on its own
links_reviews_text: Maybe a belt or a blazer would have made a difference for this one. It was fine for work but without waist definition it hung out a bit on me. Slightly big but I think a full size down would have been too tight
Absolutely loved this dress. Received compliments from coworkers and 2 women at a restaurant. Easy to wear, paired great with boots. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, but lays a little funny if you are curvy
links_reviews_text: Really comfortable fabric and fit. I am curvy (pear shaped) so some of the lines laid a little funny, but will work nicely for work.
This dress fit perfect and had a perfect amount of stretch to it. I will definitely rent this one again.
I am short and things often run too long, but this was fine. Also, I have a very small waist and this wasn't too loose as many dresses are, but also wasn't too tight over my larger thighs!
The dress is super comfortable and lightweight. The sleeves are perfect tightness as well. I would say this fits true to size, but I picked a larger size by accident.
Loved this dress!
Comfortable to sit in throughout the day. Nice material. Looked cute with black tights also.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable Feeling while looking put together
links_reviews_text: This was so comfortable and flattering, had a meeting that we couldn't dress casual for & I felt polished with a comfy feel in this dress.
Fit true to size for Lauren by Ralph Lauren. Classic work dress.
Too big in bust for me
Love how flattering this dress is at the waist. The print was perfect for fall. I wore it with black tights and black suede booties to work and it felt perfectly professional. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Simple and easy to wear with black tights
links_reviews_text: A little short if you are on the taller size, it's knit so very comfortable
I'd read that these run small and are so high waisted that they're uncomfortable. I sized up by one size (28 to 29) and I'm only 5'2 and thought the high waist was perfect. Loved the button fly
I didn't mean to look like The Rock when wearing these jeans, it just kind of happened. The jeans are a little long on me, but i liked them. I'll just never pair them like this again.

links_reviews_title: Too large in the knee area
links_reviews_text: Fit great everywhere but it bunched up a ton around my knees, which wasn't flattering. Stretched out a lot by the end of the day. Not the comfiest.

I really wanted to love these jeans but the waist runs big and they looked silly with a belt cinching the waist to size. They looked cute with a crop top or something to balance out the baggy fit of them.
Wore these twice and loved them. Cute, baggy higher-waisted jeans that are easy to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Super cute fit, but stretched out quickly.
links_reviews_text: Really cute ~mom jeans~ fit. They fit perfectly when I first put them on, but within an hour or so, they became pretty baggy! I would go a size smaller... they may be tight at first but they will stretch fast.
Soft, comfortable, great color, broken in jeans I could live in.

links_reviews_title: SIZE WAY DOWN and you'll find the jeans of your dreams.
links_reviews_text: I decided to rent these after realizing that the jeans modeled on the Emerson Fry site are icon 501s. I am a 2-4 on bottom and usually wear a 26. I got these in a 24 vases I. Reviews. I was very nervous when I saw them- they looked tiny! Trust the process. I wiggled into them (broke a nail buttoning) and wore them out grocery shopping. An hour later and these were the most flattering, glorious jeans I've ever worn. Swiped right and purchased! Highly recommend but you have to size way down!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable but baggy in the butt
links_reviews_text: The thickness of the denim was so nice and they held their shape really well. Button fly is a really nice touch but they were definitely loose in the butt. I didn't mind the first two days of wearing but by day three or four, it felt too baggy and awkward. Highly recommend though.

I liked the button fly; quite nostalgic, and I liked that these didn't have spandex in them like a lot of jeans these days. I like a darker denim but these weren't too bad. Also liked the straight leg cut.
Got my usual size and it was super snug. Would recommend sizing up.
The higher waist is comfortable except for sitting for long periods. I'd wear them out and about but not for long trips in the car.
These pants are fantastic! They are well structured. I bought them--enough said.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to send them back
links_reviews_text: I get compliments every time I wear these, which is constantly.
These fit great everywhere but the waist. Such a cute pair of jeans otherwise.

links_reviews_title: WAY too short, but very flattering. Love the rigid fit.
links_reviews_text: Hit halfway between my knees and ankles, so length as way too short to even pull off as a crop. Had they been longer, these were super flattering.
Great every day jeans with a bit of a 90s vibe. Great fit that flatters the booty. Very rigid denim without stretch (which i like, but not everyone does).
Young college girls told me how "on-trend" I was: I high compliment for this old mom! Levi's are always a good idea!
I'm 5'9 and these were almost too short. Button up front was very flattering.
I rented this for beach vacation. Great after an active day with minimal time to change before dinner. Very soft and relaxed like a comfortable old shirt, but eye-catching! Pockets too!
Loved the fit and fabric of this dress. It was a bit short, but I didn't feel uncomfortable because the fabric was a good weight and didn't feel like it would fly up on me. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Easy rainbow shift is happy & pretty! Thicker fall fabric but still airy.
links_reviews_text: My husband loved this one. Effortless. Very comfy fit. Would be too hot in FL summer sun but perfect happy dress headed into fall. Def rent again. Great length for me at 5'2.
Would be great by the pool, longer in back which i love. Very cute and super easy to wear.
Loved how comfy this was. But it's heavy and can get hot.
Easygoing fit that is perfect for a weekend, beach vacation or a work day in late summer. Loved being able to throw this dress on with a Jean jacket, sandals and go!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a day of traveling
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Comfy and flattering

Update: love, probably keeping. - Somehow didn't get a picture, though I basically lived in this for like two weeks. Amazing, fabulous dress. BF referred to it as "fancy dishtowel." Hahaha. People stopped me on the street to ask where I got it. If it weren't $500 I'd have kept it. Will order again if I can!
Loved this dress- fit is generous like a shift, material is a little heavier than expected, but pattern and style are great.

links_reviews_title: I rented for a weekend trip; loved it so much that I kept it for a little longer.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is thick and a little too scratchy to wear as a beach cover. Cute casual summer dress. Not fitted but a little short.
I fell over the moon in love with this pocketed, rainbow dress. I cannot wait to rent it again for summer evenings by the pool.
I would only suggest renting this if you are super petite. Granted I'm tall, but it was a shirt for me...although super cute...it's not attractive as a shirt.

Loved this dress. I rented it for vacation in Mexico. It was great for a day out on the boat. Fabric is a bit heavy so wouldn't recommend for somewhere super hot and sweaty but was perfect for a hot day on a boat/ at the beach where you have a nice breeze

Loved the material, the colors, the overall look... but the length is VERY short. Combined with my very long torso, this one wasn't wearable, not even as a cover-up. I put it on a few times because I really wanted to wear it, but ended up taking it off every time because I couldn't move my arms without exposing everything. The bottom of the dress hit right at the bottom of my undies. Super cute, but too short for my body type.
Lived in this during a tropical vacation. Cute, comfy, and works as both a beach coverup and for casual dinner.

links_reviews_title: Cute but fit more like a t shirt than dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this cover up while on vacation as a cover up - it's very stylish and loved the unique fabric. My only downside was that it was on the shorter side and didn't fit me how it's shown in the photo. Looked more like a t shirt on me that just barely covered my butt... I'm 5'8" and have a long torso for reference. I still got compliments though!
Fell in love with this unique fall dress paired with booties. Received endless compliments! The fabric is so different than expected but great quality. Highly recommend!

I can't decide if I loved this or not. I wanted to, because I was crazy about the print. I'm not a shift dress girl, so I wore mine with sage green Capri leggings, and that worked. It was too heavy for me to be comfortable on a sunny day in the 80s.

Fit was fine. Some people said too heavy and hot but I wore in the Caymans and thought it was fine temp wise. I am 5' 6" and it was too short, but fine for the beach. I would size up if 5' 4"-5' 5" or taller.
This dress runs large so order size down. It was cute enough to wear around, but it wasn't anything glamorous. Heavy material is good for chillier weather.

links_reviews_title: Got Compliments on colors but felt meh
links_reviews_text: In theory I should have loved this dress because the color scheme is really cute and playful, and a lot of people commented that they liked it. But the fabric was heavy and felt like burlap and the fit was just meh.

Loved wearing this dress on a weekend getaway. It is comfortable, fun, and casual while still making a statement. And it has pockets! Literally a dozen strangers stopped me on the street to pay a compliment on the dress. Things to note: Tall ladies, it is somewhat short and rises up if you raise your arms. It also can get a bit warm outside in hot weather due to the fabric. This one is hard to return!

links_reviews_title: Striking colors and nice texture w/stylish side tie
links_reviews_text: Comfy and stylish wrap skirt. I felt great in this, worewith a black tee and cardigan in winter with black boots. Lots of compliments. Texture is almost like pique. Only small issue is that the inner button came undone once or twice. Just be conscious of it. I'd rent again or maybe buy!
Loved wearing this skirt. Will rent again through unlimited.

This skirt was cute with a black slim sweater. The material is a nice weight and there's a lining- definitely winter only skirt. I liked the colors and color blocking. It did take me a couple tries to get it to sit right- may run a little big or just be a bit stretched from wear. I enjoyed wearing it and would rent again!
I wear this to dinner and a show with my kids, every lady in the room asked me where I got the start. Highly recommend it.

Received more compliments on this skirt than anything I've ever worn!!! It's a compliment machine! Unique colors and pattern, substantial fabric, the tie waist accent is a great detail. Wore it with RTR Flyn Skye top and knee-high suede boots. Flattering on my pear-shaped bod, and since I have a small waist relative to hips I loved being able to tie the waist to customize the fit. On me it looked best with a narrow-fitting tucked-in top. Will be renting again!
Fit well, cuter in person, good for work, didn't totally love it
Unique style and comfortable
I love this skirt - it's stretchy and comfortable but very stylish. I never felt like the wrap was coming undone. Considering buying it I loved it so much
Great skirt! Loved how unique it is. The material is a bit stretchy and I had to retie the bow several times throughout the day. Loved it! Many compliments
This skirt ran a bit small, and the wrap did not stay closed well. Too much of the under layer was visible for the line of the skirt to look polished.

links_reviews_title: Perfect winter skirt for work. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_text: I wear a large. It was too big on the sides and too tight in the waist.

links_reviews_title: It was not my cup of tea
links_reviews_text: The material was different that I expected. It was thicker and textured and chunky @ my waist

I got so many compliments in this skirt! It is a unique fabric (thick and high quality), beautiful pattern and flattering fit. It works best with a tighter shirt on top - I wore with a black turtleneck. I am usually between a medium and large. I was happy with the medium, but imagine the large would have worked too.

This wrap skirt was amazing! I wanted a medium but only small was available and I'm glad I tried it! I never felt like i was going to have a wardrobe malfunction. Very comfortable and flattering on the waist. The colors are great too!
I received lots of compliments when I wore this with a basic black turtleneck. It made me look and feel a little thick through the trunk, but it was a nice cold weather item for the rotation.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt! Appropriate for work, stylish, and could wear it out afterward as well.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected, falls below the knee and perfect to wear with high boots like the model photo.
Cute but the waist was a bit strange. I would rent again if I found the right top to go with it.
This skirt fits great and I received a ton of compliments. Runs a little small but still amazing.
I wore this to a stuffy work event, a regular day in the office, and an afternoon holiday party. Got compliments on all occasions so decided to keep!

This skirt was so cute! I wore it like the photo with a black turtleneck and tall black boots. The pattern was different but awesome...loved the colors! It was comfortable and looked great for work. Will definitely rent again!
I actually wore this to work. I wore it to be different and received many compliments in office. Wore with black turtleneck and black booties!

Fit was great and the skirt is very comfortable. The black lining kept rolling out of the top throughout the day. I had a black top on so it went unnoticed, but it was a bit annoying and would have been an issue had I worn a different color top.
fits wonderfully well, nice slit. super fun.

This is a spring or fall weight skirt. The lining and fabric are light but sturdy with some structure so it doesn't hug your bumps. I love the tie accent and the way the color blocks line up. It's a low-key, comfy skirt with texture and detail that get noticed.
This skirt was so cute and comfortable. Loads of compliments. Paired with a v-neck black sweater and boots on a cold day.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a casual rehearsal dinner and received endless compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: It fits very well, if not just a tad too big. It is a TRUE wrap skirt so be careful to keep an eye on the inside button and be aware when you sit down that it will open. I loved the skirt so much that I purchased it.

The skirt fit beautifully. The pattern and unique tie on the skirt are a little different than what I usually wear so I liked trying something new! I got tons of compliments on it. I paired the skirt with a black turtleneck and black booties for an easy look. WRA = will rent again

links_reviews_title: Not my normal style, but comfortable and lot's of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Rented this as a work outfit. Looks exactly like the picture in person and fits true to size. unique and got plenty of compliments in the office which was nice. Thicker material and very comfortable (heavy enough to not worry about the wrap flapping open in a soft breeze :) ). The only thing that I had to fix a couple times was the interior button (there is a tie on the outside you can see and a hidden interior button to help keep the skirt in place). It came undone a few times but wasn't a huge deal since the tie is there to keep it in place as well!
This is a heavy skirt and a lot of fabric but the colors are great
Cute skirt. Hard to get tight due to the button for the wrap and the tie on the other side. Runs slightly large.
nice flowing skirt. make sure you hang up upon arrival.

I rented this for work and wore it three or four times! I usually prefer to cycle through RTR pieces pretty quickly, but I really enjoyed this one. It's thick but not heavy and the fabric is pretty breathable (and lined), so it was really easy to wear as a summer-to-fall transition piece. I paired this with a couple of different black tops, because that wound up being my favorite combo. The XS was a perfect fit for me, and sat right at my waist, so it was very figure-flattering. It was roughly knee-length, maybe a little bit past. I'd recommend this - the colors and pattern aren't too loud, but they really add interest.
Great, versatile piece to wear to the office. The fabric texture, color blocking and belt added nice visual interest.
Pro; my butt looked amazing and the pockets actually open!! Con; I would have to pull them up every now and then but not to the point where I wouldn't wear again!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, little big on the waist.
links_reviews_text: So comfortable, little big on the waist. Also since they were cutoffs they were a little frayed at the end and had to be careful putting them on

links_reviews_title: Nice jeans, but the pockets are a little too much
links_reviews_text: The pockets and color have a safari / tomb raider feel to them. High waisted, not too snug, easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and flattering. Def run a bit big esp in the waist.
links_reviews_text: #everyday #cargo #daytonight
I love these cargo pants. They are stylish. The slim cut is very flattering. They have a slight stretch but not so much that they become frumpy. Casual, comfy cargos! I'd rent again!
My way cooler, more stylish teen told me I was wearing granny pants. They went back. If you like them, they stretch out a lot during the day.
Super cute pants but too tight on me!
Cons - too baggy in the crotch area and material stretches very quickly throughout the day

I really liked these pants but they were comically short on me. I wore them once with really high shaft ankle books and there was still a significant amount of skin showing. I'm 5'9 but my legs are short compared to my torso. I wouldn't rent if you have long legs.

links_reviews_title: Wore this with the Rebecca Taylor Lua Floral Pullover and it looked great!
links_reviews_text: Comfy, quality clothing. Fit was on point.
I really liked these - super comfy, flattering and a great neutral color. The waist does stretch out a bit but I didn't find it to be overly so.
nice fit, very versatile & comfortable. Saturday pants.

links_reviews_title: The most flattering non-jeans on the planet
links_reviews_text: I can't say enough about how cute and comfy there were. Wish I didn't have to send them back.
These fit great and we were super comfy. I love joe's jeans!

I sized up on these because I've had a lot of pants here run small; however, there's no need to for these. They run pretty right on size and have some give to them so they will stretch a little as they're worn.
Fit was on target, however it stretched out and did not have great recovery.
exactly the right nip and stretch
True to size, thin wool sweater. Not bulky. Pretty color and style.

I should have gone for the small. The medium fit wasn't flattering. Very bulky, bunched in weird places. VERY ITCHY. I needed to put a thin long sleeve on underneath to help with the itch but then it just looked too bulky so I did not wear.
Definitely tight, knit is rough and doesn't feel very lux. Uncomfortable. Doesn't breathe.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I'm keeping it.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit. Gorgeous color - a soft periwinkle blue. The cabling on the sleeves is a nice detail. Perfect for everyday. Feels like very high quality material. Big fan of all my pieces from Rebecca Minkoff.

links_reviews_title: The sweater is very ITCHY. Great for work but was pilling when I got it.
links_reviews_text: Pro: pretty color Con: Itchy, a little small if you have larger boobs, awkward hit on your hips, waist - wish it was a little longer or a little shorter.
Great sweater a little rough and only wore it once bc weather turned warm. Definitely would rent again
Scratchy

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this, was let down by the fabric and the color
links_reviews_text: didn't try it on

I love the color of this sweater and thought it was really cute. Unfortunately it was itchy af. I could only wear it one day. The sleeves were a tad bit short on me but I didn't mind. I'd consider buying the sweater if it weren't so itchy.
Didn't like the material at all. Not as soft as I expected. Didn't wear for long as a result.
This was really itchy on me and I never wore it. Looked cute though.
The material was way too itchy for me to bear.
The color is really pretty. But it was small, almost like the wool was shrunk. The wool was also super itchy. I send it back immediately.
Scratchy, bulky, weird fit.

links_reviews_title: It's not as soft as I would have like. A little itchy, in fact.
links_reviews_text: It fit fine
Fit nicely. Cozy with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Blue is much lighter in picture and darker in person
links_reviews_text: Wish the color was more similar to one in photo but was still cute. Wool was pretty itchy.
Beautiful color and loved the pattern on the sleeves. Kept me warm when it got very cold! Great change from my usual black clothes during the winter.

Anyone with blue eyes will love this sweater; it'll really make your eyes pop. Like others have said, it is made out of wool and it is a little itchy. I wasn't bothered by it, but if you are sensitive to that, I would avoid this sweater. The sleeves are fun too!

links_reviews_title: Looked great and was very warm!
links_reviews_text: The sweater worked well with my outfit and is made out of a wool so it was very warm but slightly itchy! Wear a long sleeve undershirt with it!
Fit was a bit small, and the items just didn't feel like any more than a standard sweater. Didn't end up wearing it.
Comfortable but itchy from wool
A little itchy but so cute!

links_reviews_title: great throw on for every day, easy to wear, looks effortless
links_reviews_text: soft, comfortable, perfect for that chill in the air kind of day. Great color.
The sweater is very cute and loved the blue. Once I put it on I was itchy and it was a little big throughout.
I really loved the color, but the the fit wasnt neccesarily flattering and the fabric was pretty scratchy like the other reviewers had said.
This was really cute for work with jeans. It was super itchy tho, that would be my only complaint
Super cute but very itchy

links_reviews_title: Material is very itchy didnt wear
links_reviews_text: Material is very itchy didnt wear
Great sweater! Comfortable, cute, and beautiful color
n/a

links_reviews_title: The perfect everyday sweater with a calm color
links_reviews_text: Shhh...I wore this three times in one week. Love this sweater!
Fit is true to size. It is a little itchy because of the wool content, but can be avoided by wearing an undershirt. Would definitely rent again!
This was so pretty - a little more lilac-ey than the photo BUT it was wayyy too itchy for me so I had to take it off immediately. I'm a bit sensitive to itch, but i couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Sweater was cute but had to wear a shirt underneath because it was very itchy.
links_reviews_text: I wore with jeans and slip on sneakers for a casual look. I liked everything about it except the itchiness of the sweater. Only wore for a few hours because of this.
It was super cute, but unfortunately really itchy!
Just feels itchy on the hems

links_reviews_title: This sweater is so itchy it was uncomfortable when I tried it on. Returned without wearing
links_reviews_text: Fit was good
Baggy fit all over, not just sleeves and very very itchy!
These fit like a glove! Hands down one of my favorite pairs of jeans I've ever rented, they have a little stretch to them so they're comfortable enough to wear all day.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable jeans for a day of NYC fun!
links_reviews_text: I listened to the RTR suggestion and rented 27R versus 29R, and I'm glad I did! The jeans fit perfectly - at the airport, on the plane, and in NYC (and we walked a lot!). Highly recommend theses!

I was a little nervous on going with a size smaller than I usually wear but these jeans couldn't have been more perfect! They have stretch in them but never got loose through the night. They have become my favorite and I will be keeping these!
I loved these jeans super cute but were way too big needed a belt to keep them up

Such a great pair of skinny jeans! Fabric is soft, stretchy and extremely comfortable. I have a short waist and it's hard to find a good pair of high waisted jeans that don't overwhelm my midsection. These jeans have a front rise of approx. 9"...making them "high-waisted" for those with a short-waist like me and technically mid-rise for those with a longer torso. The button-fly and frayed hem added a unique touch. I wore them many times before they started to lose some of their shape. I am 5'9" with a 34" inseam and usually wear 27/28 Tall in jeans but the 27R fit great. These run slightly larger than true to size and I plan to try the 26R before buying a pair.

Hard to find the perfect waist and length fit. These jeans were it. Love the button close detail and they were comfy and great length for 5'5" frame. Wore multiple times. Will rent again and possibly purchase.
These are amazing! I rented them before making the purchase because Madewell jeans are expensive. I've loved having these in my closet.

links_reviews_title: Perfect everyday jeans, wore them SO many times
links_reviews_text: Comfy, cute, just perfect. They are not true black though, a bit more like dark grey.
I'm a true 27 in Madewell jeans and these fit perfect. I wore them multiple times. Great to dress up or down!

I am a huge fan of Madewell jeans so I knew how these would fit and that they would be super comfortable. They were a bit stretched out from previous wear when I received them, so I might size down since that usually happens with most Madewell jeans.

I am 4 months post partum and have been wearing a 30 in jeans. I have another wide leg pair from Madewell that is a 29 so when many reviews said to size down, that's what I ordered. However, I could easily button these, but once on they looked too tight in the pelvis and thigh area. Had to send them back and will wait for the 30. Just wanted to offer a counter opinion since so many reviews said size down- remember these are very form fitting jeans so you might want to give yourself some room!
Madewell Jeans never disappoint! I've kept these for weeks they fit perfect and make your bum look great! They run a little big.
love love love. fits perfectly. no love handles & they don't fall after they stretch out a little. (well, at least not so far)

links_reviews_title: I love the button up closure in the front, the cutoff at the ankle, and they just fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Madewell suggests you wear them multiple times in between washes, but I wills say that they stretch out quite a bit with wear. I would have gone down a size had I known how much they would stretch!
Comfortable but large fit, and stretches over the course of the day.
Fits comfortably at my waist and hips with lots of stretch. Faded black denim. Hits at the ankle/foot. Effortless staple item everyone should have in their closet - yes I recommend to rent.

I loved these so much that I am getting a pair! The fit is so nice and the color is quite a bit lighter than in the photos - more of a charcoal grey than a black (which I what I was expecting). Even better, these come in both Petite and Tall sizes at the Madewell store.
Being 5'10", I should have known better than to get a regular length pair of jeans. Even so, the fit was a bit baggy at the top. Not impressed.
Suggested size was too big. I would suggest sizing down due to stretch of the material.
Best jeans I've ever worn. Stretchy but don't stretch out as the night went on. I wore the 27 but could have gone with 26. I ended up buying them in 26.
great style, wish you could rent petite

Super comfy, flattering fit. The fabric does stretch out significantly after the first wear so I probably should have sized down about two sizes. Love the fray at the ankles. Overall they did the job, they are more of a dark gray than black though, no fading detail like most other jeans I wear so the change was nice.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable but runs a bit large.
links_reviews_text: Once I washed and dried them, they fit better!

I love these pants! Just what I was looking for. I wish I had gotten a smaller size, 24-25 would have fit a bit better for me, but the 26 worked ok. I wore multiple times and would definitely rent again! The fringe bottom is adorable and length was a perfect crop. Love the higher rise and the button front too!
These were fantastic jeans. I got so many compliments but was always comfortable.

links_reviews_title: love the style - goes with anything
links_reviews_text: Far too big. Comfortably fit at first, but stretched out throughout the day. Size down.

links_reviews_title: runs big, but who doesn't love wearing a size smaller than they usually do?!
links_reviews_text: These jeans are great and super versatile. I wore them multiple times and they always looked great with whatever top I threw on. As other people have noted, they run big so I purposefully sized down. The size smaller fit me perfectly and made me feel great! The material isn't too think or too thin. Thick enough to not show cellulite dimples but thin enough to not be too hot in the summer heat.
Flattering cut, good color. I loved these.

links_reviews_title: Cute but too baggy, very stretchy
links_reviews_text: I still wore them once but they were too big and the fabric was stretchy which is nice but then it got loose throughout the day. I definitely would size down

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. So comfortable and no cutting into the sides!
links_reviews_text: These pants had the perfect amount of stretch. I cannot stand wearing jeans because I just feel so restricted. These were the most comfortable pants I have ever worn. So flattering and fit very true to size! If you are right between sizes, you could likely size down. But if you have a true size, go with that!
Fit great!

I love these jeans and am considering buying them. They are the perfect waist height and length and are trendy with the buttons and frayed ankles, yet still nice enough to wear to work, etc. I find them very comfortable, the material is thick but stretchy.
A lot of stretch, if I rent again will size down

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect pair of jeans for a night out
links_reviews_text: I loved the jeans. I wore them for a night out with friends. I did a lot of walking around town and not once did I feel uncomfortable, nor was I dying to get my jeans off by the end of the night like I normally do. The jeans were tight and form-fitting while still breathable. I would definitely rent them again!

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Love these jeans! Great for everyday wear! You can dress them up or keep them causal.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size! Very comfortable and flattering!
Super cute jeans... I wore them large, but next time will rent a size smaller!

I'm usually a size 2 - 4 and these 26 fit great. I actually might try the size 25 before buying these just to make sure. They make your butt look great and the high waist looks amazing (not toooo high waisted). I like the exposed buttons and cropped bottoms. So comfortable! They do stretch out after a couple wears.

links_reviews_title: These jeans are made for YOU!
links_reviews_text: As soon as I put them on I was hooked. I had tried madewell jeans once before but these were nice because they fit to my body. True to size and the length was great. I am 5'3, 131 pounds. I had to purchase!

links_reviews_title: Cute and stretchy but size down
links_reviews_text: I kinda of wish that these pants were as stretchy. They are super cute, high -waisted fly button but go a size down. Since there is so much stretch they kinda sit on your body, so by sizing down, it will be a lot more flattering.
Cute casual sweater coat, runs really big. Not meant for petite. Would size down and recommend for someone taller. Otherwise would've worn

Love this jacket and it was perfect for 50-60 degree weather. I sized up because I wanted a looser fit and I was glad I did. The sleeves are long and it was the perfect length for me. I wore it multiple times while I had it and definitely recommend!

I listened to the other reviewers and sized down, I'm normally a medium but went with a small and it was perfect. Wore over a black shift dress in the winter. This is a really comfortable sweater (ish?) jacket, I'll be keeping it for a few weeks!

This is so cute and cozy! I went for the bigger size because that's all that was available. It was definitely too big on me, you can tell it's baggy. The large would have been perfect. I would totally rent again! I am tall and things tend to be short on me, but this wasn't. It is nice and long which I love. Shorter girls may not love the length.
Wore with casual-jeans and crop top as well as an elegant black romper for evening.
Super fun, warm. Was a little big - had to roll up the sleeves. Recommend sizing down.
Cute! But definitely could have sized down to a Smallz Paired with casual black sneakers and jeans with a white tee. Fun way to spark up a casual outfit.
This oversized sweater coat was very comfortable. It was super soft and cute and looked cute with shorts and jeans.
Oversized, but very cozy. I'm glad I tried it.

links_reviews_title: LOVE IT! So cute, goes with everything and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: true to size
Loved this piece with dress slacks for work and then leather leggings on a weekend night out!

links_reviews_title: A little big but soft and cozy!
So many people loved this coat!
links_reviews_text: I got so many comments and compliments about this coat. It's super comfy and hangs nicely. The pockets are a little loose, so be careful about items falling out. Is warm enough for some pretty chilly days if paired with the right scarf and hat. An easy, stylish look that you just throw on !
I absolutely love this sweater jacket and I can't wait to rent it again. It does run quite large though; I had a small and would definitely get an x-small in the future.
Wore this for a brunch and to work. Can be dressed up or down and definitely makes a statement. It recommended I size up which was not good advise. Go with your normal size and it should fit great!

links_reviews_title: I'm obsessed with this jacket and ended up getting it for Christmas.
links_reviews_text: They only had the large available but because it's long it was cute and oversized. I ended up getting the medium as a gift and it is perfect. Just warm enough for a 40-60 degree day. I could not love this coat more.

I really wanted to love this sweater. I loved the way it looked on others in reviews, but when I got it, the pattern and material both looked and felt very cheap. It was a good length but it was very large around the chest area. Felt more like a bathroom than sweater or coat.
This sweater coat is super cute, will spice up any outfit. Received tons of compliments. It is very warm and cozy, so keep in mind for wearing indoors.
I'm a small/medium - more towards medium. I was worried this was going to be snug but it was actually a little broad in the shoulders. But still very cute. Got a lot of compliments on it

Like the other reviewers said, it's definitely oversized so size down. Even with sizing down you'll still be able to wear it over a sweater. I tried wearing it over a tee but I'm very sensitive to itchiness and it's definitely itchy. But with a long sleeve or sweater under it's so perfect. I was very tempted to buy it.
Wish it had buttons
Definitely size down but overall cute sweater would def order again but in XS

I usually am between a M and L, but unfortunately decided to order a L in this sweater... HUGE MISTAKE. It was huge!! I also thought that the fabric felt similar to an old curtain or one of those couches my grandma used to have, not a fan.

links_reviews_title: Not a coat, not a sweater, perfect transition layer
links_reviews_text: Material feels very expensive. It's a very thick and soft knit. Love the deep pockets. Great piece to dress up jeans and boots.

links_reviews_title: Loved the pattern and it as super comfy, but it was way too big!
links_reviews_text: Shoulders were too big and it was too long for my frame. Would not recommend if you are 5'3 or shorter. I kind of looked like I was drowning in it, according to my husband.
I wore this for a flight and four hour drive. Super cute! Fit was oversized but perfect! The fabric was better than expected. This would be fun to own.
Loved this but wish I had gotten a small or medium as it was way too large. I still wore it 3 times. I will rent again but in smaller size

links_reviews_title: Chic, warm and matches just about anything
links_reviews_text: This coat is such a winner. It's a perfect fall transition piece. You will get so many compliments! The leopard print is fun and unique without being overwhelming or distracting. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: returned too big! still tags on :-)
links_reviews_text: very big! im petite, but i got the XS. i get the "big" look, but i was drowning in all the fabric.
I'm obsessed with this sweater! I dressed it up and down while having it. Super comfy but does run small. I sized up and loved the fit. Will probably rent again!
Absolutely love this sweater. After reading the reviews I decided to go for the bigger size because I didn't want it to be too short and It's perfect. Highly considering purchasing. This piece!
This sweater is comfy, warm, cute and a pretty pop of color in the winter. It's pretty cropped so you need to wear high waisted jeans. But it fit great and I got so many compliments!

I accidentally ordered a size M when I'm typically a S - so it was a little oversized but was super cozy & cute & still felt a little sexy with the crop. Perfect for a cold night in with girlfriends and wine.
Wore this out to dinner with some friends and it was perfect! Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but definitely a cropped sweater!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater and received so many compliments! Only complaint is that it is very cropped. I am usually a S/M in sweaters, but got a L because it was the only size left and knew it was a cropped sweater so I thought going up a size would make it less cropped on me. The L is still very cropped, but overall I loved it and would rent again.

I like the wow-factor of a crop in the dead of winter (once I'm inside, of course!) It's so comfy and plenty warm enough to be the only layer under a heavy coat on a snow day. Bright color and bold crop were turning heads and getting me all the compliments.

links_reviews_title: Pop of color and great fit!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater! Didn't want to send it back. It has small cutouts (or side slits, rather) in the sides that add some sex appeal to an otherwise very cute sweater. I received so many compliments when I wore it to work. Perfect to pair with high waisted jeans or skirt because, as others mentioned, it is a crop! Very warm, perfect for Fall!
Definitely cropped and larger sleeves. If you're bustier the crop might be too much but it hit me almost at the waist since I have a shorter torso. Really loved it!
Very much a crop top sweater great breathable material

links_reviews_title: This is a color I usually wouldn't buy, so it was fun to try and I ended up loving it!
links_reviews_text: A little heavy, but good for early spring. Cropped, I only felt comfortable wearing with highwaisted Levi's because it's definitely a high crop. Over all feels slimming at bottom while the top has a lot of extra room. Very flattering for my body type!
the sweater is supposed to be short! It looks great with my fav high waisted leggings from American Apparel
Very cropped but cute with high waisted jeans. Pretty color pink
Super cropped but really cute
A bright pop of color with full billowy sleeves. Flattering fit even with the big winter weave. Needs high waisted pants because of side slits-be forewarned. Cozy and cute!
It was sooo cute and I wanted it to work but it was just way too cropped. Much shorter crop in person than it looks like in the picture. Not for tall gals or girls with long torsos.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater. Bought it specifically for homecoming.
links_reviews_text: The perfect cropped sweater, the size was perfect and the color matched my school colors (white and red). It was great for a cool day in the fall-not too thick but warm enough that I didn't need to wear a jacket

links_reviews_title: Super cute sweater, but it's cropped just below the bustline and not at the waist as pictured.
links_reviews_text: Super cute sweater, but it's cropped just below the bustline and not at the waist as pictured.
I'm not all that comfortable with cropped tops so although it was beautiful I wouldn't wear it
fit is slightly cropped

links_reviews_title: Very cute cropped sweater! I say if you're in between sizes - I would probably size down.
links_reviews_text: Casual but cute sweater!
I received this and legit thought I ordered the wrong size - it looked like an xxs. It was soooo cropped and the arms were weird and stuck out. Didn't wear.
Way too cropped / short. Hard a hard time figuring out what to pair it with and ended up not wearing it. Cute color though!
Thought this sweater would look so cute and cas, unfortunately my bust turned this sweater into a crop top. The bottom half of my shirt stopped at the top of my stomach.

links_reviews_title: Stylish sweater for a casual bar hangout.
links_reviews_text: Crop is quite high and sleeves are very large. Great, bright color.

Really cute sweater, baggy arms but super cropped. I was hoping to wear this to work, however it was just a bit too cropped for that. I ended up wearing this with high wasted jeans and booties to the bar one night in chilly NYC and really loved the look. I'm smaller chested, so while its super cropped only a tad bit of skin was showing. definitely recommend for casual night out.

In the picture, this sweater looks like a slightly cropped sweater that could pair well with a high-waisted pair of jeans, but when I tried it on, there was a good four-inch gap between my waistband and the bottom of the sweater. Not great for those who are tall or have long torsos
Very cropped sweater - especially if you are tall.

This sweater is much more cropped than it looks in the photo. I sized up to a large and still encountered this issue. With the baggier sleeves + very cropped cut, it felt like pretty heavy and unflattering. Overall wasn't a great fit for me.
This is a really great crop sweater to wear with a skirt. Initially I thought it was a full length sweater but quickly improvised and got compliments all day
Cute fit, yet much more cropped than anticipated - even with high waisted pants. Loved the color!
This sweater is VERY cropped. I have a large bust, which doesn't help, but my mid-drift was showing when paired with 10" high waisted jeans.

This sweater is VERY cropped which I feel like you can't tell from the pictures. It's comfy and love the color, but even with high waisted jeans you will probably be showing skin FYI. Runs a bit small. I'm usually a small to M and the M just fits.

links_reviews_title: Love the knit, hate the length.
links_reviews_text: The colors in this sweater are beautiful and it is really well made. Unfortunately it is just too short to be functional. Even with high waisted jeans I still wouldn't have been able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: It was a cropped sweater so not a fan.
links_reviews_text: Did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: This was laughably large and unflattering
links_reviews_text: So I love a good oversize fit but this coat took that to a whole new level. It was boxy and just massive for a OS fit. There was no structure and made me look 2-3 times larger than reality -not great.
I wore this a few times over a tank on a warm day and long sleeve on a colder day. It was comfortable and warm! Would recommend!

I'm still not ready to give this coat back! I had very low expectations given it's a "one size fits all" but this is my favorite thing I have rented from this site!! It makes everything look super pulled together, is super warm, and has huge pockets! I'm in love!
I wished it was more structured... it felt a little grandma-y.

This jacket was perfect for a late February Monday. I paired it with a turtleneck otn boots and black jeans for a casual work outfit. Could easily be dressed down with blue jeans and sneakers. Super cozy and warm but not too hot. The shoulders are wide so they hung off of me but it looked fine it's just naturally a larger fitting coat.

This jacket was so comfy and warm. It doesn't have a zipper or buttons but was still really warm when I was wearing it during the winter in Chicago. Oversized, even for someone like me who generally wears a size 12/14. Great fit, I got lots of compliments on it.

It's huge, but I love it. It's so stylish and looks great over just about any outfit. I wore it over a dress to synagogue and over a pair of jeans and a white long sleeve top...I don't think I'll be sending her back anytime soon.
Living in New York and working in Manhattan, this coat was perfect. It made me feel like a fashionable diva. Wore a bunch of times

This was really large and costume-y looking. The flaps at the side were unexpected and made it look even bigger than it was. the material was thick and warm, but it felt like a winter kimono and wasn't flattering on me.
Wore this for a week and enjoyed it. Plus size so usually can't do one-size, but this worked perfectly. Will rent again

This sweater coat is perfect for throwing on and running out the door. It's definitely oversized but I wore it with leggings and a fitted sweater and it was fine. It's really warm but it doesn't close so that's something to keep in mind. Sad to return this!
Very cozy and warm. Felt like a cocoon, with pockets!

links_reviews_title: Big and cape-like, great for a cozy day and lots of pockets but could be too big for some people
links_reviews_text: I work events where the temperature is very cold inside, and this was perfect for that. I loved being able to throw this over my blazer at work when it got cold. There were four pockets and that helped a lot to carry my phone, pens, etc. Comfy and big without looking unprofessional. I'm a size 14/16 and it is one size fits all, so if you are smaller it might engulf you.

Adorable oversized jacket that has some lining so perfect for mid-fall days. It doesn't have buttons or any closure, so not good once it gets cold. Slouchy and so easy to throw on - it dressed up jeans and a tee perfectly.
It's definitely sparkly. The photos don't show all the silver thread running through it. It's as large as everyone says. Fun as a coverup to wear over your cocktail dress.

While I did get compliments on this jacket, it was just too warm to wear indoors, but definitely not an outdoor jacket either. It was super oversized on me and I'm a size 12, don't know how anyone smaller could pull this off. I don't recommend.
Loved this! Wore it at least a dozen times! Easy to throw on to instantly uplift a look! Work and play!

I loved all the tweed texture and big side pockets with buttons. It was soft on the inside and the cut slits on the side gave it comfortable and stylish ease. My con was the cut on the shoulders and upper arms. The style is like they tried to cut a cape and a coat into one piece of outerwear. It was very constricting, tight and I couldn't lift my arms properly. I wore it a few times to run errands because it's cute and I loved the big pockets, but since I couldn't really move freely, I had to return it.

links_reviews_title: love this- it was great for the holidays since it has some silver shine!
links_reviews_text: great for the holidays and easy to dress up with my normal black wardrobe! it indeed was over sized but I was fine for me- it 5 foot 7 inches!
This is a very large coat but its incredibly warm and very cute! Got so many compliments on it, perfect for everyday warmth :)

links_reviews_title: Very cute addition to my outfit
links_reviews_text: Very cute tons of compliments! Runs large and is bulky great for the winter and fall
Too big and bulky to be a cute oversized sweater coat

This jacket is extremely shapeless and overall just massive. I'm normally a size 12 but only 5/4" and I was swimming in this. BUT that being said, I ended up wearing it 3+ times because it was below zero where I live and this was comfy cozy but work appropriate and allowed me to stay cuddled in my "coat" all day. It is NOT flattering or sexy in anyway but if you're looking for a cross between a tweed jacket, a poncho and a scarf this is it.

links_reviews_title: Too big, even for the oversized lover
links_reviews_text: I exclusively wear lose fitting clothes, but this cardigan was MASSIVE on my frame. I would have liked it if I didn't feel like I was drowning in fabric.
It was a little big but really warm.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this to an event
links_reviews_text: Oversized for a size 0. Barely stays on my shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Stylish comfy pullover jacket - loved it!
links_reviews_text: Loose fitting, oversized jacket. Beware it doesn't zip or button in front, but its very thick and comfy. Received tons of compliments!
Runs large, comfortable, slits on side, not too warm.
Horrible fit and super heavy. Couldn't wear it.
Didn't realize it has slits up each side when I rented it. But it was very cozy and chic! Looked great with jeans and held up in cold NYC weather.

I was really excited about this. What isn't pictured is that there is a slit on both sides that give this a very triangular look. It looked good from the back, but from the front it looked really bad - very boxy and unflattering. It was comfy, but I didn't wear it out.
Very comfortable and cozy for cold weather.
Absolutely overwhelmed my frame and also has silver sparkly thread in it (not my style)

Surprisingly warm and easy to throw on over anything for a boho chic vibe. Definitely large but in an Olsen-twin way. Only downside is that the material of the shawl collar looks a little cheap. I'd rent again but not purchase.
Too large and long on my short arms. Didn't end up wearing it because the coat swallowed me. I'm petite and sad it couldn't wear because such a pretty piece!
Was not expecting the slits on the side to go up as far as they did. Overall, was a fun jacket for mid-autumn, but would not keep for regular use.
the fit was very oversized, arms didnt fit well and the sizing was off

This is a massive and heavy coat. It kept me warm at an outdoor concert in October in Colorado even without buttons or a zipper to fully close the coat. I loved wearing it but it seriously it is massive so keep that in mind if you don't like baggy/loose fitting.

links_reviews_title: Classic fit and color, fun zippers
links_reviews_text: Love love LOVE this coat. Wore it for a family trip to London and Paris. It's longer and warm but so easy to wear. The zippers on the sides are different and so fun too! I couldn't recommend more. I really liked the M size and it was great with a light sweater underneath!

I wore this coat for a trip to London and it was perfect. Great zipper and deep pockets (not zipped tho so make sure to have a purse!). I got so many compliments and it was the perfect weight for the weather. The black piping on the shoulders is gorgeous and the side zippers give it a little flair.

links_reviews_title: Everything I love in one jacket
links_reviews_text: This runs a little big, but it's also the style. I love everything about this. Great coverage in the back. The side zippers are so cool. It can be worn with workout clothes or to work. I'll definitely be keeping this one for a while.

links_reviews_title: People love this jacket, so many compliments from a diverse group of people almost everywhere I went
links_reviews_text: Medium weight, but still ok in 30 degree weather
Overall loved this coat I got so many compliments on it!!
Perfect coat to dress up or down warm and stylish

I loved this jacket online and then I loved it even more in person. It's streamlined, neutral, classy, a little edgy. What's not to like? I'm normally a S and got the XS because it's was the only size available and it fits fine, even with a sweater. It's slim and doesn't overwhelm. I think regular size or a size up or down would work.
I was so close to buying this jacket. It's my favorite quilted jacket I've ever worn and was sad to return it. Lightweight but still very warm. All around an awesome jacket!

links_reviews_title: Not a coat person but loved this!!
links_reviews_text: Oh how much I love unlimited for the few days in Dallas where I really need a coat -- and I can get one based on my week. I wore this for a few cold days and really loved it. Even my teenage girls complimented it on me. That's a good coat!!

links_reviews_title: It's simply the coolest. i get tons of compliments when i wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fits slightly baggy but that adds to the cool factor. The color is amazing. i think i'm going to purchase.
Super cute, a little on the big side but cozy for cold days.

I rented this for the week of Halloween and it completely exceeded my expectations. The color was vibrant in person and perfect for fall. The quilting and zipper details make it really unique and I received many compliments on it. The large pockets in the front were great for holding my phone or keys. It was simultaneously comfortably and chic. Plus it's always fun to discover new-to-me designers. It definitely is oversized. I wore my normal size at 8 months pregnant. If I wasn't pregnant, I would have sized down. Great pick, RTR!
Fits a bit larger than I expected, but I like the style enough to trade it for the Large instead of XL.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and perfect with crisp button down for winter
links_reviews_text: So many compliments, comfortable and great for work

links_reviews_title: Maternity and bump friendly at 25 weeks
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for some maternity holiday photos and the color is perfect for fall! The material is very forgiving and hugs curves well without feeling like compression. Pre pregnancy, I'm usually a XS/S depending on the brand. Ordered this dress in the small and medium and ended up wearing the small. Probably could have worn the XS because there was a little bunching in the back because small was just a tad too big. Length was mid-calf on my 5'3" frame and looked great with black booties!

In my 8th month of pregnancy and this dressed served me & my bump well! Very comfortable & stretched in all the right places. The color is different from my usual... lots of compliments. Wore with sandals, but could also be dressed up if wanted! :)
This dress was so comfortable and had the perfect stretch for 25 weeks pregnant. Material is great and very flattering I thought. My hubby loved it:)

links_reviews_title: Stretched over day, looked good if like an insta Star
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was okay, loose through the waist and stretched over the day. However was very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Liked it but didn't love it on me
links_reviews_text: Constructed of a somewhat heavy, synthetic, stretchy knit that can definitely accommodate a third trimester bump. I chose a size small as I didn't want it to be too clingy, but it's so stretchy that I think an XS would have worked. I'm only 5'1" so it was a bit of an awkward length on me. Since the material is kind of thick, it doesn't show every lump and flaw on your body.

Loving this at 30 weeks pregnant, I am all about body con but stretchy below the knee dresses. Thank god for RTR. This line runs a little big- pre pregnancy i would defo need a S for my size 6 frame but this pregnant M looks good. Wore to work with booties and a navy leather jacket and feel pretty cute! Great knit and love the on trend color, will rent again

I love this dress! I wore seamless underwear but it was easy for everything to show anyway. My strapless bra outline is pretty visible as you can see in the picture. Still, a gorgeous dress and tons of compliments. To minimize the effects of having everything show under the dress, I styled this with a chunky sweater.
Wore this 25 wks pregnant. So comfy. Really versatile with the style and color. Highly recommend
Has great shape without being stuffy. Color is gorgeous! Great for that tan on tan look.

links_reviews_title: This dress was worn on a regular weekend.
links_reviews_text: I loved the way it made my hips and butt look. Everything was beautiful about the fit of the dress. I think the only negative was that it was a bit long. I am 5'5 for reference. I also feel like if you have any lower belly fat whatsoever it will show but if you are really worried about it, I'm sure you can wear shapewear. I would rent again.

This dress is SO comfortable and can really be worn any season. I wore it mid winter and paired with a jacket & navy heels. It's tough finding cute clothes this far in pregnancy (32 weeks) but this dress is a gem! Putting my RTR unlimited on hold after this month and I'm so sad to miss out on cute outfits like this one!

Fita bug, I went with a Medium as I was 9 months pregnant and it was still roomy. Loved eating this though, was able to dress Down with a denim jacket and sneakers and dresses up with a white blouse underneath and kitten heels for work. Would def buy this!

links_reviews_title: This dress makes a great shape!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. Beautiful cut and shape. Loved the color with my amber jewelry and love the bell flare out shape it made at the claves. Met my company CEO in this dress and felt so sophisticated. Great stretch and thick material made it look very expensive. 5 months pregnant and it fit just right. 180lbs and 5'6"

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. Somewhat forgiving for a bodycon. Very easy to accessorize.
links_reviews_text: #bodycon #ontrend #camel

This is a great dress for all season. I love the color. The ribbed material makes it fitted in the right places. I was in between ordering size xs or s. I went with the small and it fit good. Will rent again. Would love to keep it.
Gorgeous color and fits like a dream!

I'm 5'3" and this dress was almost ankle length on me. I'm guessing it's supposed to be for taller folks. Also the arm holes are so big it wouldn't work with a bra without it showing, but with a jacket over no problem. Finally the waist fell around my hips, again, probably because I'm short. The material and quality are nice though!

Nice, fall-tone color. A bit too stretchy of fabric. A little too long for a petite (short waisted) gals. I’m top heavy and the dress extenuated that in a bad way. Does NOT hide cellulite... Overall fine - seems like it might serve tall/skinny gals best.
Nice caramel color, quality fabric and flattering silhouette. I'm 5'9 1/2" and the M regular hit me mid-calf, so it might overwhelm more petite frames. Otherwise, it's very pretty and I recommend!
Very comfy curve hugger great for dressing down. Fit nicely.

I absolutely love this dress! It is incredibly stretchy, which made it very comfortable for a long workday. It is also a really great length that made it appropriate for work, while still being very sexy and formfitting! I would definitely recommend it. The color is very true to the picture and you are sure to feel amazing in it! I will definitely rent this again!
Fun to wear once, but nothing spectacular. The color is nice but the fabric was a bit rough. I also wouldn't recommend for shorter gals because I got a bit of bunching in the torso.
Great work dress. Love the long midi length. Matches with lots of accessories and shoes. Would definitely rent again
I wore this dress at 35 & 36 weeks pregnant and loved it! It made me feel sexy and put together when I'm normally feeling quite heavy these days.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I rented it twice!
links_reviews_text: Should just buy this dress at this point - it's one of my faves! Fits beautifully and looks amazing on. Runs a litttttttle big but not enough to be noticeable.

links_reviews_title: cute and comfy but center band is oddly oversized and hits at weird place
links_reviews_text: center band is a different texture and weirdly jutted out away from my body instead of pulling in at the waist. i'm a standard size 8 and wore a medium, but would probably need to go down to a small next time? overall, still a cute look for work.
