links_reviews_title: Super comfortable with a vintage flare
links_reviews_text: The stretch material is comfortable, but not structured so just be mindful. The midsection seam hit me in the wrong place but I still loved the dress.
Looked lovely when I first put it on, half way through the night it was loose.
On its own this was a meh but I paired it with a long trench and loved it for a client dinner. Body con without being too revealing and didn't wrinkle all night.
This dress is perfectly fitted yet not tight. I love the neutral, warm peachy color, too.
Great fit and material!! Hugs in all the right places.

I didnt have any occasions coming up, had a spot open in my unlimited & stumbled upon this gem, just wanted to see what it looked like in person- i loved the color, fit, fabric is lovely thick knit- i wore it grocery shopping and running errands around town with my toddler. It was perfect.

The color and thick stretchy fabric made me feel so chic! I love the way it hugged my curves and had a flirty mermaid flare at the bottom. Beautiful structure. Only con for pregnant women is the visual look of the band at the waist - didnt quite hit the right spot on me. I probably could have worn a medium. (Pre preganacy im XS or S).

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! Want to keep it forever
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous- I love the color, fit, and nice material. I wore it to work but will wear on the weekend too. I dont want to return it!

This dress was beautiful and comfortable! Im only 5'3 so it was very long on me and wouldve looked better with heels or wedges, but we were walking a lot so flats it was. The sizing was perfect. Still a little loose on the waist and hips so some fabric bunched up but it wasn't too noticable. Really recommend for a simple and fun outfit! I would 100% buy this if it werent 300 dollars BUT thats why RTR is so amazing. :)

This is the perfect sweater dress that you can dress up or down and I adore the color. This is a super comfy fabric and isn't overly tight so there is is plenty of stretch if you are curvy. You will need to wear a racerback bra with it because the back is racerback. It hits a little bit longer on my legs since I'm 5'3 but I love the length. Overall such an amazing looking knit dress I can't wait to rent it again to wear with a little leather jacket and some ankle booties.

links_reviews_title: Love love love but runs a tad bit large and is very stretchy!
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing the small although i could have and it would still look great but some of the fabric bunched a bit because it was a tiny bit too big around the waist. I will be reordering in xsmall! Fyi i am 5'11, 133 lbs, size 34AA, 25 waist, 37 butt.
Chic dress that is simple yet will turn heads. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and easy for work
links_reviews_text: I felt chic and comfortable all day at work. The fit is very forgiving because it's so stretchy. I think I could have worn a xs or an s.

Loved this. There are so many details on this shirt to keep it from being boring, and I love how floaty and airy it is! Perfect for spring. Looks great tucked into pants, and the slightly billowy back gives it strong 70s vibes. A little sheer but nothing unmanageable.
Great fit. It gives a work outfit a highly elegant yet casual look
I love Rebecca Taylor work jackets and this one does not disappoint. It looks loved/used, but still works

Nice tweed jacket with pretty sleeve details. I would consider this bracelet length sleeves, not 3/4 length sleeves but not full length sleeves. It has hook and eye closures if you wanted to close the jacket. I would rent again for the fall. It is a pretty heavy tweed jacket, not really for the summer.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality and looks grown up
links_reviews_text: I'm always looking for nice tweed jackets to wear to work. This one definitely made me feel like a grownup. Fit is a bit boxy... didn't do much for my figure but I think it was fine for work. I rented the Rebecca Taylor Sleeveless Scallop Dress to wear with it (as pictured in the RTR app), but I don't think they looked good together on me, since the jacket covered most of the length of the dress. I ended up wearing it with black pants instead. The jacket was also much warmer than I expected; I didn't wear another jacket over it when I went outside.
Very beautiful! Definitely more blue than black but it doesn't matter. I use it for looking put together on zoom and Skype calls since I WFH.
So many compliments on this jacket. I wore it to work a couple of times and also wore it out in the evening with jeans. Really really lovely lots of compliments

This is the second time I rented this jacket. It looks great with a black skirt and black tight turtleneck underneath. It would fit better in the shoulders and length if it was a petite. If you are small framed size down.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket - adds polish to a pair of jeans and a t shirt!
links_reviews_text: fits true to size

I really liked the weight of this blazer. It is good for a fall day when it's too hot for a coat but too cold for nothing else. The black and white make it versatile and you can dress it up or down. The only thing I did not like was the eye hook buttons. I would have preferred regular buttons or none at all.
I wore it with black jeans and black T-shirt, and a pair of Grey boots. It looked both elegant and casual. Then I just changed for heels, and the whole look was more "business".
Nice jacket, one I received was a little tired
Loved this for work and received several compliments.
excellent coat goes well on back dress
This jacket is for colder climates. Folks in Texas in May doesn't work well.
I liked the pattern.
Goes well with a black dress or pants
I don't think I'd rent this again, but it was cute and served its purpose. Wore it out to a dinner at Soho House with a cropped leather moto jacket on top and sneakers.

The cut is really nice, I ordered up because I was worried about the length. It was not too short on me with tights. It was a little too big on me. I thought the huge collar looked very seventies and cool.

links_reviews_title: Chic little number that turned heads!
links_reviews_text: Not too short, super structured/little rigid, the COLLAR was an unexpected pleasant surprise! overall, loved this dress, little big in the waist but c'est la vie!
Wasn't a snug fit which I preferred. Unique and comfortable for a full day

links_reviews_title: Sherlock Holmes but make it fashion
links_reviews_text: This dress is fun and quirky! I was initially worried about the collar being TOO big and... it is. But it works! The fabric is thick and heavy and holds structure very well which makes this dress super cool. I wore it on a date and paired it with a mini white top handle bag and croc cowboy boots because why not. Very London chic, very Paris chic. The length was the perfect mini on a petite body (5'3) which is always a win! One note: the collar when it's all closed up felt kind of tight.

Love this dress. It has a cool fit that's flattering if you have a tiny waste. It's tight and really short and not that comfortable. I would wear it anyway, it's just so haute!! I wore it on a date and again at work. Maybe a little too short for work....
Great

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress so much! Great for everyday wear. Would absolutely rent again and again
links_reviews_text: I wear a 0 normally but it wasn't available; the 2 was totally wearable (and I think true to size) but the 0 would've been better.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear but wish I did.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear, however I wanted to so BAD! The fit on my body was amazing, the length was a different story. The dress was so short, that it barely covered my lady parts. Possibly in the winter wit some tights though!
Really cute dress but too short for me (5' 8" and wore a size 10). Would highly recommend for anyone a little shorter
I'm 5"8 and couldn't even wear this dress with tights. It was WAY too short. Don't even bother unless you're under 5"5

I'm glad I sized up per the other reviews. I'm usually a Size 6 and the 8 fit perfectly. Regardless of sizing it is a short dress, I'm not sure I would have been able to wear it earlier in the season without tights. Super cute, high quality and thick material, comfy!

links_reviews_title: dressed it down for day but dressy enough for night
links_reviews_text: Based on the previous reviews, I had sized up in this dress to a 4. Ultimately, I should have gone with the 2 as I had a lot of room in this dress. It didn't look big or baggy, only in the back could you tell that there was extra fabric/room. This dress is definitely for someone who has a narrow upper torso and smaller chest as the fabric does not stretch or give, it is quite stiff and will hold it's shape, which I personally liked. It was definitely on the shorter side, but I had worn with tights and chunky flat boots so it didn't look short. It is super cute and structured.

I love the collar and sleeves on this dress! Great material, I found it very flattering to my curves. It is super short, though (especially if you have long legs.) I ended up wearing it with my favorite jeans and boots!

links_reviews_title: Love the way it looked (on someone else)
links_reviews_text: Great, heavy material. Loved the oversized collar and buttons. Cons were the length (short even for me, I could not wear this to work) and the chest. There is no give. I may try to rent in a larger size- tbd!

This dress is beautifully made but is so incredibly short, I would imagine anyone over 5'3 or so would not be able to wear this out in public. It's basically a long shirt, did not even cover my bottom all the way (I'm 5'8 for reference). Such a bummer because it's very on trend and cute for fall.

links_reviews_title: Runs small! Collar is rather large.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this but the fit is weird. Collar is up by ears and it's super short. Nice fabric though!

I wore this coat for a day trip to NYC and it kept me warm all day! To be fair, I did have on a few layers underneath and it wasn't too cold out. This coat runs a bit large and I wish I got a size smaller. Other than that, I loved that there was a button to keep the coat closed and that there were pockets. I got a lot of compliments on this coat!
Back is black sweater like material
Oversized sweater jacket loved it compliments! Runs big but I like that oversized fit.
Comfy and chic, hit right at my knees. Only slightly itchy, would advise a long sleeve shirt under. Plus pockets!
Love the colors, its oversized which is fun, and just FYI it only has one button in the front so its not a coat you can wear alone in the winter. Its a layer piece IMO.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for winter and fall football games! Loved it and may just buy it!
links_reviews_text: A little bulky in it's fit, but that makes it super comfy!
Great for the cold weather and casual days visit family. Would rent this again. It was comfortable and looked nice with leggings and T-shirt's

I LOVED EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS COAT! I decided to go up in size because I really wanted it roomy! However after reading reviews I stuck to a 42. It was perfect! I wore it a few times. Running errands, girls night out, a luncheon. It was perfect in each setting. I will definitely rent this one again! I loved it!

links_reviews_title: One of the most versatile pieces I have rented ! Wore it almost daily on three week trip back east.
links_reviews_text: Matches everything - dress it up for evening / business meetings or down for weekend trip to the farmer's market -- bonus: it's also warm and cozy ... even made a good blanket on my red-eye flight.

links_reviews_title: Can be worn as a sweater or jacket. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: This is sweater jacket is super warm. It is an easy fit and is meant to be oversized so even if it is on the smaller or larger side it still looks great on. It doesn't feel like luxury yarns but looks the part.
Pretty color and heavy but nothing special
Loved this sweater! It's surprisingly soft and hangs perfectly for maximum comfort either open or buttoned up. The color is also gorgeous and adds a fun pop to a grey outfit.
This sweater is really soft and a great fit. Lots of compliments on the color
It's fall in Chicago! Perfect sweater cardigan to later or wear by itself. Wore this to work as pictured. XL is a nice oversize but could also wear L to be a bit more true to size look next time.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater in a bold color I normally wouldn't purchase.
links_reviews_text: I tend to only purchase clothes that are neutral (read: black) because I find I get bored of bold colors or patterns easily and the item goes unworn after a month. I styled this by not wearing another shirt and keeping it buttoned - was so cute & appropriate without cleavage even though I have a bigger chest. I even wore it to work!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, looked great with black jeans
links_reviews_text: I sized up to get a comfy fitting, wore it a few times as casual day wear.

Deep rich color, and fitted (i debated between XS and S and glad i picked the S, XS wouldn't have worked for me). However it's pretty basic and good for a one time rental but obviously not as special or luxe as other rentals on this site

Basically, it's everything you need in a sweater. It was comfy and warm. I liked the pop of color it gave me. I just took off one star because sometimes in bunched a little in the back instead of laying flat. Not a big deal, it may just not have been perfectly fitted to my body type.

I loved this cardigan! It's really good quality, thick and soft. I wanted to wear this without anything under it, but the neck line was just a little too low for work. I paired it with a white tee, jeans and vans. Definitely fits true to size.
Wore this for work and then for drinks afterwards. Wasn't a knock out, but was very soft and warm for a cold office

Pros: fun textured terry cloth fabric, vivid colors, soft inside Cons: runs small. Size up unless you like your sweatshirts to be skin tight Takeaway: perfect for vacation... or to just feel like you're on vacation!
This sweatshirt is so comfy and cute. The fit was perfect. It's terry cloth material, which I thought was different than anything I have in my closet. I just purchased one on Poshmark today!
It is terry cloth, and I sized up one knowing it would be smaller, but the sleeves were still short! Love the top though, and wore a curved hem tank under it.
True to size and great for casual wear
This is a funky shirt that got lots of compliments, but more importantly it was just fun to wear! Highly recommend it for a casual day activity piece.
I would not rent again
The inside is super soft and I was surprised to see that the outside was like a micro terrycloth. Cozy, casual, and bold. I wore this more times than I can count.
Didn't wear though it was a nice terry weight. Definitely looks like the picture but wasn't that appealing to my family so I skipped it
Sized up to a medium hoping for an oversized ... still fit small

links_reviews_title: didn't love the terrycloth and didn't read close enough to notice that's what I was getting.
links_reviews_text: cute colors and cute fit, but overall just not for me.
Sweat shirt with funky print that is very on trend

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and cozy sweatshirt while still cute!
links_reviews_text: Bright and fun colors, it's a terry cloth material.

It felt a little small for a medium, I should have ordered the L for the oversized look. The outside is a cool terry cloth material. Perfect for the airplane going to and from vacation! I wore it with ripped jeans too. Love it
Perfect for relaxing. Runs a bit small - XL fit me just right, not oversized at all.

links_reviews_title: Love the Spring floral pattern on this blouse!
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS, the sleeves can be a little fussy if you work with your hands alot at work, but I would rent again for a girls night out, or date night because it is a beautiful blouse. Semi sheer but I was able to get away with just a good nude bra underneath.
Rented with Unlimited and am tempted to buy, but I've worn it so many times... ready for something new!! Pretty pattern, flattering cut and very versatile!! Loved this blouse!!!

Really like this top! With the elastic in the wrist, you have the flexibility to wear the sleeve at your wrist or up above your elbow for a 3/4 sleeve style, which is what I opted for. The top is a touch to sheer to wear without a tank underneath. I do think it runs a bit big. RTR recommended I wear size 44, but I think one size down would have been better.
I wore this shirt a few times. It was good for work, or hanging out with friends, even wore it to Disneyland. I felt it was flattering :)
Fun to wear beautiful top. Fit was perfect and the material was elegant.

I thought it was okay. The sleeves are a little much so I added a cardigan. Would be cuter in the Spring. I had a pair of red jeans on and it was cute, but felt the blue was more appropriate for Fall/Winter

I really had fun with this look, pairing it with flared jeans for a 70s vibe. I went with the size RTR suggested and it fit well, but I think this top is also very forgiving. My only con is that the stitching is loose on one sleeve, so that side kind of kept falling down my wrist, covering my hand with the sleeve at times.

links_reviews_title: Perfect top to feel put together!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this top! I was debating buying it, but I'll definitely plan to rent it again. It made me feel very chic all day at work and the elastic arms and torso were perfect so that things aren't too short on taller girls. Loved it!
This blouse is amazing! Flowy, floral and perfect for fall!!!
I tend to shy away from anything hitting my waist since it's where I'm widest & have a slight belly. This is SOOOO flattering!
Fits me really well. Perfect for everyday & vacation!

I got this shirt to wear to work. I got the recommended size and it fit perfectly! Not to tight on my chest or shoulders (I'm a 36E). The sleeves were a little long like others mentioned, but they have elastic, so I just pushed them up to my forearms. It's a little sheer, so I suggest a tank or a nude bra underneath. Would definitely rent again.
I absolutely loved this blouse. It is so cute and makes you feel put together but not too over the top. It's comfortable and I might have to buy it. At the very least i am renting again!
So cute and flattering
This blouse is fabulous! Interesting neckline, flattering silhouette, fun details. Such an easy upgrade to a pair of jeans. Non-stop compliments on this one.

This was such a nice statement top to wear with jeans for the daytime. Waist tie is flattering when worn at your actual waist, and the sleeves have elastic around the wrists. Sleeves are long and can get caught or messy. Colors are vibrant.

The only downside to this is that the sleeves were long and completely covered my hands and fingers. It's very comfortable and I imagine would look good on a variety of shapes. The cut is forgiving and it has an elastic drawstring. This would look good with denim and a cute wedge. I paired it with the Grey Bedford Zip Satchel by Rebecca Minkoff.
I wore this to work and then for an evening work function. I received lots of compliments and LOVE this blouse. If it wasn’t so expensive I would buy it for sure!
Love this top with skinny jeans & even a cardigan
Pretty, fit nice, flows. A bit Boho.
This blouse was great! Looked great with jeans, a bit oversized and very feminine looking.
loved the romantic sleeves
SUCH a cute and fun top!!! Fit great
super cute- very flattering and flowy. basic top that can be worn by itself or paired with a cardigan, blazer, sweater... sleeves are fun and add dimension to the blouse.
Runs big so you can size down, very flowy.
Blouse was beautiful - colors and fabric are great. The cut was flattering, and covered my growing bump (2nd trimester).

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous style/loved the sleeves but too small
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of this shirt, the sleeves made me feel feminine and it was exactly my style; however ran a bit small for me. The elastic made me feel self-conscious in my belly, which stuck out. Likely needed a size up, but this was as high as they went. Also, this garment smelled REALLY FUNKY.
So big I couldn't wear it. Size down at least one size. But the fabric is very pretty and it would be lovely for everyday/night.
Loved this top. Super flattering fit, nice print, and nice materials.

links_reviews_title: Work or weekend, great for both.
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments wearing this to work with dark jeans. It creates a nice waist while being a loose oversized look. I probably could have sized down, but I like my shirts to drape. The bell sleeves I thought would be a pain at first at work because I type, but there is elastic so you can push it up your arm and it stays in place out of the way, while also looking stylish. Cute print!
This top is very unique, flattering and versatile. I would definitely buy it if it were cheaper.
Enjoyed wearing it. A little low in the front so had to wear a bandeau. Very comfy
I absolutely LOVE this top! I want to wear it daily, it will be in my closet for a while.
This shirt has a great print and fun sleeves. Extremely comfortable. Casual but professional.
Just falls beautifully and the sleeves are gorgeous! Wore it twice in one week-both times out to dinner with friends.
Loved everything about this shirt! Received so many compliments
This top was a great fit and high quality. I can't say it was special enough to purchase, but LOVED it for day to day wear.
Loved this top for work! Very cute and comfortable. Sizing was pretty true to size. Could have probably sized down but overall great top!

links_reviews_title: This is a great top if you are invited to a party with a Bolshevik Revolution theme.
links_reviews_text: Fabric and pattern are nice enough, but it's cut so wide that I really felt like "peasant" was taken to an extreme. Sleeves are absurdly long. Very blousy. Extremely unflattering on a pear-shaped body.
The cut was flattering & not to low. Cute pattern and the tie at the waist is a nice detail. The only thing I didn't love was the exaggerated long sleeves-they kind of drug across everything.
This jacket was both thicker and baggier than I expected. It was warm and I liked the material, but it just made me feel kind of frumpy. Maybe would be better on someone taller.
I have recently lost 80 pounds and am trying to figure out my size. This was a little big for me, but comfortable. I appreciated the lining and fabric quality. Another beautiful dress.
I love that this dress is a bit heavier material. It fits true to size and super comfortable. Lots of compliments on it!
I rented this for a meeting where I wanted to feel confident and comfortable. Totally worked! It's classic, subtly sexy, and so easy to wear. Love!
This dress was classy with a splash of sass. Fits well, was comfortable, lots of compliments. The material has a lot of give.

Great fit and weight to this dress, and I loved the front slit to give it a sexy flair. The description says metallic gray flowers, which they are NOT. The flowers are the same nylon fabric and a little pixelated, which would be my only criticism of this dress.
Great length below knee, very flattering. Thick material. Received lots of compliments

I wasn't sure if I loved this dress when I first tried it on but after pairing with tights and boots I really liked it. It is perfect for work, stretchy, heavy and warm material. Great for cold months.
While the dress is made well- and the fit was ok, the dress looked matronly on me. I didn't wear it.
The dress fit great, looked great and was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I received a number of compliments on my winter wedding attire.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, and very flattering, stretchy material. This piece was versatile enough to also wear for a work event later in the month. True to size.
This dress was perfect for a winter wedding. It was just perfect & I got lots of fun compliments!

This dress is much heavier than it looks because there is an under layer. The dress itself is conservative and the long sleeves make it ideal for cooler evenings/seasons. It tucks in a bit at the waist and is very slimming/makes me appear taller than I really am. PLUS it has a lower thigh/knee-high leg slit on the left side that makes it a younger fit and balances against the grandma-esque floral design. Great for events where you prefer some understated elegance and something that leans a bit more casual (e.g. work, dinners/dates)
Super comfortable and professional. Only issue was big slit down side of leg. Fixed that problem by wearing tights

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a work party.
links_reviews_text: The dress was fitted with some stretch. It was a heavier material than expected but that was a nice perk due to it being winter in STL. Only downside for me was length. I’m 5’7 and the dress was a good amount below the knee so it just hit at a weird spot. The side ruching was nice for drawing attention away from the tummy and the belt portion was adjustable. Overall great dress and the slit in the front made it a little more fun

I thought the dress was just so so when I put it on. I ended up pairing it with an open back black blazer and ankle booties to make it a little more my style. It was a beautiful dress but probably outside of my normal wheel house.

links_reviews_title: Flattering simple look with cute pattern
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed this dress. Wore it a business meeting. There is a slit on one side but for my industry it was ok and didn't go too high (in fact I still was able to wear Spanx that go to mid thigh with this dress) The mesh fabric made it slim fitting but flattering, and it breathes really nice. Loved the grey floral pattern on the black background, definitely made this dress stand out a bit.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an evening outdoor wedding and it was perfect. Kept me warm, but not too warm, after the sun went down. The material is heavy (but not hot), thick, wrinkle resistant, and lays beautifully on the body (forgiving!). I am 5'8" and the length hit me below the knee and the sleeves were a true long and went to the wrists. There is an adjustable tie around the waist that is easily used even during wear. The neckline is on the higher side, but the shape and small slit on the leg made this dress sexy yet sophisticated. I got compliments all night and felt super comfortable. This dress seems versatile for many occasions. In my opinion it runs true to size, but if you get a backup I would size down as it is a stretch material and very forgiving. I would buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazingly comfortable and made the night memorable.
links_reviews_text: Fitted well all around.
I feel like the dress kind of swallowed me up- just too much dress for my smaller frame. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this, can't wait to wear it.
links_reviews_text: RL is always good for my big shouldered hourglass figure, and this dress is no exception. The fabris is sturdy and forgiving yet body hugging and flattering. I am 61, so it had to be understated and not too sexy as wel; works so far. I will try it at work next week and see how it holds up during the day for comfort. But so far this one looks like a winner, and might be a purchase! Going to try it with black tights, low heels.

I probably should've ordered a size up, but that's me not the dress. Because it was a bit too form fitting for work, I work a short-waisted black cardigan (dressy one, no buttons) with it and received many compliments. I choose sheer black tights and short gray boots. It's a bit longer, but for work it was perfect.

The fit was extremely flattering, I loved the material. Like other reviewers described, it fit really nicely and there were multiple layers so it was great for a winter business occasion. I felt like I was dressed my best, but also was super comfortable for all day meetings.
This designer runs about a size small, so the 8 fit perfect. I received lots of compliments on this dress. It is really heavy - so very appropriate for cold weather events.
This dress is heavyweight. So much fabric. I was surprised. Yet, the dress fits well and hugs the body. Perfect for a night out or a cocktail party.

Nice day to night outfit. I wore this to work and then a work cocktail event afterwards. It was warms on a very cold fall day. I did not like that it wasn't structured, but it did fit well. It shows imperfections so I would recommend wearing shape wear underneath.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a conference. Was flattering and very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Easy, peasy to wear. Comfortable fabric with sufficient heft to flatter.

PROS The fabric was thick for Washington's incoming cold weather. I forgot my winter coat home, so it was perfect to get me in and outdoors for an evening Happy Hour. Great length for work. The detail of this pattern was so classy. CONS -None- HIGHLIGHTS The belt was a surprise. I love the slit on the thigh. Again, great for work and even a better transition piece for an evening out on the town.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress with a fun slit
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress for work. It's double-lined. I also loved that the neckline was very conservative since the slit was a bit high for work. I wore this several times!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the event I was attending that evening.
links_reviews_text: Could almost wear the 6 but opted for the 8's looser fit. Fabric was comfortable and dress fit well.

links_reviews_title: Super great dress for cool days when you need to have an upscale look
links_reviews_text: This is a classy dress yet feels comfy when you put it on. I was initially concerned about the wrap style as that does not typically work with my small frame and small chest. I was so excited when I saw how the wrap has a loop that you can adjust and I didn't have to worry about the wrap falling down.

links_reviews_title: Draping is a bit odd, but otherwise loved this dress
links_reviews_text: The draping/ fabric on top is a little awkward, but it feels really luxurious, fits comfortably, and is NOT a true wrap dress, so you can wear to the office (or wherever) without fear of flashing anyone.

links_reviews_title: It fit great with the adjustable waist. Wore to a funeral perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly was very comfortable loved the adjustable waist
I added this one to my rent again list. Loved the sophistication of this dress. Add to it comfort and flattering and it makes for a great rental.

links_reviews_title: True to size, but not at all flattering.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear.
The slit may be a little high on the thigh for work if you are on the shorter side (I'm 5'4"). Very pretty and comfortable. Would rent again for a night out.
Very flattering. Nice to wear something long fit a change great with boots. Heavy lining very warm would not rent past April

links_reviews_title: Lovely and easy breezy to wear
links_reviews_text: Nice change up for basic black. It's an easy to wear, moves-with-you cut that doesn't disappoint. Below the knee and covers all the right places for a professional setting. Would rent again
Easy and flattering dress. However it's very long for a petite person. Can't definitely wear as a midi but it may be better as knee length
Got this dress for work but the very deep slit in the leg made this one unwearable.
Cute dress but it totally engulfed my petite frame
Loved this piece. I ended up having to wear a sticky bra or no bra but that was fine with me! Fun, flirty and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Ran a little big
links_reviews_text: Got this outfit for vacation in Europe. It ran a tad big but the straps are ties so I adjusted. It also got super wrinkled but overall I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my own Bridal Shower and it was great!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for an outdoor shower in June and I was not too hot in the jumpsuit! You can tie the sleeves as tight as you want, which helped keep the jumpsuit from falling down.
I feel like I've rented every thing on RTR and this is my absolute favorite - rent it you will feel like a goddess!!!

Fits just like the model - though it is a zip back, the smocking makes it a teeny bit roomier. I am a true zero and found the 0 to have a generous fit. I think this one is best for smaller busts. I am 5'9" and the length was great with flats. It does wrinkle easily, but that is to be expected given the material. I loved this!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this jumper after a long day at the beach. This was easy to put on, beautiful color and very light weight.

links_reviews_title: Loved this item. Very cute and comfy to wear
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size.

links_reviews_title: Adorable jumpsuit for every day where
links_reviews_text: Although it looks big, it is very flattering. It was a little long on me but overall great fit
this runs slightly large but the elastic top made it work ...cool comfortable dress it up or down perfect for summer.

links_reviews_title: Cute for a date night and for a night out with my girlfriends.
links_reviews_text: Very cute jumpsuit. Comfortable to wear. Only negative is it is a tad sheer so I wasn't comfortable wearing it to work.

links_reviews_title: I paired this with statement earrings and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It is see through! Plan accordingly for under garments.
Beautiful colt and Iran is spot on. Fabric wrinkled even with all over steaming. For that reason, I couldn't wear it.
It's a pretty piece but ended up not wearing, just wasn't my style.
liked the fit of the jumpsuit but it was pretty sheer. even with nude underwear it was visible. also wouldn't want to wear a strapless bra with this but was too see through to go without one.

I love jumpsuits. This one was ok. I liked the top part a lot, but the top part mixed with the looseness at the bottom made me feel like a little girl. Almost a diaper-like effect... not great. And it was every so slightly short in the crotch.

links_reviews_title: Cute but pants are see through
links_reviews_text: This was a cute jumpsuit and I loved the tie detail at the shoulders. I have a long torso and didn't have any problems. The inseam is short so I had to wear flats. The pants are not lined so be careful. Even my nude underwear showed through. I ended up just wearing a pair of knee length pantyhose instead of underwear because otherwise everything was visible. Fits true to size on the looser side. My measurements are 35-25-37 and the 2 was fine. Taller girls with longer legs may find the pants to be too short/more like culottes.
Fit was true to size. Ending up not wearing. Not really flattering and not my normal style. Good quality.
Cute dress but unfortunately there was no lining and I felt it was too see through to wear to work
Super cute for vacation - I wore it as a cover up for a one piece swimsuit. Would recommend!

I love how I could mix and match this with many of my tops. This skirt is just the perfect size, it shows some leg to the point you feel sexy but now too much you feel exposed. Love how flowy it looked when I walked! Definitely rent it for a summer get away!
Got many compliments. I wore it with matching top. I needed to wear my backup size in the skirt. Material wrinkles easily so it needs to be steamed or ironed.

I wore this skirt multiple times. Some with a cute crop or others with a band tee. I received many compliments. I loved sparking the conversation of conscientious clothing. I would recommend this skirt.

Has two buttons inside the band for the wrap part so the size is slightly adjustable. It didn't wrinkle too bad throughout the day but did need to be re-tied a few times as it would get loose. Wouldn't recommend for a windy day!

Rented both this skirt and the matching top to wear as a set, both arrived new with tags, which was nice. I'm generally a medium in that style of sizing so that's what I went with and it fit well. It was a little tight but not an uncomfortable or unflattering amount. Both the skirt and the top have two button holes so you can slightly adjust the size of the waist. The button is primarily what secures the skirt in place, not the wrap tie, but if you needed to adjust bigger or smaller than the button holes, it seems like it could be safety pinned pretty easily. The skirt is super cute for summer, very lightweight and flowy (I wanted to be twirling around in it) and I love the lemon pattern, it's simple but cute. The fabric is slightly shear, so plan to wear nude or white underwear with it to make sure it's not noticeable. I wore it out to breakfast with a friend with some white birks to keep it more casual, but it could definitely be dressed up with heels and some simple accessories, or kept fairly casual. I like that the skirt and top can be worn together as a set but are also cute and complete enough on their own to be worn with other pieces as well. Would definitely consider renting again!!

This skirt is comfy and lightweight but not see through. I wore it with the matching top but it would be cute with a different top too. There's a hidden button inside the waistband with a smaller or larger option for the button hole. Highly recommend for a summer event!

When I tried this on I immediately thought how I want to buy it! I tried it on with a black tank, white tank, orange color and dark green. All of them looked AWESOME so it was honestly hard to choose. I ultimately went with Green since it's Fall however you could switch up the color tops to wear with it for the seasons, it's just the right length. I normally wear medium (size 8-10 jeans) and I got the large and it fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: This skirt was perfect for adding a summery flair to work outfits
links_reviews_text: A detailed ruffle and great colors!

Such a cute skirt. There are two buttons to pick from on the waist, which help create the perfect fit. Wore this on vacation in Hawaii and it was perfect. You could pair it with a nude or black tank, or even a bikini top. I'm considering buying this- rent it!
Shows off waistline!
Fits great! Super comfortable. Paired with a casual black body suit and really liked the look.
The print is great and the cut is flattering. I'd say it runs small, I typically wear size 4 and the M was pretty tight. Recommend wearing it with a peach colored body suit.
Didn't end up wearing because the fabric was very sheer

links_reviews_title: Very warm & cozy. Not to be worn if you want to show off your figure. Color is unusual and fun.

links_reviews_text: Super cute interesting color
This jacket is so warm and cuddly and I want to wear it constantly. It matches 0% of what I own, but I don't even care.

links_reviews_title: Would buy. Felt like wearing a cloud!!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on how iridescent the orange appeared in the light and how cute this coat was. This is the warmest coat ever and I'll be renting it again!!

links_reviews_title: I really enjoyed this jacket and seriously considered keeping it
links_reviews_text: This has the funkiest hood ever. It's fun and perfect for a rental.
I love this coat! If you have a "cool" style, then it's a must have!
There is almost no variation in color on these sweatpants. They are basically white with a tint of blue. They don't look anything like the photo. The fit is great though.
These were perfect for lounging around and still looking stylish!

These are just cute, everyday sweatpants. They have a typical sweatshirt/sweatpant feel. They look and feel a little like pajamas as opposed to cute "going out" or "errand running" comfies. They are very high waisted.
These pants are exactly as they look--they are perfect, slouchy cotton pants perfect for lounging around the house. They are a lighter linen-type fabric that breathes well and easily relaxes.
These pants are cozy everywhere but the waistband. It kind of dug into my hips and stomach.. I suggest sizing up if you're curvy.
so comfy utterly in love with these joggers
I love that these are high waisted and i can easily wear with a cropped top.
These aren't supper flattering and I really recommend sizing down
I got these to wear on vacation for a long plane flight. They were very unattractive. I wore them for comfort, but I would not want to wear again. Sloppy
Loved this outfit, just like the picture! Super comfy!

I wore these to babysit my nephew's. They were very cozy for a fun winter indoor day. I was able to move around comfortably. Did they run somewhat big. I wasn't able to wear them in public as they were somewhat frumpy on me.
This runs big. Very baggy in the crouch area, and quite unattractive. You also need to be tall to pull this pant off, won't work on short gals. Pattern is so/so in person. Will not wear.

I should have gone for a small as the sleeves were a bit short. I liked the color and fit (besides sleeves) but it was really itchy. If I had a bigger size I would have put a shirt under it to help. My friend who knows a lot about clothes was raving about the quality of the sweater.

I accidentally ordered this in two sizes too large, so it was hard to judge it specific for me. I really like the color, although I wouldn't say there's anything special about the top. Good for an every day option.

I can handle a bit of itchiness. I had to remove this sweater within 5 seconds. I guess you could make it work if you wore a long sleeve shirt underneath. It's absolutely beautiful and stunning but it's going right back. I'm super sad because when I saw it I wanted to purchase just because of the beauty.

The sweater was long enough in the arms and wasn't too baggy or tight in the body. Would look great with denim or dress it up for work with a skirt or dress pants. Wish I could have actually wore it but sadly it was damaged.
Cute color, nice fit. So terribly itchy I couldn't wear it, even with a camisole underneath. Bummer!

links_reviews_title: Was cute easy sweater for work.
links_reviews_text: Looser fit. Fun deatils on the sleeves.
Cute sweater, wore it to work. Beware it's super itchy
Great color and awesome style with the bell shaped sleeves. Sizing was spot on. Only bummer was it was SO ITCHY. By the end of the day I could not wait to get it off.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater but not my favorite.
links_reviews_text: The neck is extremely tight. Difficult to put on.

links_reviews_title: A trip to St. Louis, MO
links_reviews_text: I wanted something comfortable for the frigid weather we were about to experience going to St. Louis. The color is really a beautiful and soft pink which can be worn with many skin and hair colors. The sleeves are just the right size of being a little oversized. It is slightly itchy but I took care of that by wearing a tank under the sweater which I do regularly to help keep the core warm.
I loved the sweater- received many compliments. But definitely itchy- would definitely recommend wearing a cami underneath

Unfortunately, I didn't check to see if this was made of wool, and it is. I have an allergy to wool and I can't even wear it with an undershirt. If you're not sensitive to wool, rent this sweater. It's great for everyday with a pop of light pink to brighten a winter day.
cute color, but it's itchy so i had to wear an undershirt
This is great for everyday. I wore it to the movies with cut off jeans and again to work with more tailored jeans. Only downside is it's a little itchy.
Soooo itchy!

links_reviews_title: Great color and fit, but itchy
links_reviews_text: I am normally a medium in tops, but got this in large for length (I have a longer torso) and am glad I sized up. Great soft pink color and stylish fit, but as others stated it is quite itchy. I wore and got lots of compliments, but I wouldn't want to own this.
Sweater was too itchy so I didn't wear it, but the Medium did fit.
Great sweater, very comfy and not too oversized. The color is great too!

links_reviews_title: Great, easy to throw on sweater. A little itchy but not unmanageable.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves 'bell' a bit - so it does widen you.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater but not worth it
links_reviews_text: The sweater is itchy :(

links_reviews_title: Super cute, perfect color, little itchy
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this sweater. Just wish it wasn't itchy from the wool but it's ok. Was hoping it was a softer wool. Love the sleeve detail, it's more subtle than the picture of the model. Considering purchasing.

links_reviews_title: It was a cute shirt but was very itchy.
links_reviews_text: I had to wear another underneath to make myself comfortable. I do not think I would rent this piece again
Really loved this sweater. It was a bit scratchy, but the color and texture was beautiful.
A bit itchy but with a tank underneath it's doable. Loved the color and the unique sleeves. Fit perfectly!
Cute sweater with torso section that fit just right, but the sweater was itchy. Would definitely recommend a long sleeve under it if you're going to wear it.
The sweater was super itchy. I also expected the fit to be much baggier based on the photo.

links_reviews_title: Cute bulky sweater but too itchy
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size and is on trend with this winter's chunky sweaters. However it is very scratchy wool and even though I wore an undershirt it was still uncomfortable and very coarse around the neckband. Likely won't wear again.
Even with a long-sleeved shirt underneath, the sweater was so itchy I couldnt wear it.
Material was way to itchy for me. Otherwise, nice color and style. I was sent a large, but normally run medium and this was definitely oversized on me.
So incredibly itchy. Even with a tank under it the itchiness of the sleeves is unbearable. The sweater is so cute but not a good option.
This sweater was very warm, comfortable, and flattering. I agree with the other reviewers that the material is very itchy, but if you can get past that, it's great!

Cute sweater, nice color and true to size but this sweater is VERY ITCHY! I wore a tank underneath and could still barely stand it. I had to change into my gym shirt halfway through the workday because it was unbearable. I did like this sweater, but due to the itch, I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and then dinner, good work to evening sweater.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and the sweater was pretty cute altogether, but the fabric was very itchy.
Very itchy. Didn't end up wearing because it's felt too hot and scratchy. Pretty color though and fit was good through body.

links_reviews_title: The double breasted style made for an odd fit
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the fit of this coat nor the cut. It was warm enough for me to be warm on an evening in the high 30's. But also so tight that I couldn't fit a thicker sweater under it. The double breasted look made it boxy. And the hem wasn't very crisp (it bagged/sagged in places). That said, I thought it looked cute unbuttoned so that's how I wore it for the most part. But it's going back after a week.
Received tons of compliments in the BEAU. Will definitely rent and purchase if it ever goes on sale! Very light coat and extremely warm. Wore this in 30 degree weather and was fine. Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: The best jacket for a BRIDE
links_reviews_text: This jacket is so thick and warm. It was 35 degrees the day of our rehearsal and then the same the next night! So I got my use out of this jacket! The button popped off of it but other than that great jacket! Recommend it for any winter brides perfect shade of white ordered 3 jackets from RTR to get a true white jacket!
So flattering and paired it with a dress rental. I got a lot of compliments it is so soft and comfortable
Warm coat that's a fun transitional color. Ran true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect winter coat for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I rented this outfit and felt so glamorous all day. Highly recommend!
This coat is stylish, soft, warm and perfect for petites. I am 5'4" tall and the sleeves fit perfect as well as the length.

This is one of my favorite RTR rentals. I'm only 5'3", but the length was perfect as was the fit through the shoulders. It's such a pretty coat, and the material is unique and seems durable. I will definitely rent this again. I wish I could buy it!
Beautiful coat! I loved it. But I did not wear it because it was too large.
This coat is divine. Feels so soft and so luxe on top of being very warm. Got compliments every time I wore (which was a lot). Have been putting off returning it bc I love it so!
It fit correctly, just very large and very long and very heavy. I was so excited about the idea of it - just not for my short body.

links_reviews_title: This coat is elegant, beautiful, warm and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This is a roomy size large for me which I love because in addition to wearing it to my party I am going to wear it to several other activities layered over a sweater for cold weather. It is chic and dresses anything up. I think I may buy this coat!

I thought this jacket was really pretty and very different from typical furry coats you saw. It felt very elegant and the white color offered a crisp winter option. Would probably rent again! Fits slightly large so if you're between sizes, go smaller.
This was fun to wear. Warm and heavy. Luxurious feeling.
Wore for my rehearsal dinner and wedding, cake new with tags. So soft and perfect

Very soft white synthetic fur overcoat that doesn't shed or leave fuzz on dark clothing. Has pockets! Very warm and on the heavier side, kept me warm in 30 degree weather. I usually wear a S, but wore the M for a oversized feel and to fit sweaters underneath. Loved it so much!
nice coat - loose button

links_reviews_title: My husband says it makes me look "hot". When do you say that about a jacket
links_reviews_text: Love it! I would prefer another set of buttons, but do love it
Such a beautiful sweater. So great for in between seasons.

Gave me serious overprotected dark child remix vibes in the best way possible. The detail was beautiful and the lace was thicker than I thought it would be. In the end, too short in the torso for my taste. A tiny bit sheer, wearing a red bra underneath in photo. Truly a cool piece I wish I felt more comfortable in.
Love love loved this sweater. Felt great on and got lots of compliments.
Sweater was cute but a bit bulky
This top is great for spring. Wears like a sweatshirt but elevated way beyond. Beautiful details. Lots of compliments.
I actually wore this sweater backwards so the zipper showed in front and then over a maxi dress. Was perfect for a cool spring day. Loved the appliqué flowers for more of a standout look.
Comfortable fabric
Perfect to spice up a casual weekend outfit. So comfortable and flattering and the detailing on the sweater is amazing.
Fits well. Classy. Great for work. Got several compliments.

Very sweet cute little sweater. A little in the bulky side because of the flowers so a little difficult and bumpy under a coat in the sleeves. I loved this otherwise. It was so cute warm. Silky inside lining very comfortable and warm. It came a little dingy white but I washed it and hung dried and it came out beautifully. It is on the shorter side. I usually wear a small but I'm glad I chose XS in this one. It has a fitted waistband and and sleeves so it is great for petites. Wore this multiple times
This sweater I wore to a winery. The flowers are 3D and are sewn onto sweater. Zippers up back of neck. It fits true to size. A tad bit short. Could be dressed up or down.
I went with the XS for this and glad I did! I usually wear a small - size down. Loved the fit. The lace detail was adorable and feminine. Great for work. Very pretty!
Lots of compliments. Wore it to Christmas mass.

This is a great sweater- very unusual with fantastic detail. I wore it to work with dress pants but it could also work with jeans on the weekend. It has a mock turtle neck- the only part I did not love.

I wore this for the second time today and I got soooo many compliments on it. It really was gorgeous. Although it's not usually cool enough to wear this...when it's calling for a cold snap I will rent again.

Gorgeous sweater with intricate details. Easy fit and relatively heavy. Perfect for cooler climate. I wore with black leather leggings while shopping in Tokyo. Love the gold zipper in the back. The neck is snug but it was ok for me. I will probably end up being this later.

I loved this sweater! It felt fancy enough to wear to an after-work event, and casual enough to work to work - the perfect day-to-night piece. High quality fabric and lace, with a fun gold zipper in the back. The neck was a little tight, but I got used to it after wearing it for a bit. I sized down which was a good choice since it's a little baggy. Definitely thought about buying this one as I got so many compliments when wearing it and felt it classed up my whole look for the day.

I really loved the knitting on this sweater- it's not too delicate to be nervous about, but not tacky either. I wished it was just a little longer, I didn't think the cut was super flattering for my stomach. But overall it's really cute and a great winter white! I really liked the collar and roomy sleeves too.

links_reviews_title: White on white with particular petal placement
links_reviews_text: This is a very nice long sleeve light weight sweater. There a two petals that lay directly a top your breast point. Didn't notice till the sixth hour of wear, because all in all, the lightweight sweater looked amazing.
Fit well, received lots of compliments
This sweater works as long as your wearing something more form fitting on your bottom half. I'd recommend sizing up, but that might just look even bulkier. A bit difficult to get on and off.
Looked lovely for Christmas Eve Dinner. Casual but not to informal. Pretty.
So cute, but definitely worn. Some of the flowers were loose, about to rip.
Cute sweater.
It looked amazing on, it fit well and I felt great in it. I will for sure be renting this again.

links_reviews_title: great to dress up a pair of jeans.
links_reviews_text: True to size, really nice detail which elevated it from a being a basic sweatshirt.
Received so many compliments on this sweater. It's perfect for any time of the year. Obsessed!

links_reviews_title: Cute top not the greatest fit for me (athletic build)
links_reviews_text: The lace work on this top is really cute but it just wasn't the most flattering fit for me.
fit was perfect, details were beautiful
Great sweater; loved the details. Wore on a double date to a casual brewery with jeans and booties. Worked perfectly!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR pieces
links_reviews_text: I love this top. I have rented it three times and have gotten tons of compliments every time. I was nervous it would be a little overwhelming for my size (I am very petite, 4'11) but it doesn't overwhelm at all.
Definitely unique. Dressed up for work, or casual with jeans, people stopped me to say how much they loved it!
Very cute & fit was perfect. I received a lot of compliments. It kept me comfortable & fashionable. The flower pom poms were a little loose in some areas but I do not think it was noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Runs slightly small but very comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: Not entirely necessary to go up a size but recommended if you're busty
Great fit -- will rent again. Detailing makes a plain concept interesting and more versatile
Did not end up wearing. I did not like where it hit me oh my waist. Heavy sweater. Great transition to spring for March in Ohio.
Great top, so pretty, but the knit turtle neck picked up every spec of makeup and dirt so made it unwearable for more than half day. Still was worth it bc compliments galore for 1/2 day.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: It's such a cute sweater. Not very warm but the detail is beautiful

This is one of the most flattering and comfortable tops! While I feel it's a bit small to be a "Large" it thankfully fit! I received so many compliments every time I wore this-I am forcing myself to send it back so someone else can enjoy it

links_reviews_title: Pretty but a little too fussy for me.
links_reviews_text: Fits well. Detailing is beautiful. But it runs a little warm (I didn't like the lining), and it just felt stuffy and fussy for my taste.

Ordered this in Navy Blue first and loved it so much I bought it; saw there was this white one and LOVED IT EVEN MORE. Fits so well and makes you look so good- it is a tad see-through, so wear a thick, neutral bra. So comfortable too! Perfect for everyday or especially if you're a bride going on your bachelorette.
I love the flow in this jumpsuit, felt like kill bill ;)
LOVED this jumpsuit. It fit so well and was incredibly comfortable but still nice. My only grievance was that the fish and eye hook in the back would not stay clasped.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but not for humid weather
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit. The fabric and flow of it was really nice and high quality. But, it doesn't breathe well at all so I sweltered in the Mexico heat and humidity. I'd rent again, but not for that kind of heat.
Loved this jumpsuit. The fabric was thick and I liked the legs and also the black stitching! True to size.

links_reviews_title: Jump suit with a flare! Super comfy for sit down birthday dinner.
links_reviews_text: With jump suits I usually worry about tightness in the crotch and whether it accentuates the small of my waist. With this number, I didn't have to worry about either of those things. The length is also perfect. I'm 5'1 and it hit right above the ankle. I loved the wrap layer on top as it gave some flare and dimension to the outfit. Thick but comfortable material made this perfect for a fancy dinner.

After reading all the rave reviews I decided to rent this for an east coast vacation in September. It was perfect for the resort I went to and more. So many compliments. The stitching is the perfect detail and the way it ties is uber flattering. I usually don't like to accent my hips much, but just loved the way this jumpsuit made me feel. I want to buy it but's it's not practical for normal wear where I live. Rent it!!!
Pretty jumpsuit with fun pant detail. I'm normally a 2, 4R was slightly large on me so I recommend ordering your real size!
Wore this to work and then a yankee game. It fit my body like a glove and hit in all the right places. Such a unique jumpsuit!
Fit was great. If traveling, bring a steamer since it wrinkles easily.

this is very cute. I am very small busted, and it just fit over my chest. The tie in front can stay tied for bathroom trips - not hard to undo the rest. I got compliments, even though I wore white after Labor Day!
Awesome for summer. Loved this one.
I love this jumpsuit! Really hard for me not to keep it! It's so comfortable & flattering! I wore it out for an evening with girlfriends. Tons of compliments.. would rent again!
SUCH a cute piece. Classy and sexy. Wore it for a night out and to work. Would 100% rent again

links_reviews_title: Liked the classy but trendy element to this piece.
links_reviews_text: RTR recommended a size 8 for me but didn’t have an 8 available. I liked the item so much I took my chances and ordered a 6. Wished they had the 8! It fit very snug in the top even more so because I am broad. The hips and length all fit fine, however. I preferred the longer length versus a cropped length as seen on the model. I liked the belted flare as it could camouflage any tummy issues. I’d order again if it became available in my right size.

Rented this for an after-work rooftop barbecue. I was delighted by the length - it could accommodate my long torso with only a minor wedgie when bending over, but it loosened up a bit after sitting in it during the work day. Going to try my best to wear it again before sending it back!

Gorgeous jumpsuit, fit perfectly, flowed perfectly. Got tons of comments from women on my commute into work, haha. It made me feel so confident heading into work that day! Only tiny complaint is that the class at the back of the neck kept coming undone throughout the day but honestly the jumpsuit was so fabulous I didn't mind. It's really the only thing keeping me from buying this, though!

I'll be keeping this rental through Labor Day! An amazingly wearable jumpsuit. I wore a 10 which is my usual size and it fit perfectly, especially since it allows you to tie the waist as tight or loose as you want. I'll wear to work with a jacket. Lots of compliments and perfect for summer weekends.

links_reviews_title: The cut of this jumpsuit was off
links_reviews_text: People with big boobs need summer things too. Y'all designers can't just be cutting major side boob into every singe summer garment. I had to try on at least 5 or 6 bras before I found one that wouldn't show too much. This is a real meh. For me. Just ok. And it was way too large in the waist, the rope allows you to cinch in but that makes the fabric around the bust gather. Not cute.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved it! So many compliments! I felt like princess Jasmine in it!
links_reviews_text: I have a short torso so the torso was a little long for me.
Fits true to size. The pants are so fun and cool.

links_reviews_title: Soooo cute will be hard not to keep
links_reviews_text: Darling and different.
Love this jumper. It's so unique and fun. Can be dressed up or down

links_reviews_title: Super cool jumpsuit -- and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit fit me perfectly. Easy to get into and out of (which can be an issue for jumpsuits), it made me feel so cool. It's white with black detailing and the fabric feels nice. Can't wait to wear it out.
Fits very comfortable, I have a long torso and this worked perfectly proportion-wise. The fabric is comfortable and perfect for summer and spring weather!
Perfect for plane travel. Pants but a loose waistline. Also looked stylish. Received many compliments.

I wore this to a luncheon and received tons of compliments even from people I did not know. I felt cool and chic. I was worried that the legs would be too loose and would make me look bigger but they did not. I'm short and the length was perfect. Love love love this jumpsuit
I absolutely love this jumper, I wore to work with the blazer and heels and then I wore to Disney with flats and a fanny pack. It's just so beautiful and comfortable.
Skirt or jumpsuit. This outfit gave both vibes. I'm 5'3 and this jumpsuit did not swallow me. It's very flattering.
It was so flattering and fun AND comfortable! Will definitely rent again!
Super cute jumpsuit worn all day during vacation. I love the wrap/tie detail in front. Can be dressed up with heels or worn with flat sandals for a perfectly versatile look

I wore this on vacation to Florida. Even though the fabric is heavy the cut of the garment lets air flow through. It looked great with sneakers by day and heals at night. The wrap make is flattering for anyone.

links_reviews_title: This Gorgeous outfit got lots of attention!
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit and style. Will definitely be renting this again!
Very Modern and different.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, chest runs small, I sized up.
links_reviews_text: Loved it, chest runs small, I sized up.
I actually never even wore the outfit. It fit perfectly, although I got a size 8, and I am normally a 4 or 6. I just didn't think it was flattering....
Great fit and totally flattering. A breezy material that doesn't wrinkle too badly. Standard wrinkles along the pants leg for sitting 8+ hours at the office, but that's it. So many compliments!

Such a great outfit - can stay casual or be dressed up. I rented this in 2 different sizes - my usual 8 and in 10. The 8 fit fine but didn't have an inch to spare. The 10 was looser but overall more comfortable. Still looked good. A client visit go-to. Would be great for date night too.
I have a long torso and ordered after I read good reviews of other supposedly long torsos. Still did not fit well enough to wear.

Seriously beautiful. Way better in person. Fits like a dream, waist is adjustable which is nice. The contrast stitching gives this jumpsuit a nice pop of definition. Easy to put on and remove without assistance. 10/10, would have bought it but the garment I received had a small stain on it.

Super cute eyelet white skorts perfect for spring and summer. There's plenty a room in the hips and the legs but getting in and out of the stretchy waist part is a little difficult I wish there was a zipper… Then again I have not been able to hit the gym since they are closed LOL. The fabric is also rather delicate and wrinkles easy but these are very cool and refreshing for a hot day.

Loved the color on this. Just found the fit to be a little strange. It was pretty short, although I was able to tuck it into my high waisted FRAME jeans. Didn't like it untucked. Wore once for work. Just ok, probably won't rent again.
Beautiful silky green blouse! Wore this for a work event and received so many compliments
I liked the color and fit.
Loved the shirt. It was a great fit and overall looked nice. Material is thin but still wearable in the winter.
This blouse was perfect for work. I wore it tucked into black high-waisted pants. Got so many compliments about the color. Fits true to size.
Love the color, love the fabric, love the neck tie loose or tight. Just love this shirt. Would have purchased but I hate dry cleaning so I'll just rent again and again!

Loved this shirt, absolutely flattering green color. Good fit, I chose to wear a pencil skirt with it because it's a little short on the sides. Received lots of compliments, will definitely rent again.
I'm obsessed with this blouse! It fits perfectly, the color is gorgeous, and the tie neck feels very regal. I paired it with grey jeans and patent loafers.

Channeled my inner Slytherin and rentes this lovely shirt - it's amazing!! The material is soft and comfortable, the fit is very nice, and it's short so it's perfect to tuck into pants. Got compliments from my coworkers and felt very confident!
Nice blouse for work. Bright green isn't obnoxious. Fit is good. I could have worn untucked or tucked in.

Beautiful, rich green color with a fun pattern and great tie at the neck. The fit was good, but the blouse is on the shorter side, which made it difficult to keep the back tucked in. Totally worth it though, this is one of my favorite work rentals!
I ordered the largest size because I'm a 34DDD. It had enough room and wasn't tight around my arms. Loved the look and copied the styling from my friend who also rented, the leopard heels worked!

links_reviews_title: Great shirt you can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Wore this a few times. Loved it!
Fit well tucked in; otherwise was slightly short to be left untucked. It's a beautiful blouse and I would wear a version of this everyday if I could!

links_reviews_title: Love it, but short on the sides
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous blouse for work. Too short on the sides by about 2" on me - tucked in, I had a 1" gap on each side so I fudged it by wearing the back untucked and covering with a blazer. In spite of the fit issue on long torsos I'd rent again because the textile was beautiful and an unusual color to find in garments (leafy green is true to product images). Classy.
Absolutely obsessed with this blouse! The material quality was amazing and the details were perfect - I would rent this type of blouse from RTR daily if I could find more like it!!

I rented this to wear to work. Love the color. It was just slightly shorter than I'd like, but still worked. Everything fit as expected, and it's one I'd rent for work again. Nothing overly exciting to write about it, just a great work blouse.
Love this top for work or fun! So comfortable and got lost of comments on it. It is a little short so I think lols better tucked.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a holiday photo shoot for my business
links_reviews_text: Fabulous fit, gorgeous fabric and color. I will rent this one again... possibly will buy it I liked it so much
Wore this to a friend's baby shower. I absolutely love this blouse. It's easy to wear and quite luxurious.

I love this blouse! The details are beautiful and it fits like a tailored top! It's the perfect length and the sleeves hit my wrists perfectly. There is a subtle pattern to the silk that doesn't pick up in pictures behind the print, but it's beautiful. I paired with black denim and heeled black boots for a business casual look for work meetings and dinner. I also recommend a pop of color with a cheetah belt or shoes. You could also pair with black/navy suit pants or skirt.
Great color, quality, cut. On trendy tie. Wore this beauty twice, once with jeans and again with black pants.
Beautiful fabric, love the color and the pattern. Nice fit, love this shirt.
Great color, elegant, comfy, but not too stuffy. Perfect for an important work meeting. Loved this one!
Cute, high quality silk top. Fits true to size, although the shirt is a bit short so it works best with high waisted pants or skirts if you want to tuck it in. Very classic. I felt like a boss lady.
Will wear to a Christmas dinner
Really pretty color. Styled almost exactly like photo and felt like I had a bit of extra style for a relatively informal conference.
This is SHORT - I'm very tall but usually shirts hit lower than this one. I needed a cami underneath to make it work appropriate. Great color and cool, smooth fabric.

links_reviews_title: Love the fabric and the color!
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit.
The fit is perfect; it is on the short side, but that makes it easy to tuck in to jeans or trousers. I wore it for work with black wool pants and it's just really pretty!
This is a gorgeous shirt. Rent it.
Comfortable & beautiful - received several compliments.
The blouse was a bit large but the length was too short to wear with pants or tuck it in to a skirt. Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the fit
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and loved the emerald green!
Love love love this. Would def buy if it weren't so expensive!

This shirt is gorgeous! Really lovely material and the pattern is great and the colour is really beautiful. I also got lots of compliments. I tucked it in but it would definitely work untucked as well. I loved it.
Cute shirt for work, fit TTS and the fabric felt very high quality. Can't tell in the pictures, but the silk has a patterned texture that is lovely.

The fit is blousy, but it is shorter than you might expect, can be worn loose over skinny pants, or tucked in. The color and texture in the fabric is magnificent, and the print is subtle. I got so many compliments each time i wore it.
Great top! Comfortable, unique print
This sweater is so cute. I wore it with white and blue jeans. I love the big neck and the side vents make it more flattering. I'll definitely rent again.
Rented for a casual office. Very warm, good at hiding a growing baby bump and super soft. I am very sensitive to wool and I was able to wear this no problem.

Wore this sweater both to work on casual Fridays with jeans and the week of Thanksgiving while vacationing in Breckenridge. Super warm and comfy. It runs a little big. Many compliments every time I wore it.
Surprisingly chic for such a big, super warm thick sweater.
Fit is large but cute with a front tuck. Lots of compliments and very warm!
Trendy, bright plaid pattern on a super comfy, stylish sweater. I wore it to a girl's outing and received several compliments. I thought it was a bit large so next time I order, I'll size down.
This sweater is soooooo soft and cozy. I'm considering purchase. Not itchy at all.
I loved this sweater so much! I wore it so many times! It was hard to give back. Not itchy. Slightly over-sized but in an appropriate, not overwhelming way - in a cozy way. Loved the colors. Get it!

links_reviews_title: Sweater is a nice casual piece
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size
Nice loose fit, great for a winter ski weekend. Tons of compliments on this sweater. Recommend.
Cute sweater. The neck is just a bit weird

Couldn't wear - neck stands up straight and looks and feels odd. Tried folding down but that looked strange too. I loved the rest of this sweater but found the neck too distracting for me to wear. The side vents which others have mentioned didn't bother me.
Sweater had a cute pattern and fun flowy cut. Would work better on a taller person. The sweater was too large on my frame.

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on classic winter sweater
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater, very warm yet very soft--perfect for air travel if you tend to get cold on planes. I picked this up in a RTR physical store, and was pleasantly surprised that the only size--a large--available did not look too big on me. I wore it as an oversized sweater, but it was flattering on my pear shape. Received several compliments.
I loved this super comfortable sweater. I got many compliments and wore it many times.

links_reviews_title: How easy it is not to go shopping.
links_reviews_text: Ok, a boxy boy cut. Great for a chill weekend.
Great colors always complement

links_reviews_title: Shape is more silhouette than looks in some photos
links_reviews_text: Some of the photos make it look like this dress comes out a bit at the hip area - not so. There is ruching at the stomach/hip area and the pattern changes there, but the dress is fitted to the body throughout. I got an xs because the small wasn't available. It fit but the small would have been better in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Chic, comfy, and flattering fall/winter dress!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress, flattering fit with the stretchy and sliming ruching. Sophisticated, fashionable look with the high neck and no sleeves. Great for work into happy hour. Awesome paired with jean jacket for a casual look or leather jacket to bring out an edge. Got so many compliments, the pics don’t do it justice! Will definitely rent again.

I love a dress that is also wicked comfortable. I feel like Fuzzi dresses are always a stretchy material that is also somehow flattering. I'm not sure how they do it. This dress was form fitting, flattering and a fun pattern.

This dress is so forgiving! Gained 15 pounds this summer so I have more curves than normal. Still, I felt very confident in this even though it's form-fitting. The slight ruching also gave me a little booty so that was a plus. The fabric is a sheer, thin, stretchy print made to look like wool, so it's a fall look that can be worn in 100 degree weather (so Texas fall). Id imagine this is a good dress for all sizes. Will rent again, whether I get bigger or leaner.
Fit is tight at the neck but comfy all around, flows beautiful and chic. Dressed it down with a denim jacket for work but great for happy hour.
Stretchy material but has nice ruching in the waist so it’s flattering and forgiving. Simple and elegant but comfy too.
This dress is super flattering, particularly on an hourglass shape. Looks great with a variety of black blazers over top. Had a hard time turning this in because it fits so nicely.
Very comfortable to wear and can make work appropriate with a jacket. Felt a bit cheaper than I expected.
Very light and gauzy material, beautifully hugs curvy body. Would definitely recommend for a variety of occasions.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but not for a curvy figure in my opinion
links_reviews_text: The dress was super comfortable and stretchy and it felt like I wasn't wearing a dress, but rather a comfy sock. However, it was pretty straight up and down and, in my opinion, wasn't flattering for my body.

links_reviews_title: Love this designer- very flattering cut and pretty fabric. 4 stars-clingy. Used Static Guard.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected- I wore it to work but its perfect for a party. Loved the sophisticated pattern and color. It looked great with a jersey crepe Tuxedo jacket with rolled up sleeves. Will rent again in the spring when theres less static-ability!

The dress is ridiculously light and comfy, but if you are not a small woman (like me) you'll need to pull out the Spanx because it will show every tummy/waist bump and accentuate it. I didn't wear it with Spanx, but wish I had. It made a huge difference when I tried it later. The dress clings very close to the body. The fabric is very stretchy. But that's also why it is so comfortable. It fits like a glove.
The pattern was great for hippy/pear figures. I loved the layers. Beware of static pulling up the lining though, if you wear tights underneath.
I love love this dress. As everyone says, it's really comfortable and extremely flattering. I've worn to both work and social events - with heels and sneakers. I don't want to give it back!

links_reviews_title: One of the most comfortable flattering dresses I’ve worn.
links_reviews_text: VERY comfortable, yet clings to every curve without being too revealing. I don’t think it would be as flattering on a short gal. I’m 5’9” and it comes mid calf on me. I wore it with stockings and heals.

Wore to work with a black jacket over it and felt great all day. Fit perfectly, skimmed body really well and was so flattering. Got so many compliments and would wear again on weekend for dinner with dressier shoes and jacket. Great dress! Should've work tights under tho bc thin dress and it was freezing today!

it was so flattering that I don't think it looks like my body at all. It was slimming and super comfortable. I remarked to my hubby that I felt like I was wearing pajamas. I think the way the shoulders are cut is fitting for my broad torso too and shoulders. Highly recommend and I've already gotten another Fuzzi dress for my next date night. Very similar as this style too.

This fit me singly but it was stretchy and comfortable. I thought it looked sexy without revealing too much. Only problem was styling it for cold weather; I had a hard time choosing a jacket or sweater that complimented it, so I didn't wear it as often as I would have liked. I would rent again in late spring.

I wore this to work and then to a work Christmas party. Overall, it was a solid rental. The pattern was interesting and the material comfortable. It was longer on me than the model. I would have liked it better a tad bit shorter but it was ok. The neck did get a little itchy toward the end of the night. I received several compliments.
Really loved this. Got tons of compliments all day! Was also very comfortable to wear
Very flattering fit especially the ruching at the waist, lots of compliments.

I really thought that this was going to be a knit, but it was actually stretchy, diaphanous material. I made a bad choice wearing it with tall boots - I think those made it look stuffy for some reason. But! It was cold, and I though the dress itself would be warmer. Anyway, it was cute, and comfortable with all the stretch.
