Came above ankle in length Lightweight material Colors didn't do much for me The material in the center is good for covering up tummies
Subtly beautiful and very comfortable and flattering. Would love to try when pregnant as I think it would be very cute for a little baby bump too.
Easy, comfy, lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Curve hugging dress with interesting pattern
links_reviews_text: I've found most Fuzzi dresses are the same. Tighter cut with multiple layers of for, and the top layer is always something sort of sheer meshlike fabric. Ends up being a flattering look but I would recommend Spanx to smooth out your lines. Loved the longer length, and there was some cinching along the tummy area to help hide a bit of tummy. Loved this fabric, it was all grey tones but had different patches of fabrics.
Thin, but it’s slip helps. Loved it.

This dress is great! The rouching across the stomach and the high collar are really flattering. It's made out of a thin, gauzy material that's comfortable and flattering. It was 100% work appropriate and comfortable to wear for a long day. Definitely would recommend.

links_reviews_title: perfect for my work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: great for any body type!
Very stretchy and forgiving fabric. Love love it.

links_reviews_title: This is a quietly interesting and fun dress!
links_reviews_text: FIT: I was worried this would accentuate my hips and larger rear, and it didn't! It looked so great on, even while it is very form fitting. It hugged my curves in all the right ways. I really loved the fit. You can easily adjust the dress to lay best on your body. There is a slip/underlayer that makes the dress and, as the photo shows, ends just a bit above the outer layer. I wore it with black heels, statement earrings and a bunch of chunky bracelets on one wrist. I let the dress stand alone with its high, tight collar. Pros: Not dressy, but feels more elevated than just dress pants or jeans for a night out. Cons: Could feel, as other reviews mentioned, a little witchy.
Fabric has a lot of stretch so it is incredibly comfortable to wear. It did run large - and long - so had to size down.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a perfect mix of sexy and subtle. its form fitting and super flattering.
links_reviews_text: perfect for the in between weather - seasons changing ... the colors and pattern and high neck make it perfect for fall, and the sleeveless cut and the light fabric make it easy to layer and sexy yet professional and appropriate for a work event or a party. huge fan!
I thought this dress was just okay. Nothing special but it is super lightweight

links_reviews_title: I really loved this dress. So flattering and felt like I was wearing air.
links_reviews_text: Good fit. Still needed shapewear underneath but was v flattering

links_reviews_title: Too small. Didn't fit as shown
links_reviews_text: A little too dressy for work without a blazer

links_reviews_title: Incredible dress, very fashionable and also work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully and was very flattering. Only complaint is the length. I am 5'5 and the dress is to my feet. I was able to lift the waist with safety pins and the layering still looked great! Will definitely rent again

I love this brand, and while some of the styles run a little snug, I could have gone with my usual size on this one. That said, this was my least favorite Fuzzi dress only because of where the gathered skirt hit my body. Its great for travel because it absolutely does not wrinkle.
As with most dresses I wore this with spanx shorts and the slip kept sliding up as I walked.
Love all fuzzi dresses for work. Extremely flattering thanks to material and touching. Unique sleeveless dress with high mock turtle neck

Cozy & Practical-this over-sized olive green sleeveless cardigan is perfect for your video conference calls. You can easily throw it off and on over your pajama top to make coworkers think you are round the clock stylish. It has big pockets to stash your charger, last minute conference call lip gloss and travel size sanitizer. I’d pair this sweater with a hip, brick background wall. If I were allowed outside it would be a great fall and spring added layer.
Comfy cute, could dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Lovely fabric and color, would size down.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is very soft and cozy, despite being short sleeved. I would size down to a medium next time. I typically wear a large, but because I'm on the shorter side at 5'4, it felt very long and heavy. Will definitely rent again!
Love this cardigan. The material is so soft and beautiful. I could think of so many ways to wear this!
This was a nice basic cardigan and easy to style with a variety of outfits. The fabric is heavy which is okay but it could have been slightly softer. I enjoyed wearing it.
If you like massive, bulky and unflattering sweaters, this is for you. My least fave RTR rental so far. Wanted to love but never wore. The S was so huge!
Nothing super special. Thick material and love the color. Easy to wear.
Comfy, heavy warm material
I really liked this but I think it would have looked better on someone taller. Heavy good quality material

I am obsessed with how flattering and cute this sweater is!! It drapes gorgeously and the knit feels very luxe! Only complaint is that the color is a bit browner than what's pictured, but I still found it really cute!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable even when too big!
links_reviews_text: I was sent a size too big, but due to the style it still worked out. It was very easy to wear (jeans and booties) and stylish.

I wore this to work once, but it was enormous. I am 5' 9'' with broad shoulders. I ordered the Medium and I was swimming in it. I liked the design of it, so I may rent it again in the smallest size available.

links_reviews_title: Big but still comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and stylish. It ran a little large but worked well over a sweater.
Oversized, heavy, thick, beautiful. Im a size 12-14 and the Medium was perfect. Could have sized down further but like the super-oversized look.

links_reviews_title: Runs a bit on the large side
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments on this piece at work. It felt a little in the large side, but it works.

I really liked this coat. I was very close to purchasing it. It is warm and fit me well. The only thing I wasn't keen on was the belt, it made the coat feel a little like a robe. I choose to wear it without for most of the time.

I would have loved to have tried this in a 14, but it was never available. I did try the 16, but it was just a little too big. I love the contrast of the navy and blue. It's a heavy weight and warm. Overall it's a lovely coat and likely better in your true size.
Cool jacket. Good for early spring. Warmer than expected.
Love this jacket. Always get compliments on it. Perfect for fall or spring.
This is one of those coats you really can't walk down the street in without strangers commenting on it! It's beautiful in person. You can wear with or without the belt and looks amazing! Warm too!
Such a chic coat! I've lost count how many times I've been complimented on it. I don't know if I can part with it!
This coat reminded me too much of a smoking jacket or robe for me to wear in the end.

I got tons of compliments on this coat, I love that it's just slightly dressier than a basic pea coat but still looks great with jeans and sneakers. There is a hook that holds it closed, the tie is just for looks. It fit me perfectly with enough room to wear over a thick sweater but still be figure flattering
I thought this coat was black. I didn't see in the description that it is navy. That was the only reason I did not wear it. Very nice. Seemed warm. Just didn't go with my outfit.

links_reviews_title: Nice detail, but the fabric catches dust and lint.
links_reviews_text: I like this coat, but the wool picks up EVERYTHING. It looked a little dingy already when I got it from RTR. A few people have said the belt falls off, but there are actually very subtle thread loops in waist which you can use to thread the belt. One thing: there is an RTR sticker on one side of the belt. If you flip the belt the wrong way, it's super obvious that you don't own the coat. My friend called me out on it because she thought I left the sales tag on it! It's a very pretty coat and classy, but I wouldn't buy it due to the fabric. It doesn't wear well over time, I don't think, and shows every hair, fleck of dust, fuzzball, etc.
Wore many times. With wrap feature and tie closure, you can wear most outfits under this coat. Exceptionally warm.
Runs very large.

links_reviews_title: the best jacket ever! got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: true to size, it fits me perfectly. It's warm, elegant and comfortable.
Adorable coat, got lots of compliments. Unfortunately didnt know it came with a belt until i was returning it. White piping is starting to show its age

I wore this several times for work meetings, every day wear and even just for errand shopping. It is very high-quality heavy material made of wool. J.Crew does run large so I wore the 00, I normally wear size 2. Highly recommend it!
Thick and will keep you warm. I completely forgot that it came with a belt--so don't forget about it in the bag!
This coat was so, so pretty and fun to wear. My only complaint is that it probably wouldn't be warm enough for particularly cold days.
Loved the fit on this coat! Really warm, nice inside pocket for phone and good length.
I rented in spring so only got to wear once then the weather was not right for this jacket. It's fall/winter appropriate, not spring. Loved the white trim and belt. Great rental.

links_reviews_title: Sharp-looking coat. Many compliments throughout my work day and into a dinner-date.
links_reviews_text: Tailored-fit. I felt very well-dressed. Definite statement piece! Worn over black leggings, turtleneck and leather slides. Paired with bold jewelry.
I returned without wearing it. It was too big on my frame. I've other jcrew coats size 6 ... and this one runs large
Loved the look but did not like the fit. I felt like I was wearing robe.

links_reviews_title: Good to look out together in cooler weather
links_reviews_text: For great in the top even over a sweater, although the bottom worked I think I would size up to feel like it really closed in the front over my hips. Perfect for cooler weather and little too warm for full Spring.
Runs a bit large. I could've gone with a smaller size, but I find it difficult to find my size available at RTR so made it work. Good spring coat
Fit is true to size!
Very nicely made.
warm yet on thinner side!
Great all around winter coat when wanting something a little dressier. The only complaint was the pockets bulge a bit when buttoned if you have hips. But the arms did fit well.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, warm, and well-made. Fit is true to size
links_reviews_text: Washington DC style Formal
Small. Tight.
This fit on the bulky side- my husband said it looked like a coat a politician would wear. Didn't end up wearing
Comfortable and looks great! There are no belt loops so I'd belt falls off it hits the floor
This is a good looking coat! the fit is great and the contrasting white is a nice pop.
This was a nice winter coat. I wish it was dry cleaned a little better. It picks up all it easily. For great and was warm.

links_reviews_title: Definitely draw attention on the street
links_reviews_text: Love the look! Thick material for cold weather too.
Cute warm coat. Warm for 50 weather. The belt scan was a little visible but cute for work or around town
This coat is the perfect length and warm

I think I'm going to regret not buying this...it is the perfect coat. Equally cute dressed up or down, warm, and looks much more expensive than it really is. Beautiful fit and loved toggle closure if I didn't want to wear the belt.
Pretty coat, brand new!

I wore this to a weekend work convention in Knoxville in 30" degree weather. Not only did it feel cozy ( material is super soft) the coat doesn't just hang on you. It gives you a figure. Not bodycon figure, just the shape of the coat. It is so well made, I ended up purchasing it. It is a heavier material but not heavy like you are carrying extra weight, heavy to keep warm. I received so many compliments on this coat. Through my unlimited I also wore 2 other coats during the weekend, but no one said a word about the other two.
These were gray, not green. The shape is a universally flattering one. I just didn't love the color. Too gray for me.
Great glasses! They are dark and really shade the light. They come with a beautiful case. I would love to keep these glasses!

I am 11 weeks postpartum and have been wearing mostly stretchy pants. I decided it was time to wear pants that button. I tried on all of my jeans, and while they fit, they were uncomfortable right at my waist. I got these after reading the reviews and have fallen in love because they look amazing and are so comfortable! I should have gotten my regular size, as these are slightly too big in the waist. They do stretch out a bit throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Too short and kept falling down
links_reviews_text: I think it is likely because my thighs are sizable, but these damn things would not stay up on me. Also, my hands were blue after wearing them a day so clearly the color is wearing off. I wish they were full length. I liked the color and the were stretchy, which was nice. I'm glad I tried the brand, but these were not the jeans for me.

If I could live in these jeans, I would! I was hesitant to rent high-waisted jeans. I never really thought I could pull off the look. These jeans changed my mind. They are so comfortable. Not too long on my 5'3" frame. They go with everything. A nice dark wash. I kind of want to buy them :)

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans when first put on. But pulled them up all day
links_reviews_text: I had high hopes.. Loved the wash and I was looking forward to renting these to try out the brand. I've seen so many advertisements. They looked great at flattering when I put them on. I thought I'm def buying these. But as the day went on the waist and yummy stretched out quite a bit. :( I don't believe I could wear a smaller size so I don't think that was the issue.

links_reviews_title: Good fit, wish more jeans were available!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, thinner fabric, soft. I usually wear a short length, but was able to wear these in regular length just fine! I was expecting thicker, quality denim. But these are soft and fit well. Good standard for work, weekend, or evening!
Absolutely loved these jeans!! I typically wear a 29 so that's the size I ordered. They fit good but I could've worn the 28 I think. They hAve great stretch and are buttery soft!
These jeans were so comfortable. They hugged in all of the right places. The dark color made them even more flattering. The jeans have quite a bit of stretch, so I do wish I would gone down a size!

links_reviews_title: Good looking but not great fir
links_reviews_text: These were good looking skinny jeans but sagged at waist.
Kept these for a while with my Unlimited because I love the fit and stretch in these! I wore them so much! Would buy if I didn't already own so many pairs of jeans. I will so rent these again.

links_reviews_title: I received so many unexpected compliments and I wear jeans all the time
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size smaller as reviews indicated. They fit like a glove. The dark wash with verticals threading was flattering on curvy bottom half. Smaller than normal pockets in the back.

Loved these jeans. Their waist is unlike other jeans I've tried in the past - no awkward squeezing - no muffin top! And yet they stayed in place. Might consider purchasing a pair of these in the future. Very glad I tried them out!
This is my second time ordering Mott and bow jeans without success. I have heard great things about them and was excited to rent them. They just are not flattering on my figure.

links_reviews_title: These were too small, but if I'd sized up, I would have loved them.
links_reviews_text: In the right size they would have been super flattering!
not for a curvy girl

Loved these jeans so much that I purchased them! Great dark wash for colder months with super stretchy & comfy slim fit that retains it's shape/fit even after several wearings. Super versatile to dress up and down. I could wear them every day!
These are more like leggings than true denim. The wash and fabric is nice but they are so skin tight in the legs that they look like they were sprayed on.
These are comfortable and have just the right amount of stretch. I have been wearing them almost every day!

links_reviews_title: Dark skinny jean I've been searching for
links_reviews_text: I almost returned these when I first tried them on because they were pretty tight, but after first wear, they stretched out just enough that they were perfect. Length hit the bottom of my ankles, none of that cropped business. Will be keeping these for awhile.
Great every day jean.
Dark wash and high waist create a slimming effect. Stretchy and comfortable.
I would have done them again in a size down as I'm currently losing weight because I loved how well these fit. These were perfect pants for me! Love the high rise, length and stretch to them.

I wore these jeans like every other day. The material is so soft and it's just the right amount of stretch. The color is gorgeous and they match with everything. I love a high quality jean that can last and that fits a cury body the way they should.
Flattering and comfy with enough stretch to be comfortable. Super tight on my thick ankles.
A very skinny and snug fit but not uncomfortable. As somehow who often sits cross-legged and winds up with baggy knees, these held their shape well but weren't constricting.
Great stretchy snug fit and nice dark wash. My new every weekend jeans!
LOVE these jeans! They fit beautifully, which is something that I cannot say about most jeans on me! Love love - don't hesitate! Rent!

links_reviews_title: Wore these Friday, allllll weekend and then again on Monday. SO comfortable but no slouch!
links_reviews_text: Held everything in place, made the booty look good and still so professional.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and easy to wear with anything
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and stylish
Perfect dark wash denim
I am tall, 5'10, and these were far too short on my legs. Couldn't pull them off.
Casual high rise jeans- comfy but not my favorite as far as fit went
One of the most comfortable pairs of jeans I have ever worn! I'm 5'7" and the length was perfect!
Fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Work these for work and date night.
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, cozy fabric, not too tight but flattering!
These fit more like loose yoga pants than jeans. I prefer a jean that is more structured material.
Material and wash were nice, but they run large, I would order a size down

links_reviews_title: love the color and the style
links_reviews_text: I should have gotten a size 27 as the waist was too big so they kept falling down giving me a baggy butt and showing my undies when I bent over. super cute though!
Love these jeans. They were a bit snug on me in the legs but the waist was just right.
they fit slightly cropped for my longer legs
True to size

links_reviews_title: Basic jacket that works with anything
links_reviews_text: Super versatile and a good basic! I was hoping it would have more structure to the fit but it is flimsy suede.

I rented this jacket to wear to a themed Mardi Gras party! I fell in love with this jacket. It is soft with some stretch and very comfortable to wear! I am tempted to purchase it I liked it so much. Would not hesitate to rent again.
A nice soft jacket

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: Such a versatile, stylish piece. Goes with anything and everything. Not too heavy so ideal for No. California weather. Great price. I just couldn't send this back...so I didn't!
Perfect weight for fall. Not too heavy, but not too light. Fits true to size. Material feels great! Would recommend.

I enjoyed this jacket. It definitely runs tight in the shoulders and short at the waist but I was able to get in a few wears with certain outfits. The fabric is definitely where this coat is unique. It's a super interesting fake suede fabric, but not the gross feeling kind!
I loved this jacket so much I ended up buying it! Comfortable and can go over anything. Easy to wear and really soft.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, very comfortable on top of dress or v-neck sweater.
links_reviews_text: Exactly as expected - worked out well !

links_reviews_title: A bit too short for my taste
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8" and got a small, it looked like a kids jacket in terms of length and arms length. I probably could've done with a medium but then it would have been boxy. Would work well on someone shorter. Quality is amazing - very soft and looks expensive. A bit more military looking than the photo due to the flaps on the shoulders.
Felt great on! Comfortable and can be dressed down or up. I would wear this with leggings and around town to jeans and heels. Favorite jacket so far!

links_reviews_title: Awesome in every way. Wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable to wear but still perfectly fitted to really add a flair to your outfit. Just loved it so much. Highly recommend
Rides a little short, probably natural waist length. Love the zip and edginess of this look - so happy to have unlimited so I can keep it for a couple of weeks without commitment.
This goes with everything - flowy dresses, jeans and tee, more. Was warm too
Hard to layer more than a tank top in a size small for me but it was super cute and soft and comfortable. Had some stretch to it

links_reviews_title: Cozy & soft. Actually warm & cute too
links_reviews_text: Runs large. Material is a faux suede

The suede is really nice quality, very soft and flexible. It gives any outfit a cool vibe. For the price I am seriously considering purchasing this one! I stuck with a Small which is my usual size and the overall fit is great. Not only is the outside soft, but so in the interior making it that much more comfortable to wear all day at work or out. It's on the thinner side thickness wise so you could wear through the summer nights into fall and winter (with another coat of course).
Fit was nice, fabric was beautiful. One of the few items I regret not buying!

I found this design and color super interesting! These earrings are lightweight but quite bulky so be careful not to get them caught in your hair, or around a baby. Overall a very fun way to dress up any casual daytime look.
Earrings were much bigger than I expected but still very lightweight. Pretty with green sequin dress (also from RTR).

Normally I order a small, but went with the medium based on other reviews. Glad I did! Medium was still snug, but not skin tight (I think the small would have been too tight). Great skirt/top combo - would def rent again! Instagram: Mama_cassss

Lots of uses for this skirt. 1) lots of stretch - if you're early in your pregnancy I suggest this for a professional look 2) love the length, i wore this with boots but could be worn with heels for a more formal look. I rented up bc I was nervous with designer sizing but i definitely recommend going true to size, the stretch here is amazing. Highly recommend!
Great two piece outfit that was easy and comfortable while looking polished and fashionable. Love!

links_reviews_title: Pretty houndstooth. Short for tall girls and tight waist.
links_reviews_text: I loved this fabric and I get why it's shaped the way it is but I am usually a 2 and even the waistband on the Small was super tight. Also it was kind of an awkward length for a tall girl.

Rented the set and never have received so many compliments! Would 100% rent again. Super flattering. Needed to wear a light spanx under the skirt since the material is not thick enough to smooth completely. Bottom is super stretchy, the whole set was comfortable.
Comfy stretchy fabric-great houndstooth print with hints of orange. I love this skirt. Dress it down with sneakers and a tshirt or up with heels and blouse. Wish I could keep it!!
Lots of compliments and comfortable to wear. Shapeware might be desired but not required.

links_reviews_title: Can be dressed up or down
cute pattern and a very unique look
links_reviews_text: slightly bodycon fit on my tush and length hits on my ankles but overall very cute and different

links_reviews_title: Would buy this if not so expensive
links_reviews_text: Great skirt. The elastic waste band is really nice. I got a large because I have wide hips. I am normally a 6/8. Will keep this for a few weeks.

Despite the extremely questionable hefty price tag (proving yet again I know nothing about retail) this skirt is great. SUPER flattering. SUPER comfortable. You could sleep in it and would wake up unwrinkled and ready to roll. I would say it runs small because the extra large fit me perfectly and I am not an extra large in anything. I would have bought it in a second had it not been for the fact that at discount it is still over $300. Which is ridiculous. It is, after all, just a simple skirt.
Great fit, perfect length for work! Wore it about 5 times in different ways over a month or so. Would rent again!
Stretchy high waisted skirt which hugs all the right areas. Beautifully paired with matching top. True to size- rented the XS skirt which worked but would have been more comfortable in my true S size
Really liked and had several compliments. Liked the slit in back so could walk comfortably. Waistband is elastic.

I sized up in this skirt, and once I received it, I realized the fabric is very stretchy. Everything felt comfortable on- until I looked in the mirror. I have a large booty and thighs and the fabric hughes my curves in the most awkward way- did not end up wearing this
Excellent quality, incredibly flattering, great as a separate or with matching piece.
Loved this for day to night. Only downside is it doesn't hold up for rain!

Cute jacket, got lots of compliments on it. Only criticism is that it runs a little short and wide. It had sort of a bell shape and wasn't as tight in the torso as I'd like, but I'm sure it would have been too short if I had sized down. I have a long torso, so I am extra sensitive to this - may be fine on others.
I wore this for two different events, my bach weekend and my bridal shower. It dressed up my more casual outfit and dressed down my dressy outfit. It was super comfy and kept my the perfect temp.

links_reviews_title: Not even close to correct sizing
links_reviews_text: It is not even close to a large! My daughter who wears XS and S wore it comfortably.

I still have this jacket. I might consider buying it but why when there was rent the runway? It is the perfect like to wear with dresses and jeans. I am not tall so know how well it's taller person would like it it would feel quite cropped I believe. RENT this if you can buy it if you want it it's not very expensive! I would say that it runs a little small as usually I am almost swimming in a medium jacket. I get a medium often just so I can layer, with this jacket I could fit a thin sweater.
I loved this jacket, perfect fit and warm

links_reviews_title: Best "ALL AROUND tote" I miss this bag already!!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for storing many items. Things do not get lost in bag. Easy zipper compartment. Goes with nearly any outfit. Love the closure!!
Fits true to size. I wore this a few times. The fabric is pilling a bit but it is pretty cozy otherwise. The tie detail in the front sets it apart from other cardigans.
I ended up being surprised at how much I loved this soft cozy sweater!
Just your average gray winter sweater. Nothing amazing about it, but nice for a casual weekend. It runs almost small. I was it had been just a little more baggy for that comfort look.

I really liked this sweater. The inside was a little itchy but I wore a long sleeve underneath it so I was fine. Likely next time I would rent a small. It runs a little big and I had to roll the sleeves a couple of times to make them the right length.
Wore this for a casual day out and loved it
Very cute and warm sweater, but it transferred lint all over my pants and undershirt. It looked like I had been snuggling with 20 cats by the end of the day.
This sweater was very cute but the fabric felt very thin and worn out.

I can't decide if I love this so much I want to buy it or hate it so much that I need to send it back on the next shipment! It's super warm, soft, and cozy to wear and I love how it falls and looks with jeans and a tank. However, the huge downfall is the material is that fuzzy material that leaves lint EVERYWHERE! It's so annoying to see my tank or leggings covered in gray lint. If you don't mind lint and are attracted to this style you love this. If lint is an issue then stay away from this one.

links_reviews_title: Darling shape, perfect fit and style
links_reviews_text: Great fit, style, loved the drawstring waist. Loved it out of the bag. When I wore it I was shedding and my entire office was floating fuzzies from this sweater. It pilled after one wear. Returning.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater but will transfer serious lint if you wear black pants or leggings underneath.

links_reviews_text: I've only had it on for a few hours - I was the first renter as it came with tags - and I'm fairly certain I can never send it back. Beautiful weight, not bulky at all. I rented for everyday wear but I can see dressing it up for work. Tied or open, it looks great. My only complaint is it's pilling up, but I will credit that to it being brand new. This one is a keeper!!

I ordered too big, because I couldn't help but wait for my size to be available. I still was not disappointed! With a belt, these shorts were so cute and didn't fit too bad! I loved the wider leg and high waist.
Little bulky and baggy with large front zipper. Should have tried the 2.
These are so comfortable. I wore them on a long day of classes, from 9:00am to 5pm and was so comfy all day. They looked so cute with just a white t-shirt and a blazer. Love these shorts!

links_reviews_title: Great look, runs a little small
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8 in shorts and probably could have in these as well, but only a 10 was available. Even so, these were great. I wore them way more often and longer than I planned to keep them. Very comfy, and on trend. I can see how they would look baggy if you don't wear a form fitting or tucked in shirt, but that's just styling preference.
They fit a little large in the waist and front but they were so comfortable. I got a lot of compliments on them. Will definitely purchase in a smaller size.
A little on the small side
Loved the high waist and slightly longer leg. Super comfy!

These fit the waist perfectly while giving a good flare for larger thighs. They have such a flattering look! not too short but fun enough for various occasions. I love these! Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Should have listened to the reviews!
links_reviews_text: One reviewer described these as diaper-like...and she was right. They just weren't that cute. I thought they would be more unique due to the pleating but they were basic, unflattering jean shorts.

links_reviews_title: Cute and just the right length for a 40 something.....
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. I will buy these at some point.
High waisted and too big. I can wear a size 4 or 6 and this was huge. Didn't wear.
Nice fit at the waist with the shorts going out a bit in the legs. Very flattering and cute!
Cute shorts but they run big. I'm pretty solidly a 4, but felt I could have gone down at least one size, if not two.

links_reviews_title: Thought these were a great new take on denim shorts
links_reviews_text: I felt like it ran a little big but haven't worn JOIE before so not sure what their sizing runs like normally. Going to rent again in a 2!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for vacation - will rent again!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit! Wore it on vacation to a warm climate and it was light and breezy but still very functional. Top was a bit snug (34D) so no bra needed which is a huge perk! Perfect for exploring a new city in the summer while still looking cute. I'll definitely rent this again.
I read reviews that it runs small, so I sized up and so glad I did. It was so comfortable!
Only con is the bust was a little big on me, but everything else was great! Got lots of compliments

I'm not tall but LOVE wearing jumpsuits! So when I find a good one -- that's not crazy long or I don't need to wear heels with... it's a gem! I wore this cute seersucker jumpsuit all day on a wine tasting tour to multiple vineyards. It's was very comfortable and airy.

links_reviews_title: Cute summer look but loose straps
links_reviews_text: Loved the look fit and material but the straps need to be shortened just a tad bit. They kept sliding down.
Felt like I should have been seaside in this amazing jump suit. Got so many compliments. Would rent again!
Very cute piece, fits true to size. Wore this all day at the vineyards and was very comfortable. Fabric is breathable which was perfect for this hot day. Definitely recommend

This jumpsuit was amazing!! Material was very light so it's perfect for a hot day! I received so many compliments and felt very confident! :) FYI - the top was a little tight on me (32D) but I squeezed and felt fine. A medium definitely would've been too big.

links_reviews_title: Fab seersucker on a hot day
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit. It's got great wide legs and is very flattering. Big chested women beware, I'm a 38B/36C and it was at capacity. It did get a little uncomfortable later in the day. Otherwise super happy and will likely rent again!
great fit

links_reviews_title: Cute but bust was way too big
links_reviews_text: The bottom fit me but I was absolutely swimming in the top.
Great for everyday or vacation
Love the fit and look of this jumpsuit. It fit perfectly all around- was tight enough in the waist to give you shape (I have a small waist) and flowy in the leg. Will be renting this again!

links_reviews_title: Cute but struggled with upper body fit
links_reviews_text: This is a very cute outfit. The straps are not adjustable so the top needs to fit perfectly or it may not be very flattering.
The medium was way too small & I couldn't zip it up. It was really cute and I would rent it again in a large.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my son's first birthday!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and the seersucker material is great - light and breathable, but didn't show lines for underwear and it didn't wrinkle. However, the lining on the bodice was starting to move and did not lay flat (likely due to a lot of wear/washing).
didn't fit
I thought this jumpsuit was adorable but it was too tight/small to wear, especially in the stomach.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is SO CUTE but unfortunately was too big for me.
links_reviews_text: Big in bust, big in hip. Should have gone a size down.
I would've loved to have worn this romper! Unfortunately, I ordered a XS and I probably needed a Medium which is not my normal size. Runs small.
This was too short for me to wear so I couldn't use it at all. I am 5'8"

links_reviews_title: Great fitting jumpsuit for everyday work wear or out day drinking!
links_reviews_text: It literally fit perfect. I definitely would recommend renting. I may rent again in the future myself. I am a 32B and 125lbs and it was actually a little tight on top, but I personally like when jumpsuits fit like that! it was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Super nice fabric and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Super nice fabric. RUNS LARGE
A little tight on my torso but still comfortable
This ran SOOO small. I couldn't zip it

links_reviews_title: The worst cameltoe I've ever had with a garment
links_reviews_text: Ugh. Ran small, fit wrong, was awful. Did. Not. Like.
This ran small and I was unable to wear it

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable jumpsuit. Great for a hot day.
links_reviews_text: I received the large and in reality I should have rented the medium. The straps were not adjustable and really long. I had to wear a strapless bra and the armholes were really big. Do not size up.

links_reviews_title: Too big in the top so I could wear it
links_reviews_text: Cute style

links_reviews_title: Loved this blazer but it was so big I couldn't wear it. Size down.
links_reviews_text: Really nice and well made. Runs big

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear this from work to our holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Great looking blazer, it was a bit too long on the sleeves and went past my hips. I should have sized down.
Loved this. Wore it with boyfriend but would also be really cute with skinnies. Will rent again.
Fit well.
Big in the arm holes. Size down.

links_reviews_title: Eh. Nothing against it -- or for it
links_reviews_text: Just "whatever" to me. I have nothing against this top, but nor do I have anything for it. I love a Kate Spade top, but this really didn't do much for me. I didn't love the print and nor did I find the fit -- while forgiving-- to be particularly flattering/forgiving. I wore it -- but won't bother renting again. In terms of fit, this fit like a typical Kate Spade top. I'm always a large in their tops and an XL in dresses, for whatever reason.
Def runs large but still cute and not too low cut. Loved this bright blouse for work!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! Summery colors!
links_reviews_text: Baggy fit but somehow super flattering. Wore out with jean shorts and then to work the next day with jeans for casual Friday.

links_reviews_title: Nice, simple cute, bright colors and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Looks better tucked since it's a little long.
Got a lot of compliments about the shirt at work. Was great for casual Friday.
It was just for work but the blouse runs large
I usually wear an XL but should have gone down in size. This blouse is so versatile and comfortable, I might have kept it if I had the right size.
I got compliments all day with this gorgeous top. Rent it, you will not be disappointed!!
Wore an XL and it has big, should've rented a L.

This top was great. The color was very vibrant and it's versatile, you can wear it tucked in, or out over leggings. I also liked that I could wear it under a business suit, or with jeans. It fit true to size, and I did have to wear a tank underneath as it was a bit revealing for work for my taste.
Very feminine, extra coverage at armpit so bra didn't show, fabric seemed thick, ruffles give shirt a more square shape.
Perfect for work or a night out!

I wish I had a pic, because I loved this top! The color and print are summery and fun without being crazy, and the feel is lovely. It's polyester, so no wrinkles, and hangs very nicely. It was long enough so it hit a little below my hips, and very roomy/breezy. I agree with other reviews that it seems "large" at first but fits and flatters beautifully when worn. Styled with dark denim crop jeans and fancy sandals, but can totally be dressed up or further down. The ruffles on the neck and sleeve remove the need for much jewelry. I hate to return it, and will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Added a fun "pop" to work wear.
links_reviews_text: Colorful and fun. It has extra fabric under the arms to prevent any unwanted gaping.
Super cute but runs big. I'm busty and it was flattering. High quality and flattering. Can be worn tied or untied. Love the ruffle sleeves. Beautiful blouse.
Very fun hoops. They are heavier than expected even though another review described them as lightweight. I disagree but my earlobes are small and I decided not to wear.
Around the shoulder and arms it lays awkward and is extremely small. I feel a lot of RTR are junior sizing

links_reviews_title: runs small but it's warm and pretty
links_reviews_text: my arms are skinny and the xs just fits comfortably and there's stretch to it.
Runs small
Im top long so am usually between sizes. Loved it so much would rent again in a L
Loved this hoodie. It was comfortable & a beautiful piece of athleisure wear
Very unique. I liked them a lot. Baggy and fun.
I wore these jeans multiple times. They are boyfriend/mom fit and so comfortable. They are unique and I loved being able to wear these!

These pants fit great. I usually wear a 26/27 (2/4) and I got the 6 and they fit really well because they don't have any stretch. So if you are curvy I would recommend going up if you are between sizes. I have a short torso and I didn't really they were to high-waisted.

links_reviews_title: Very interesting design but not the most flattering. Also size down as they loosen a lot

links_reviews_text: Rented these for Amsterdam. Wore day and night. Have rented these multiple times, such cool unique pants that can be worn in multiple ways. Great w heels. Will stretch out so size down

I love these jeans! The inside-out styling is a cool little twist, but they're still versatile. They're a little stiff at first (as expected with true denim) but they loosened up nicely after a few wears. I'm usually in between sizing (smaller waist, wider hips) but these were an amazing fit.
Such a fun twist on a classic jean pant. My parents were confused about them but I got so many compliments otherwise. Would definitely rent again.
Definitely a stand out jean, many asked if the jeans looked like that on purpose. Fit really well and the colorblocking was great. Stretched out a bit over wears just like any other jean.

Denim delight at its finest! The jeans held its shape. They fit true to size with a slight give in the right places. Trendy and Fashion forward by one thousand years and an all out statement pant. Because of the style you would definitely want to cuff to add some flare to them especially if you're 5'6"+. I didn't want to send back but definitely don't have a need for such a high end jean which would eventually turn into my everyday denim like my $9.99 H&M jeans. There would be no way to justify

Ok... I know the picture isn't the best but I cannot get enough of these jeans. They are truly my favorite. The fit perfect. Baggy in the right places and they are super unique. Have of the pant leg is "inside out" while the other pant leg is "normal". I've gotten many compliments on these and will definitely be renting again.... maybe purchasing in the near future. Insta: RTRLewks
Really cute. Normally 27-28 jeans got 6 for these. They are a bit too loose but I kind liked the loose/bf ish fit.

Perfect jeans. They are tight at waist and larger-boyfriendy in legs. I would reco cuffing them to make them even more unique! Good for going out too with sock booties and black silk tank! Definitely rent these if you are considering, no one has jeans like them and they are super quirky. Sooo tempted purchase.
Wore these to a work happy hour and received so many compliments! I read other reviews and sized down one size and they fit perfect! Definitely rent these for a fun day/night out!

links_reviews_title: So comfy! Such a good look!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 6 because they didn't have my usual 4, so they were a little big, but perfect for a boyfriend look. I usually hate boyfriend style jeans because I'm pear shaped and they don't hang correctly on me, but these were PERFECT. I got so many compliments, I wish I could buy them!
I'm usually a size 12 but the 12 was a lil big & 10 too small. Great length, super stylish! Got tons of compliments!
Horrify the old timers (my generation) with these funky mom jeans! Fun times!!
These are so funny fresh! I love the inside out look and the fit was very forgiving. They felt roomy, yet also magically made my butt look great. These are fabulous!

links_reviews_title: Maybe the best pants I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: Wow. These pants are amazinggg. You may be wondering, "can I pull these off?" The answer is YESSSS! These high waisted, no stretch jeans are flattering and fun. Wore these for weeks. Will definitely be renting these again.
I loved wearing these jeans on the weekend. They are supposed to fit oversized and baggy so I enjoyed my regular size.
These pants fit perfectly! Felt amazing and looked sooooo cool. #obsessed

Absolutely in LOVEEEEE with these jeans!!!! I would've worn them everyday if they weren't so distinct. Super comfortable, and since it looked more appealing when cuffed, my short little self could freely run around without dragging them all over the city. Would buy if they weren't so expensive lol

These are definitely bigger, boxy, boyfriend style jeans but I'm obsessed. Wear them with sandals and dress them down or wear them with heels and dress them up! Versatile - comfy and so cute. So many compliments. These were big but could still let them hang on me without a belt. This size fit bigger - I wear 25 in jeans.
This was so fun to wear and turned so many heads!
I really loved these jeans. I wish I had known that they run a bit large, they were a bit large on me but I still wore them to work and got tons of compliments! Great quality too!

I love these jeans because they feel super trendy but are still as versatile as great denim always is. I paired them with other "overbranded" items for a sort of camp-y look, and had fun! I also love the high waist and the cropped, cuffed length (for my short legs). Enjoy these with sneakers or heels, for day or night! Just awesome.

links_reviews_title: A cool spin on a jean and white tee look
links_reviews_text: Super cool and I plan on keeping them for a while!
Love the idea but they are big and just not that flattering.
I really enjoyed wearing these. They are very different and some people may not like them but I loved them! Comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved but stretches through out the day
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments
Loved these. But got weird comments from the males o worked with - the ladies loved the look!
I am in between a six and eight in certain designers but I rented the eight because I wanted them to be a little baggy and they are adorable and so comfortable
Stretches out significantly after a few wears. Might want to consider sizing down. Other than that I loved these jeans and got so many compliments!
I really wanted to buy these, but of course they're like half a month's rent rent ha! They're so cute, and I feel like they can easily be dressed up or down. Highly recommend!

When you walk down the street, people will look at you like...huh? And you'll just smile and say, "it's called fashion!" So just be prepared for that. I thought these were so fun, they match everything like normal jeans but are weird. They fit loosely, so maybe size down if between sizes. Really comfortable!

These jeans are definitely funky, but man the fit is amazing. There's just something so fun AND comfy about them - I don't want to send them back! Warning: I'm usually a size 10-12 and the 14 was a perfect fit, so I'd size up.
Loved these jeans. Felt so roomy that I felt like I was lounging. And a pants with pockets that actually fit things! However, I'm typically a 0 and these did run a little larger around the waist.
Absolutely adore these pants! I did find that they stretched out a bit so I would recommend probably sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual night out
links_reviews_text: These were comfy and fun. Slightly large (plus they didn't have my normal size available) but that's how they are meant to run and I made it work with a belt.
I've had these pants for the entirety of my RTR subscription - I just cant bear to give them back (yet). I probably could have gone with a size 6, but the 8 was all that was available.
Adds great texture to any outfit. I wore with shorts, skirts, leggings, dress pants, and jeans.
I was hoping for a more oversized look, so i'd have to say the sizing runs a little small. Nothing to gush over.

The fit of the sweater was perfect in length and width. Didn't make me feel to wide or too short in the torso. The icing on the cake was that it matched my hair! I wanted to keep this sweater but it was already spring and couldn't justify the purchase. But I will for sure be on the look out for this sweater at their next sample sale.
Liked this seater but it was a bit see through given the knitting. I was ok without a cami underneath but could see some feeling uncomfortable. Nevertheless fit TTS and would wear again!
I would buy if it wasn't so expensive. Love it!
Pretty colors and comfortable. I got compliments while wearing it.
Slightly boxy (which I liked) and very comfortable. It's cute and slightly cropped. Needs a shirt underneath (wore a black T-shirt).

I love this sweater! The colors are beautiful and it is very unique. It is more of an open knit so you definitely need something underneath, but I liked that because it kept it from being TOO warm. It is not slimming, and I found the armpits to be very low, but it seems like the style of the sweater.m-oversized. Love.

links_reviews_title: Didn't even wear it was so bad
links_reviews_text: From the pictures online I expected to love this sweater, but instead I'm returning it unworn. The knit is huge and you need to wear a cami underneath if you don't want your bra to show. (I took a pic to show this better.) The fit was super off and unflattering and combined with the weird knit I recommend you pass on this one.
Stiff material , not soft and flowy- very boxy

As other reviews mention, this sweater is boxy - but I find the style very cute (and flattery post-baby). I received many compliments the evenings I wore it to social events. I did not find it to be too short as some people mention. I wore a fitted black t-shirt underneath and black jeans. Total hit. Love it so much I found it on sale to buy.

links_reviews_title: Very boxy, short, with huge sleeves
links_reviews_text: The colors and knot were so beautiful but it had such an odd shape
Definitely cut short, short in the torso and the arms but any bigger would have been too boxy

Cut is totally boxy. The fabric is extremely heavy. Put a cami underneath and that was fine in terms of seeing through it. However the way the sweater falls makes you look like you have a donut around your abdomen if that makes sense. Unwearable.
Not cute at all
Fits nicely and lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Cute, but more oversized than I wanted
links_reviews_text: Yup

links_reviews_title: This is a very heavy feeling sweater and the material is stiff.
links_reviews_text: The colors are fun but the sweater quality is strange. It is heavy and stiff, feels boxy.
Super short and boxy. I can tell it is good quality but doesnt look anything like the picture

Sweater was super cute but way short. The sleeves barely hit my wrists and the sweater barely covered my belly button, making for an awkward fit. May work with high waisted pants? Looked goofy enough I didn't wear and returned immediately.

The stripes and colors on this sweater are really fun. The fit though is big and the fabric at the end of the sleeves is really stiff and bulky, making it awkward to wear (and fit under a jacket!). It's a big sweater, but the loose knit keeps it from being very warm.
Runs very short, which was not evident to me from the pictures. But I still wore it with a tank top underneath and made it work. The colors are vibrant and lovely.
This sweater had a fun color and pattern but the fit was large and boxy. The length was slightly cropped and the sleeves were really wide. Kind of weird?

It as incredibly boxy and huge, also definitely a cropped length and THICK, and the sleeves went to an odd length a couple inches above my wrist. The colors were really vibrant and I loved them but that's my only compliment to it. Looked like a more relaxed material and longer in the photos and that was definitely not the case.

links_reviews_title: I wore this multiple times to work
links_reviews_text: super cute an comfortable, pretty flattering fit, I'm not a thin person - but I loved this!
Too short for my growing bump!

Looks much different than what the model is wearing - is quite short. I anticipated needing a cami under this so that's no issue whatsoever, but I was caught off guard by how billowy the sleeves are and how it barely comes to the top of my mid-rise jeans despite sizing up.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is so short. I am tall with a short torso and it looked awful. I didn't wear it once.
links_reviews_text: It looked okay on my mother who is shorter.
The sweater was shorter and boxier than I thought. The sleeves were also strangely wide.
Much shorter than it looks in photos and really bulky at the chest and shoulders, looked ridiculous on.

This beautiful oversized sweater got compliments but was somewhat impractical. It is boxy with not much shape The material is heavy yet like a wide knit blanket with open holes so not as warm as you'd like since air moves right through it. In addition it is on the shorter side. I'm not accustomed to this style so the shirt I wore under it showed constantly since the sweater was about bellybutton length.
Great cozy sweater with beautiful colors. Didn't love that the top section was see-through but wore a black tank top underneath and it worked out

I can't believe all the bad reviews for this sweater- I loved it!! Who care that you have to wear a cami under it? It is thick and perfect for NYC winter and I would love to try it again with just a bra under in between winter/spring. The XS was not too cropped and the colors are super vibrant for dreary winter

It's cropped and boxier than it appears on the model - think oversized, cropped sweater. I wore it with jeans and a white button down that hung below the sweater. It was just okay and nothing really remarkable. There are better options.

links_reviews_title: Fun take on an everyday sweater.
links_reviews_text: Fits loosely, but super-comfortable. Larger knit makes it a bit sheer - so be prepared to wear a tank or cuter bralette underneath. I loved the colors!
More of a boxy fit but really pretty colors. Not exactly figure flattering but more of a slouchy look.

Love this sweater and the colors. It goes with everything and i can dress it up for work or wear it with jeans for everyday. The only downside is that its not warm at all. The holes are bigger than I thought they were, and even with a tank under I was chilly all day. Probably better for spring, rather than winter.
Boxy but cozy
Great sweater, warm and cozy, great colors! Received lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Nice colors but a boxy , bulky fit
links_reviews_text: Was huge on me.
Really really cute and great material. You could tie it up in the front or tuck it in. The arms are definitely fitted but the shirt has some stretch so it worked fine for me
Excuse my face in this photo...but this shirt is awesome. If it were less expensive, I'd keep it. Great for date night dinner with the in-laws
Dress up. Dress down. For work. This shirt does it all. Incredible!

links_reviews_title: Fell in love, don't want to return!!!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous, classy, versatile
Got lots of compliments! Loved the colors and pattern. Definitely a top that needs to be tucked in the front.
Great fit, beautiful fabric, highly recommend for work, dressing up or everyday. I wore with jeans, loose pants, and skirts. A great piece.
Love the design and print of this piece. Great for fall. Does wrinkle easily.
Fabric is nice but it's not anything super special.
Paired it with J brand mom jeans and everyone loved it! Can dress up or down.
So many compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the first day at college.
links_reviews_text: Clearly paired with another RTR outer wear selection this shirt was a lovely eye catching one that had my favorite palette of colors for my first day of college. It's a thin shirt and had a lovely detail at the shoulders for a great effect.
Great shirt with stretch which made it really easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Very cute design on shoulders. Perfect summer blouse!

links_reviews_text: I am typically a 2 in blouses. The 34 was at least two sizes small. Otherwise beautiful and excellent quality.

Able to wear this to work and also dress up. Doesn't wrinkle very much so looks fresh at the end of the day. I ended up buying it as I wore it so many times. And the fabric allows it to be worn thru all 4 seasons.
I really loved this top!!!
Pretty, great fitting, unique colors...a great shirt!

Loved this versatile top. Wore it multiple times, dressed up with slacks and heels for work or jeans for dinner out with friends. Great fabric, didn't wrinkle easily. Would definitely rent again. Great rotation piece for you.

links_reviews_title: Great quality, looks just like picture.
links_reviews_text: I love this top. The fabric is amazing quality. I think it would look good on almost anybody. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work but ended up wearing all the time
links_reviews_text: Surprisingly a very flattering fit. I have a bigger bust and typically struggle with button downs but this one was amazing. I also wore it open and tied in a knot over a one piece swimsuit with denim shorts.
Pretty Shirt. Fit as expected.
This shirt is amazing. Got so many compliments will likely rent again!
so so

This definitely fits large. I probably could size down. It has these ties that cinch the waist that give it a more fitted look. I'm tall, and it hits almost to my ankle, so not likely good for someone on the shorter side.
Rented it to feel like I'm put together while in quarantine, while at the same time super comfortable. Looks good on zoom, but feels like you're in your nightgown.

This sweater fits true to size, I recommend going one size down for a tighter fit in the sleeve area. The fabric is a heavy-like wool material but still comfy for winter weather. The crop in the back is acute idea but can get a little awkward.

links_reviews_title: Not crazy about it - runs large so size down!
links_reviews_text: This is a very thick wool/hairy kind of sweater. Im not a fan because it has a tendency to feel heavy and attracts fuzzies. I only liked the sleeve bottoms. Yeah the back was cropped but it didnt reach the effect level i had desired. I dressed it down and wore it to the grocery store just to get some use out of it but for me it wasnt that great. I would had liked a different fabric perhaps. This would work for colder regions and for casual wear. Im a large and went with medium and that worked out so size down.
The fit was very large and I couldn't get the arms to not hang off in a way that wasn't flattering.
kept falling off, sleeves were weird, wore with a tank top and it doesn't look as expensive and chic as it should

I really liked the way this looks, but it does limit your options in terms of what you can do (for example - very difficult to wear a coat on top). Also, know that the back of the sweater comes up really high. The sleeves are very cool, though.
I think if this were more fitted it would be really cute, but it's really big.
Fit weird. Material looked worn/pilled in certain areas. It was fine to wear for the day but I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Cute idea but it takes work to stay on
links_reviews_text: Loved the high back but the sleeves just kept falling off the shoulders all day
Looks worn
Not my favorite. Thought would be much more luxe. Sleeves awkward. Ended up wearing once and returning fast.
This was huge, the sleeves hung about 8 " below my hands, did not wear it
This is way shorter in the back then I anticipated- the sleeves were comically big. Didn't fit at all-- right back in the bag.

The arms and front panels are significantly longer than the back panel, which is cropped quite short and hard to tell from the photos. As a result, it slid off my shoulders constantly and wouldn't stay on properly. Not my favorite piece I've rented.

links_reviews_title: Awful piece. Don't be fooled by price.
links_reviews_text: This sweater is awkward. Sleeves fit odd with uncomfortable zippers. Front so long and heavy it pulls the cropped back of the sweater up. Not only uncomfortable but completely unwearable.
The back is very short - more of a shawl with sleeves
Raglan sleeve, short back = not cute. Sleeve detail lovely

Very slouchy, with leather lower arm (with zip) that are very cute, but all in I could not get this to stay on. Would be good for a much slouchier look, not for office, and NOT for someone who futzes with clothes a lot. It falls every which way.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and great for casual, work, or going out
links_reviews_text: Oversized fit, easy to throw on with many outfits.
Big

links_reviews_title: If fit well overall the back of the sweater was a little too cropped for my liking. Heavy material..
links_reviews_text: Wasn’t a fan of the cropped back, didn’t wear

I just couldn't even figure out how to wear this. It's too short in the back, sleeves are too long, front is too long, the sweater is too heavy. It was impossible to wear. The sweater fabric was very soft, but that's about all it had going for it.
This was a fun, trendy piece to wear out for the weekend on a cold day. Definitely size down at least one size. The fit is big otherwise.

It's more of a shawl with tiny sleeves than a cardigan -- could never really get it to sit right -- but it was lovely on an airplane! Wore a few times, but felt too sloppy to wear to work or anything more than casual.
Fits nicely

links_reviews_title: runs super large, felt more like an XL, very high back
links_reviews_text: The back sat very high, almost like it was backless - I was expecting it at waist, it was just a few inches below my shoulder blades. very strange fit. Sleeves were huge.

links_reviews_title: Wore this sweater on three separate occasions in one week. LOVED
links_reviews_text: Great for work, great for casual days, great for family holiday parties, great for plane rides. LOVED this sweater. Yes, the back is kind of weirdly cut, but it's such a gorgeous product.
I hated the back - you should show photos of the back since it goes up so high compared to the front.

links_reviews_title: The app is super easy, and even the nyc flagship staff is super friendly & helpful!!
links_reviews_text: Too many lint balls , and was hard to work with throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: very cool, different and fun sweater to wear!
links_reviews_text: Fit to size

links_reviews_title: I tried this item on and quickly sent it back. Very odd shape.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were quite long and the shoulders moved around, more like a shawl than a typical cardigan.
Odd fitting. in the end, I didn't wear it.
Short back. Looong sleeves. Very fashion forward

links_reviews_title: Super cool And comfortable. Runs a little big.
links_reviews_text: Super cool And comfortable. Runs a little big. #glam and warm
Very nice piece. It runs a bit big, but I still loved it. I would definitely order a size down, though. True to image in style
kind of too bulky for under a coat, but i like the style

This was great to rent for the cooler fall evenings, super warm to throw on over a tank or tee. I received many compliments on the sweater structure and overall look. The only drawback was how the long sleeves kept getting in my way - if it hadn't been for this, I probably would have kept for much longer! It's so lovely!

Sweater with a mix of structure (forearms, high back) and unstructured (cozy cardigan shoulders and front). Looked great. A little difficult to keep on. Had to keep pulling various parts back to where they belong.
This sweater looks great on the model, but in person it was oddly designed and looked more like a scarf than a sweater/cardigan.

links_reviews_title: SF weather is up and down in the summer, but my office is super cold. Kept me very warm and stylish.
links_reviews_text: It's very loose and heavy which is good for keeping warm. I like the look in the front, but I'm not as big a fan of the half back look as I thought I would be.

This arrived with the tags, and it was returned with the tags. There were so many things I disliked about this cardigan- it felt like my body was rejecting it. The forearms felt tight, but the rest of the garment engulfed me. The fabric(s), weight, and juxtaposing fit of the arms and torso were so irksome that I immediately put the cardigan back it the RTR bag, zipped it up, and went to the UPS drop box.

links_reviews_title: Nice casual sweater for layered looks
links_reviews_text: Not a fitted cardigan. I thought the knit was very pretty, it's a mix of several different colors. It was initially itchy, which at first I thought "oh great" but it didn't stay itchy. I was able to wear comfortably all day

So cute! I wore mine backwards bc I wasn't loving the way it fit the usual way. Was very comfortable and only slightly itchy but can be fixed with a cami or light tee underneath. Very versatile and fit true to size. Def recommend :)
First, heads up this is wool so it is scratchy but it's so comfy! Fun way to add color with jeans and make everyday a little more interesting.
Warm comfortable cardigan with interesting sleeves.
Simple chunky knitted cardigan for the win. Modernized grandpa sweater. However, it's itchy.
Loved the look of this sweater. Really pretty colors throughout. But slightly itchy.
5 stars for this unique, warm, fall sweater!
loved this sweater, could wear it many different ways: open, buttoned up in front, or put the buttons in the back like a crew neck sweater!
Love the color and fit of this - looks great with a pair of cropped jeans!

they should NOT put this beautiful sweater on a hanger, it ruins the shoulders!!! besides that - loved the color, buttons, and loose fit of this cardi/sweater. i wore it buttoned up but it would also look cute just as a cardigan. if you are sensitive to itchiness this might not be for you
It is a modern twist to the Irish knit sweater. Warm with cool sleeves and a shorter length.
Held onto this sweater for a while! It's super comfy and goes with everything. Loved the sleeves
Wore this to work, super cute and adds a pop of color to the outfit!
I wore multiple times. Nice warm weight cardigan. Multiple colors - very versatile , great with jeans
The cropped length and puffed sleeves are super cute.
Fits TTS, slightly cropped on me, and very warm. Perfect for a cool day under a lighter jacket!

links_reviews_title: Unique sweater! Looks like designer piece it is.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful sweater! Full of fall colors. It's Big, which makes it true to size. Super cute with jeans and brown boots. It would look less bulky on a taller person, but I still really love it. Only downfall: itchy where exposed to skin.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments that it looked handmade.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit itchy. seemed a bit big.
Very itchy, I didn't wear it. I don't have a high tolerance for itchy sweaters. I probably could've gotten through the day if I wore a shirt underneath it, but I decided not to.

I was getting SO BORED of winter jackets, until this came into my life. It keeps me warm and the color makes me so happy! It's a little on the short side but I think it's better that way since it's a bit boxy (like all furry jackets are). Definitely TTS small was great and buttoned up perfectly but XS would likely have been a little tight.
A little over-sized but great otherwise
Comfy warm and fashionable
Comfy, cozy, everyday jacket to live in. I sized up so that I could wear with bulky sweaters, hoodies etc. Fabric is extra soft. Love the color. I might have to own this one.

links_reviews_title: Super cute color and love the tie!

links_reviews_text: I like the sweater. It was in really good shape like new. It fit true to size and the colors are really pretty.

I'm not a long-torso girl at all and it barely hit where it should in order to look cute. One size smaller would've been a problem. The colors are unique and the ombré effect pops. Not crazy about it, but it's a safe/nice rent for a casual day

Would rent again this is a very flattering color and would recommend it for almost every skin tone but yellow. This piece is well designed and great quality. Not much wear which is great and good length for average height people.
Very comfy, a little short in the torso, maybe it's supposed to be more of a mid-drift look??

36B-29"-39" , fits loose in XS but not boxy, surprisingly warm( but not hot), i did had short sleeve turtleneck under to avoid skin showing) & mostly for warmth)-where the tie & i just did one turn insted of knot.

Sweater material was super comfortable and the colors are great! It was a little shorter than I like my sweaters to be, but i still enjoyed wearing it. The tie was a bit awkward because if it wasn't just right it would show some skin, but this wouldn't be a problem for shorter gals or some high-waisted pants :)
Great sweater, true to size! Wore it a couple times. Great for a brisk day!
Cute, warm, not too scratchy. The tie is weirdly bulky under a coat, but otherwise decent rental!
Soft and medium weight. Vibrant colors. Tie allows this to be dressed up a bit. Great sweater.
As described

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments on this sweater
links_reviews_text: A little boxy fitting but still very cute
Great color - received lots of compliments on this. Tie on the side is fun. It's chunky but super soft. Glad I rented a large, but could have sized down to a medium.
Sophisticated and comfortable. The material is on the thicker side and great for a cold day. I had a light rain jacket over it and I was warm in 50 degree weather.

links_reviews_title: The feels amazing and beautiful color
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews, I sized up because I don't like sweaters that are short on my torso. It does keep you warm and looks beautiful!
Super easy to wear, looked good with jeans and with dressier pants at work.
Comfy fit and feel. I love the bright color and tie feature.
It was comfortable but I couldn't make the ties look right. They just looked bulky and weird.
Gorgeous color, really makes skin glow. This is a very warm sweater...good for cold or cool early spring days. Soft yarn, no itching.
Great sweater for work and every day. Love this color and style.
Comfy. Great color ombré.

Gorgeous color, looked so cute with destroyed denim and my white slides! The side tie is a nice, unexpected touch that makes this cooler than you average sweater. Really versatile- I could see myself wearing this again with jeans, a denim skirt, white wide leg pants, a faux leather pencil skirt- the list goes on!

links_reviews_title: Great sweater to break up winter monotony
links_reviews_text: Warm but not too warm, super comfy and not itchy. Tie adds a nice extra element. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wore this sweater a ton - snowshoeing weekend in northern Michigan, casual work get together, etc.
links_reviews_text: Always got compliments on this sweater! Super comfortable and the tie at the bottom gave it an extra pop.
True to size too short for my taste

links_reviews_title: Soft, warm, comfortable. A little short.
links_reviews_text: Very nice sweater - cozy and colorful with jeans and boots. It's a tad on the short side, and requires a cami underneath so that no skin shows through when the ties shift. I'd rent it again!
It was cute on but the sleeves were a little long
This sweater is a bit boxy but the side tie makes for a fun, flattering detail. I got plenty of compliments on this one!

links_reviews_title: I wore this sweater a lot as the weather turned cold and it was great!! The tie detail
links_reviews_text: It runs a little big. I would rent the small next time.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and to a dinner party with friends.
links_reviews_text: This is such a cute sweater! I get so many compliments. It gives your work outfit/every day outfit just an added touch of flare :)
Such a fun twist on an ordinary sweater! The colors are beautiful, it's well made, and the tie give it a little something extra! Tons of compliments. Not itchy at all.
Lovely, well-made, substantial sweater and a great color. Sadly, it hit me in the wrong spot on my hips and made me look very boxy. Not edgy and stylish-enough for work.

Ill wear it on the weekend as a nice change to my wardrobe for the color. The tie detail is great too. The overall shoulder and arn area though is verrly baggy and boxy so not really a going out flattering sweater.

The sweater looks exactly as pictured and fit, but was sooo unflattering. I do not recommend this one if you are hourglass shape, larger bust, or plus size. It just adds bulk and heaviness in all the wrong ways. Probably best suited for straight/athletic figures.
So cute and fun, the color is such a nice pop for cold weather- lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: It’s looks also good in pictures when worn
links_reviews_text: It wasn’t great color and soft comfy
Beautiful sweater but to short and square for my busty figure.

These are so cute and on trend for spring!! I love wearing them with sneakers during the day and strapping heels for dinner! So cute and comfortable! Definitely cropped (I'm 5'9) so be prepared to embrace that!
I was hesitant to rent this but am really glad I did. The pants are a fun staple and very comfortable
Super comfortable and soft. I received a lot of compliments. They do run a little large, so I got a size down for sure. Will rent again (if I don't end up buying!)

I figured these were going to be too big , but wanted to try anyways. Definitely size down atleAst one size. I'm usually a 28. I could wear them for about an hour but then they stretched out and were too loose.

links_reviews_title: Thaw were okay enough to wear but not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit around thighs/hips/butt but horribly big at waist which made my stomach look huge. Didn't wear anything tucked and muddled through the month wearing these a few times.
Love these jeans - they got a little baggy throughout the day as most jeans do. They're also thick, but I was comfortable wearing them in the summer. Just something to keep in mind!
I normally wear 26/27 but 24 fit snug & stretched well enough to be comfortable sitting

Wore these 3 times on vacation, Madewell really knows how to make jeans! Does run long on a 5’2 woman. I wanted them to hit above the ankle so I rolled them up twice (about 2inches). I usually wear a size 12 and ordered a 32R.
These pants are awesome! I accidentally ordered a 25 (usually a 24 at madewell) so I belted them and left my shirt untucked. Very cool wide leg jeans. Will rent again in the right size!
Love the fabric and slightly worn wash. Perfect length for my height. Adorable and versatile.

Fun play on black denim. I have to wear mostly black to work and these were trendy and flattering while also being comfortable. The high waisted buttons hold you in and give a nice shape. Will rent again.
Nothing special comfortable though
Really cute and casual - the fit is super comfortable and goes with everything!

links_reviews_title: great fit and good quality material
links_reviews_text: sturdy material but stretchy so it's forgiving. true to size.
These fit well but the crop was quite short, so I couldn't wear them in the NYC cold. Would rent again in the spring though.
I wore them twice...once with a patterned short sleeved sweater and winter jacket and again with lightweight yellow v necked sweater and a black jean blazer. Got compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very cute! They ran just a little small for me but were good quality.
links_reviews_text: Loved the flare and button up fly. Would love if they were a little more high waisted
Legs are wider than expected... but super comfy and cute. High waist. Perfect to pair with a basic (white) tee.

links_reviews_title: Exaggerated leg, high waist - stylish and comfortable
links_reviews_text: These were fun! Stylish, good fit. The leg is more exaggerated than other cropped pants, and I like that the waist is high.

I typically wear a size 27 in jeans, but can go down to 26 in some brands (J Crew). I ordered the 25 because that was all that was available, and it was a risk. I was able to wear these, but they were tight. They loosened throughout the day thou. I loved the style and could see myself getting a lot of wear out of them. I would size down one size.

links_reviews_title: I've had these pants 3 days and worn them twice.
links_reviews_text: I wear a 28 in madewell jeans and these are no different. They fit perfectly! As the other reviewers have said, they are a heavier fabric, but don't make you sweaty. So so so many compliments!
These fit well, super comfortable! Would have loved if they were 2-3" longer on me.
These are super cute but would not go past my thighs.
Great fit, comfy, can dress up or down

I love these jeans so much! I have dressed them up & dressed them down and they looked amazing. They fit true to size and being someone on the shorter end the length was perfect. My only comment would be they do get a bit stretched out as you wear them through the day but they are GREAT!
Really like the cut and color. Fabric was very soft but had enough hold.
A great classic, comfortable jean. My husband said it looked like I was preparing for a flood but I didn't care. A very cool pair of jeans.

Great jeans that instantly give you that cool factor, but still are stretchy and comfortable. I did not wear often because they were a bit too cropped for me at 5'10" but will be going to Madewell to purchase them in their tall inseam length.

links_reviews_title: Ran small for me (I have large hips/rear)
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 33/34, but tried the 32 since it's the largest size available and other renters said it runs large. While I could button them, these jeans gave me major cameltoe. I love the style and look, but wish RTR carried larger sizes in Madewell since I know the stores carry 33+

So flattering, so comfortable. Perfect for summer when it's too hot for traditional skinny jeans but you don't feel like putting on "real clothes." I actually flew in these and they were still super comfy. Didn't want to send them back!

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans, I received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Very flare but on trend
I love these jeans- perfect for work if you work in an environment that allows denim. They're super stretchy and high waisted, i probably could have sized down from my 27 to a 26.

links_reviews_title: Fun change from my usual skinny leg jeans.
links_reviews_text: Stretchy and runs large, I'd go down at least one size, maybe 2.
So flattering but wash wasn't my favorite. Super high waisted, nice crop, makes your butt look incredible.

links_reviews_title: Great style and comfortable. Goes with everything. Perfect for summer casual office attire.
links_reviews_text: Fit is great but they run large at the waist and above the knee. For reference I am between 27/28 in Madewell jeans, I should have done 27 in this ones. I'm 135 lbs, 5.2. The length was actually fine, not as cropped as in the model but still looked cropped.

links_reviews_title: I've worn these to the office a few times, and the pants are both cute and functional!
