links_reviews_text: These fit like typical Madewell jeans -- size down! I usually wear between a 12/14, and a 31 fit great. They're a perfect mid-high rise, and comfortably stretchy but keep their shape. Very casual, fun!

These pants are amazing!! They are soft and comfortable, flattering, and stylish. I will say that once they are on, they stretch out throughout the day, almost a full size up. As such, I would go one size down next time for my perfect fit. I love them so much I already bought them.
Loved the idea of these jeans, but they were big right where I didn't want them to be, at the waist.

First tried size 4, way too big, so I went down to a 2. Waist on these runs small, which works for my pear shape. Shown with my own top, and the center pic is RTR Sachin & Babi Solange blouse which was amazing with these pants! The pants are a substantial fabric, no worries about the white being see-through. They have a nice stretch to them. Which also meant they got a little baggy around the knees as the day went on. For that reason I gave them 4 stars. But still a great pant!!

links_reviews_title: A little more print than I would typically wear but loved them!
links_reviews_text: Great fitting comfy pants

Reallllly high waisted, no pockets. Not really cropped, but not full length. Stretched out during the day. Probably could have sized down. Felt a little frumpy, like something my mom would wear (and she is in her 70s).
I loved these pants for work for something new and different. Got compliments all day.
Loved these pants! Ordered an 8 and they were TTS. The length was great for my height too. Can't wait to rent again!

I was hoping to love this more, but this was still beautiful. I love the print so much! The pants are extremely high waisted though. I'm 5'8" and the waistband came up between my navel and my breasts. Runs very slightly large as in between a 14 and 16 right now and this was just a smidgen loose.

I am usually a 12 with very small waist and huge hips! Sometimes I have to size up for my hips sake, sometimes down to a 10 if something is very stretchy. These are not stretchy, but I did have to size down to a 10 for them to fit well. Also, I'm short, so this is a factor in my sizing down process. Basically if you're in between sizes, i def suggest sizing down for a form fit!!
These pants have such a pretty fabric that could be dressed up or down, but they run AT LEAST one size too big. The waist went up to my chest and the pants were so baggy and long. Size down for sure.

Anything DVF is a sure rental success. These pants are so beautiful and versatile. The best looks are wearing a solid color top so you don't take away from the statement look of the pants. I squally have to size up for DVF dresses, but these pants were true to size and even though they were high waisted, it was not tight.

I really loved these pants. The fabric has really nice texture and the print is bold without being over the top. I really liked the high waist and the seam down the front of the leg provided nice structure. I got a lot of complements at work, but as other reviewer's have stated, they do tend to stretch over the day. Depending on the designer I either wear a 12 or 14, usually a 14 in DVF, but should've done a 12 with these pants. Good thing I didn't, because I probably would've kept them!

I wore these for a bbq style rehearsal dinner in early September. The wedding was at a flower farm so I thought the floral pattern was appropriate. I wore the pants with a navy blue blouse tucked in and a jean jacket. You have to be comfortable with wearing very high rise pants, but I am, so I loved them. The fabric is very stretchy. Sometimes I'm a size 4 and sometimes I am a 6. I wore the size 4 with these pants. I felt like the thicker, stretchy material helped hold in any evidence of my mommy pooch. I saw some reviews that said the pants stretched out and sagged. I didn't experience this but maybe it was because I went with the smaller size. I got lots of compliments on the pants.

Originally got these for work but ended up wearing them to a birthday dinner and on a date. Great fit and such a cool pattern. High waisted so it keeps ~everything in~ but we're still super comfortable all day. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Second time renting these. Love them
links_reviews_text: I'll prob rent them again next summer too...!!

I'm a solid size 4 in DVF, but have gained a few lbs over the past few months so I was surprised these fit so well. They weren't tight or restrictive at all. If you're a small size 4 or just want a tighter fit, consider sizing down. But these are a great work pant, kind of a Jackie O vibe with a high waist.

I rented the dress with this same print earlier this year and loved it. So happy when the pants were available to rent. They are very high waisted and had a good stretch to them. Comfortable to wear all day at work.
So comfortable, flattering, stretchy leggings like pants that got lots of compliments. Will rent again for sure!!!

links_reviews_title: Pants were ok, a little too large
links_reviews_text: I think these would have been amazing pants but, to be honest, the size ran super large. I've worn DVF dresses in size 10 before that were a tight fit around the waist and hips. These pants, in a 10R, were HUGE, and so the overall effect was a bit mom jeans. Beautiful pattern and colors, would consider renting again, but recommend that you go a size down. Also, very high waisted. I've got a short torso and these came up to my ribcage.

The pants where high waisted and fit perfectly! They were also so comfortable! Great for sitting at a desk and running errands all over the city. I wore with heals at work but looked great with flat sandals after work as well.
These pants made me look I had legs for days! I love the high waist. So flattering! They do run a bit large. I might try sizing down, but they also weren't big enough that they were unwearable.

These pants are a perfect work-to-drinks pick. They were comfy and fit well. I wore it with shirt tucked out because I am not tall and the high waist game up to my bra - literally! I also would recommend Spanx if you don't have a tight tummy.

links_reviews_title: I recieved many compliments about my pants throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: I wore the 0 and the waist was big for me but I liked the print and color of the pants so much I decided to wear it anyway. If you are short you will need heels with these pants. They have alot of stretch to them also.

These are super high waisted and at first I was nervous about it but they ended up being very comfortable and flattering. I wore them with spanx though. I got a compliment on them from a stranger within 5 minutes of walking out of my apartment. Very fun pants if a little bit loud.

I really liked the pattern and material on these pants. They felt substantial and were thick enough that I didn't have any see-through issues with the color. I had two small issues with them. The rise on these pants is absurdly high for someone under 5'9". They came up under my bra and I am 5'7". The second thing I didn't really like about them is that they were more of a straight leg than skinny pant on me. I think if you're on the tall side, they'd be the perfect pant for summer.
These are so fun! I got a lot of compliments. I thought that they ran a little large, and they're soft and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, high waist but cute!
links_reviews_text: Love these pants! Showstopper! Very high waist but super flattering. Perfect with a crop top. Thick and beautiful fabric. Runs a little large - I'm normally a 2 (or 26) and should've sized down to a 0. Im 5'3" and have to wear heels with these pants (no flats). Overall, love these!
I'm usually a 4, and the 2 fit great. Love the high waist too- these could be worn to a multitude of things! Very flattering and stretchy. Wish I could keep them!
Loved these pants, they were super cute and looked great. Waist is very high and material stretched out a little throughout the day, but overall, great pair.

Loved these pants! High waist, very comfortable, easy to wear and pack a style punch. Wore to work and again on the weekend to brunch. Tons of compliments... even some from complete strangers. Fit true to size and great length for us tall gals. Will rent again.
Awesome fabric and pattern; quite a bit of stretch. These quickly became too long and too big in the hips
The fit was perfect - even the length and I'm super short. The waist was awfully high though. I wouldn't want to wear a shirt tucked in for that reason.

These pants hit it out of the park! I have worn them twice, and each time, people have stopped me in my tracks to compliment me. I tend to be terrified of prints and florals, so this was me taking a huge risk. I styled them with a seersucker jacket for work (print on print!) and with a solid and kicks for a more casual look. They are a little long on my 5'3 frame, and the high waist is really high, but nothing about the fit detracts from the pants
Eye catching pattern, bright colors, lots of compliments. Too high waisted (more than I'd like). Size down - as I have large hips I was unsure about it, but it worked just fine!

links_reviews_title: I thought these pants were really fun. I wore them to a semi dressy fundraising event.
links_reviews_text: I thought these pants were really fun. I wore them to a semi dressy fundraising event. I am 5’7” and wore these with heels and they were still a little bit on the longer side so I imagine these would be hard for women on the shorter side to be able to wear. I thought they could really easily be dressed up or dressed down. Very versatile. Photo credit: my 8 yo daughter.

I loved these pants because they had some stretch to the fabric which made them very comfortable. They are a little high waisted but since I am too it worked fine. Some ladies might find it too high for them. They run fairly true to size but with the give on the fabric One size down probably could've worked also. Will rent again.

These were a real adventure for me! I'm not usually a print wearer especially on the bottom! But I tray liked these pants. Wore them to pre-prom pictures for my son and got a few compliments! They are very high waisted and very long legs, I am 5'8" and they were almost long on me. Very comfy stretchy material. I'd rent again.

I liked these pants. The have a high waist and were very comfortable on me, true in size. The white is not see through at all, I was able to pair with merlot shirt and tuck it in without seeing the bottom through the pants. I liked the shape but wish the legs were slightly more tapered. All in all great work pant to add some fun print to my wardrobe
So I loooved these. High waisted so looks great with a tucked in blouse. Fit is comfy for such a high waist.
Great pattern. Quite high waisted. Long enough for tall girls (5'10) and so many compliments
Fabulous!!!!!

As others have mentioned, these do stretch out a little bit as you wear them. The waist is high and that does stretch a little bit too. I don't have much of a booty but these would probably work for someone who does. The background is a true white, which I really like. Overall, very pretty for work or play, love the vibrant colors. I am going to enjoy wearing these.

The color, the cut, the western vibe was perfect for a Work convention in Nashville. Paired well with a skirt but would be super cute for date or girls night with jeans and heels. The tie is long, but you can double it up if it bothers you.
I felt very classy wearing this beautiful top. I received so many compliments

I wore this casually to work, dates, and to meet friends. Super light and airy. I tied my bow low. Brings out the femininity with the bow tie, ruffles, and the pink color. Loved it and wore it a lot more than I thought.

links_reviews_title: Neck tie is too long and strangely placed
links_reviews_text: Very cute design just weird neck tie. So long and rides up so it looks like it's separate from the shirt.
True to size, beautiful material and great design. 100% silk so wrinkled quickly though.

This is a pretty pink sheer blouse. The ties are super long, in the picture it looks like it's wrapped twice around the neck but bc of the little ruffle that starts at the neck and goes down the front of the blouse in front of the buttons the toes don't want to stay over top of the ruffle. I could keep that control better with it only wrapped around once and then tied in a bow. But you have to tie a BIG bow in order for the ties to not go halfway down your leg. It runs slightly big. It was a pretty blouse but I probably wouldn't rent again. Nothing special.
Color is beautiful and wasn't overkill with ruffles
Sheet and not really breatheable. A little sweaty by the end of the day
Not sure what the tie is for, just tucked it, too thin to tie around neck

The details in this shirt were very pretty and the color was gorgeous. My only complaint was the tie. It was way long and when tied, it moved inside of the collar instead of staying put outside which looked weird. Overall pretty work blouse with a pencil skirt!
This blouse was perfect for work. Love the silk on my skin. I paired it with a simple black pencil skirt.

links_reviews_title: Unique top with so many details
links_reviews_text: I loved this top!!! It is sheer so I had to wear a cami under the shirt but I got so many compliments. I would rent again in a heartbeat
I could have worn a 8. I love this shirt. I receive a ton of compliments.
Strange “Bow”
This blouse is perfect for summer and spring. It is breathable and the fabric is elegant. I absolutely adored wearing this top to the office!

Definitely looks like wearing pj pants. The waist was way too high and a bit snug and the pants a tad too long. I only wore out for half the day to do errands. Just didn't feel like they were very flattering to my short body and unshapely waist. Maybe I needed a different top, but it also made my butt look long. I'd skip this one unless you are taller than 5'5" and reed thin.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy but can be dressed up. @ VeganRoyalty for more photos
links_reviews_text: Paired this with the alc crop top and heels with a jean jacket for early fall night. Stunning in an effortless way. The small was perfect for me in the waist. The length was perfect with heels.

links_reviews_title: Looks put together while feeling so comfy!
links_reviews_text: These pants can be dressed up with a little heel or casual with flip-flops. I enjoyed the versatility.

links_reviews_title: Easy Beach Pants // Not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: These are great cause they're an elevated linen PJ Pant. Perfect for a lazy beach day. However they aren't the most flattering. Super comfy still wore a lot on vacation to the beach and around. Runs large and is somewhat high waisted
Cute casual pants and so comfortable
Wore these several times during quarantine- had a hard time giving them up! Nice and long. Beach vibes!
Airy enough for the desert, love these pants!
Like these pants. They run big so would have preferred a smaller size but worked well over swimwear.

Overall, these were exactly what I was looking for - a relaxed, comfortable, lightweight summer pant for work or evenings. The waist fit nicely, but the length was a bit long and the hip/crotch area was a little baggier than I would have preferred. I probably could have gotten a medium and been fine. Overall I enjoyed these.
Ridiculously huge, not flattering. I never wore them.
Waist ran a little high on me (I'm 5"2'), but the pattern, style, and fabric were perfect for a day at the beach
Way too long. I had to roll them up two times. It didn't look terrible but definitely not how it was supposed to fit. But otherwise fit well around waist and rest of body.
The pants are like big pjs and run super long. The tag was scratchy. But they were cute
Not flattering, bunches around belly. And insanely long. Couldn't even wear with 3" heels
I ordered up a size to ensure I had a relaxed, almost slouchy fit. Very comfy and cool. However, the pants run quite long - didn't measure but would say close to a 34" inseam.
I am petit in length, so the pants ran a little long.
Very comfortable pants. I wasn't too fond of the pleats in the front.
Was so excited to get these pants but they were way too big. I normally wear a medium but got a large so they would be comfy but poor decision. I think I could have worn a small!
TTS but unfortunately the pants were a good 6 inches (at least) too long for me. I am 5'4". I tried rolling them up or being creative but it just didnt look good.
These pants were very long

links_reviews_title: Legs are too long, need shorter length.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Like the pants - but they are WAY too long - and I'm 5'7
links_reviews_text: Like the pants, but unfortunately was not able to wear them with anything - they were way too long.
Great fit. A bit long and I am 5'7". Love the pickets. Perfect for the beach holiday.
So long - could not wear it

I wanted to love these, but they're basically fancy pajamas. And they are very long. I theoretically could've worn a heel, but who wants to wear a heel with such a casual pant? I did love the fabric. The waistband fit me perfectly and was super comfortable.
looked like a diaper and really long
Super cute and comfortable, but had to roll the waist over and still needed to wear a 3 inch wedge so they wouldn't drag the ground and I am 5"5'
Cute pants but they were really long so I could only wear them with wedges.

Was so excited for this ... but unfortunately couldn't even wear it because it was sooooooo long. Fit around the waist was true to size but I would have to be half a foot taller to wear this! Even with my highest heel, this was way too long still. Material and print was cute though.

I wore these with a white long sleeve and a jean jacket. They were comfy and fit well in the waist but were so long! I'm 5'7 and never really have a problem with things being too long. I wore a high chunky slide on heel with these so they wouldn't drag on the floor
The top fit well but the dress was too short and too snug in the hips.
Absolutely loved this dress. Unique pattern and great fit. Very comfortable and versatile. Looked cute with tights and boots and bare legs with heels.
I loved this dress. I wore it for a professional event and could wear it every day. It's super comfortable - fits true to size and I had no worries. I am 5'3 135 pounds and wore a 4. Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress with nice print combo
links_reviews_text: Loved the pleats in the skirt, love the pattern and it's a very flattering fit. Low cut, I used an undershirt even with a pin, but it still looked great!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress for work or events!
links_reviews_text: Dress is very flattering, lots of compliments! It does run small- I had to size up and needed a camisole underneath. Love love this dress!!

Such a cute dress, I wish it didn't fit so tightly on my bust!! Even after adding two safety pins, I spent all day tugging at the neckline because my boobs were popping out...oh well. I recommend everyone size up.

The fit is a bit restricting around my shoulders/upper arms but otherwise fits great! Be warned this is more of a navy than a true black color. The v is a bit deep so I wore a cami underneath. No wrinkles - great for packing in your suitcase
Ended up not wearing because it was too snug at bust. Cute otherwise.

This was cute - a simple black dress with a little extra detail for fun. The faux wrap was a nice touch. A safety pin could've help in the chest area, if I slouched even a touch you could see right in, but that is an easy fix.
This is a very nice cut. Super flattering and light. Just make sure to have a pin or some wardrobe tape to fix the odd gap at the bust.
Comfortable and super flattering style. It was just long enough on me to be work-appropriate (I'm 5'6"). The top did try to gape a little bit, so a tank or cami underneath may be helpful.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the print on this dress and it fit perfect. Its just a little revealing in the front
links_reviews_text: This dress was stylish, trendy, fit perfect and loved the pattern. The only negative is that it was a little revealing in the front (prob bc my bust was a little too big) for actual sit down meetings but perfect for any social setting.

Beautiful fit all over. There was a thread that held the deep cut top together which was too tight for my bust. I tend to have a flat bottom but this dress made it look like I had a booty! Plus I love the long sleeves & bold cut of the shoulders. I needed a pin to close the bust area because it showed too much cleavage for a professional setting.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but very low cut
links_reviews_text: Loved this for work, did have to wear a bandeau underneath to avoid way too much cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress - a bit tight in the chest
links_reviews_text: So cute and comfortable. Only thing is it runs a bit tight in the chest and the cut in front opens slightly weird because of it. If you're smaller chested this would look amazing!

links_reviews_title: Great for work - slid up a little bit
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work or evening. So comfortable. It did slide up a little but I was sitting a lot!
The fit was fitted but comfortable and I received so many compliments on the pattern! The draping of the front is super flattering although the neckline seemed to be slightly revealing at times.
Worn to work with some black booties. Cute and easy! Great fit.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work, made me feel wonderful
links_reviews_text: Great pattern, the dress is lined and has back zipper closure which makes it difficult is you are busty. I should have sized up for this dress as the snap to cover my cleavage was gaping and I wore a cami underneath.
This dress is all that and more. Fits like a dream and the print is beautiful.
The dress fit just right- very flattering. Not too low cut, tight, or short to be appropriate for work, but still unique and interesting. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Excellent work dress for a professional environment
links_reviews_text: Fabric is a light-medium weight. It lays in a way that would be flattering for most. It's a faux wrap dress so no wardrobe malfunctions! Hits just above the knee. I wore it with tall boots for fall, but this would be ok for other times of the year as well (except for very hot and very cold days). Beautiful pattern and lots of compliments
Not as sexy though
Just a little tight on the hips but otherwise great

links_reviews_title: Cute but not quite right for larger hips
links_reviews_text: The dress was cute and definitely a unique pattern, but like all the other reviews, it's weirdly large and gapey on top (even with the snap). I am sort of hourglass/pear-shaped, and especially with it being so big on top, it was a little tighter on my hips than I'd want for work. The sleeves were also pretty long.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but wish it had a little stretch
links_reviews_text: Cute pattern and stylish dress but it was hard to move arms. Wish all dresses were made with a little stretch these days to fit more body types. This was also very low cut but with a cami underneath it was OK!

links_reviews_title: Too dressy for work... I couldn't make it work!
links_reviews_text: Definitely above the knee and I'm only 5'4" The ruffle in front made it too dressy for work. It's fine, I guess. Just not my style.
Need a safety pin at neck line for work but wonderful otherwise! Gives the booty a good boost.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments ! Great dress. low cut. Needed a safety pin. Otherwise really nice
Great Work dress, but large chest area
links_reviews_text: I wore this for work and got so many compliments! However, it required a slip because the chest area was very large.

There is no stretch and the slip skirt under neath was too snug on my butt to fit comfortably. I would rent again in a size larger. I wish the chest area had an optional open/closed snap. It's sewn shut with a small thread so if you're busty, that may be problematic. Very cute though and sad I couldn't wear it!
Couldn't get this dress over my hips. Even if I could of, it was way too short to wear out in public.
I had to wear a camisole under it, the v goes so deep that pinning it was not an option. Very well made, nice fabric.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! It was perfect for work, and for a nice dinner. Super flattering dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was good, my only complaint was the button near the cleavage area. I had to wear a black tank underneath just incase it snapped (and it did about three times throughout the day). Even with the button issue, I will still be renting this one again.
Great for work, professional and fit well
Too big and hung weirdly! Had to return without wearing :(
fun dress, fit was not amazing. but my boyfriend liked it.

links_reviews_title: was interviewing for 4 hours and was comfortable
links_reviews_text: get and easy travel

I only wore once because it was tight. I really needed 10 and it wasn't available I gained a few pounds and this material doesn't really give so you need to be accurate. This is a dress than definitely go from work to a party.

If you have curves - rent it!! This dress perfectly hugs the right too curves and eventuates your waist. The color is perfect for fall and complimentary to fair skin! Let's be real, who's tan in the winter?! Definitely not this girl. I received tons of compliments! Material is super soft and a little stretchy. Perfect to dress down with tennis shoes or up with heels. Loved it and almost bought it!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear... waste line too high
links_reviews_text: Flattering on the chest but the tie came just below my bust and was not flattering on me. Better suited for short torso.

links_reviews_title: Fit in all the right places
links_reviews_text: Between the neck line, the open back, where the tie lands on your stomach and the flow of the skirt, the dress was beautiful. For like a glove, nice material and pretty color. M

Love the quality of the fabric and the shape- the waist is super defined and the length is great (might be too long on shorter girls- I'm 5'11" and it hit just below the knee). If you're at UT gal, it's a great burnt orange shade. Main complaint is that it is a wide neck and almost sat off the shoulder on me. I had to wear a strapless bra due to the neckline.

Very ladylike dress that flatters an hourglass shape. Wrap tie waist cinched in and stayed tied all day! Square neckline is very flattering but also very wide cut ... difficult to keep bra straps from showing. I wore with a jacket so didn't have to worry. Loved this ... nice alternative for every day. Probably could have easily worn a small.

Color wasn't right for me and fit wasn't quite what I expected. Dress was on trend, don't give up on it though - I think the dress would really work for someone with a different complexion and body type!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR dresses
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect and i did not want to send it back. The color was great for fall and the fit was perfection. Received compliments all day.
This was an ok piece. It's comfortable and cute. Not a standout piece, but just different enough. I don't know that I'd rent it again, but it was a cute work dress for the day.
Beautiful square neck and scooped back. Fabric is thick and wooly and forgiving.
The perfect fall color and surprisingly heavy dress. Beautiful neckline. Wore this to a engagement party and got plenty of compliments. Definitely considering buying it!!
Great comfy wrap dress in a knit material! It's a lot longer on me than on the model. I wore it with a strapless bra and booties. I love the square renaissance neckline!
The dress is nice but not anything special. Would have picked something else if I went back in time

I wanted to like this more that I did. The neckline was very wide so I had to keep tugging at it so it would slide off my shoulders. If you are more athletic, it may fit you better. Nice bohemian look. Hubby liked it on me.
A good dress when you need a pick me up. Great 'bloated' dress.
Hit a bit wider on shoulders than I realized - only issue was hanger straps popping out occasionally
The back on this was too low for wearing to work. I put on a beige cardigan though and made it work. definitely need a strapless bra with it though.

links_reviews_title: Cute in concept but not so much in reality
links_reviews_text: This one runs a little big just across the shoulders - since it has a pretty open neckline with a deep scoop, the sleeves just would not have stayed up on my shoulders. Also, the middle seems impossible to tie in a cute way... the straps are much longer than I expected so you need to wrap them around a time or two, but that makes it bunched. I couldn't wear it. Pros - I did like the weight of the fabric, it's pretty heavy with some stretch.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering dress for a winter baby shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a winter baby shower. This fit was super flattering and it was just dressy enough. I wore it with tall heeled black boots. The material is heavy and quality.

Good for cold weather since it's a thicker material that flows very nicely. If I had a larger chest it would have probably been too low cut, but for me it it worked fine. You might need some shape wear but it is a very comfortable fit.
I wore this to Friendsgiving and Thanksgiving. It was super cute and warm enough for snowy Denver. Loved it!

This was the most complimented thing I have rented from RTR. The color is beautiful and flattering, the material looks expensive and it is extremely comfortable. I felt like a very stylish ballerina with the neckline/back. This is really beautiful in person in a way that is not captured in the photos!

links_reviews_title: Flattering neckline, but made me look pregnant
links_reviews_text: Quality construction, nice fabric, could work well for someone with less of a paunch.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress - good length and no need to wear tights.
links_reviews_text: The neck is wide and the shoulder coverage is minimal - cannot wear a regular bra. Love the fabric and the waist tie. Super cute.

links_reviews_title: Super forgiving and comfortable. A very bump friendly or postpartum dress!
links_reviews_text: Thick and stretchy fabric that's perfect for fall. The scooped back made it a bit difficult for work and a regular bra, but still a wonderful dress!

Due to the material being a little heavy it may slide off the shoulders and pull down throughout the night. The tag sticks out in the back since the material slides down. The back is lower cut than expected and did not cover bra strap. Def recommend a strapless bra!

links_reviews_title: Wore for a church event, fit well, tight sleeves
links_reviews_text: I rented this for either every day or a friend's baby's baptism. I wore it because one other item I rented didn't fit. The dress fit well, except the sleeves were tight. The fabric isn't very stretchy. I was able to shimmy it up enough on my shoulders that my bra didn't show, but the sleeves would slip every now and then. I got compliments and would rent again. The color was perfectly fall and the weight was heavy enough to not wear a coat on a fall day. The dress wrapped so cool!

This dress has such a flattering neckline. It enhances collarbones and wasn't too low or too high. It is hard to wear a bra with because of the low back. The fabric is comfortable and perfect for fall because it's not too thick or too thin. Being able to tie the sash in different ways to best highlight my waist was great.

links_reviews_title: Great ribbed fall dress to kick off the season
links_reviews_text: The color is a gorgeous amber/rust. The ribbed style of the fabric is warm but not overwhelming. The dress is heavy. I layered my long hair over shoulders to hide bra strap occasionally peaking out; if I wore it up I would have needed a strapless. It’s a flattering style that hid my food bump, which is great for holiday season. The neckline is flattering, but not discrete for a conservative work environment.

I really liked this dress. The belt does slightly bulge you but the form fitting of the turtleneck offsets it. It was warm, comfortable, and you can wear booties, flats, really any shoe with it. Really liked!

links_reviews_title: Ran a little large but good for easy fall work look
links_reviews_text: Fell off my shoulders a bit but was a good length and wrap around belt made easy to adjust
The color of this dress is perfect for fall. The fabric has great stretch, so it's very comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Great fall dress for everyday or multiple occasions
links_reviews_text: Love the tie belt detail to accentuate the waist. Nice midi length and thicker fabric. I find ASTR runs small, as I can usually wear small in other brands but tend to choose medium in this one just in case.
Nice dress. Pretty casual. Works for fall.

links_reviews_title: My boyfriends favorite rental so far
links_reviews_text: The dress is super cute- the top is well fitted and the A-line bottom was very flattering. The wrap tie is somewhat adjustable so you can make it as tight or loose as you want. My boyfriends jaw dropped when I walked in the house with this on because it gave me such a nice hourglass shape! The only tricky thing is finding a way to wear a bra with the square neck.
Perfect transitional dress. Fits well and very comfortable

This is a great take on a leather jacket. Wore it constantly. Live in California so it was fine for outerwear. Glad I got the medium for that reason. Very stylish. Soft leather. Wore it at least 10 times. Seriously considered buying but there are so many gorgeous jackets to try. Keeping my eye on this one for future purchase.

This jacket is the perfect example of why RTR Unlimited is so much fun! I would never buy a jacket like this, even at a lower price point because I wouldn't wear something with statement sleeves very often. It was so fun to have a wear a few times on vacation. It's a gorgeous jacket! I'm usually between a small and medium and the medium was a perfect fit. The leather is beautiful. I got several compliments on it!
Fit is comfortable and very soft! Great for date night!
Loved this statement jacket. Also the fabric is soft and comfortable.
I loved this jacket! It was a unique twist on a leather jacket and it was fun to wear. A little boxy, but I didn't mind!

This is a fun jacket to wear for a week or so. It arrived new with tags and smelled wonderful! :) It's a good medium weight and perfect for fall. I loved the contrasting snakeskin sleeves and the moto/zipper details. Fits true to size, but it's a bit more cropped and boxy than I was hoping. Fun if you're looking for a different jacket!

links_reviews_title: A fun spin on a classic
links_reviews_text: Nice looking jacket. A little boxy in the Torso for me-- got a large because I have such long arms. It's a fun way to spice up your everyday!
nice jacket
The cutest and most comfortable jacket. Definitely heavier so it will keep you warm, but since I live in Florida, it was mostly just worn inside. I would rent this again (even considered buying it).

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this jacket!
links_reviews_text: Looks great with jeans or leggings. great fit and design.
I got a lot of compliments wearing it! Loved the look!

Super cute, good quality, comfortable. I got a L and was worried cause I have broad shoulders and a large bust. But I was fine although I wouldn't have worn it zipped up very much (just wasn't flattering on me). It was definitely shorter than I realized though and partly because I have a long torso. Just beware. It still worked out though. Got lots of compliments.
Fun, edgy, large enough to layer with a hoodie for a cold day, lots of compliments.

This Slate & Willow leather jacket was great to wear with jeans. Compliments abounded!! And the leather smelled so good and was so supple. I almost hate to rave about it because I definitely want to rent again and want it to be in stock. It did run a bit short in the sleeves and torso but I really didn't find it off putting. Love this jacket!
Lots of compliments! Wore it to work and out to play--thin enough to fit under an overcoat to wear as a blazer, but also wore it as a jacket.
Close fitting so not great over a sweater but very warm. Cute and well made.
Perfect jacket for fall. Love the animal print. Leather was super soft.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day of walking
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a walking day on vacation in Rome. I definitely could have sized down to M but the L was just fine. Such fun details in the back and the side slit on the legs

This jumpsuit is so cute, i had been wanting to rent it for a few months but it was never available! I finally got it and was so not disappointed. Its so cute and casual but also very different with the open back. Im a huge jumpsuit girl, and this wasnt the easiest to get on/off, but still worth it!

I wore this to Sunday brunch and could not have been happier. Aside from the no bra situation, I could not have felt more comfortable, cute and classy. Definitely recommend for tons of different occasions! Very flattering! Lots of compliments from men and women!

I adore this guy. I wore for dinner and drinks with friends - fit is super flattering. I got tons of compliments, was worried it would be too heavy for summer but there's lots of airflow between the leg slots and back. It is a pretty heavy denim so if you're trying to wear in humid east coast summer it might be hard but in CA on a night out in spring / summer / winter -- it's perfect. Only FYI is that the denim fabric wrinkles easily - nothing a quick steam can't fix but good to know in case you want to throw it on straight out of the bag.
Rented this for a girls trip where we wore all white. Extremely comfortable and beyond flattering. Will rent again for sure! The back is exposed so you have to get creative with the bra situation.

links_reviews_title: love the style, looks relaxed but tailored. didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: open back, don't know how you'd wear a bra with it

I love how easy this jumpsuit is to wear - both because it's comfortable, and because it can be worn in so many circumstances. The details really make it special. I wore it both with a white camisole underneath and with just a bralette, which makes it appropriate for different circumstances. Felt infinitely cooler than I am while wearing it.

Great fit for someone with either a short or average size torso. Thick canvas-y material was nice because I did not have to worry about undergarments showing through but was light enough for a 75-degree day. Dressed up at night with heels and big earrings! Would rent again.

A little hard to get in and out of but great pockets and very comfy. Couldn't wear a bra but it seemed okay. Denim was thick enough. Not the best picture, it looked better in real life. Baggy in the butt though.
Perfect for an island getaway. Very comfortable and love the open back.
Fit true to size. Material is thick.
So comfortable and cute and pulled together. Can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Love the cut and look, back is a little weird can't wear to work because it's an open back
links_reviews_text: Nice fit
Wonderful jumpsuit. Fits well and is very stylish.

links_reviews_title: The coolest piece I've ever rented
links_reviews_text: I'm always obsessed with the cuts that Vince. creates. This did not disappoint. There are side slits (that go up to just the right amount of thigh) and the open back flaps are both some comfortable in the heat and also so sexy and fun. The fabric is a stretchy jean feel and very comfortable. I wore this on the most hot days of summer and felt effortless. The white was no issue. It was easy to remove stains with a stain stick. I honestly can't send this back!

Fit me true to size as a M/6-8 regularly in most things. Some Vince items I find I have needed to size down, but not this one. It's easy, breezy and chic. It has some funny shoulder ruffles that don't show in the photos but easily tuck in. Maybe they're meant to be tucked in? I don't know, but the high leg slits plus ruffle shoulder was too much for me- but a minor and easily remedied detail. Fun enough for a night out, wash enough to wear with sneakers during the day.
Comfy and flattering - for SO many compliments
The fit of this jumpsuit was amazing. It hugged in all the right places and the open back and slit pant legs made a 95 degree summer day bearable. Highly recommend

I loved this jumpsuit so much! It was perfect for a hot Saturday in the city and the torso length was great for my tall frame. It takes a little work getting in and out of for the bathroom, but you'll be fine :) Fabric is thick enough that undies don't show through and I got a ton of compliments. Love it!
So comfy

I was skeptical of this when I rented it, but it was very cute in person. it looked a little bit like a painters jumpsuit when I first pulled it out of the bag, but the way I styled it changed that. would recommend!
I wore this running errands and then to dinner--the open back was a fun touch. The front is quite low cut, and when you sit it poofs out a bit, so make sure you have something on underneath.

This jumpsuit fit great! I wore it on vacation and a friend wore it one night also. The stretch in the waist make its very comfortable, I was able to wear it from ferry to dinner and out. The slit on the sides are higher than I realized, but still provide great coverage. Open back is super fun and the material is thick enough you can go with or without a bra, not sheer at all.

A little boxy but a chunky belt helped. Not a style a would typically wear but it was a fun departure for a cool summer afternoon. It is white denim so it's a thicker jumpsuit. Wouldn't necessarily recommend for warm day.
Obsessed with this. So comfortable and glam. I had to pin the back shut so I could wear to work, but it is great for all occasions.

Loved this denim jumpsuit! Super comfortable and easy, wore multiple times with black lace bralette and sleek casual black loafers. Hid 20 week baby bump pretty well. Only inconvenience is the arm hole fabric had to keep getting tucked back in.
ABSOLUTELY LOVED LOVED LOVED EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS!
Being on the shorter side, I was concerned this would be too long but it ended up looking great. Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: nightmare to go to the bathroom in
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work (we have a casual dress vibe) and wow, I regret it. The fabric is bunching in the crotch area and I didn't realize how high/dramatic the side slits are - it's basically like I'm wearing shorts. The worst part is that the top piece of the romper is connected in the back by fabric, so in order to go to the restroom, you have to pull the top over your head (particularly unfortunate if you're wearing makeup) in order to take it off so you can pull the bottoms down.
The material is very thick. The romper looked like it should be worn at a karate studio.
So comfortable

links_reviews_title: Just stupidly comfy, yet casually sexy
links_reviews_text: So chill yet so cute. Bought it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this jumpsuit! I got a ton of compliments, super flattering and stylish!
links_reviews_text: It fit great! Super flattering and loved allof the little details. Perfect for summer!

I love this piece. It's so comfortable for the summer with the open back. The waistline is very flattering. The fabric is soft but still has nice structure so you don't get lost in the piece. I absolutely loved this. I wore it quite a few times and didn't want to have to return it!

links_reviews_title: one of my favorite items i've rented
links_reviews_text: this was gorgeous, flowy, and really easy to wear. note, there is a khaki colored piping around the shoulders you can't really see in many of the pics. definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: It for great and perfect for a day in the sun drinking wine!
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear for most body types
Open back so didn't wear a bra. Material is thicker but very flexible, soft and comfortable. Perfect for daytime party or happy hour
Was very comfortable and flatter for a petite frame

Loved loved loved this jumpsuit. Definitely want to rent again. Great summertime/warm weather piece. Super flattering, love the crisp white color. It's not great for a work function because you can't really wear a bra with it and it has an open back, but great for vacation or summertime casual daytime wear!
Vince, you get me. The coolest freaking piece. Great for travel because it's just one piece!! And so chic. Obsessed.
I've had this jacket for a couple of weeks and don't want to send it back! I received this with tags still on, the quality is high, and it's super versatile. Definitely a great rental.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This was an absolutely excellent jacket! The leather is soft and supple. It's perfect and I bought it!
The stud detail was really cool because it was just textured leather and didn't weigh down the jacket. Wish I would've sized up.

links_reviews_title: This jacket totally completed my whole look.
links_reviews_text: I love the embossed studded details and the coat just gives you an edgy look.

Would rent this again for any occasion, so cute and comfortable. I wore this while working a concert and received so many compliments. It was perfect for elevating my black jeans/black T-shirt outfit. This is definitely one of my absolute favorite pieces I've ever rented.
Absolutely perfect leather jacket. Wish I could buy it but maybe down the road!
They didn't have a medium so got a small and it worked out. It's very soft and can be dressed up or down. Nice details!

This jacket arrived new and I didn't want to return it. It was amazing! So soft and warm! The dark zippers, etc., opposed to silver, make it more versatile and dressy and not too "biker". Was able to wear light sweaters underneath. May need to buy!

links_reviews_title: Yes yes YES everything about this is so good
links_reviews_text: So many wonderful things about this jacket I don't know where to start! The color is amazing, pretty dark but definitely not black in person. The unusual color makes it extra special but it's still really easy to style. The pockets are large enough to keep your phone/wallet/keys/etc and zip closed without issue. The little flap pocket is a real pocket! The length is perfect for me, not too cropped for sometime with a large bust but it doesn't read as a long jacket. It's a classic style with the contrast hardware, but still felt polished enough to wear to work. Wore it several times in the first week and loved it so much I bought it. This one will definitely be a wardrobe hero.
Good shirt for work. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Fun take on a classic button up
links_reviews_text: While I didn't find this particularly flattering, it was fun to wear. I enjoyed the tie front and the unique take on a classic button up. I would say it runs small.

The fit was fine once you maneuver the bow situation. I can never tie a nice bow and this thick material made it that much more difficult. I wasn't the biggest fan of the snap on buttons. Overall the shirt is nice for it's unique wrap around/bow.
I'm a little less than happy with my mid-section so this is flattering and doesn't call attention to those areas
I loved this top. It looked super chic with leather leggings and heals.

links_reviews_title: A different take on a white button down
links_reviews_text: The shirt did absolutely nothing for me. I wanted to try it for a different spin on the white button down, which I love. It came out of the garment bag incredibly wrinkled. I ironed it and within five minutes it was incredibly wrinkled again. I just didn't feel it was flattering I wore it once to work

links_reviews_title: Pass on this. Not well done.
links_reviews_text: RtR has a bunch of these "button down with a big bow" shirts this season. Some are great. Rent one of those. This one is fine, but mostly a miss. It's very short (admittedly I have a long torso but I'm only 5'4"), which looks especially odd given the way it cinches under the bust for the bow. The way the shirt is cut around the bow makes it super incredibly breast focused. Almost so much that I wasn't sure it was work appropriate. It's a white button down! How can it not be work appropriate? They cut the under-boob area in a very weird way. I wore it, but felt a bit awkward in it. No complements or comments on it from anyone at work.
Great top with a tie waist to emphasize shape. This shirt snaps to button which is fun and a little sexy. Runs small in the shoulders I'd say, I'm a 6 and took a M. White isn't see through.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but for people with a larger chest it's just not flattering

links_reviews_text: This top is definitely cuter on the model's pic. I ended up with a size L but perhaps the M would have fit nicer.
Little short waisted

links_reviews_title: Does not look like the picture
links_reviews_text: Looks nothing like the picture and super disappointed. The top is more cropped and not as long as it looks. Ties are also difficult and can look messy if done incorrectly. Go up a size and make sure to wear something high waisted on the bottom if renting.

links_reviews_title: The tie on the front is much flimsier than you would expect - not like the photo
links_reviews_text: It's a very regular white button down - the tie on the front looks more like a rope.

Short had potential but came poorly dry cleaned, so the material didn't look great and he tie in front didn't look right. However, as I mentioned this may have been due to it being poorly dry cleaned.
Shirt is short

The top style didn't suit me because of my petite yet broad shouldered frame. But I'd guess it would look well on a longer torso. Material was thick and comfortable. I didn't end up wearing it after trying it but that's mostly due not suiting me.

links_reviews_title: I should have sized up for this one
links_reviews_text: This is a case where the photos look much better than the item on. The sash was nearly impossible to tie and it ran very small.
Nice short but wrinkles VERY easily. I very much liked the colonial feel it gave.

links_reviews_title: Fit nicely, really cute. Would rent again
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely, really cute. Would rent again
This piece is really special, and i found it to be very flattering...great if you have a smaller waist, helps show it off!
A little short and boxy
Runs ridiculously small, didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Meh, boring top and not flattering
links_reviews_text: I was hoping for a more stylish and high quality material from Scott and Soda and was disappointed in this boring and unflattering top. I have large should and have a hard time picking between medium and large. The large was a weird fit and short in the torso. When you tied the bow it really pooched out in the back and required a lot of tugging and adjusting. Big disappointment on this item, I returned and did not wear.
Easy to wear with a lot of things! Runs TTS.

links_reviews_title: Love this skirt! A little glamorous but also professional
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, drapes well. Perfect length for a tall girl (5'9"). I loved this skirt with tall suede boots and a leather jacket.
I loved this skirt! The length is perfect for winter. It was super cute and comfortable. The blue shade made it a bit more fun than a classic satin skirt.
So trendy and fun to wear. Seams are a little funky but love this skirt

Such a fun print skirt but definitely runs a bit large - I'm a 4/6 and the 4 was a little big on me. It was also a bit longer on me than it looked on the model (I'm 5'4) but was so cute that I still made it work! Looks great with sweaters or crop tops. Material is very silky and thin so can get cold if you wear it in the winter!
easy to wear and super comfy. dress up or down. the perfect midi length.

This skirt is a flattering bias cut and so pretty. It's oddly versatile - it's pretty for work or a night out, but it really wants to be swapped out for a pair of jeans because it's even better with sneakers and an old tee. It ran like a 10 in the waist but a 12 in the hips, so I'd size up to a 12 if you carry most of your weight in the waistline. For fit: I am 5'4", and a 10-12 on the bottom. I took a star off for the polyester sateen fabric - at this price point, it could have been silk.
Wore this skirt to work and to a party, it's easy to dress up or down. Runs slightly large, so I'm glad I sized down the the 4, which fit perfectly.
have wanted to try the leopard midi skirt trend without being too on the nose - the blue makes it so fun! it fit very well, slightly big but i like not feeling squished.
I wore this with a cute black top for a night at a bar but it could be dressed down to be worn in the day. Looks great with long or short sleeves. Fun rental

Great fit, great material, beautiful pale blue color. Flowy & flirty!! Only snag is that the zipper sort of pops up a little, creating a little bump on the back. Didn't bother me, but definitely worth noting.

links_reviews_title: Great spin on animal in the light blue
links_reviews_text: Fit nice a bit straighter than anticipated, only slight Aline

links_reviews_title: I loved this skirt! I was so close to buying it. The perfect spin on cheetah but with color.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, super comfortable fit, nice length and color.

links_reviews_title: fun color and print to spice things up on a normal day
links_reviews_text: i wore this for everyday wear - i mixed it up with white booties and wore plain black tops or a black blazer. it's thin and unlined like a slip...but oddly flattering! I sized down like another reviewer said and she was correct. It's best if it fits on the waist.
Loved this skirt! I'm a true 4 and the 2 was too big. Will order again, but a 0.
I am hourglass shaped and was unsure about this style of skirt, was alot more flattering than I imagined and it fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Cool, without being too "silk leopard midi skirt"
links_reviews_text: Similar to another reviewer, I wanted to sample the silk leopard midi skirt trend without wearing a literal silk leopard midi skirt. This blue alternative proved *very* cool - trendy enough to be on point - while not being a lame copy. I wore it with a black cropped turtle neck and felt very, very cool. My hips are more than 10 inches wider than my waist, so I was worried about sizing up, but the 4 fit like a dream. Hit in my natural waist, and accommodated my butt and thighs. It was probably too long to really be considered midi, but still very cool. 5/5 will wear again!
The fit is large, size down if you want it to be high-waisted.
This is perfect for work. Very flattering and true to size
This was really cute and I was even able to wear a light layer under it as we were going to be outside in the cold. Loved it!
Rented for date night. Easy to wear. Fits true to size. Didn't get much use because of quarantine but will rent again.
This was a great, comfortable top for work. I have a slender torso, and so the wrap tie wouldn't go as tight as I'd have liked it, but was flattering nonetheless. Good quality.
this was awful and I don't even remember ordering this.
Fabric felt cheap. Runs very small
Love this shirt. Got a lot of compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top for work or dinner
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top, lovely material. Loved the wrap and ruffle detail but wound up not wearing it anywhere. Had planned to wear it to work but didn't for a couple of reasons. One, I've gained a bit of weight around the waist so the fit wasn't quite right. Two, I appreciate the interior buttons to help keep the wrap in place, but the buttons were hard to deal with. Bummed it didn't work out.

LOVE this blouse. Will rent again for sure. The material feels like a crepe. Fit is great. I'm tempted to buy it. I wish the wrist buttons were a little easier to button, they're a little inconvenient.
Very flattering blouse. I have wide shoulders and a thicker waist - this was slimming and fit nicely. I could see possibly buying this, it would make a great staple.
Ordered this for an interview and it was beautiful. Great quality and fit really well. Would buy.
I think this top is adorable and feminine. Fit true to size but I think if you are busty you may want to size up so it stays closed. Will rent again.
Absolutely loved this. If it goes on sale I'll definitely buy it. Fit perfectly and was very flattering. One of my favorite rental tops for sure.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments in this top!
links_reviews_text: Very nice material and fit.
Loved the fit and would definitely wear this again.

Wore this on a date night with jeans and heels. Really nice way to elevate a Friday night outfit! Very comfortable and flattery. Only con is having to unbutton the sleeves in order to get it on and off (fit tighter around wrists)
This was a gorgeous skirt but it did not fit me so I had to return it without even wearing it.
Ha ha ha I cannot even get the wrap around my body. It was way way way too small

Not gonna lie -- I saw Paige from Summer House on Bravo wearing these and I totally stole her look!!! I loved these as something different on a more mild winter day. They're great quality and kept their shape all day. Definitely would recommend renting these pretty shorts!
Loved the color and the fit

links_reviews_title: Rented for nice night out in NYC, wore with tights, black top and a blazer and it was perfect
links_reviews_text: Need to have a belt you can wear with this.

Easy wear shorts that look luxe. Great color, fun flirty fit and show plenty of leg while maintaining full butt coverage. Would absolutely rent again but in a smaller size as they were definitely baggy (normally between 2-4).
Way too much material and too wide in the hips that it makes you look a lot bigger than you are unless you size down. I was able to cinch the waist to fit but it just wasn't worth it.

links_reviews_title: Very chic and stylish shorts for both every day and nighttime wears
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and the fit of the shorts. They did wrinkle fairly easily but that's to be expected with this fabric.
These shorts were so fun. They are great with a sports bra or with a tight shirt tucked in. They travel well. @jessicapaige.la

Loved these high waisted olive shorts. They had a chic structured look and were long enough for me to still feel confident (I don't generally wear shorts). Paired with a pale pink RTR top, Rose gold pumps, and Burberry bag. Great summer date look.
they run really big- I normally wear an 8 but got a 10 cause they were out of 8. Way too large. Would've ordered a 6

links_reviews_title: Show stopping shorts, with flare and just enough coverage to get away with them at work.
links_reviews_text: Amazing and flattering, dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Can be dressed up or down. Wore this as a stylish alternative to wearing a dress .
links_reviews_text: Crotch can be a bit baggy given the style.

links_reviews_title: Such a great alternative for holiday party attire!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and had these cool sizing adjuster things on the waistband. I wore with pantyhose and battled with not showing the shorts portion of the hose but I have really chunky thighs so might not be a problem for everyone. All said soooo cute and expensive looking. A comfortable alternative to a holiday dress! Hope to have another occasion to rent these again.

Really liked the how the modern cut and satiny fabric elevated these shorts. The fit was very comfortable and true to size. The belted waist made for a flattering look. I dressed them down but can imagine how cute they would be dressed up for evening

I wish I bought these shorts. They were sooooo flattering and comfortable. I consistently received compliments on them. The color is a bit off in my picture because of a filter but the color is perfect for fall, and the cinched waist paired with the belt really accentuates your curves so that your body is highlighted in all the right places. True to size. Definitely recommend.
Loved this piece for working on location in costa rica. Very professional but sexy and fun
These shorts are so well-made and beautiful on. The high waist makes them look great on a variety of shapes.

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the style
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love these shorts but the fit if them wasn't all that flattering. If you have thick tights, a butt and hips.. opt to size up. Also, beware of the 'extea piuch' look it gives if you don't size up. Overall, love the high waist and color.

links_reviews_title: Most flattering shorts I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: I'm so in love with these shorts - they're incredibly flattering because they nip in the waist and the wide openings make your legs look super slim. Paired them with a cropped black sweater. Definitely wearing a few more times before I send back!
Great for vacation! Especially running around in 90 degree weather. It was high waisted enough for me to get away with a sports bra. Runs a bit big though, but manageable with the belt.

Probably my fav thing I've rented l. These pants cinch your waist and then leave room for a thicker thigh. I think the belt may come separate from the pants so MAKE SURE to grab the belt as well. It's so necessary. I wore these three times.
These are so fun! Loved wearing them, got lots of compliments. Perfect for summer -- short without showing too much behind. Super luxe. Would def rent again!

Some would say they fit big, however being a former model -these are cut true to size. The material is beautiful, the style and cut are perfection. You will feel like a million dollars walking in these shorts
Loved these but the 10 was to large. Sizing down to 8. Being fair I am between sizes but you are safe to go with the smaller of your two sizes. Quality and cut is fab otherwise.

Lustrous satin adds instant dress-up appeal to these easy-to-style shorts we love from 3.1 Phillip Lim. My typical size runs between a 0 and 2 but was told these run large by another RTR user. I rented the 0 and felt these were still a bit long in the torso. Overall - the paperbag waistline is adorable, length is perfect, fabric and color are stunning. Would recommend for dates, weekend, and everyday wear.
I did not wear these as the size was too large.

links_reviews_title: These short are huge - run really big.
links_reviews_text: Darling but size down.
it was baggy
The high waist looked great on, and the secret waist tabs were genius. All pants/shorts should have these!
These were great! The waist was adjustable (buttons on the inside), plus the belt helped too. Without the belt, these would have run too large; however, they were perfect.

I purchased white boots so rented these pants to match those boots and it worked perfectly well together. Size 2 is my usual size but it runs large. I'll rent it again when smaller size becomes available.
Fun look to wear to work with tights and ankle boots.

These are beautiful shorts that can be dressed up or down. They definitely run big however because of the paper bag waist and the D ring belt, you can cinch it as tight as need be and it still looks good. I rented these to try on in advance of an upcoming trip and I plan to rent again because I think they will be perfect. For photos of my daily rentals check out my IG @luxeandlouche :)

These are perfect weekend-about-town shorts. Paired with a sleeveless black top tucked in but could do any number of ways. Size fits well and style is forgiving for a big eating day. True to size or a little large.

I really like these shorts. I was thrown off at first by how big they are around the waist, but there are adjustable buttons on the sides that cinch the waist in more. The 4 was still big but wearable and I don't think it was noticeable. I wore these for a Christmas party (in California where the temp. was pretty mild) with black tights and a cropped black turtleneck sweater. I could see how these would be pretty versatile in other seasons too and would definitely rent again.
Fit was a little large but wow, these shorts do wonders for the legs and waist!

links_reviews_title: I love that the clothing always arrives perfectly dry cleaned.
links_reviews_text: The material and color were fantastic. Fit was true to size. I wish I knew the belt was in the garment bag. Next time, I would suggest having the accessory around the hanger of the item.
received lots of compliments
They are very high waisted amd run large
These were quite big so I used a tight belt to keep them waist level. Other than that, they were cute and well made.
Great shorts for dressing up date night on a summer's day! Runs high waisted so top may cover top part if you don't tuck in. Runs a tad large but gives a loose appearance.

links_reviews_title: Great concept but it didn't quite work for me
links_reviews_text: It's a quality dress with beautiful sleeve detail. However I didn't like the fit on me. It should have been a lot more fitted at waist and a little longer. It rode up when I was sitting down and made me feel too exposed at work.

links_reviews_title: Cute but too short for work
links_reviews_text: Cute if you want to show off some legs! Definitely not work wear
Very comfortable. A little short for work but wore with black tights and worked well.
Fits perfect, looks amazing. Tons of compliments. Really a knock out dress. The snap at the top tends to pop so I wore a tank underneath, otherwise totally perfect

This dress was perfect for day to night. I felt beautiful in it yet powerful too! Wore it to court (and won). Comments regarding sleeves are true. Some maneuvering is involved. Dress runs big, but I still loved it.
Not your simple black dress. Drama in the arms, sexy with a masculine and feminine feel. This dress was so much fun to wear. It was short when sitting down, but standing up, I was on a power trip.
Loved this as a dress but it was a bit too short so I wore it as a jacket.
Love! Prefer slightly larger as it can be a bit short but the fabric is amazing and flattering.
Super comfy n sexy black dress. The sleeves make it unique & an eye catcher. Tons of compliments

My bust is disproportionate with the rest of my body, and I was able to pull off a medium without a ton of gapping between buttons. I wore a black slip underneath just to be safe. I ended up using double-sided tape on the sleeves because they kept getting in the way when I was trying to type.

Usually I'm a small in Amanda U. I rented the 2 and it felt a little loose. I wore a lace tank top for work because the snap button kept on coming off and I didn't want to have wardrobe malfunction at work. I give it a 4 because The sleeves can be a little annoying when eating and for work. Overall is a beautiful trendy dress. I recommend it.

This dress was very flattering, nice thickness to the material, etc, but SO fussy! I literally couldn't sit down in it because it would ride up and be to short (and I'm 5'4"!). It looked polished and nice but just wasn't practical in any way.

links_reviews_title: I looked like Dracula, fit me like a huge cape!
links_reviews_text: I was so excited for this to arrive, it looks amazing in pictures. It was huge on me, not flattering on my petite waistline. Unfortunately I could wear it.
I was so excited to try on this dress but it was wayyyy too big on me and the sleeves looked very awkward.

links_reviews_title: Cute and trendy - but short when you sit!
links_reviews_text: So great for desk to dinner! Feels sexy but professional, except when you sit down! Yikes. Rides all the way up. Need tights and don't wear around conservative people.

links_reviews_title: Very nice - lots of compliments - fit true to size. I love this brand.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect, perfect for office to evening.
The snap at the top of the front of the dress did not stay on. Every time that I sat down or leaned forward it unsnapped. I had to use a safety pin to keep it together.

links_reviews_title: I always wear a medium. If you have a large bust, order up 1 size.
links_reviews_text: The quality of this dress is great. The buttons are very secure. I loved the style and the material. I didn’t get to wear this dress because the buttons wouldn’t button over my chest. I always wear a medium for this reason. This medium did NOT fit.
good fit, stylish, comfortable
Great dress. Not super flashy. I wore it with fun stockings and heels. Very versatile. It's not really a knockout piece. But it's comfortable and a solid winner.
Got a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but arms too small
links_reviews_text: I have pretty big arms so the dress was constricting. Loved the design of the dress, but was uncomfortable due to restricted movement in arms. Fit everywhere else and it was just okay. Recommend for tall and lean women. Muscular or petite, this one isn't for you.
Loved this dress! I wore is as a jacket and plan on wearing it this week as a dress. Huge fan of the sleeves and the fit!
Very cute but the snap at the top kept coming undone. Also could have been a little more fitted. But a fun dress to rent and wear once.

links_reviews_title: Looking sharp at work with a twist!
links_reviews_text: I wore this over jeans as a long blazer. Looked really classic with a twist. The open sleeves were eye-catching (& admittedly a bit annoying when eating or washing hands)... but provided great flair for presenting in front of a room!!!

links_reviews_title: Sexy and professional all in one!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, super professional, modern and sexy at the same time. Definitely will rent again

I loved this! The 2R fit well, although I probably could have sized down to a 0R - but I liked having a little extra looseness. The color is vibrant but not over the top, and the gathering at the shoulder is so pretty and interesting. I love the high neckline! This wasn't too long for me (5'2") and looked really flattering. I wore this to my office and to court with a cropped tweed blazer. It's a great look! I would definitely recommend this dress.

Wore this for my first day at a new gig and made me feel super confident! A bit long for my 5'4" self, but still loved the shape. Toward end of day it was a bit uncomfortable in the neck/arm area, but just because it is not stretchy material... still a win!

links_reviews_title: Great color, fit and neckline. A workplace hit
links_reviews_text: This dress was a winner - from color to neckline and length to cut/fit. Perfect work option.

Loved this dress. Length was just at knees (I'm 5'9) and fit was slim and flattering. The slit in the back was a bit high so if you're looking for something very conservative, this may not be your best option.

Got this to present at a conference & it was a big hit. Ended up wearing it with boots & a jean jacket for a simple day in the office. Wish I could keep it, but the price tag is a bit high for me now. Will definitely rent again. I tend to wear between a 14-16 and the 14 fit perfectly. I'm also very tall & the length was right to my knees. Perfect!

I loved the color and the detail on the back of the dress that is hard to tell from pictures. It's longer (to mid calf) so beware if you are short. It also has a small/mock turtleneck. Great choice for fall

links_reviews_title: Runs TTS. The length worked for my petite frame.
links_reviews_text: TTS. Dress is lined.

links_reviews_title: great simple dress with nice neckline/details for work.
links_reviews_text: eggplant color, hits below knee, fits well, nice detail on shoulder (rouching)

links_reviews_title: Could not walk in this dress
links_reviews_text: After reading reviews saying the slit was high, I'm confused because I didn't feel that way at all. I'm 5'7" and the dress hit about 2" below my knees and was very constricting around my legs and knees. I could walk with only short steps. Overall the dress looked cute and is a pretty color, but not comfortable to walk around in and wear all day.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but too small. Unable to wear

links_reviews_text: The length and fit of this dress is perfect for work. It felt great on, and I got lots of compliments.
The lining was weird and it did not fit well.
I bought it for a conference and the color is not really as pictured. It's a little lighter than the photo and a bit longer past the knee than expected. Otherwise, good fit!
Gorgeous color but too long on me... that made it feel too formal.

I wore this to speak at a conference and felt really good. The 4 stars is based on the fit being a hair off because I have a longer torso. The material feels upscale and is comfortable. The dress is a true midi length - well below knee - so it probably works best on those 5'6" and taller. Looked great with knee high boots.
Very flattering, fully lined, great color and perfect length for work (just below the knee). Interesting detail on the shoulders. True to size.
Size 8 felt great and very form fitting!
Perfect for a day to night look. Loved the fit and color. Runs true to size.
I wish I had worn this dress with my hair up, the clasps at the nape of the neck are cute. Love the color. The one-shoulder detail was subtle, so the dress needed pairing with statement pieces.
My favorite rental for work. Probably best for taller people.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. The fit the color the style was truly amazing.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and stylish. The color was amazing. I will certainly consider renting this again.

links_reviews_title: It ran right around my hips, not if this is just my body type though.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and flattering cut overall.
Cons- Longer than expected. Still loved it with tall heels. Pros - True to size. Great color!

links_reviews_title: Take small strides in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: Small strides only in this dress! Perfect for super high heels it seems if you're walking like that any way! The dress fit gorgeous! A perfect size 4, but I felt like an idiot walking and throwing myself butt First into my car!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this with Ted baker suit jacket
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect great for work!

links_reviews_title: Love the many options and service RTR provides
links_reviews_text: Great thick fabric. Beautiful dress but not for a shorty.
Pretty straight up and down so found the shape a bit tough for my curves... especially my tush. The lining kept wanting to bunch in the back
I loved this dress, it's so modest until you turn around. The dress split was just too high for my liking.
This worked nicely for wearing to work and then to a fundraiser in the evening. It did run pretty large and would have been much more flattering if I had sized down.
fit nicely
I wore this to a work party. I felt like the classiest dressed woman there. I really want to save up to buy this dress. Unforgettable!
It was a bit large overall, and the color was a brighter purple than I'd like at work.
I loved this dress but the 6 was too big. I'll rent again but will get the 4. I'm almost always a 6 in RTR dresses.

The fit is a little odd. Really long midi length and it never really feel right on the top and mid section. It wasn't super tight. It is definitely a comfortable style and pretty easy to wear. Just kind of so-so overall.

I thought this dress looked a little matronly when I initially put it on. It runs slightly large as well so size down if you are in between sizes. I work on tv and it looked FANTASTIC on air - very professional.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a warm Fall day
links_reviews_text: Color is gorgeous and the fit even better! Love this dress. Will rent again for Sure!

The color is nice and I like the top portion of the dress. I typically wear a 6 in dresses and this one was too big-I definitely needed to size down to a 4. The hem is too long, ending well below the knees, which looks frumpy on me. I sent it back immediately.
This was so comfy and I love it so much. Sweatpants meets overalls, the greatest crossover in history. I recommend if you want to be cute and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable & very versatile staple piece!
links_reviews_text: great fit, loved this jumpsuit!
I wanted to love these, but I didn't know how to style, and they weren't flattering on my hips. They are perfect for hanging out with my toddlers though. Comfy and full coverage.
I wore this to work and it's like being in your PJs. It's make of a sweatpants like soft material but it doesn't look too casual.

These are THE best. I wore them one day with a tee and another with just a sports bra - hey, we're not going anywhere right now but I'd also rock that look outside in the right setting. They are so soft. I am a 4/6 and the M was excellent.
I'm sad to send this back. The fit was perfect and it was so comfortable- I wore it twice. Definitely will rent again.
Honestly already regretting sending these back. Might need to rent again and buy. I loved them. They're so comfortable and sporty and perfect for a day of travel or errands. Wish I'd kept!

Loveeee the fit of these jeans i need to own these. Very true to size and flattering. I wore these in winter so I say these are seasonless but others might argue just for summer. Either way dress up how every fits you best and own it!
I'm usually a 28 but I'm happy I sized down for these. They were tight at first but stretched out and were perfect. Keeping for a second month!!

links_reviews_title: Best shape and fit but wrinkles
links_reviews_text: Very flattering pants, and comfortable but material under knee wrinkles very easily

These were really fun, baggy jeans that still felt sexy on. I don't think I would ever buy in the store as they're a bit trendy for me. They stood out enough that you couldn't easily get away with wearing them over and over again. But I really enjoyed a one-time rental. Paired them with tighter tops to balance the big flair. I liked that the fabric was super thick so I could wear a shirt that tucked in (even the black one in the photos) without it showing.
So comfy and so cute in person.

links_reviews_title: Fits great and super cute for summer
links_reviews_text: The jeans fit great. They are perfect for summer. I am 5'9 and 130 and 25 fit perfectly (little snug around waist).

links_reviews_title: Still haven't found the right pair
links_reviews_text: I've been trying to find the perfect pair of wide leg pants that don't stretch out after one wear for two years. Unfortunately, these are not them. They are a nice thick fabric that is not see through (important for white pants) but they were baggy and boxy after one wear. I am 5'3 and did have use to fashion Velcro to quick hem these pants when I wore them. I'm a 24 at madewell and I wore a 26.

links_reviews_title: Really well made, comfy, and flattering
