links_reviews_text: sadly I think maybe I'm just not a white pants kinda gal! Runs true to size, and I disagree about the waist being tight, it gaped just a little on me. I'm 5'9" average build, regular size 6, with a pretty long torso
I had to order a size up because my size wasn't available. They still fit okay except the length was longer than I would've liked. Comfortable though.

I never white denim because I either find it too skin tight (like when it suctions at the knees, am I right?!) or too maw maw. These were awesome. I got tons of compliments about how cool a look they were. They fit firmly but not too snug in the waist and butt, and then go straight down without grabbing your legs. They were also much cooler than normal jeans in 90+ degree weather. I would buy them but I don't think I need them all the time, so just a fun renting option!

links_reviews_title: I loved these pants - comfortable and flattering while still making a statement.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments throughout the night! They fit perfectly and as expected, and are a true high waist fit. Cannot recommend enough!

No stretch and button fly = a little sucking it in to get them fastened the first time! ;) The loosened up just a tad, but didn't stretch out, even after a couple wears. The denim is quite heavy... good for hiding lines and bumps that white bottoms often show! But not the most comfy as a result. Fit was good and they are finished at the hem so look nice. Wore with navy/white top (untucked) and flats to church and teal button down (tucked) with wedges to work. Also looked cute with a T and sneakers!

I've been searching for pants like these for over a year and they finally made them!! High waisted, thick enough that they're not see through, wide leg but still fitted enough in the butt. Love them! I sized down because I have smaller thighs and they were a little right in the waist/crotch so I'd say they're true to size.
Cute jeans. A little snug at the waist. Great for petites.
Worn with a brand new Sanctuary Starry Night Faux Fur Jacket and the color of the lining bled into the white jeans

links_reviews_title: Beautiful High Waisted Pants - Runs a little small
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. Easy to pair with tons of things to fit your personal style. As a fairly short person, I've often found wide-leg pants, especially high-waisted, would overwhelm my frame. However, these balanced those issues perfectly. Especially love how wide the legs are. I wish I had sized up a bit as they really are smaller in the waist than the rest of the pant. But overall, recommend.

Sooo cute and would have definitely have loved them but seriously y'all I could hardly even get them over my thighs much less to my waist. Buttoning was out of the question and I am consistently a size 29. I mean it was terrible lol. I'd post a picture but I couldn't even get them on. I am curvier on the bottom with thicker thighs and butt but still my typical size 29 fit like a 26/27. So! Rent, but size up!!
Sadly, couldn't get these on. But they are cute so just size up!

links_reviews_title: great pants--fun for summer when you don't want to be in shorts. Fabric is thick which matters!
links_reviews_text: every day essential! felt together dressing this up and down--love it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit in the waist, balloons at the knee
links_reviews_text: Might just be the larger sizes but at 29 these pants looked ridiculous on. They were a great fit at the waist, butt, and hips (true 29, maybe a little small) but the pants flared a ridiculous amount at the knee. Unwearable
I own pants by this designer and these are not true to size. Couldn't even get over hips :(
I rented these in the size I usually get my jeans in - 27 - and while I could button them, they were suuuuuper tight at the thighs and waist, I couldn't wear them out of my apt.
Wanted these to work, but runs very small! No chance of buttoning (and even crop was short with my height)
These do not stretch what so ever but the fit is so good. Tight in the waste and wide leg. I have a hard time finding jeans that fit my waste because my hips are wide. These did that.
Love, love, love !
Definitely ran small due to not having any stretch, the wide leg was a good cut - not too crazy
Was very excited about these pants but unfortunately they did not fit. I normally wear as size 30-31 but these didn't even come close to buttoning.
These pants have noooo stretch at all. I usually wear a size 28 in jeans but went for a 29 after reading some of the reviews. Couldn't even button them up. Nice pants but run very tight/small.
Great kick at the ankle but fit all sorts of odd at the fly.
Pants fit very well and are snug around the hips. Wore these several times.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought them!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for summer and to dress up a simple tank. Loved them so much I purchased!

I loved these pants. Super fun and perfect for spring/summer. After reading the reviews and RTR recommended size, I got a 27. Way too big in the waist and thighs. Still wore it for a casual look, but wish I went down a size. Then I rented them AGAIN because they were so cute and got a 26. Much better!
The fit was fine they just weren't flattering on me. Better for taller + skinnier people.
Material was great but these were huge (both waist and legs)! I am usually a size 28 and I am returning for a 26.
I loved the style but the waist was so small I couldn't even button them. I do not have a small waist but this was crazy.

I struggled with returning these! I often hate most white jeans but these were an exception - good material/not see-through. I am normally a 27 in high-waisted jeans (28 regular) and they were a bit snug when I first put them on but stretched a bit throughout the day. They are definitely more wide-legged than portrayed on the model

Love the fabric- very flowy and soft and understated floral print. The fit and cut is super flattering and perfect for a curvy body. It's cut in at the high waist and flares out at wrists and hips. V neck is perfect amount- not too low. Side zipper allows for a nice fit

links_reviews_title: I wore this shirt a bunch before I returned it. So freaking flattering !!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed and should probably buy it

links_reviews_title: Great blouse for weekend or work
links_reviews_text: Great quality blouse for the weekend or for the office (with underlay got v-neck). Not see-through, not too fitted, and flattering.
I ended up really liking the fit and pattern of this top!
I didnt have high expectations for this, it looks just like a plain blouse, BUT dont be fooled, this has a beautifully fitted shape courtesy of the side zip. Very flattering

Don't be like me and try to squeeze this over your head before you realize there's a hidden zipper on the side! Cute blouse for work or dressing down with jeans on the weekend, nothing special but cute nonetheless.
Love the fit of this top, it was very slimming and amazing quality!

links_reviews_title: The shirt runs small but is a pretty color
links_reviews_text: It's a bit tight on the top if you have a full bust and a little baggy on the bottom of the shirt

links_reviews_title: Runs small and not great quality
links_reviews_text: I tried on this top for work and it was too small. It felt like a shrunken top on me. I also didn't like the quality of the top. It didn't feel professional enough.
Fit was perfect. Great with jeans for work. True to size
This was the perfect everyday top to throw on for work with Jeans.

I love the print, fabric, fit, everything. It was So flattering and versatile. I don't think I can swing the price to own it but I will be so sad to send it back. I have broad shoulders and a small waist and it just hit in all the right places. Highly recommend.

A got a lot of compliments on these cool jeans. They weren't as high waist as I'd like. A little tight as in almost no stretch. I was surprised by how tight they were, runs small? I can fit in some 28 but these were size 29 and fit perfectly tight and right.

Love these jeans! The lines really make your curves stand out. Also I usually have a hard time finding pants with high enough waist but these hit perfectly at my waist and are super comfy. I did have to size up 1 size since I'm normally at 26 and the 27s were a great fit. Also because I'm petite, they were a bit longer but these totally work cuffed. Wore these several times!!

Loved these jeans!! they did seem to run a little small, i'm typically a 28 or 29 and wore a 30 in these but loved the fit and the detail was so fun! I almost only ever wear black skinny jeans because I can never find anything else I like, but these were by far the best jeans ever.

Fit perfectly, length was just right for my 5'8" frame. The denim has a slightly old school, structured, heavier feel which I liked. The seams are the star of the show - so unique. These are jeans I want to buy and wear pretty much every day! This was my first RTR order. I didn't know what to expect and had never worn Jason Wu 3x1 jeans before, but am a fan now. I ordered 2 different styles, and both fit perfectly. How long can we keep these things...? lol, hope you aren't looking for my size, I think I'm going to have these for a while! ;-) P.s. blouse is Prabal Gurung Collective Flutter Sleeve Blouse Size 6

I love these jeans! They have diagonal piecing on the front which I found flattering. On my 5'6" frame they hit right at the ankle, which I liked. The size 31 just barely is large enough. Cuts in a bit when I sit down. Probably should have sized up to the 32. But these are so cute, I'm going to wear them anyway! Note: I did get the size 32 and found those much more comfortable to wear. I'd consider buying these, except the price is much too high. Normally I wear size 10 pants.

links_reviews_title: These pants were super cute. They were easy to style and I got many complements throughout the day.
links_reviews_text: They fit comfortably and the denim was great quality.

links_reviews_title: Only jeans I've ever enjoyed wearing
links_reviews_text: These jeans fit me so perfectly and were unbelievably comfortable. I don't know about you, but I absolutely despise wearing jeans; they're always uncomfortable and almost never fit right in all the right places. These jeans, however, were so amazing I actually wanted to wear them all day every day. I cannot rave enough about them
Absolutely loved these jeans. The look is so unique and I got many different compliments. They may be a bit on the small size but nothing enough to really cause that much of an issue.

The fit was okay on these jeans, the waist was a tad small. The reason I didn't wear them is that the seaming in front is bulky and when you sit down or bend, the seams dug into my abdomen. The style is super cute, wish the seaming was better designed.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but run so small
links_reviews_text: I had been eyeing these jeans to rent for a while and was super excited to wear them. I read the reviews and decided to size up a whole size- heading the warning that they run small. Well I should have gone up 2 sizes on these jeans. Keep in mind they hit more on the hip when considering a size. Overall cute jeans, would rent again in a bigger size.
I wore these pretty much every day I had them and got so many compliments. Highly considering buying them.
Super cool. Thought they were to funky for me at first but when I got them I considered buying! Look super cool in person!

links_reviews_title: loved it fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: great denim feel
Structured jeans with unique tailoring. Take a break from the usual jeans that we've been wearing for a decade, and enjoy this unique pair.
The overall style was right on. I sized up from a 30 waist and these were still too tight. Too short, too. I realize that is the style. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Probably more flattering if you have long skinny legs.

links_reviews_text: The texture is rigid, thick and feels 'safe'. It is definitely not the type of thin or medium thickness and soft feeling jeans. My body type is more suitable for such soft jeans instead of a quite structured one. Otherwise it's a nice designed, good quality and unique everyday jeans.

links_reviews_title: Little bit of a strange fit
links_reviews_text: The seams along the front of the jeans ran straight across my kneecap and were a little uncomfortable when I bent my knees. Fun design and different than my everyday jeans though.

I'm usually a 28. Got these at the rtr store and happened to try the 29 which fit perfectly. It wasn't great on me. I liked the interesting front. Very high waist. Thick, no stretch - which I also liked. All in all not for me.
I am only 5'5" but they felt too short. Very comfortable, and interesting pattern. Need to wear a shorter shirt with these.
these were super comfortable to wear.. i always get nervous getting jeans from RTR because the fit can be a bit unpredictable for my body type but it fit perfectly. Wore it multiple times!

links_reviews_title: Would have enjoyed but definitely needed a 25 (got 24).
links_reviews_text: Super cute, but was looking for a lounging feel and the 24 just wasn't that.
fits loosely around legs fit perfectly around my waist. The details on the jeans are so cute!
While the design is interesting because of the stitching, the fabric is too stiff which doesn't work with my body type. They fit funny around the crouch. I won't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Not as big as the reviews say
links_reviews_text: Great, fun Jeans. I got a size up after reading reviews and they were kind of huge.
No stretch - jeans I wear a size 26 and this 26 was TIGHTTT
These were cut snug through the thighs but not too tight. I found them comfortable and super flattering.
I got these for some casual time in NYC.

links_reviews_title: Good jeans to try a style I usually wouldn't wear.
links_reviews_text: High waisted, best with a tight short tucked in or a tie-wist.

links_reviews_title: I wore these jeans a lot
links_reviews_text: Jeans fit well
rums small on the thigh area
I ordered the size 32R but they were entirely too small. Great quality jeans and cute design but the sizing seems off hence the 3 stars.
Not my normal style but ended up loving this one- comfortable and a pop of color

links_reviews_title: Great blouse! Silky luxe and beautiful print
links_reviews_text: Paired with the veronica beard pants I already owned. This was just me trying on. Love love! Plan to wear out this weekend

A dress shirt, jeans and boots is as close to Texas fashion as I'll get and this worked! Very chic blouse, fit beautifully. It's very lightweight but not sheer, 100% silk. Also someone at a work function spilled Chanpagne on me and it dried instantly. A winner!
Fun colorful top! Wore it to work and out to dinner. Fit is true to size.
I'm obsessed with this top. It's incredible quality and ridiculously slimming! You can't go wrong with this one.
Something different. Wouldn't buy but fun to wear.
Wore this with leather leggings for a evening out. Phenomenal look and fit. Blouse is light material.
Loved this button down silk blouse. The pattern is great for fall. Can be dresses up or down.

This was a beautiful silky blouse with gorgeous painterly colors and details. I wore this to speak at a conference and I just wanted to wear it forever. It was enough to be funky and interesting, but still wholly professional. I ended up wearing it several times and very seriously thought about buying it. Perfect for the fall, but works any type of year. Outstanding!

A more interesting take on the classic work button down. Comfortable material. If you're busty like me, you probably need to safety pin in chest area, but otherwise fits nicely. Stand out in a meeting while feeling polished.
DVF worthy top. Paired it to create a super funky outfit! Definitely a must rent.

links_reviews_title: If you've never rented a DVF top, do it
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 2x, but the XL fit me. I got so many comments on this top: it made a pair of jeans seem fashion forward. The fabric was awesome and the pattern was eye catching. Love DVF!
This was the perfect tip to wear for my presentation. It's fit well was brightly colored and made me feel powerful. A beauty

links_reviews_title: Wore it twice, love it so much
links_reviews_text: This shirt was gorgeous, the shoulders are classy and the desbroce is airy and luxurious. Might have to buy it! Haha

links_reviews_title: Super bright & fun shirt, got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: It was a little snug around the waist but not uncomfortable and I think a L would have been too big

I love this shirt. The print is bold. The fit is on point. The cut, design, and print remind me of 70s fashion fabulousness! I am thinking about buying it because it feels like it should be a part of my wardrobe. Excellent rental. It screams fashion and confidence!

links_reviews_title: Please don't make me send this back
links_reviews_text: I love this blouse! It fits so nicely and is extremely flattering. I'm not sure if it's the shape or the color scheme, but it has a very slimming effect. It's also a very fun pattern to wear. Love this blouse and am definitely considering buying.
Good flowery option for work or everyday
Fits well. A bit much for repeat wear
Beautiful shirt. It does run big so next time I should get the 6 (maybe even the four). Doesn't wrinkle during the day
This blouse swallowed me whole, the recommended size was way too big and blouse was therefore not flattering.

This top is amazing- material, fit, pattern BUT I did not get to fully enjoy as it had an overwhelming smell of body odor. I put it on quickly and once in my car, I noticed it and once I got to my destination, i could not deal with it. I could not wait to take it off. Sooo disappointing...

Very chic blouse that fits true to size. Lovely material and perfect fit. I have a longer torso and this shirt tucked perfectly into black work trousers. Paired it with leopard print and it worked great. It would be easy to turn into an evening out look with different jewelry.
Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern and lovely fabric! I got lots of compliments at work.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected - loose without being baggy.
Decent blouse for work, pretty seasonless which is nice.

links_reviews_title: I felt stylish and professional in this blouse.
links_reviews_text: The silk fabric has a lovely drape and feel. This blouse is beautifully constructed, has lovely shaping, and is vibrant but not too loud for me.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant floral pattern - doesn't look like a curtain or a couch, but like a modern canvas painting!
links_reviews_text: Perfect pattern, perfect shirt for skirt or pants, jeans or work.

One of my coworkers wore this shirt and I loved how it looked on her so I decided to try it out. The fit of the shirt was great, I love the small detail at the shoulders and the length was perfect to wear untucked or tucked in. Great option for work!

links_reviews_title: the colors are awesome and the fit is perfect
links_reviews_text: I wore it with black pants and a blazer. the colors are fantastic
Rented several times, one of my favorites!
Cute blouse, fun pattern - very orange. I got the XL thinking the L would be too snug - should have gotten the L. This was way big on me - only wore it once. May rent again in a smaller size.

This top is fabulous! The print, the colors, the fit, the material, all fantastic. And it does not wrinkle easily (or at all really) which is a must for me when it comes to sitting all day at the office. Adding soooo many Dvf tops to my favorites now.
Super flattering, great pattern. Wore with jeans to work on Friday and got a few compliments. Would rent again!
I wore this to work and loved it. It fit perfectly.
Nice flowy shirt. Good for work in early pregnancy. Runs a little large but doesn't look frumpy.

Fit was absolutely perfect in the bust (no gaping) and sleeve length. Very comfortable, lighter weight, perfect for spring or fall. I love the color and pattern. I would have bought it if it were a bit less expensive. Great for work or play tucked into jeans. Got lots of compliments.
It fit so well. Such a gorgeous fabric and tucks in to jeans or a skirt very well. I felt so sharp in this!!!
Ordered to wear on vacation but it didn't come in time so I wore it to work. I loved it! Super flattering and love the print.
Very light weight, but not at all transparent. I'm top-heavy, so wore a black cami underneath just in case there was any gaping at the button on my chest.
This dreamy white and simple but sophisticated top was perfect for a day date to the museum. Paired with jeans and nude heels. Very roomy! Size down! Arm holes were too big.

links_reviews_title: Very versatile top! Great for Gameday! (Never got a great picture)
links_reviews_text: I am a 4 or 6 in tops and should have gotten the 4. The 6 was a little big but still worked! Comfy & doesn't have to be steamed/ironed. Only really works with a strapless bra. Drops a little lower in the back, but as long as you don't have your back bra strap up high it's fine.

links_reviews_title: Tricky to find the right bra for this top
links_reviews_text: Wore to work and it was ok. Didn't want to spend the whole work day in a strapless bra so wore a cross over bra and kept my cardigan on as you could see the bra. Probably won't rent again.
I loved this shirt! Very flattering cut!

I'm obsessed with this top! I'm usually a 6/8 in tops (34D) and got this in an 8. I probably could have gone smaller but the 8 still worked! I was worried it would look like a maternity top (flowing outward) but it hung well and was flattering. I'll definitely order this again!

This top is designed in an elegant style, the fabric quality is very high-end and the neck line shows off your neck shape. I love the bottom because it is very stylish and casual, can be tucked in or out. Recommend this! It can be pair for formal setting (pants fit better) or weekend chill vibe.

I loved this top so much! It's true to size. I wear a 12 in everything and the 12 fit perfectly. I got tons of compliments. I wish I could buy it! It's the perfect white top but the neck/design gives it a little something extra!
Not the most flattering top in the world and it kinda wrinkled easy but still was great for the occasion! Easy to dress up and down
Gorgeous, high quality, and lined. You need pasties or to go braless to make this work. Loved it!
Cute, flattering top. Only downside is the fact that I don't like how the cut shows a racerback bra
Great crepe too. Would rent it again
cute!
Top was difficult to wear with bra. Ended up lot wearing.
Size down, very flowy
Neckline is difficult to wear any type of bra, even sticky bra.

I rented this top to wear to my bridal shower. I paired it with a high-waisted skirt to hide the tent shape that this top gave me. I wouldn't wear it on its own, but it's cute with something high-waisted.
I did not wear this top because the arm hole area was too big. Strapless bra was visible.

This top is structured and can very dressy. Nice thick fabric but not too hot, Lots of compliments. if you want a closer fit size down. It runs just slightly large but I have a B cup so if you have a bigger bra size it would probably be more true to size.
Nice but tough to wear any kind of bra with it. Sides are very open
I was swimming in this - especially in the chest and I'm a DD. Size down

links_reviews_title: perfect white top. Want to buy
links_reviews_text: This white top is my new obsession. I wore it four times within one week and I never rewear clothing (hello renting clothes?!) It is so awesome. I had four different people ask me in one night where i got it. It's a beautiful neckline but also shows a little more skin in the back. I wore a strapless bra pulled down and it was fine for me!
Great material, lovey fit.. would rent again but probably would size down one

Loved this top. Simple and classy, and a very flattering style on me. I wore it under a blazer and it was really cute for work, but can totally be worn out or dressed up. I'm hiding a baby bump so it helped in that dept too. Definitely would rent again!

I normally wear a 6 but this fit really large. Armholes were so low you can't even wear a strapless bra and with this color you need a bra. Also, the way the arm and neck are cut, I thought it would be really flattering but it made me look larger than I am, sort of big-shouldered. Also the swing cut of the midsection looked maternity. And the color wasn't bright white. Kind of off. Basically a disaster. Went right back without wearing it.
This top is cute and flattering, but you cannot even wear a strapless bra, because the back armholes are too low. Even "pasties" were a little bit visible through the white. Might try the black one
Beautiful material and design. Swing / shift style gives plenty of extra room. Recommend getting normal size and sizing down one if you're getting multiple.
Hard to wear a strapless bra with this - too low in the armpits. But would be darling otherwise!
This top had a pretty neckline. The armholes were a little low so my strapless bra showed on the sides. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Just didn't look right on me.
links_reviews_text: The shirt hit at a weird angle for my shoulders. May look great on other people.
I wore this to work under a sweater and then removed the sweater for an outdoor happy hour. Love this top.

links_reviews_title: Very cute shirt. Can be dressy or looked great with jeans. I wore it several times.
links_reviews_text: Slightly small fitting in bust
Too low in back to wear practical strapless

I wanted to sleep in this it wore so beautifully and the drape, weight, and texture of the fabric is so luxurious. Forgiving cut, accommodates a regular bra and dresses up/down. I wore this to work, but could have easily worn it anywhere.
Very big under the arms, but I received a lot of compliments!

Love this top! Runs a little large. Will probably keep though as I do not think it comes in a 00. Big around the chest and back but fun structured fit with nice weight to the material. Overall really like! Only gave 4 stars because it is too large. Will need to get taken in if I keep.

Loved this shirt! I wore it for a girls night out and got so many compliments on it. It looked great with jeans and heels but also shorts and flip flops. The only thing I would say beware of is because of how it cuts in on the front and then is a deep razor back the bra situation is tricky. I am thinking of renting this again just so I can buy it!

I think this is not cut well for petites. Ordered 2 sizes down and it's not bad. But the cuts while it could have been flattering, were too low and deep near the boob. Also yes, bra choice is tough. Strapless might work depending on cut. Flattering to stomach as it's roomy there.

links_reviews_title: I love this top. So comfortable. I would have definitely bought this top if it was not so expensive.
links_reviews_text: The top has a nice stretchy fabric which helped with sizing and better fit - - and made it super comfortable.
Really warm and stretchy. Perfect for skiing. Sleeves run a little long, but doesn't make it uncomfortable. Considering buying the set.

links_reviews_title: Cozy but breathable - great for outdoor winter wear
links_reviews_text: I usually go for S/M in LNDR leggings, because they tend to be a bit snug for me personally. These are maybe slightly larger and less compression-y than the typical LNDR leggings, which I did not mind. They still fit great, and were really comfortable. They did feel warm and cozy. They feel soft on the inside, but not exactly fleecy. These were breathable, but still kept me surprisingly warm on early-morning New England dog walks. I really liked these! I think these would be excellent as a bottom layer for skiing, and also could be good for anyone who likes to run outdoors in winter conditions. The teal/green color is really beautiful, and not as aggressively vibrant as, say, over-the-top '90s winter gear. These feel very high quality and are excellent technical winter leggings. Highly recommend.
Very warm for skiing. Were a little tight in the waist but fabric does stretch a lot.
While these leggings are too thick to work out in, they're perfect for skiing. I didn't get to rent the matching top, but I definitely will try to.
LOVED these. Will be renting again! The perfect waist fit.
This sweater is so fun! Unusual design, truly fabulous sleeves. Fits snugly through body and arms. Wish material were softer but thinking of buying to have for upcoming festive events.
Amazing fit and fabric quality. It is shimmery. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Loved the shirt - wish it were a little looser
links_reviews_text: I loved this shirt and the material. The sleeves were very tight. I wore a medium but would've preferred a large for the sleeves.
Received tons of compliments on this shirt! It was comfy, light weight despite having thicker fabric, and cute! Sleeves were a little hard to manage at the buffet line.
Loved this fitted top. Bell sleeve is a little long but totally doable. Great for brunch with your girls.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the fit! Very fun sleeved!
links_reviews_text: Really nice fabric. Flattering.
This top is cuter in person but photographs so well. I love the way it felt on. And the sleeves weren't an issue that others have said. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Order a size up and receive compliments all day
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and unique top. I originally got a M (my usual size) but elected to go up a size because it's tight across the shoulders. But I loved the sleeves it's such a beautiful piece

I would have loved to buy this top, it was that stunning! Wish I had a better picture to capture the sleeves. Very comfy, color was gorgeous. I can either be a S or M, glad I went with the medium for this one. Sleeves are very bell-like and could see them being annoying to some

This shirt had flattering cues in all of the right areas. It's a fairly stretchy material that fits nice and snug on you, so be mindful of that in the chest area. Other than that, it really fit well, and the upper angle of the design across the stomach makes your waist look great! Would definitely rent again.

Wore to Easter mass and brunch. Unique and flattering. Can't really tell by the photos, but the material has a bit of a sparkle to it and is thick (but stretchy)- I wouldn't recommend in humid weather. Super happy I rented it. High quality
Length was very short on my long torso, and size was tight even though I went 2 sizes up!
Top was fabulous! Sleeves and bottom were unique and an overall show topper.
Loved the color and the fabric. Sleeve detail was gorgeous, just be careful around food and stuff! Slightly more cropped than I was expecting - would recommend for a unique top
Got lots of compliments! It's very pretty! A little short on the torso area
Lots of compliments on this one. Loved the way it hugged my curves in the right places. Sleeves were a little long, but manageable.

links_reviews_title: Wow I'm a big fan of this top
links_reviews_text: Didn't want to return it - but also needed to move on to my next rental so I did. I loved the sleeves and peplum. Very flattering and still comfortable. It felt a bit tight, so I would recommend sizing up. Also not so easy to fit those flared sleeves into a jacket - might be better for a spring night that wouldn't require a coat over a it.
I wore this to a dinner with my besties for my birthday. I'm so glad I ordered a medium. It is a snug one. The color and cut are perfection.

This was such a hit! Extremely comfortable and flattering in all the right places. Rented for a themed party but will rent again for a fun weekend or evening top. I got sooo many compliments and people asking where this was from!

I loved this feminine and flirty top by Jonathan Simkhai! The metallic pleats and bells sleeves were a beautiful touch! It runs true to size and has a lot of stretch. Choose a size up for a looser and still comfortable backup. It works best for A- C cup sizes. You are also able to wear a standard bra with this top. A nice accessory for this top would be a cute multi colored crossbody that has some subtle pinks, rose, or red colors on it. You can pair it with your favorite jeans or pants for a lovely everyday look!.
This top was so fun! I loved the shade of pink and hints of red in the fluttery sleeves. The detail at the waistline helped give a slimming illusion. Wore this for filming. Showed up great on camera!

Loved wearing this top! I had it for a few weeks before I was able to wear it and finally found the perfect occasion. I can't rave enough about the color, material and fit. The material is thick and the fit is somewhat of a fit and flair. I am a big busted gal so I wore shapewear underneath to smooth everything out. Would have bought if it wasn't so pricey!!
Snug fit. I'm typically an XS/S and thankfully I read reviews saying this top runs small so I rented the M and it fit very well. The sleeves are so cute and fun. I received several compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this on a date and to church and got compliments. It's flattering and unique
links_reviews_text: Love it, it's so fashionable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments at a work event!
links_reviews_text: Slim fit but the peplum really makes it flattering. I wore a "vanishing back" bra with it so I had no lines on my back which was a plus! I seriously got tons of compliments from both women and men on this top!

links_reviews_title: Cute Top but Had to Tone Down for the Office
links_reviews_text: It made my chest look huge so I had to wear a black vest over it to tone it down. You definitely need a seamless bra with this one. I got a lot of comments on the sleeves.
Wore this for family Christmas. Loved the sleeves. Top is tight!
The top is pink and sparkly and stretchy. Very flattering as it hides the stomach bulges. You need to wear it with a seamless bra as it is very form fitting on top.
I didn't believe the size up a lot recommendation because I'm flat-chested but it's true: I could use the medium maybe. Small works though. LOVE this sweater!!!
Beautiful color, and shape was lovely. Unfortunately it was tiny and I had to send it back.

I rented this for work. It was really cute on and had an underlying sparkle to the material. The only problem was that it was tight in the arms and chest. I always wear a small and this sweater just doesn't have much stretch to it, so it was slightly uncomfortable. Other than that it was great. I was still able to wear it despite that.

links_reviews_title: I wore this at the Museum of Ice cream in NYC - literally perfect
links_reviews_text: fit so well and was such a fun piece :)

Wore this twice! Fun & flattering top that enhances the bust and and waist. The thicker, stretchy material has a slimming effect. The fabric also has a slight metallic/shine to it that I was not expecting.
very flattering
This is a snug, and very tight fitting shirt. Hard to get on the shoulders, but very flattering once you have the shirt on. Made my smaller chest appear larger.
This shirt was so cute and fit well without being too tight. The bell sleeves were so fun but you need to be careful with them when you're eating so as not to dip them into your food.
Cute style, but ordre a size up if you have a long torso
This is a cute shirt but I didn't love it. The sleeves were a little long for me
The cut is very deep so I had to keep pulling it back so my bra wouldn't show but it's a super cute and comfy shirt!

The collar isn't meant to sit like a shirt collar-the way the shoulders are gathered caused it to hang a bit down my back, which is fine. I love the little pattern and I love wearing a white blouse with a polka dot bra that doesn't even show through.

Loved the look of this classic top! Wore it to a brunch in NYC. The fabric felt pretty fragile, but well made. It was also thin, but was not see through (and was perfect for the hot day it was). Fit true to size.

Loved the fit and the look of it tucked in. I normally have issues popping out of buttoned tops, but this gave me plenty of room and no issues (other than making sure it didn't ride too low every once in a while.) the fabric was light and airy, and not transparent at all with a nude bra. I would reco and rent again.
This was a last minute pick but I ended up really liking it. It's casual but polished.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I really like the style and fit of this top. The gathered sleeves and neckline are very flattering on. I got lots of compliments while wearing! The shirt does taper slightly along bottom hemline, so I felt like it looked better tucked in. Although I would have probably styled it this way anyway. Overall love the style and fabric of this shirt!

Cute top. I think the sleeves made me look boxy because I am big busted. The large worked well for the bust area but was a little baggy. Ended up wearing with grey dress pants and cardigan for the office.

links_reviews_title: Great for travel and touring NOLA
links_reviews_text: Great fabric. Not see through, but light and comfortable. I would like to own this.

links_reviews_title: Ordered a medium and runs small
links_reviews_text: Ordered a medium by accident. I'm in between sizes. I wear between a medium and a large. This shirt is a medium and runs way small.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear due to size.
links_reviews_text: Very low cut and loose at the neck area.

The pattern is beautiful, the style is great for my workplace. I don't whether it was the size or the fit but it kept rolling back on my shoulders (which are admittedly very narrow) so the fit just looked terrible. I guess I didn't see the collar either which didn't seem to match the rest of the design and went structured enough to hold its own.
Really liked this top. Material was super nice, fit was flattering, and looked good either tucked or untucked.
Ran slightly large in the busy but oddly tight in the shoulders
The neckline is larger than usual. It is necessary to wear a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Way too big and blousy -- blah
links_reviews_text: I rented this for the Fourth of July but sent it back because it was way too big and boxy, even with me sizing down. Obviously it's a blousy sort of look, but I wasn't flattering at all on me and the top was cut so low that it emphasized my flat chest. Even for the hipster Brooklyn vibe, this just wasn't flattering. The nice print was the only good thing about this shirt.
Pretty top, but possible to size down for a more tailored fit.

links_reviews_title: A little large but a cute shirt
links_reviews_text: Was a little big in the chest but got a lot of compliments on this shirt. Easy to wear casual look for going out. Would get this one again.

I have a large chest, and usually can't wear anything that buttons down because it creates a gap and you can see in my shirt. I thought ordering a size up might eliminate that, but this was still too tight in the chest for me. it's also low cut and tight in the hips

links_reviews_title: Great top for the summer. Very feminine and fit right in with my current wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! It's a bit low-cut for work, but with a tank top underneath it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for work. Never wore it.
links_reviews_text: This was just the weirdest fitting blouse I've ever encountered. I couldn't figure out who it would fit (definitely not me). The collar sat in an odd place and it bloused out in the oddest way.
For work, I wore this with a tank under. Then without the tank it was low-cut and sexy. Super soft.

This is a very cute top although it is boxy and runs a bit large. It was big on me so gapped in the front a little--I ended up wearing a black bra underneath so it looked intentional and that worked fine. Got lots of compliments and it was very comfortable and easy to wear with anything. I considered buying it but was too expensive. Will definitely rent again!
This was just OK. Love the colors and subtle print but the deep neckline made it hard to wear to the office. A camisole is a must! It was breezy and lightweight for warmer days
Low cut but flattering. Good with camisole underneath for work and no camisole for a summer evening out
The sleeves and shoulders were way too big. Looked odd when I tried it on so I didn't wear it. I tried renting it again and it looked weird... not a flattering shirt. (Rented both a S and an XS)

links_reviews_title: Rented for work/ work travel and it perfect for different climates.
links_reviews_text: Very cute silk top, I had some trouble exchanging it for the correct size but once I got the fit right it was perfect for the office.

The fabric is very pretty, but it's cut more narrow at the hips than the shoulders - which makes for an awkward fit. If your bottoms are high waisted enough, you can pull off a tucked in look. It didn't work for me. I just sent it back.

links_reviews_title: Awesome everyday top - wore under a Jean jacket, leather blazer and alone.
links_reviews_text: Caution with under garment- pretty low cut.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it it was too big
links_reviews_text: it ran big

links_reviews_title: This sweet blouse was perfect for a sunny day at the local festival
links_reviews_text: I love, love, love this top. It was sweet paired with both jeans and boots, and a skirt and Hasbeens. It looked amazing and was great for the newly hot weather. Will rent again.
The top runs large and is incredibly low cut for those with a larger chest

links_reviews_title: A luxurious fabric. I instantly wanted to buy--but then saw the price. Thank goodness I can rent it!
links_reviews_text: Great for work or a day out! This is so soft and fits beautifully.
This top is cute, breezy and easy. Great with jeans, white pants or denim shorts. Slightly see through, but not too bad for a white silk top.

links_reviews_title: Strange sleeves and thin, wrinkly silk material
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, this blouse didn't work for me. The cut of the sleeves seemed hard to pull off, and the material was thin and prone to wrinkling. I was hoping for a short sleeved version of my favorite Equipment blouses, and this wasn't it.

I wore this shirt twice. Once under a black suit for work and tucked in and then the next day with frayed jeans, black blazer and black flats. The pearl buttons are a great detail, but gap a little so you need a cami underneath. For a large the armholes were still a tad big and it's a little more tapered towards the waist.

links_reviews_title: Didn't really do much- very blousy and short in length. Fabric was nice and pattern was ok overall
links_reviews_text: Loose and short

This is likely my favorite thing I've ever rented. It took an everyday trench a step up and was so fashion forward. Wore it several times and got the best photos in it. The rainbow fur is so so cool and cute.
The fur adds a fun pop of color. The inside is actually kind of quilted and is very warm!!! I wish I could keep this.

links_reviews_title: CRAZY COOL detail on the collar
links_reviews_text: Ran a bit small for me. There's a fairly thick liner inside the jacket, which made it difficult to wear a sweater/layers underneath. That aside, the colors on the collar detail are UNREAL. I got so many compliments throughout the day!

The colors in the picture don't do this coat justice! It's gorgeous! My only complaint is that the cut doesn't allow enough room for hips/butt. It was a little snug for my taste over my hips, but for great everywhere else.
The coat I received was very worn. Also this is not a high quality Item, but I knew that going in. It's cute and the collar is fun for something different in the middle of winter.

This coat is the coolest. I felt like a million bucks wearing it. I wore it over a tiny dress for New Years Eve -- between the furry collar and actual jacket it kept me surprisingly warm. I also wore it over a few more casual outfits with some big shades. Looooved how I felt in it. One of my fave rentals.
Great color and collar. Great fit.

links_reviews_title: So cozy, nice pop of color with the fur collar!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket! Super well-made and classed any outfit up (although you can totally wear sneakers with it). Nice and warm, and the collar adds a nice pop of color. Was getting compliments from men and women alike! Do it!
Incredible coat super fun and love the faux fur collar. Definitely cute for fall. Runs true to size.
I wanted to give this coat 5 stars but this is the second time I have rented it and the buttons keep falling off. :(
I felt like I looked like an extra in the Lion King in this. It was too much and just not for me.

I did not realize it, but the collar is multi-colored. There are yellows, blues, reds, greens. I was a little self-conscious wearing it., but I wore it anyways. You just have to look in the mirror and decide to rock it. The coat itself is of extremely good quality, lined and very warm.
The collar on this coat is gorgeous. I was hoping for a fitted coat but it fit rather boxy on my frame. Too bad - it's pretty!

links_reviews_title: Fun multicolor fur collar! But runs small
links_reviews_text: This coat was so pretty, nice camel color body and multicolor fur collar! Pretty thick, would keep you warm surprise to see some people say it was lightweight. I’m 5‘2, hits right below the knee. I only wore this once bc it was too small on me :( the buttons are shallow and would stay closed for me... still gave it 5 stars bc it’s a great coat, just didn’t fit me.

I rented this for walking around NYC over Christmas. This is a very heavy, legit coat. It's not a fashion coat that won't keep you warm, this is a warm coat that is fashionable. You can't super tell from the pictures, but the faux fur is all sort of fun colors. Sleeves were a bit short for my taste (or maybe my arms?). But that's the only complaint.

This coat is honestly perfect. It is the perfect day-to-night transition piece in that it can be worn with jeans during the day, or over a dress for a more formal occasion. The colors in the collar's faux fur are beautiful, the camel coat goes with everything, and the length is amazing. Aside from being gorgeous, this coat is perfect to keep you warm and toasty in the wintertime!

links_reviews_title: NOT SUPER WARM BUT NICE JACKET
links_reviews_text: Quality jacket, not super warm but it was pretty perfect. When I say not super warm I mean...you are semi comfortable in it in 40 degree weather. Felt fabulous and I would rent again.
Beautiful but runs small in comparison to other coats.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I purchased it!
links_reviews_text: The faux fur collar is removable
Thick warm coat, looks cute, fun fur detail

Love the fit and style of this jacket. It's a classic mid-length, camel coat but with added flair with the faux fur multi-colored collar. I get compliments on this daily. It's perfect for fall, as it's fairly thick. My only tiny complaint is that it pills a bit. I received a brand new coat, tags and all and have had it for less than a week, but I see pilling in multiple places. Would recommend.

I love these pants! I love how the waist is tight fitting but the rest of the pant is flowy and loose. I will definitely rent again, and would even consider purchasing. So flowy and look like a maxi skirt, but are comfy pants!
These pants were fun and versatile. I can dress them up or down very easily. The fact that they look more like a skirt make the pants unexpected and interesting. Trendy pattern and nice material.
Amazing pants, so comfortable and disguise as a skirt. At 5'4", not too long. Loved. One of my favorite cool rentals.

links_reviews_title: Fun pants but too long to wear IRL.
links_reviews_text: Made me feel like a supermodel, but also made for people five foot ten and up - so long that I couldn't wear them even with my tallest heels, except for maybe to a party or formal event. Can usually do an 8 or 10 from Club Monaco and the 10 felt good here.
Really unique pants. Took a star off due to size. Big around the waist and long for a shorty. But overall fun for a one time rental.
Nice flowy piece. Loved the higher waist. The inside material was a bit staticky so had to adjust at certain points.

I love these pants! I've rented them twice and will probably rent them again. They are so flattering, and I love that they look like a skirt. They are fully lined, so they're a little hot for summer but I think I'll love them now that the weather is staring to cool down. They are long enough for my long legs (I'm 5'10) but not too long that they drag. LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Very cute but tight in the waist
links_reviews_text: This was very cute and very fun and I got lots of compliments but a few hours into the day I could hardly breathe. The waist had no give and was so high waisted it pushed everything out. Not a good look sadly To look very pregnant at my age.
Great fit and prettier fabric in person! Rented for office wear. A lovely addition to my unlimited goodies

links_reviews_title: Cute in theory but very large waist
links_reviews_text: Pros: length on 5'1" is perfect in flats (though you must have both hands free to hold all the fabric going up stairs); lightweight fabric is perfect for late summer weather; soft pleats aren't overaggressive with the pattern Cons: waist is EXTREMELY large - 3 safety pins were necessary to keep the pants on. I'm a 00/00P so I normally expect a waist gap, but these pants in size 0 felt much larger than the average 0.

I love these pants, they are unique and beautiful. I wore these a couple of times. I did think they ran a bit snug. I usually wear a 6 comfortably, but these felt a bit tight. I also found it difficult to stand up from sitting without stepping on the pants, and going down stairs was tricky- but this made me laugh a few times so like I said, really didn't affect me wearing them or not. Overall I'd rent again!

I felt like a rich lady who spends a lot of time in museums! The fabric is flowy but lined so worked well for my air conditioned office. They are a really wide leg so it did look more like a skirt than pants, but they moved beautifully
Loved these high waisted pants. Wore to work with a tank.
Absolutely adored these pants!! They're so fun and flowy, and look like a shirt! The pattern is lovely and they're extremely comfortable and flattering. Wore them multiple times in London and Paris.
Really comfortable and beautiful fabric, but hung oddly in crotch area. Didn't like enough to wear twice.

links_reviews_title: Great pants to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Beautiful pattern and flow so nice when walking. Received many compliments

Wore this to my sister's bachelorette party in the Hamptons. Loved that this pieces looks like a skirt, but was actually pants. It was a windy day, so I was happy to not have to worry about holding them down. Fit true to size. I am about 5'9'' and length was perfect!
Loved the length with heels. Paired with a black sweater tucked in. Comfy but tons on compliments!

links_reviews_title: Amazing color palate and super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Love the fit of these pants! So light and comfortable. Super cute and flattering! Beware the zipper however, it does catch in the fabric.

links_reviews_title: These pants are a dream!! So beautiful - I didn't want to take them off.
If you're tall and have a long torso these will give you a wedgie.
links_reviews_text: If you're tall and have a long torso these will give you a wedgie. Had to send back.

I rented these to wear at a rehearsal dinner and again on Christmas. These pants are so much fun! I received compliment after compliment. They are light and flowing and look amazing when you walk. I had to get the 12 because the size 10 wasn't available so they were a little loose but it didn't matter. Total winner here.

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED with these pants, gorgeous and flattering!
links_reviews_text: A great way to dress up a white button down. Super flowy and comfortable. Great length for a 5'4 girl (but did need to wear heeled shoes so as not to drag on floor!)

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately, these were too long on my 5'2 frame!
links_reviews_text: loved how they looked on, but wanted to wear them to work and would be tripping over them all day.

links_reviews_title: Looks like a flowy skirt but surprise it's pants!!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this piece. Wore it with a white leotard style quarter sleeve top and black loose blazer. I got so many compliments!! I will say that I had to wear heels to make the length work, and if you were shorter they may look ridiculous. But at my height these were perfection.
Would have been 5 stars but it was a bit longer than I expected and a little large in the waist. I wish I would have sized down.
So much fun to wear these pants. People thought they were a skirt.

I received countless compliments when I wore these pants. Everyone thought it was a skirt and I think loved it even more when I told them they were pants!! Really beautiful in person and just a great fit overall. I look forward to renting them again.
Love that this skirt is actually pants. Wore it to a BBQ and it was the perfect mix of looking nice and comfort
These are beautiful pants for warm weather. I got tons of compliments!
Fits true to size - maybe a little tight on the waist
I loved these but am between sizes and wish I had sized up to the 6. They are a beautiful print and very fun, though because of the lining, it was a bit difficult not to trip going up the stairs.

links_reviews_title: Loved the style and the print. Could be dressed down for daytime or dressed up for a date night.
links_reviews_text: The length is long in the legs even in the smallest size 0R. I loved how wide the pant legs are giving the elusion of a skirt when really its trousers. Worked really well with a simple t-shirt and slides or sneakers.

Such a cute print. Wore these a few times and would rent again. Perfect for spring for summer. Love the print. Wish the legs were a little less wide so they look more like pants than a skirt but got so many compliments everytime I wore it!
These are great for any occasion and are so comfy! The length was perfect for me and I'm 5'3. They didn't drag and looked cute with a short heel. Tons of compliments - highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: A great option for my summer work wardrobe.
links_reviews_text: These fit my hourglass figure perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Versatile pants for play or work
links_reviews_text: Loved that they weren't too long and were very high quality. I found them a little tight in the waist - should have sized up. I can fit into 0-4 in pants and for these I should have worn 4. 2 still fit just a bit snug. Wore these plenty with a crop top shirt. Never wrinkled and traveled well.

I wore these pants a few times-- both to work and just for fun. I love the wide-legged, flowy feel and the abstract print. The fabric was also comfortable. However, I feel like the fit was just a little too narrow and high-waisted. It took a while to style it in a way that was comfortable and chic, and I wasn't 100% happy with the finished look. The zipper was also very temperamental! Although they were fun to swish about in, and I got lots of compliments, I don't know that I'd rent again.
Very comfortable, loved the colors and flow. Looks more like a skirt than pants. Can be dressed up or down.
Pretty, but longer than I expected. Felt like I was wearing a maxi skirt, which I didn't love. Didn't end up wearing.
Perfect amount of bagginess!
Small was just the right amount of room. Super comfy too!
Loved the look and the fit. However it is not very soft or as comfy as most hoody's.
Cool but nothing that unique. I sized up for a baggier look.

links_reviews_title: Love the tie dye, love the color! LOVE THE FIT
links_reviews_text: This is a hoodie for the fashionista in you. Not your american apparel. I love this. Wore it many MANY times. I would have bought it but I felt like I couldn't spend $245 on it even with the RTR discount.
Awesome hoodies for flying with leggings and then skiing and apres. It was heavy enough to wear outside but not stifling. Got a ton of compliments on the tye die

It's an oversized sweater that is a real conversation starter. It's so comfortable and cool for those into athleisure. Love it! I wore it with bike shorts and doc martens. I also wore it with skinny jeans and dad sneakers.
Great sweatshirt. Definitely oversized so size down if you want this more to your body. It's very comfortable and an easy throw on for errands or a street style look.
So fun. Large, but suppose to be oversized. My husband and I took turns with this.

links_reviews_title: A fun cozy sweatshirt. Great for a casual office or a laid back weekend,
links_reviews_text: Really groovy tie dye hooded sweatshirt! Great length, too, with a generous fit. I'm 5' 5-6" and the bottom of the sweatshirt hit a tad above mid-thigh. The colors are vivid and bright. I wore it to the office for a chic, comfy casual Friday. I took a cue from RTR and wore the sweatshirt with black yoga leggings, with a bit of shine to them. I wore a white linen button down Polo underneath to dress it up just a bit. I wore a pair of black floral print Dr. Martens with pink satin ribbon laces and the floral print hues totally jived with the variegated colors of the tie dye. I felt unencumbered yet put together all day long. My office is so casual-pretty much showing up in anything but just your underwear is acceptable. (I do marketing & creative work for a nail salon supply company and rarely interface with the public when at the office, so for most of us wearing makeup is even optional.) Saturday evening lounging on the couch I happened to catch a bit of a chill and reached for this awesome sweatshirt once more. It serves as perfect hermit garb as well. Whole heartedly recommend this one. Might have to get it again- unlimited all the way.
not super comfy or oversized as i was expecting great colors

I ordered a small when I normally wear a medium. Small fit fine, so this runs large. I can't say there was anything flattering about it, though, and my husband didn't like it at all. I wouldn't recommend unless you maybe want to wear it really big with leggings and sneakers. Even then I'd say pass!

links_reviews_title: Would 100% keep if it wasn't v expensive!!
links_reviews_text: Large sweater to wear w leggings. Loved the quality and style definitely reluctant to give it back.
I have rented this sweatshirt twice, and I wore it on repeat both times because it's comfortable and edgy at the same time. It has a slightly oversized fit.

I wore this a LOT because it is super cool. Looked rad with everything I paired it with - various washes and styles of jeans, leather leggings, low-tops, metallic booties. Just a comfortable, elevated basic that takes little effort but looks super edgy.
The sleeves and body length were a bit.shorter than I would like for a hoodie. I loved how the hood laid - differently than a traditional hoodie which is a good thing.

links_reviews_title: Stand out while being causal and comfy
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a week of travel could throw it on and not feel "basic" super super cute thinking of buying it

links_reviews_title: Super cute hoodie! Comfy and the strap details really add to the outfit
links_reviews_text: Love love love this hoodie, wish I could keep it! I love the strap details, it definitely is unique and makes the whole outfit pop. The colors pop but are well nuanced enough to go together. This was part of my first shipment this month from unlimited and I might have to keep it for awhile!!

links_reviews_title: Trendy pairing with a black faux leather skirt
links_reviews_text: This was a cute, trendy rental that I paired with a black faux leather skirt. It did not work well for me personally, as it was a bit frumpy on my body type. However, it was a cute and comfy sweatshirt that was nice to wear on a cool fall evening. The hood was the best part of the sweatshirt--it was very flattering and covers the entire head.

Get this. Do NOT pass this up. Probably the best piece of clothing I've gotten from RTR. I wore this all the time- it's so comfortable and really in. It makes you look cool on a lazy day and dresses down a fancy outfit. It's really perfect.
Super comfy and oversized, bright and large hood
Oversized and comfortable. A bit stiffer than a typical sweatshirt. I wore this on my summer vacay to Lake Michigan for the cool nights. Comfortable and funky!
It's stiff, not soft in the slightest and the arms are quite short
Loved this! So comfy ! I styled it with bike shorts and Birkenstock’s.
love this cozy sweatshirt
Cool designer hoodie. Fabric is stiff and not that cozy. I recommend pairing with darker bottoms.
Love this piece. Will rent again! So cozy and worn in. I got a S to wear w high rise jeans.

Loved this - it fit great. It was big enough to wear with leggings, but not too frumpy to wear with shorts or jeans. I wore this to soccer games, camping and several other casual events. Really liked the blue and red colors too. Would rent again for casual days.
This has taken up one of my spots for over a month now because it is perfect in every way. Dare I purchase a $245 sweatshirt... I just might.
Used it for everyday wear! Somewhat thin but great hoodie for spring or fall. It's not oversized. High recommend- I didn't want to give it back!

links_reviews_title: Cozy and stylish for when I'm feeling lazy!
links_reviews_text: The perfect oversized sweatshirt that doesn't look frumpy. A thinner sweatshrt material.

I brought this sweatshirt on vacation with Me for ten days and wore it multiple times. So comfie and kept me warm and on-trend. The XS was perfect size. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and I'm glad I sized down.
Fits well and true to size, oversized look. Looks just as pictured but didn't really love it.
No small so I went with the medium and it was very large. Has nice detail, good designer piece that is casual.

links_reviews_title: Fun, different. So many ways to wear it.
links_reviews_text: So happy with this rental. If you're looking to take your relaxed weekend outfits up a notch, this adds a unique, fun touch without any effort.
This one is eye-catching and super comfortable. I sized down so it wouldn't be too slouchy - the XS was perfect (usually I wear S).
Material is Not too bulky, great for layering. Love the colors.

links_reviews_title: It was ok. For the price I expected it to be a lot softer,and cozier. It runs true/ small. sz up.
links_reviews_text: ok. not as soft as I would expect for the price. This is def a case of brand name recognition, but not really superior quality.
Loved everything about this hoodie. Comfy and casual yet a bit daring and definitely not "ordinary". Will rent this again.

links_reviews_title: The sweatshirt was cute, but not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Cute every day fun sweatshirt. It was cut a little short. Would have preferred a bit shorter or a bit longer.
It was a Wisconsin outdoor wedding and this made for a perfect coverup when it got chilly.
Nice long sleeves and perfect length (can't adjust the folded over cuff though).

This was super soft and had a nice shape for a work or everyday/casual layer. Like most Vince it's cut generously so an XS is just small enough on me (I'm usually a 0-2). Because it is so soft it borders on schlumpy if not worn carefully though. A good rental, but I wouldn't buy it.

I rented this to have in my hotel room in a recent biz trip. I wanted something cozy that would wear well with my Everlane cashmere sweats for when I run around the hotel and for taking my dog (under the blanket) our for potty breaks in the evening!
Super soft and warm. Love!
This sweater is a casual staple that I would love to have in my wardrobe rotation. I miss it already and might have to rent it again or buy it.

Wore this for work with jeans. Comfy and simple, but had a thick cuff that added some detail. I accidentally ordered the small (I would have normally order the medium) and it fit a bit snug on the arms, but was still able to wear a thin white tee under without it looking bulky.
What you see is what you get with this sweater. It's beautifully made and hangs nicely. Very comfy, not at all itchy. Sleeves were a little long and the color is nothing special though.
Comfy, cozy and cute. No surprises. Just a dependable basic.
I love this cardigan. It is so comfortable and soft, I wear it for lounging as well as to work.
Really want to keep this. This is warm, soft and cozy but still looks polished for work! Will 100% rent again.
A bit of pilling. Static-y acrylic-feeling. Nothing amazing or special.
Looked good and fit true to size. Ideal for fall.

links_reviews_title: super cute - wore it the day I got it and have plans to travel with it as an extra layer.
links_reviews_text: very nice - casual but the quality and detail are superb. I will enjoy having this around for the the next month!!

links_reviews_title: I love this sweater - it's the perfect transition piece for fall.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are perfect length and it goes with everything.
Seriously want to buy this. It's perfect.
I wore this sweater multiple times during the month. Great for work, home, travel, etc. I'm usually a medium, but I sized down based on reviews. I think that made for a more polished look/fit.
This cardigan has a nice weight to it, very warm. Was too large for me so I did not wear it. Would look great if the right size is chosen. The sleeve cuffs are not adjustable.
I love VINCE and this was no exception. Super cozy cardigan and a little oversized. Would rent again.
It was hot outside but the airport was chilly. This sweater fit the bill perfectly.
This is a great sweater. Flattering and very warm. Dress it up or down. Wore it all the time!
Great color, cut, and style. Fits well and does not pill. Sleeves run a little long so if you have long arms this would be good for you.
Comfy but not flattering. Awkward fit.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday sweater in chilly SF
links_reviews_text: Nice sweater, comfy and warm on cold days
Love this
A little boring and not as soft as I'd hoped
Fits well. Well made. Classic.
So comfortable and looks luxurious - wore it multiple times
Wore this countless times to work, on the weekends, lounging around. Great layer!
Wore for work but very versatile for everyday wear. Soft and kept me warm without looking too frumpy.
Great basic! Cute; didn't stretch out. Wore multiple times.
OMG I LOVED THIS!
Didn't wear. Upon arrival I saw that it contained a material that causes me to itch.
Nice sweater. Size up if you want a more relaxed look.
True to size, perfect for everyday when you want something comfortable and casual. Warm too.
Not exciting, but this is exactly the kind of well made, basic every wardrobe needs. The knit is heavy and luxurious. I would have bought it, if it weren't the end of heavy sweater season.
Loved this sweater! Easy to throw on with many things and very soft!

links_reviews_title: Great sweater in the cold weather.
links_reviews_text: Loved how it fit. Wore this sweater just about everyday!
Extended this to keep it another month. So soft and warm. I love it
True to size. Super comfortable. Great for everyday.
Loved this dress. Fits true to size. Appropriate length for work. Wore with wedges but could have also paired with a nude pump.
High end, great quality and True to size. I'm 5'6, 121 lbs and 34B. The size 2 was perfect on me.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with fun pattern, perfect for desk to dinner
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size and is a flattering A line shape highlighting a smaller waist. I am a pear shape and I found this very flattering. The Peter Pan collar is a fun detail and I thought the pattern was perfect for work or dinner out. The length was perfect for work. I found this dress to be very comfortable.
Great classic fit. I had to pin the bust.
This dress was so awkward. I feel like I belonged on Laverne and Shirley. The buttons going down my chest were so tight, but the rest of the dress felt big. I never wore it.

This dress is so so flattering! I was worried that the buttons would gape but they don't at all and the waist has an extra clip that cinches you in without being tight. I had so many compliments wearing this dress, I'll definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: More beautiful on than on the hanger.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but tight in the bust.
Dress pattern is super cute but too small around the bust.
Great dress for work. Fun pattern, great fit, and comfortable.
slightly tight in the bust

I thought this would be just like the floral Draper James shirtdress with the same colors. It was not. There isn't lace and the cut is different despite the same numeric size. I found this to run slightly narrower in the chest, waist and ribcage. It is more slimming in terms of looks but I liked the room in the lace dress. The lace dress runs slightly wider in the waist so it isn't quite as flattering. This dress is also not lined and the last button stops about 5 inches above the hem. A solid dress that I would rent again but I do prefer the other one.
Very loose. Didn't give any shape.
Just a little too short for my frame for work, otherwise fits perfect
The dress (14R) fit perfectly everywhere and laid flat, except across the chest. The buttons pulled a little too right for me to wear. I'm a 38DD for reference. Fabric was light and airy.

These jeans are very long. I have a nearly 35" inseam and they were full length with a little room at the bottom. I have NEVER had regular, designer jeans this long. For me it was a huge plus, but obviously won't be for everyone. These were high rise, but they wouldn't stay up for me. I still felt like they were falling down in the back a little. They stretch out a bit throughout the day. The fit was spot on. I will likely keep these for a little while with my unlimited subscription.
These jeans were a dream for a tall gal like me. They're flattering, don't stretch out too much, and are the absolutely perfect length! I love love love them!

Being 5'11.5", I am accustomed to ankle and cropped jeans and could never find a pair of premium denim that was long enough and could hold up all day without losing shape. These are phenomenal jeans that are plenty long! The denim is a little thicker than normal and perfect for fall/winter weather in NYC. Thank you RTR for introducing me to a great new to me label.

links_reviews_title: I am tall and in love with these pants
links_reviews_text: Yes they are very long, so unless you're 5'8/5'9 and taller they probably aren't made for you. As a 5'9 woman I looooooved these jeans. I have a long torso and I found the high rise to be great. They still bunch a little at the bottom for me but just a tiny bit which I thought looked good-also tucked into boots a few times. I think I wore these for 5 days straight lol. Would have bought them but they are too expensive.
These do run long, but I rolled up bottom to accommodate my booties. Very slimming and stretchy. Don't hesitate!

links_reviews_title: True to size. Soft and looonnng.
links_reviews_text: These fit well. They were true to size and soft to the touch. They were really long, which I love because I'm tall.
I have longer than average legs, but the pant legs were extremely long. I had to roll them up ~2 inches. If I had something else to wear, I would not have worn them.

links_reviews_title: Great fit in waist and hips
links_reviews_text: They are a bit long and I rarely have issues with length but looked cute cuffed

links_reviews_title: Great fit on the hips and waist - way too long!
links_reviews_text: These jeans are so long they covered most of my feet. I’m 5’7” with pretty long legs and these were 27R jeans, my normal size. I had to roll them about 6 inches to wear them. I’m not sure if it is the brand or if these were accidentally long sizing, but they were not what I was expecting.
So so comfortable and fit perfectly for a curvy girl. Runs just a bit small.

links_reviews_title: Nice color and fit but 12" too long!
links_reviews_text: I liked these but they were ridiculously long for a 5'3" person.
The fit was great except really long. I had to roll up the pants at the bottom.
Jeans were super long and a bit baggy at the bottom. Too baggy to even fold under or sideways. I sent back after wearing just once. They also aren't very high-waisted, which I was expecting.

I love this look and feel of this dress but it is extremely static prone when worn with tights. It's a lovely weight for spring/summer, but the darker colors make it work in winter too. I love the fluttery sleeves as well. It was a little hard to keep the front closed, but this was sized up for me (12 v 10) so there was a little extra fabric to overlap in the v neck area. I wore this to work and felt it was appropriate, though if I'd had my proper size it might have been too revealing
Color was prettier in person! Very comfortable, DVF wrap dress. The length was a little longer than I like, but still very pretty and perfect for work.
Perfect dress for work, great fit!
I'm 5'3" and it's perfect length for petite. It's wrinkle free and it's super light and thin fabric, so it will make a great travel dress
Comfortable and flattering. Will rent again for work.
Love this dress! The color, feel, and fit were all great. I received so many compliments. DVF always runs small, so best to size up. Rent this one today!
Great colors; easy to wear-simple wrap dress
Really nice silky material. As with all wraps, I needed a tank top underneath. Sleeve were light and billowy.
Great wrap dress - does need a tank underneath for work. Will rent again

I was excited to wear my first DVF iconic wrap, but it fell short of expectations. It's very light fabric and unlined which meant the wind got under it and showed a lot of skin when walking outside. I also had to pin the bust. I don't think the print was very young but it was fine for an office environment. Overall not bad and I liked it, but happy to be sending it back in after one wear.

I loved the pattern of this dress! The sleeves were a nice detail. It was a little low cut so I paired it with a bralette for work- might not be necessary for a night out. There was a little bit of static cling despite not wearing tights. Very flattering dress!
Loved the breathable, natural silk of this dress! More natural fibers like this on the RTR platform please!! Wore for work and it was very flattering and a perfect spring outfit!
I felt really pretty wearing this to work and then transitioning to a date! Only issue is the chest can be gappy
I needed a tank underneath so I didn't show too much cleavage. Nice print, I expected a more luxurious feeling fabric for the listed purchase price.
A tad bit short for work but good for every day

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments... didn't find it that flattering
links_reviews_text: I really love this DVF style sleeve, I found the pattern less appealing in person. It also widened my middle in a way that I didn't love
Not for work...plunging neckline. Had to use shape tape to keep the girls in. Otherwise pretty pattern and comfortable to wear.

Wrap dress delivers as usual by hugging your body in all the right places! However, the deep V can tend to slip down a bit as you're moving around so I wouldn't recommend wearing this to work if you have a larger chest.

This was a nice dress and flattering for my body being 2 months post partum, but there were a few things I didn't like about it. I rented to wear to work as a lot of my work clothes don't fit properly. While this dress was flattering, it was rather low cut so I had to wear a tank top under it. It is also very staticky. The fabric on the v-neck part folds under but it isn't sewed down, so it keeps poking out awkwardly.

Loved this dress! It was long enough for me (I'm 5'9"), and the color and wrap was really beautiful. It's a true wrap / unlined -- I figure folks renting a DVF wrap know what to expect on those fronts! The ruffle sleeves were beautiful, not overly fussy like I was worried they would be. Rent it!

I didn't expect to love this dress so much and got it as a back up - but loved it. It felt it it was made to fit. The waist was perfect (and adjustable), and the length worked perfectly (I am a bit over 5"9 so dresses often run short but this was spot on). I was a bit worried the cleavage would open up etc but no issues at all. The sleeve effect is great too. Material is beautiful in person, lovely feel. In short this one is grown up (professional friendly), but also fun. I got some lovely photos in it too, including some where I'm smiling more than the above! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: A little low in the bust
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress, but I am perhaps too modest for it as I was always checking that I had it tight enough to make sure my bra wasn't showing. Certainly not able to wear it WITHOUT a bra at my chest size which would've gotten rid of that issue. I did wear it a second time with a different bra and it was better cut for the dress, but I still wasn't 100% comfortable in it.
Love the color on this simple, flowing dvf wrap dress. Unlike other dvf wrap dresses, it isn't too low cut so work appropriate without needing a tank top. Great closet staple!
Very cute, very comfortable and very easy to wear. Would consider re renting for sure!

If you are between sizes, size down. I am a very busty individual and the dress kept gaping open at my chest no matter how I tied the straps. Also, I wouldn't recommend for any time spent outdoors as I had to grab it from blowing open twice. The colors and fabric are wonderful though.

This wasn't the most amazing dress I've rented at RTR, but it was a nice addition to my work wardrobe. The color was beautiful, the length was work appropriate (I'm 5'0"), and despite being a wrap dress it covered the 34DDD girls well. I still pinned it just to be certain there weren't any wardrobe malfunctions, but I could've done without and been okay which is not always the case. I recommend wearing shorts or opaque spanx underneath this light weight wrap dress since it will fly with any breeze. The flutter sleeves add a nice tough to this otherwise basic wrap dress.

links_reviews_title: A nice wrap dress for work
links_reviews_text: This is a true wrap, so I did feel a little exposed in when I sat with my legs crossed and found myself adjusting it a lot. I'm a 34D/DD and had to wear a tank underneath, and the 6 still pulled a bit at the chest. Overall a nice dress for work but it wasn't a favorite.
Lovely DVF wrap! I wish it were slightly longer for work, but it was by no means inappropriate. Great shade of green. I tend to size down in wrap dresses, but this one fit very true to size.
Great wrap dress to accentuate all the right curves. The bust opens a bit but nothing a little fashion tape or safety pin can't take care of.

Super cute and figure flattering wrap dress for work. The sleeves are also really fun! You could wear this in all seasons (winter with tights) or in warmer weather without since the material is light.
