Some DVF dresses are more flattering than this one. Good quality

links_reviews_title: Runs a little big in bust
links_reviews_text: Classic DVF wrap dress I'd say this runs a little shorter than some others I was attending a modest affair so I wore a black skirt extender underneath- it was above my knees and I am 5'6 Also wore a camisole underneath since it was low I'd say it runs large especially in the bust area if you are small on top like myself 34A Such a beautiful green color Very soft light weight material The sleeves added some extra classy notes

links_reviews_title: Classic DVF wrap dress with flirty, updated sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Lovely, professional but feminine dress, however IMPORTANT NOTE: not for WINDY days! Holy cow. The beautiful fabric is quite light weight, and I caught an unfortunate gust of wind, and my elementary school principal caught an unfortunate look at my knickers. The color is beautiful. I usual size up for DVF, but I wore my usual 4 for this dress, and it fit perfectly. I'm small busted, and definitely had to wear a tank top underneath to avoid an even more unsightly wardrobe malfunction. I will select this dress again.

This dress is so lovely! It's honestly the ideal wrap dress and could easily work on so many body types. It was a little clingy with the static this time of year, but I got more compliments than I can count! I will be renting this again.

DVF wrap dresses are everything. Such a must-rent and I'm in love with the emerald green color of this one. This fits true to size and the best thing about wrap dresses is that you can tie it as tight as you need to in order to cinch your waist perfectly. Best part is you can wear your regular standard bra with this. These wrap dresses are so flattering - it's what Diane von Furstenberg is famous for. The fabric is so comfy and this is the easiest dress to just throw on for any event, you can wear it for everyday or dress it up with heels and accessories for a formal event.
This dress was so slimming and gorgeous. I had to talk myself down from buying it.

I've always wanted to be the kind of woman who wears DVF wrap dresses. Who would have thought it would happen when I was 24 weeks pregnant? LOVE this dress and I am going to keep this one and rewear a few times - gorgeous gorgeous gorgeous. Can I wear only DVF the rest of my pregnancy?
Very flattering dress & fits well

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a rehearsal dinner and after party!
links_reviews_text: The fit is so, so flattering! It made me feel effortless & fancy at the same time.
Wore this wrap to work! Has to pin the top so it wouldn't show too much cleavage, but that worked well.
Broke my leg skiing and wore this all day in the lodge the next day. Cozy, a bit oversized, fabulous color.
Loved the color! Got a size S and it was still a bit oversized, which I liked. I am 5'3" 135 lbs and it hit me at about my waist. Kept me super warm too. Tempted to buy!
Rented for a ski weekend. With two layers under was perfect for the conditions. Puffer fit but not too bulky, and the color was amazing

links_reviews_title: Super warm oversized puffer with a pop of color
links_reviews_text: The color is the best part of this coat- super bright and fun! Wish I had gotten a small since it's so big but still loved it! Zipper pockets for the win

Soooooo many compliments! Fit TTS. Gorgeous color, cropped fit - looked great with a higher waist pant. LOVED. Even wore it skiing one day, though it's really not made for it, as it's missing the extra bells & whistles/gear pockets of a true athletic jacket. Would be thrilled to rent again.
The color sells this for me. I love the TORY sport brand and this coat was no exception.

This jacket is very soft, comfortable, plenty of pockets (inside and out,) but what I love most about it is that it's the most pretty shade of bright red. Perfect to wear with jeans when cheering on the San Francisco 49ers, or for layering over your favorite animal print dress. So versatile.
Fit great! So stylish. Awesome bright color. Made me standout in the winter. Also, incredibly warm.
Loved this coat. Very warm, great color, and a nice cropped option. Wore it all December and great for airport travel.
Wore this in Colorado, kept me warm and received tons of compliments!

I wore this multiple times and loved it! got plenty of compliments. The M felt a little big on me, but it did have plenty of room for sweaters or sleeves underneath which I liked. I would definitely recommend!
Loved this jacket but it was too big on me. I would definitely rent again in a medium. The quality is amazing. Zippers work great and the color is very eye popping.
Great jacket. Would probably go with an M next time. Recommend!
I rented this for a vacation to Maine in early November and ended up wearing it almost every day! I received numerous compliments on the color of the coat!

links_reviews_title: The color was spot on, just like the picture, vibrant red.
links_reviews_text: The XL was HUGE!!! I would recommend sizing down unless you want to look like the Kool-aid man!

links_reviews_title: Ran too large but otherwise very nice jacket
links_reviews_text: I really love this coat great color and feel. Great accessory pockets inside and love that it says get to the gym on interior. I wanted this to work for me but this coat was too large and boxy in its fit
I am so obsessed with this jacket. The cut is great and it looks awesome. I bought it :)

I love this jacket so much. I have had it for a few weeks and am very seriously considering purchasing it. Firstly, it is the most vibrant and fun red. It's also super cozy and comfy. The jacket has withstood a Minnesota winter so far, so it's pretty warm. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I am obsessed with this statement jacket!
links_reviews_text: The fit, cut, color, and size was all perfect for an everyday jacket. Plus I love that it is lightweight and had zip able pockets as well as a cropped fit. However, the front zipper gave me a little trouble although it eventually zipped correctly! Would definitely recommend if looking for a power color statement piece!!
Runs way too large. Could have sized down two sizes. Didn't wear it

I normally steer clear of puffer jackets because I feel like they're so unflattering and make me look huge but this one is amazing. It does run a little bit (I'm usually a large and probably could have gone with a medium) but I'm actually fine with it being a little roomy so I can wear a chunky sweater underneath. It's warm and cozy but feels like at the same time. I might buy it! It's also an awesome bright color.
Really cute jacket - fun style that I wore with jeans and Golden Goose sneakers. Lots of compliments.

This is such a cute jacket to add a pop of color to a basic fall/winter outfit. I've worn several times since receiving and have gotten numerous compliments each time. As far as size goes, I'm 5'7", 132 lbs, and the small was roomy (I could wear a patgonia sweatshirt underneath), so I'd say it runs on the larger side of TTS. Also, I live in CT, and while this is the perfect transitional jacket for ~40-50 degree weather, I wouldn't consider this a true winter coat.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and warm! Wore it in Scotland and it was perfect, not to mention the color was perfect!!
links_reviews_text: Ordered a size small originally and it was too big, XS fit a lot better so I would recommend sizing down! it was a pocket inside which also made it even better for my trip as I could put my phone in it etc.
This coat was so fun for layering a fall look! It's very soft and warm and really stands out.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, slits a little high on side
links_reviews_text: Loved how comfortable this sweater was. It's just the perfect amount of warm. One thing I did notice that the slits on the side were a little high on the side and depending on how you pulled down the sweater or sat you could be a little exposed. Still loved this sweater!

links_reviews_title: Never wanted to send this back!
links_reviews_text: This is the coziest oversized sweater but the cutouts create a super flattering shape. Got so many compliments on this sweater, I wore it four times before sadly returning it. Winter is long - I will absolutely be renting this again!
Wide cut sweater, super comfortable and warm. Not at all itchy.
had my eye on this for a while and didnt dissapoint. A bit large though thats the style. Perfect for late march nyc weather. Also perfect for sheltering at home :)

links_reviews_title: Such a great sweater! Will rent again!
Cute and stylish but a bit bulky
links_reviews_text: Love the color and the details. But fits a little long for my taste. Hard to tuck into jeans without bulking up the midsection. If it is just a tad shorter (or if I am just a bit taller lol) it would be perfect. Very warm fabric.
Great sweater! Cozy and roomy enough to layer a t-shirt underneath. It's nice heavy cotton, no itch.
Wore a bunch and got lots of compliments. Super comfy and has just a little flare to make it more than just a navy sweater.
The perfect sweater for a cold Chicago day. Chic, cool and fun. Most importantly, comfortable and warm.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my daughters birthday dinner.
links_reviews_text: This is a very heavy, warm sweater, The sleeves were really long. I'm 5'10" and had to fold the sleeves back. I tried it with jeans and it felt like the sweater was wearing me. The midi skirt worked much better with it.
Fun but the sleeves are really long! This was too big for me but I wore it.....Nice details on it. Good for work or everyday.

links_reviews_title: Too big for a short person
links_reviews_text: Felt it drowned me
Got lots of compliments. Michael Jackson vibes. Sleeves are a bit long.
Medium weight with very cool braiding detail. Only negative was longish sleeves that had to be rolled. Got lots of compliments and wore multiple times.
Sweater runs big And is comfortable. I got lots of compliments. The sleeves world long so I rolled them up.

links_reviews_title: When the wrong rental goes RIGHT!
links_reviews_text: So I ordered this sweater for me but it unfortunately was too big, kinda boxy and overall just not flattering for my small frame... didn't want to waste a rental so I let my mom try it on... she loved it! Her thoughts " It fit great...the lines were perfectly situated. The quality and texture of the sweater complimented the body to accent the positive areas and giving it “curve appeal” lol. Ideal to wear with leggings, jeans or dress up with a mini pencil skirt. Perfect for the holiday season when paired off with a Christmas accent brooch or New Year’s Eve by adding silver black and white to the array of colors!!! Loved it...will rent again."
Little loose fit

Very warm, heavy sweater. The braids were eye catching and very cool - off-white not white. The length was a little challenging for me - not short or long, hit around my hips. Ended up wearing with a short black knit flaired mini dress with small white dots and black boots. Lots of compliments, many thought was one piece. It fit perfectly otherwise, actually long enough for my very long arms!
I loved this sweater and wore it multiple times. Got compliments every time I wore it. One of my favorite rentals!

links_reviews_title: Cool & well crafted; accentuates broad shoulders
links_reviews_text: Love the sweater, but I am a bit broad-shouldered and a 36DD on an otherwise tall lean frame, and this made me look pretty big on top, so I didn't wear it. The sweater's really cool. It just didn't work for me. Would be great on anyone small chested/shouldered.
Perfect for any casual occasion. The white trim adds just the right touch. No downsides to this rental.

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! Warm and stylish.
links_reviews_text: Love the simple design, the braid just gives it that extra little flair to give this sweater an edge. Comfortable, warm, perfect for fall & winter!
I absolutely love this sweater. It is oversized and super cozy! I received many compliments! I definitely would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater! I got lots of complements.
links_reviews_text: I am in-between a medium and a large. This large was too big. If I rent again, I would rent a medium.
I ordered a size up because I wanted the sweater to be baggy, and don't worry, it already is! Sending back and sizing down. Gorgeous piece though!

links_reviews_title: Great for a business casual work environment. Warm and cozy!
links_reviews_text: This could be worn with jeans, dress pants, or leggings. I am a size 14 and the sweater was a little big but wearable. Loved the braid details!
Pros: Nice, soft material. Cute accents with the white woven braids. Worn with jeans and tall black boots. Cons: Slightly runs large.

I've rented this twice and both times I've worn it several times before returning. It fits loose and looks great with skinny jeans. I love that the braid continues and hangs down on the side. The braid is on the front and back. The sleeves are very long but I just tucked them under.
Order this one, you won't regret it! The braid detail made this such a unique sweater. Pairs great with black pants and a colorful shoe!
Great sweater super cute details

links_reviews_title: Great for casual wear-to-work. Comfortable and not itchy.
links_reviews_text: Length of sweater and sleeve length was long. I would rent again but would get size S.
Love the sweater - it was purposely oversized and super comfy. Got a lot of compliments. The small fit well - I'm 5'5", 120lbs and have a smaller bust.

links_reviews_title: This is such a cute sweater. The braid makes it look like you have a purse.
links_reviews_text: Cute, comfy and warm. Wore three times. I love not having to keep sweaters in my wardrobe, because it doesn't get cold often in Dallas. Perfect for everything.
The sweater isn't anything super special, but the style is unique and fun. It's quite thick so if you prefer a thinner, slimming sweater this one isn't it.

links_reviews_title: Cool design not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: Worked well for my bump but otherwise not the most flattering for being petite. Cool design though.
Perfect day to night sweater with leather leggings. fun and fits well. runs small, especially during my second trimester of my pregnancy. perfect hip level length.

links_reviews_title: The detail on this sweater is very cool.
links_reviews_text: Sweater is bulky. I felt like i looked like a football player. Not flattering, would size up if you want an oversized fit.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to work a few times.
links_reviews_text: Fits loosely, but extremely comfortable.
Great travlesweater

links_reviews_title: Great warm sweater for the polar vortex
links_reviews_text: Big Comfy cute
A crisp stylish high end look !
I wanted to like this sweater as I loved the style. However, very long arms and the material is so thick that it just adds bulk. Not for me.
This is a unique, warm, perfect winter sweater. The white braiding offers some edginess to an otherwise basic black sweater. Would have bought if it were more affordable!
I should have gotten the Large...
It's very easy to wear and literally, I wear it every day!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for the holidays several times
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this sweater! Both comfortable and flattering with the horizontal stripe! Normally I wear a medium/large, and ordered the XXL based on reviews and it fit like a glove. I'm 5'7" and about 180
Cute stylish sweater. I received many compliments on it. It was a little big but nice fit overall
The feel of the sweater was great. Length of arms good. Trendy - so many people commented on it.
When I got this I thought it was super formal but I threw it on with a super casual outfit and LOVED IT. It's impeccably made and just a beautiful addition to an outfit. Loved!
I loved the fit and color of this dress.

links_reviews_title: Super easy for a day at the office!

links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful, feminine and professional looking dress. I rented it for a conference. I'm 5'1" and 110 pounds and the dress fit great, not tight at all. I'm a 32 DD and the center button was puckering very slightly, so if you have a large bust, you may want to size up. I felt very beautiful and sexy without showing anything! Very comfortable. Lots of compliments.

I had people literally walking out shops to tell me they liked this dress. It's very bright and eye catching! Super comfy, and easy to wear! Only part I didn't love was that I felt like the front of the dresses "bust seam" goes higher and then drops lower in the back. Felt it was an odd choice but eventually forgot about it!

Nice quality, but not the most flattering dress on me. Runs a bit big in the waist and a bit small in the bust. Would consider renting again just because I like the pattern so much, though it’s maybe a touch bright for me (I’m super pale!).
I got so many compliments on the color. I wear a 12 but only the 14 was available. It fit fine and was super comfortable. Love it!

I think this Cheers everyone up! Wore to a work event where I needed to make a short intro for an event and I knew the main speaker would be just as bold and burger! Perfect. Looked incredible w the matching bright fuchsia Rebecca minkoff jacket. Felt very mrs maisel and never so coordinated!!
This dress runs a little small for Kate Spade sizing. If you have a larger bust, I would size up as the buttons at the bust can create a gap. This is a cute dress to wear and extremely comfortable!

I wore this for my first day back to school and received lots of compliments. The color is so bright and fun. The button closures were borderline puckering, so fuller bust girls may want to size up or just wear a thinner lined bra underneath. I loved the vibrant fabric-- definitely a day-brightening dress.

I bought this for a real estate music video I was recording. I always have loved Kate Spade. The colors were absolutely perfect and it fit so well. The dress was comfortable to wear all day and received so maybe compliments. Hoping I can buy this dress soon.
Loved this dress! The stretch in the back made it so comfortable and pairing it with tights and a leather jacket made it the perfect day to night outfit. I think it runs true to size

This dress is VERY bright. I love pink and I even had to think twice about wearing it. I'm glad I did because it was comfortable and the fabric is beautiful. I sized up to a 14 because this designer's line runs very small. The buttons just closed on my chest. I received a ton of compliments. Perfect for any season. A must rent.

This is a great dress for a POP! of color to bring into the everyday neutrals that every one wears at work. The dress overall is a very comfortable fabric. The back top half of the dress has a nice stretch to it for lady's with a bigger bust. Over wonderful dress. Highly recommend for this fall! #rtrlewks
This dress is true to size. It fits perfectly with room to stretch and is very comfortable. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Super fun bubble print dress for work.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this dress. The smocking makes it so comfortable to wear, though I generally wear a size smaller in Kate Spade. The burgundy and pink combo really pops, and it has beautiful flow when you walk.

The smocking in the back made this dress super comfy but still very appropriate for work since the fabric was nicer. I did have to switch out my padded bra for a regular one because the front buttons pulled slightly. Larger chested girls might have issues.

I knew this dress would be a gamble, but as usual, almost all of my hearts weren't available. It's so bright that I felt ridiculous in it. I asked my boyfriend what he thought and he said "sorry, I can't hear you over that dress" haha! Maybe for a spring brunch, but not a February day at the office.

There will be no shortage of compliments when you wear this dress but beware, the front button tends to come undone. I wore a cami underneath but wouldn't recommend this to anyone with a larger chest.
The fit was very comfortable and flattering. Received many compliments on the dress. Will definitely rent again in the future!
Great dress, I am tall and it was a little shorter that I like so I put on tights and booties and it was all good.
I rented this for work in the gloomy winter & everyone said it brighten their day. The buttons stay closed and a good length. I size up with Kate Spade.

links_reviews_title: Cute and flirty dress perfect for a hostess
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to host a housewarming party recently and loved how it made me look and feel like a perfect hostess. The buttons and collar are a nice touch as are the sleeves. The pink is really bright (almost neon) but it's cute and girly. The length was great for me (I'm 5'10") to not feel too stodgy but also not show too much leg.
Cute print and pretty dress... but not for the busty. I wound up not being able to wear it, as the buttons gaped.
Fun dress. my bust was slightly popping out, but great rental.

links_reviews_title: The color is great for dreary winter day.
links_reviews_text: Super cute and fun dress.

links_reviews_title: Cute but I am waiting to try the shirt sleeve version
links_reviews_text: I wore it out just to have something new. Forgot to take a pic. It was comfortable

links_reviews_title: Picture doesn't do this dress justice!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color! Got lots of compliments. Only con is that the waist is narrow even though it's elastic - which made it a little more challenging to put on. But very comfortable once it's on!
I loved this piece. I wore it when the weather was cold, with tights and boots. Would rent again and I wish I could buy it!!

Absolutely LOVED this dress. The color is outstanding and so much fun. I got so many compliments. The cut is very flattering -- there is a texture/ruching on the back of the dress that carries onto the front around your hips, so it's slimming at your waist. Looks great and is perfect for work, an evening out, or just any day you want a pop of color.
Tight about chest if you are busty.

links_reviews_title: Loved it - easy to wear forgiving. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: great
loved this cropped sweatshirt! perfect for around the house. super comfortable, roomy on top and form fitting on the bottom. Would rent again!
Comfortable and stylish, I'm probably going to live in this. I can see why it's so expensive as it's made well and very unique.
Really comfortable and a nice outfit when you need to run errands, but also wear sweatpants to your living room everyday. Sleeves were long on me, I'm a 4/6 top and this fit well.

I loved this top! The fit was amazing and the band made the top secure (no flashing allowed lol). The fabric was super soft and I liked that I can zip it completely down or up, which made putting it on a breeze. Will rent again!

Super cute. Material isn't anything fancy. The band was a little tight around the middle. I paired with high waisted lululemon yoga pants and it pinched the skin that showed in the crop top style to the point where I didn't feel comfortable wearing. I will rent again because I like the crop style, will just size up next time for a cool look.
Cute, I ordered a size up for comfort and it was still to small... size up one or two for sure!

links_reviews_title: Perfect to step up your everyday clothes
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed this top but should have ordered a size up for a bit more comfort. The elastic band was a bit tight and hard to move my arms, but the shirt is flattering and different
Loved this top for a flirty winter look with jeans and high boots for a night out!

links_reviews_title: I LOVE the way this fits!
links_reviews_text: This fit is so flattering I'm obsessed

I rented this for vacation and liked it so much I bought it at a Joie sample sale a few months later. I'm usually a M or L, usually size up in button downs to cover my chest but this M fit fine. It's supposed to be oversized and the sleeves are cut like a t shirt but hit at your elbow. It's silky and lined so not sheer at all but also not super breezy.
Fun shirt with a great pattern. Comfortable and loose.

I wore this to a tiki style birthday party, so the print was perfect! It has a slight cropped fit, which I was a fan of. If you're in between sizes I would suggest sizing down, since it kind of has an oversized fit. It was fully lined and had a nice, high quality silky feel. Highly recommend!
Stylish, cute, flattering. Can wear to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to like it more than I did.
links_reviews_text: Really liked the design and look of the pattern, but overall it was kind of just blah. It wrinkles very easily and the lining kept hanging below the shirt part which was annoying. It was fine to wear for the day but I don't have a desire to keep it in my rotation.
Loved this joie top! It does fit boxy but that's part of the charm. The stripes on the sleeves are sooo cool.
The fit was perfect lazy look without looking lazy.
on trend, comfy pajama shirt. great print & easy fit.
Ran large but looks great with skinny jeans!
Totally casual & breezy. It feels like a lined pajama top. Yes, it's boxy, but that's kind of the point. :)
It ran a tad large, but received a ton of compliments.
Fun, comfy, light too
Lovely spring top! Lots of compliments from people of all ages. It does wrinkle, so be prepared to steam it when it arrives. But the cut is generous and flattering, and the pattern is eye catching.
Very relaxed fit shirt. Fit well and was fun. Received many compliments. Would rent this again.
Overall I really liked this top, the style of it is very flatter. I am a fan of the print as well. I will be renting again.
People stopped me on the street. Easy and chic

Lovely print, but since I'm not tall and curvy, it was just too boxy for me. The sleeves went below my elbows. It was the right size, but I was swimming in it. Would look best on someone who has a taller frame IMHO.
Cute and just embrace the fact that you're wearing PJs. Needed a cami for work

links_reviews_title: Super cute print, super breathable fabric and ultra-comfy!
links_reviews_text: If you have hips, might consider going up a size as it cuts off right around the hip area. Also, the neckline was a bit lower than expected, but overall super comfy and breathable!

links_reviews_title: Loved this flowy comfortable top for a casual day at the office.

links_reviews_text: Dry cleaning has warped the outer layer so it is slightly shorter than the lining in front. Good design, nice details and color, it just wasn't a great fit-

LOVED this shirt! The pattern was so fun and flattering and there was a lining so I could wear it to work with no undershirt (wasn't sheer at all). I was long enough that I could French tuck (thanks, tan!) into the front of my pants but it hung nicely in the back. I got a ton of compliments and fabric was high quality so it felt great all day! Will definitely be renting again.

I loved this as a way to try the pajama shirt trend - it was a great way to wear something a little more bright and fun for everyday. I was a little worried that the shorter boxy fit wouldn't be flattering with my large chest, but the longer sleeves helped balance it out and it worked great with high-waisted jeans.
Nice relaxed fit but need to be careful with styling because very close to Kramer on Seinfeld
perfect oversized fit
I'm usually a Large, but the Medium fit well and wasn't tight at all. The sleeves are big, but not bulky. The neck was a little floppy, but I still got complements at work!

This sweater is fun. The sleeves make it too trendy for me to consider purchasing, but I will definitely wear it more than once before returning it. Nice quality. The high neck did not bother me, which was something I was concerned might happen.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, sleeves were great, collar/neckline was a little worn out
links_reviews_text: So comfy, sleeves were great, collar/neckline was a little worn out (it didn't look as structured as photos)

This is such a comfortable sweater (absolutely no itching) with an incredible structure. The sleeves fall perfectly and do not get in the way. Very chic and totally made my day when I wore it. Perhaps my favorite item from RTR to date!
This sweater fits nicely And the neck is great because it comes up high but is not a turtleneck. The sleeves are full and it's perfect for fall. It's warm without being too hot.

I wore this to work for casual Friday and was cozy and snug as a bug in a rug all day long! Perfect for those crisp autumn days up ahead. Got tons of compliments at the office and my husband loved it too and said he is read for sweater weather!
It did not feel right or comfortable around the neckline. I think I may have needed a smaller size.

I love this sweater so much I bought it! It is so comfy and warm but not too warm. The neckline sits in a way that is really cute and the way the sleeves bunch at the wrists is nice. I am pretty sensitive to different materials and found this to be extremely comfortable.
I love this brand! This sweater was so eye-catching with the blouson sleeves, and really made a statement. Comfortable, not itchy at all, and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater and would totally rent again!
links_reviews_text: Great colors, texture, shape and fabric! Loved it!
I loved it, hubby loved it. Enough said.
I have gotten so many compliments on it! And it's very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater but still too warm
links_reviews_text: Great sweater: quality of fabric, runs true to size great color. Unfortunately, it is still too warm for this sweater. I will try to rent it again.

This dress is perfect for all preggos out there! It looks tiny on the hanger but very stretchy and flattering on. It has a thicker material that has a compression aspect to it making it smooth everything out. Super comfy but still put together looking!
Super flattering. Can be dressed up or down. Mine was a bit washed and worn but otherwise fine!

links_reviews_title: Super sleek without leaving you looking big!
links_reviews_text: This dress isn't like typical ribbed dresses. I've gotten robbed dresses that show every single bump and roll you have on your body but this lays flat down. It's stretches a bit during the day from sitting and everyday movements. So if you like a tighter fit I would recommend sizing down but if you don't mind, go for your regular size
Great fit!
Verrrrrrry stretchy which is great- the material is thick too so it's smooths out and lumpy bits.
Super easy and comfortable dress to wear for work.

links_reviews_title: Sweater dress - thick, but not winter weather thick
links_reviews_text: Soooo renting this in the summer was probably my first mistake, buttttt wore it on the weekend with white sneakers and than again to work with heels and it was so cute! Will absolutely be renting again in the fall. The stripes & cut are super flattering to accent any body shape!
I'm a borderline 8/10 and could have gone down a size. Really easy to wear and comfy.
This was one super comfortable dress. I wore this on vacation in Napa , CA. I paired it with a belt purse and sneakers and wore it all day. The right but comfortable fit made it a little sexy

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Extremely comfortable and flattering!!!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and the material is forgiving. Really enjoyed this dress. I actually should have gotten a smaller size

links_reviews_title: Fun for a 4th of July party!
links_reviews_text: This is definitely form fitting and hugs curves, but it looks great and it so comfortable. I'll definitely rent this again.

I love this dress and would probably keep it if it wasn't so expensive. It has a ton of stretch, but kept its shape throughout the day. It is NOT see through, but I did wear Spanx underneath to smooth my tummy a bit.
Hugs the body just right and is extremely comfortable! I loved renting this and wearing something different than just jeans.
Great bump friendly option for all day wear. Super comfortable, light, and stretchy. Would definitely recommend

links_reviews_title: Day to night- looks super small on arrival but LOTS of stretch
links_reviews_text: Nice comfortable stretchy fit; will be renting again
Great fitting and comfortable to wear. Lots of compliments
I liked this dress but is not great for winter.
Nice material and fit. Comfortable basic to elevate with a jacket and sneakers or booties for fall.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this dress. The material is a dream and absolutely perfect for fall! The cut is super flattering and it's now a staple piece in my closet. Easy to wear for work, casual, or a night out depending how you accessorize.
I wore this to a conference and felt very comfortable and confident in it all day. The fabric is stretchy, so I would not recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: It looked great at work with a black blazer!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, very figure hugging! and ran true to size!
I wanted to buy it - the rib helps keep the shape of this dress, though it is definitely body-con. Can dress up or down.
great dress. very stretchy. lots of compliments.
Dress was so flattering I ended up buying. Sweater material is light weight and perfect for Fall. Neckline & length are work appropriate
I rented this because it seemed stretchy and would be comfortable for work (I'm 6 months pregnant) this out is NOT flattering at all.
absolutely loved this dress!! considered buying & definitely plan to rent again

When i pulled this out of the RTR bag I almost laughed - it looked so tiny. But it fit perfectly. (I've been wearing an 8/10 lately and this was an L.) Stretchy. Form fitting. Very comfortable. I got lots of compliments all day. Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Such a great basic! This dress could wow on many different occasions.
links_reviews_text: I loved the neckline - how it gracefully scooped and enhanced my faceline. The feel of the material is thick, but not too warm even in a heat advisory Arizona. As thick as luxurious as the fabroc felt, I dod need to change to nude undergarments so they would not be seen I am 5'4" and 135 lbs and the LARGE WAS HUGE, but very very comfortable. I would purchase if I had ordered the medium.
This dress is comfortable and fits to your body but not restrictive. I wore it to work and it was a really sharp look.
Thought it was for everyday but husband loved the look it wound up date night going out. Form fitting so must be comfortable with your shape but stretchy and comfortable.
the fabric is so comfortable and the cut is interesting and fun

When I walk, the bottom part slides up each step I take. I occasionally had to pull down the bottom. If you don't like doing that, I wouldn't recommend wearing it. Other than that, this is nice, fun summer dress!
Dress is very cute, but so tight fitting I felt I had to keep pulling it down. It's like a sweater dress that gets bunched around the mid-thigh.
unfortunately the fabric loosened throughout the day but it was still super comfy and a great length.
This dress got dressed up and down. With leggings, with flip flops.. The fabric is super soft, thick, and stretchy. Kept this dress longer than probably any other RTR item.
Nice dress but stretched out after a while

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress during an amazing food and wine tour in Montreal!
links_reviews_text: Dress was extremely flattering and comfortable. True to size and a great length!

links_reviews_title: Such a well fitted body hugging dress! LOVED it.
links_reviews_text: At first I wasn't sure about this dress when I saw it because it's one of those stretchy ones that fit like a bodycon dress but after wearing it the first time with some spanx (cuz ya know love handles and all) I was obsessed. Legitimately wore this 3 times in a week! It's body hugging but looks so flattering! Easily my favorite weekend dress to throw on. Would totally rent again.
great fit very flattering.

I'm a size 8-10 (bigger in hips) and this fit perfectly. It has a bit of stretch to it and is forgiving in all the right spots. Conservative enough for work if you aren't super curvy, otherwise it accentuates bust and hips, might need a blazer over it

links_reviews_title: Perfect for weeks of working from home
links_reviews_text: So so comfortable and easy to throw on over jeans or leggings (or pjs, no judgement!) and a shirt to look a little nicer for a conference call. Seriously considering keeping it.

links_reviews_title: This sweater was soft and easy to wear. I received a couplenice compliments on the color.
links_reviews_text: You can see in the picture its a little large, but I wore it anyway.
Sleeves fit tightly (on purpose) and are slightly long. I wore this all the time. Business casual to grocery shopping. The color is a light lavender/pink.
This oversized cardigan was comfy for travel and warm. The color is a pinkish-lavender, which made it a little hard to style in the winter. Also, no pockets.
I wore this sweater a few times and would definitely rent again. I loved the color, and it worked well with a lot of different outfits. It was very soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, super cozy and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: Wore it over dresses, with leggings, with sneakers, with boots - versatile sweater!
I loved the color and fabric. Would recommend to anyone looking for a winter cardigan!
Loved wearing this. Very warm, cozy, soft and comfortable. Nice color too, easy to pair.

links_reviews_title: so warm but not too bulky
links_reviews_text: great material that was soft and snug

Loved this sweater, it went with so many outfits. The perfect layering piece and color for any season! I only sent it back because it was probably due for a cleaning, but will definitely be renting again for fall!
Soft, nice weight, comfy
The fabric felt so nice and had a very satisfying heft. This was a beautiful dusty pink/lilac.
This is amazing. Perfect for the cold office or casual wear. Love it.
I liked this sweater but just enough to wear it once to work and send it back. Longer than expected, which normally I like bc I'm tall. The color is pretty, not too pinky.
I bought the gray one and then rented the pink one and it was hard to send it back. Maybe I will buy it when they rotate inventory ...
Nice drape, interesting color, felt like a go-to piece but still nothing super runway about it.
Very comfortable, perfect for any occasion from work to going out.

links_reviews_title: Soft fabric in pretty lilac color. Longer than anticipated.
links_reviews_text: Rather long, but comfortable and very soft. Easy to wear with other solids.

links_reviews_title: The MOST cozy sweater - was sad to give it back and will certainly rent again
links_reviews_text: perfect for yoga
Amazing color, but really only works with a sleeveless top underneath since the fabric is quite thin.
Good for everyday. Soft and thick material.
soft and comfortable. Perfect with jeans or leggings. Flattering fit.
Nice and soft, pretty color, side slits.
So soft, comfy and warm. Color is great and works perfect with jeans or leggings! I absolutely loved it!

It is good for giving a long, full coverage to wear with leggings. I am almost 5'10" and it was very long on me. You could probably put a belt around it and wear it as a dress. I was hoping the color would pop more but it was muted. A practical piece without much style or flair but still reasonably chic
Soft and comfortable and beautiful color
So comfortable, I could sleep in this! Looks exactly like the pic, no surprises. It runs large.
Fit great, soft, and really cute for everyday

As soon as I felt the cardigan on my hands, my first impression was the softness of the cardigan. Once I tried it on, it felt like a cozy blanket that I didn't wanted to take it off! Super comfy and it's true to its size.
This cardigan was comfortable, lightweight, and easy to wear and pair. That said it didn't have much shape to it and didn't really add much to any outfit. Okay basic piece.
Very happy with this. Good quality, nice color and fit, and surprisingly warm.
This is extremely long but super comfortable
Falls wonderfully! Very flattering with a dress or jeans and a tee. I wore to work but gonna keep for Sunday brunch. Idk when I will return it!
This top is soft and comfortable. The color is pretty also. I received a couple compliments when wearing it to work.
Comfortable, cute everyday sweater. In the model photo it looks like a muted pink/dusty rose color but in real life this was more purple.
Good quality, soft and comfortable.
Comfortable and warm and very pretty color.
I rented this fur for our New Year's Eve vacation in Las Vegas. I wore it the entire trip because it was so cold. It paired nicely with everything I wore. It kept me warm yet fashionable.

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a winter theme wedding in January
links_reviews_text: It's big and warm and I loved it for a formal event
So LUX and soft and warm. I plan to wear it all weekend. I wore it over a jumpsuit going to Phantom of the opera with my bf. I will wear with jeans and black knee high boots later. Obsessed!

Definitely runs large in the body. But so soft, cozy and comfy. Initially didn't like the bulk, but have grown to like the coat for its versatility. Can be dressed up or down, and is crazy warm. A winner.
Love this coat. Super soft and lush. Big...but in a good way. Warm. Clasps are a little difficult to get done up in a hurry but stay closed.

links_reviews_title: Okay, so I said I wouldn't send this back...
links_reviews_text: But I did in an effort to switch things up after like 1.5 mo's of having this. Well; I did switch things up, and haven't found a better and equally as versatile a coat. It's very edgy and big and works with a lot of looks. For some reason, this piece definitely arrived with a bit of an odor but this is day one and I Febrezed it last night and sprayed perfume on it today so hopefully it isn't unbearable. I love this thing :) Depending on how much look you want, you might want to size down.
This coat was so warm and stylish to boot, but beware because it is enormous.
Cozy, chic and oh-so soft. Didn't want to return because it was so damn cozy. I could have easily worn the XS, and if I purchased would probably go that way rather than S.
LOVE this coat. Oversized, warm and fluffy

Definitely runs large. I rented the small and couldn't go smaller because the sleeves would be too short but it's still just a big coat. I didn't keep it for longer because it really is just too bulky for everyday. BUT soooo cozy. The fur feel is awesome and it's warm.

Kept me warm for a week in Canada and was very chic. Wore it to dinner and on our walk abouts after dinner. I was almost 6 months pregnant as well and it was great. Would rent again for next winter vacation. Sheds a TINY bit.
Super soft. Fabulous. But the medium is pretty huge.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Love this coat! Definitely a keeper and you can dress it up or down. Would recommend to anyone. Fun coat to wear. Received many compliments from co-workers. People have stopped me at local stores that I frequent. This is definitely a show stopper!

I liked the idea of this coat but I found it to be too big and I had a hard time closing it- there are hooks that also snap (?) It took me a good 5 minutes to find the closures through all the fur. Looked pretty good though, and it was very warm.

links_reviews_title: Surprised I found a pair of jeans that fit me
links_reviews_text: I'm 6' tall and can't find a pair of jeans that I love. These do a pretty good job. They definitely got length. I didn't realize the ends were frayed. They tickle my ankle but it's fine. I ordered up after reading other reviews. I'm glad I did. For me, I still have extra room in the front but I can't quite seem to pull them 100% up (more like 95% so it's good enough) - so they are definitely snug in the upper thigh. Overall happy so I'll keep them for now.

Loved these jeans so much. Kinda mom jeans but more flattering than most mom jeans. Even my husband noticed them and said they looked great! Excellent quality, cool details. I'm 5'9" with a super long inseam and the length on these was perfect for me. Cropped on me above the ankle but not an awkward shin crop like many end up on me. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Too small! Didn't get to wear!
links_reviews_text: I was super excited to wear this pair of jeans! They looked super cute and the color was perfect. The jeans were soooo small though. I couldn't even get them on.

links_reviews_title: the reviews are not lying -- these run SO SMALL!
links_reviews_text: Size at least 2 up and even then who knows! I feel like I am a true 2, and rented the 27, and could barely pull them on. Could not get close to buttoning!

I love the wash of these jeans and they look like if they fit they would be really cute. i read the reviews saying that they are way too small. but of course i got my normal size. i am normally a 24 sometimes 23 rarely 25. these would not go above my hips. i was so sad because they are so cute. i think you would have to size up at least 2 sizes.. SO small!!

links_reviews_title: Did not go past my knees
links_reviews_text: I'm a very consistent size 27 and these looked like a 23 before I even unwrapped. Very small and no stretch. I still want them so will try again many sizes larger
These jeans are very cute if you're tall and you size up 2 sizes.
Cute jeans but they run about 2 sizes too small and don't have any stretch, so you'll need to size up.

links_reviews_title: Easy to find styles from causal to formal.
links_reviews_text: Cute cut, no stretch. Couldn't get past my knees .
These run at least two sizes small. I'm a true 27 and these felt more like a 25. Even getting them up my (normal size) calves was a process. Will size up next time around.

These were my favorite jeans. I was a little sad to see them go. Many of the reviews say there were tight and they were when you first wore them, but I found that they were the perfect jean the second wear. These jeans felt like they were made for you after that second wear. So if you have to rent this for one occasion, then probably pass on these. However, if you want to have them for a few wears, they are perfect.
These jeans are SO flattering! Fit my curves nicely and the length was also perfect. 10/10 would rent again.
There was no stretch at all. The last Jean's I got a size 0 and they fit but these, size 26 were so tight I could not even zip them up !

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear, have to send back!
links_reviews_text: I couldn't even fit my foot in these jeans!!! They have to stretch what so ever. They arrived with new tags so maybe they were so tight because they had never been worn. I would consider ordering in a bigger size, but much prefer jeans that have some give to them!
I couldn't get these jeans past my thighs. Run much smaller than other size 32 jeans I have.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't even get them up my leg
links_reviews_text: These seem to run REALLY small. They have no stretch, but even taking them out of the bag I knew they were going to be too small. I couldn't even get my foot through the bottom. Size up at least 2x

links_reviews_title: So small, rented two sizes up and still didn't fit
links_reviews_text: The color is great and the length is perfect. I got them in a 25, I'm usually a 25 or a 26. They were so small I couldn't get them on. I rented them again in a 27 but still couldn't not get them to fit. They're oddly tight in the calves and they have zero stretch. I wanted to love these but will not rent again. Size up!!

I couldn't get my foot through the bottom leg opening. My normal size 7 foot literally did not fit through. I've definitely come across a jean or two that didn't fit my thighs but I never even got to experience that because the leg opening was too small. I laughed so hard. I normally wear a size 26 in high waist denim and from the looks of it I would need to size up one size but that may not solve the issue with the leg opening. I'm not going to bother ordering a size up.

I'm regularly a 27. I rented a 28R since I've been enjoying my hot girl summer a littleeee too much, and I figured I'd give myself a little extra room for a few weeks until I am back in my regular jeans. These barely made it on! They have no stretch either. Super cute, and I'll probably rent again in the next size up, but yeah beware!

These are cute and came with tags so I they were brand new. I love the high waisted button fly, but they ran small/tight along the hips and thighs (waist was good). I fit pretty consistently in a 27/28 but I think I would need to try these in a 30 even maybe, but then might be real loose in the waist.

links_reviews_title: This fit is great for long legs!
links_reviews_text: Tried these on at an RTR store. I've been a 29 lately but was looking into going up a size and and the 30 fit perfectly. This style has a slight raw hem but it's possible to roll them if you decide not to show a raw hem because they will still not look like capris for long-legged bodies. I was so impressed with the inseam length that I purchased them the next day even though it was only at a 10% discount (and probably my most expensive jean purchase ever). I hadn't heard of this designer until afterwards when I did a little research to justify my purchase. Their website reads: "Midheaven Denim was originally inspired by tall women and has grown to include all women." And "constructed of the finest Italian denim. Our fabric is made in the world's most eco-conscious denim mill... you're guaranteed perfection, from the fabric to the fit." Definitely give these a try!

links_reviews_title: Loved trying bright colors in a bold pattern
links_reviews_text: These pants are a perfect example of why I love RTR. I typically don't buy many bold colors or patterns because I'm afraid I won't wear it enough or I'll get tired of it. Now I can try these styles without fear! These were super comfortable and fun and I'm so glad I rented them. I listened to other reviewers and sized up, which was the way to go. One size up fit great.

Nice fabric. Not too heavy but not thin and flowy. High waisted. Buttons and zips. On the tighter side in the waist and fitted around back side and thighs enough to show figure. Nice length for petite. Colorful pinks and oranges and blues flares out at bottom just above knee. No give to material.
Looooved these comfy, linen pants for my trip to Palm Springs. Went great with wedges and looked great in pics!
Got so many compliments on these vibrant flattering pants. Wore to work and out on the town. Got many compliments from men and women (lol). Had a blast!
The waist is a little snug so I'd recommend sizing up. Otherwise the hips, thighs and length were perfect. The colors couldn't have been more beautiful! Can't wait to rent again.

links_reviews_title: The whole theme of the party was amazing!
links_reviews_text: The pants were so fun and they were perfect for the them. Also, it was a hot summer day, so they totally breath and are airy. Really enjoyed wearing them!

The print and color are great, but there seemed to be too much fabric at the waist, almost like pleated pants but there were no pleats. Also the length didn't work for me at 5'4". Too long to look cropped but still to short for real pants, they ended up just looking poorly tailored on me

links_reviews_title: Fun pants for a tropical vacation!
links_reviews_text: Pants run small. I felt a little restricted in them, but they have a beautiful design.
Loved the color, print, and fit! Amazing piece to have for a colorful, floral wedding in India!

links_reviews_title: Loved these Mara Hoffman pants for vacation!
links_reviews_text: These are great linen pants with a gorgeous design but they run very small. I normally wear an 8 and I had to get these in 12. They were a little roomy but still more comfortable than the smaller size would be, although they were too long for me and had to wear very high heels! I recommend renting them for vacation!

I wore these in NY fall/winter and probably the wrong time to rent as they were a little light and summery. However, I still liked them. I have a bit of a stomach and find pants tricky at times but these fitted reasonably well. Got lots of compliments however I don't think they were that flattering on my body. Better if you are more of a flat stomach with hips type of body shape, and on the taller side.

links_reviews_title: Soft, colorful and makes you stand out
links_reviews_text: I wore it for a day out activity. I teamed it with a off shoulder bodysuit. Very roomy and easy to move about. The colors are bright and true to the picture. When I shared this pic, 3 of my friends asked me about it and I recommended them to check out renttherunway.com :)

Cute linen pants with a breezy summer feel but a closer fit. These are not tight from the mid-thigh down, but they aren’t super wide either, and they are quite slim in the hips and waist. I probably could have ordered a 4 for a more relaxed fit, but the 2 also fit me well in a snug way. They are also quite high waisted, and on me they were cropped but basically just to the top of the ankle, not super short. In general, more of a classic cut than a super trendy one. The print is very pretty, and the weight of the linen is such that they can be worn into the spring and fall a bit. I wasn’t sure from the pictures but they do not have any black in them, all of the darker parts are blues. They are prone to wrinkling and the bottom of the legs definitely needed to be steamed before wearing.
Really great colors and print. The fabric is light, and is very high waisted. Adorable pants. I especially liked pairing them w a navy top.

I got so many compliments on these pants! They're definitely a head turner and not for wallflowers (no pun intended). The colors are super vibrant. The material is lightweight and comfortable, but there is definitely no give to them. I'm usually between a 4 and a 6, but went for a 6 with these after reading reviews. Extremely happy that I did!
Super tight in the thighs but loose in the hips. Zipper did a weird poof thing too.
Colors are gorgeous and material is soft but these run a bit small and were totally unflattering in me.

Adorable spring pants! I wore these to work and got endless compliments on the bright pattern. The size was a bit snug so I wore them as high waisted pants, and they seem to wrinkle easily but you can't really tell with the pattern.
No stretch so the waist was a bit snug. It's a higher waist so with a loose top you couldn't tell how tight the waist was.

links_reviews_title: I love mara for the patterns. I come back for the fit
links_reviews_text: Mara never disappoints. Always a great choice.
I LOVED these pants. Fun pop of color, fit really well. Would rent again.
Loved the fit and high waist. Very light fabric, wrinkles easily but the print hides it.
Loved wearing these-all 4 times! They are a great linen-y fabric that is not too stiff yet hold their shape. Only sent them back to have them cleaned and pressed and will rent again inmediately!
Loved wearing these pants out for a night on vacation. They were comfortable and super fun! Runs small in the waist so size up for wiggle room.
I got a million and one compliments on these pants and even more rubbernecking. Love love love.

I'm petite, 5'3, so they hit around my ankle- and very high waisted! The fit was great, colors are amazing, and look awesome with a crop top. Got tons of compliments. I also wore with a white button down and navy blazer for work and it looked great!

These pants were so amazing! I'm so glad I ordered them. The size 2 fit me very well, maybe slightly big in the waist, but they definitely weren't hanging low. I wore them with a crop top because they came over my belly button. Super light, linen fabric. Length was good for some wedges. They weren't that tight around my legs but I think that's just the style. If you're in between sizes, I'd suggest sizing up because they don't stretch. I got so many compliments on them! Super fun. No complaints.

I got so many compliments on these pants. The only drawback is they don't have a lot of give so they were a bit constricting in the waste. I wish I could have worn them more but we haven't had the nicest weather in the northeast. I held onto them for a week before we had a suitable springy day! I paired them with the ivory torri top and it was the perfect outfit!

Absolutely loved these- so fun! I was a little worried about the print and fabric but it was a really nice cotton linen and the print was better in person. Fit Is great and very flattering, a tiny bit tight in the thigh but not noticeable. I'm usually a 0-2 and ordered the 2. I definitely will rent again.
I really liked these pants, but beware. They run a little small so size up especially if you are athletically built.
I typically wear a size 4. Couldn't get the 4 past my thighs, exchanged for the 6 and I still couldn't sit down. Absolutely no stretch in the material and very uncomfortable
This had a weird fit. Very small in the waist, I sent it back without wearing it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear these. Fall arrived too quickly!
links_reviews_text: Tight on my waist. Didn't feel comfortable in them although I love the print. Best for sunny warm months.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and great material for vacation
links_reviews_text: Wrinkles less than linen (this a rayon blend) and is a really fun, easy pant. Fit is flattering and comfortable and the print is fresh and livens every outfit up. Might buy these!

links_reviews_title: great colors but the fabric is not like the photo
links_reviews_text: This is a linen-like pant even though that's not what it looks like! A bit tight on the belly, so size up unless you've got a six-pack!

After reading all the reviews with a lot of comments on sizing up - some at least 2 sizes - I normally wear a true 6 in the pants and so I ordered an 8...BUMMED. Way too big. The 6 would have been the way to go. They are a light linen pant with a loose/high waist cut. Beautiful pattern/color and was planning on wearing it with a white top...
The waist was fairly tight, but everywhere else fit nicely. The pattern is beautiful.

Pants were comfortable and easily dressed up or down. I have an athletic build and they weren't too tight in the legs or butt. I maybe could have sized down because the waist was a little loose but the material isn't stretchy so I think for comfort makes sense to stick with your true size.
I held on to these for a long time. They were so fun and breezy. Slightly snug but not enough to be too uncomfortable. The linen was great for summer and they could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print, but tight in the hips!
links_reviews_text: I rarely wear bright patterns and was a little worried I wouldn't like it, but I loved it! I couldn't wear these pants, because they were much too tight in the hips and would be uncomfortable to sit or bend. It fit everywhere else though! I usually wear a size 4 in jeans, but upon reading reviews I decided to size up to a 6, because I thought that would be sufficient. But the fabric doesn't have the stretch like jeans and wasn't very forgiving on my wider hips. I would love to try a size up when it's available to see if that fits better.
I loved this as a casual sweater over jeans or leggings. Will rent again.
Really soft, warm fabric. The neck is tall, and looked a little funny rolled down. I am 5'10 and it hit me mid thigh.

Great dark gray textile, super warm, not itchy, over-sized without looking sloppy - came down to mid-thigh on me. Wore to office & going to keep for weekend trip to midwest where it is already very cold. Great rental, tempted to buy...
Very comfortable & roomy. Soft, not scratchy. Love the color. It's a keeper!
Perfect for our WFH times

This is a pretty sweater and it had a quality feel to it. It is warm but not overly thick to wear under a coat. It definitely ran large for me however- both in length and arms. Next time I would size down.
Nice sweater for cold weather.

At my age, I don't have a lot of outfits with long sleeves that you can pull down over your hands. I really liked that feature on this sweater. It is not a statement piece. But it is a great option to wear during winter months.
I am surprised by the rave reviews - to me this sweater was quite forgettable. It was thin and did not hold it's shape well. I also found the turtleneck quite short too so it looked a little blah.

Comfy classic sweater that looks great with simple jeans & black pants. Runs slightly large & the neck is half mock & half turtleneck--needs to be longer to fold over appropriately. Wore it a few times.
Basic black sweater. Wasn't too exciting but nice quality and it was cozy.

I wish that I could have afforded to buy this sweater this month!! It is so cozy, classic, and overall just FABULOUS. It's one of my favorite things I've ever rented from RtR. Yes, it's plain, but I felt so chic wearing it. I wore it for so many different purposes (for work, a family gathering, to lounge in [it's that cozy!] and for a photo session), always with jeans and a bun. I kept it for over a month and am already missing it when I just returned it this week! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND RENTING IT!
Did not want to send it back ...

Great sweater. I rented a large because it was the only option, and while fine, it was a little big. I would say it runs true to size. Properly long so you can wear with leggings and it covers the bum nicely. Cozy. Not itchy. Classic. Will rent again!

I have nothing bad to say about the sweater. It's not too thick or thin, perfect for a chilly fall day. The turtleneck is nice and chunky. The material is nice. It is an oversized sweater, and I'm a big fan of the look. It's not the most impressive sweater, certainly not a showstopper, but what we have here is a hardworking and dependable closet staple. An oversized gray knit turtleneck. Very comfortable & can certainly be dressed up if that's your goal. I'm not hurrying to rent this one again, that said, I did wear this a ridiculous number of times when I had it. I think I may just end up buying this, as it's a great everyday piece to have in your closet.
Simple and classic sweater with a relaxed twist. Also, the quality is great and a nice warm addition for this fall. If you do not want a relaxed feel, order one size down.
The fabric felt really nice, but this was massive.
Great sweater, lightweight and looks great!
It fit perfect and I loved the length. Received compliments and would rent again!
I got my normal size and thought the fit was almost a tad loose which I found nice so it didn't squeeze the waist. Thought the print was fun and different, wore for a day of wine tasting
Loved this! So easy to wear and so many compliments.

A little tight in the waist for me. I decided to go for a mixed print combo while on vacation and I loved the easy going look of the skirt. The fabric is rather simple, but the value of this skirt is in the print.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear. Comfortable and cute.
links_reviews_text: I love this skirt! It doesn't wrinkle. Travels well. Works with all sorts of tops and can pair with a thicker cardigan.
I wore this to a bbq and it fit perfectly on my hips and flattered my figure (which doesn't happen often with skirts. A button a little above my knees was missing, so I decided to only wear it once.
Nice and airy for spring or summer. Cute buttons.

links_reviews_title: I only wore it at home but it looked so cute with a navy tank top! Really like it
links_reviews_text: Lovely print, cute tie waist and unique side "slits". Such an adorable and versatile skirt. The only thing that would make it better is if it had pockets!
Cute skirt! The hem line is a little funky but loved the print and super soft.

links_reviews_title: It is so beautiful turned alot of heads
links_reviews_text: absolutely loved this and probably should have bought.. might rent again just so i can buy it :)
It was just ok. Needs the right top.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to wear at work. Got several compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit great and easily transitions from work to everyday.
True to size and just the right length. I rented for vacation and would rent again
Cute, runs small, but is a great weekend skirt. Can be paired with sandals or boots for fall and a jean jacket

links_reviews_title: Comfortable skirt to wear day to night, work or play!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable skirt to wear day to night, work or play!
Cute, basic, nothing to write home about. Wore a handful of times for some casual everyday outings.
I didnt wear this. Too large & unflattering
Super comfy and easy to style.
I really liked this skirt. It was a great transitional piece from summer to fall. The small worked for me, but I could have also sized down to an XS and been able to wear.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite skirts ever!!!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this skirt! Most likely will buy this at some-point. The material is comfortable and soft but the pattern makes it stand out. I wore this a few times during my rental- to work and to a summer bbq on the weekend. Ran true to size but if you're in between I would say size down because the top is a drawstring.
The waistband probably needs a bit more structure, but this was a cute skirt, great for travel because it's so thin and lightweight.
The fabric was great for the summer. Thin but not sheer, and doesn't wrinkle. Colors are muted but doesn't make you look boring.

This skirt fit great and was nice and light weight. Only difficulty was pairing it with tops. It looked best for me with a loose shirt that was able to be tucked in. It could also work with the crop top paired by RTR, but it wasn't available during the same rental period.

links_reviews_title: Looks just like photo! More boho casual
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly at the waist. Hit me about mid-calf. I can see how this may look like a bag on someone. I'll tall and slim so it worked well with a tighter white tank and sandals. May rent again but not one I would reach for often.

A little longer on me than the model (I'm 5'7") but not too long. Slits were not too high but made it breezy and easier to move. Fabric didn't wrinkle much. Not the most flattering thing I've ever worn, but it was easy and comfortable and cute enough.

links_reviews_title: Good skirt but not the most flattering fit
links_reviews_text: Made me look wide in the hips. Otherwise great pattern and comfortable to wear.
Comfy skirt with elastic in the back so the sizing is flexible. The fabric was really nice and the print is unique!
Very pretty pattern but was slightly smaller in the waist than I'd expected. Wish I'd gotten the S instead of XS
Very petty colors, but the fit was not flattering. I couldn't tell if I should wear it over my hips or waist and either way it added extra bulk (I have bigger hips and a smaller waist).

Very light, flowing fabric that felt great. It was a nice fit around the waist and hips. It was a little too long for me and the subdued colors just weren't quite my style but it is a lovely skirt and well made!
Fits well, looks nice!
Very light, perfect for summer wear. Can feel loose at the top after wearing throughout the day. Length will vary by size. I was hoping it was a bit longer but it still fell at a decent length.
Loved this rust color, wore tucked into high waisted jeans. Material is thick and very warm, and is a bit long on me (5' feet tall). Def recommend for everyday hanging out
Love this sweater, got compliments on it. It is 50percent wool so a bit too warm for a California Christmas.
Perfect color, great fit. Sexy but comfortable, I LOVED this sweater!

links_reviews_title: Who loved it and I would recommend
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and warm. Just another sex appeal while staying toasty in the Colorado winter. Slightly itchy but nothing I could endure. I work two days.

Cute sweater, it was a tad scratchy, so I wouldn't recommend for anyone with sensitive skin. It also did not want to stay off the shoulder, every time I moved it would shimmy up. Wound up not wearing it because I knew I'd fuss with it all day.
Such a cute and comfy sweater! Fits true to size. I wore this for thanksgiving and received a ton of compliments on it

This sweater was fabulous. Was thick but not hot. I was worried it may be itchy because of the material- but it wasn't. It was actually very soft. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I felt it ran a bit big for a medium. If I rent again- I will size down. Overall I LOVED THIS!!!!

links_reviews_title: I love this sweater! It is oversized so I wore it as a dress with thigh-high boots!
links_reviews_text: Recommend sizing down if you want it to be less-oversized. It is also slightly itchy, but very cute and stylish :)
This sweater is a pretty fall orange color. It's meant to be oversized and pulled down on the shoulders. Pair with skinny jeans and boots. I received lots of compliments from family on our trip.

Adorable sweater, but since I've been working from home it doesn't make a lot of sense. I also can't really lift my arms up if I want to have the sweater sit right. It's a tad itchy, which I usually don't mind, but since I've been spending most of my time at home I'm looking for comfort in addition to style.
Super cute and great fit. It was a tad itchy. I didn't wear this more than once. It wasn't my favorite, but it is on trend and looks great with a pair of skinnies and booties.
Material a little itchy but otherwise great
Love the style. Fabric is a little thick and itchy so it's not as comfy as I'd hoped
Heavy material but perfect for fall evenings out
Loved the feel and the luxury look
Not my favorite look.

This sweater is really cute but is incredibly itchy so if that's something that bothers you I don't recommend. It also doesn't stay on the shoulders very well. It was really cute but I decided not to wear it because I'd be too distracted

links_reviews_title: Rich color will look good on anyone!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous way to make a cold day more fun.
Cute- but I didn't expect the fabric to be as thick. Made it less comfortable to roll over the shoulder to get the off the shoulder look.
I did not like this sweater at all. The material was uncomfortable and itchy, the top that folds down over the shoulders kept rolling up.
This sweater fit true to size. Absolutely loved the style and color. Off the shoulder stayed in place for the most part!
Super cute, off-the-shoulder top. Fabric was a bit itchy but #wool.

links_reviews_title: not bad, but not for me
links_reviews_text: the neckline didn't fit very well the way it does in the photos - it definitely would creep up. I normally don't mind that, but the sweater ended up looking like an oddly-sized cowl neck instead.
Great color for fall. I wore both off the shoulder and as a cowl neck and it looked good both ways.
The look is cute and casual, but the fit is awkward. When the shoulders are set, the armpits are down way to low on the bodice. Also, it's itchy. This was disappointing.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is very stiff and itchy.
links_reviews_text: This is a wool sweater and is very itchy and stiff. I have a long torso and this was too short for my liking.
A cute option for a fall look. I found it very cozy and had no problems with the sleeves staying down off the shoulders.
Overall cute sweater but it is rather itchy.
Fit was true to size! Wore tucked in to mid-rise jeans and there was enough material to blouse out. Definitely looked better tucked in than out.
I wanted to love this off the shoulder sweater, but the fit was completely off. The neckline would have been OK, but the arm holes were way too low. I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: was cozy and comfortable and great color
links_reviews_text: The medium was a little bit on the large size, even when looking at the photo.
Cozy sweater, sleeve fit was a bit off.

It was a little chunky around the neck line and not as sleek as it looked in the photos. I also found it a bit itchy so i didn't wear it. The color is awesome and other than the neck the fit was great.
Since it's an off the shoulders style it's also not possible to wear a cami underneath. So disappointed I couldn't wear it!

links_reviews_title: Cute color, but the sleeves won't stay down.
links_reviews_text: I was excited to expose my shoulders, but the elasticity of the sweater made it keep rolling up. The material was also itchy.

links_reviews_title: ...a bit itchy but color is lovely
links_reviews_text: not soft enough and tag hangs out the back. Color is beautiful
I had high hopes for this one, but it was super thick material and itchy. It seems to run a bit small and it looked really awkward on. Would not rent again. Did not wear.
Got it NWT and returned it that way. Too big to wear for me! Also seems like it may be a bit itchy. Nice color and thick knit, but that's all I can say good about it.
Fits true to size though is a little bit on the cropped side.
For me, this top ran true to size. It was really comfortable and had a flattering fit. Even though it's lined, the fabric was lightweight and perfect for summer.

I rented this for a light casual shirt option, it it was far too short and is made of very linen material which creases and wrinkled something awful. It was about 3 inches longer - I still would have given it a short with the material. It is super cute, but didn't work for my body.

I saw reviews from other members so I rented a 2 even though I am a 4. Sizing down fit perfectly. There was still a bit of room but any smaller would have been unflattering. The shirt is not see-through and the clasps down the front are placed perfectly to manage cleavage. Loved this top and am considering renting it again!
Fits well over a larger bust. I paired with some white high-waisted jeans and sandals. Super comfortable for all-day wear. I'll definitely rent again.
So feminine and great quality

links_reviews_title: Fun sleeves, though body is not that exciting.
links_reviews_text: Liked the off cream colored fabric and the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this top. Perfect for warmer days.
links_reviews_text: Fit was flowy but still flattering
Great top. Fits true to size, is flattering and comfortable and the cotton fabric is light and airy - perfect for summer. Loved this one.

I wore this for a 95 degree Summer Friday with Olive Wide leg cropped pants. It dressed me up enough for work and looked great for an afternoon out at bars in sweltering heat. I liked this enough to want keep it but the price is still pretty steep. That's why I use RTR!
It does run large. I wore it with a black tank bra underneath and it was sexy but casual. I wore it with shorts over the weekend and black jeans to work. Loved both ways
I ordered a size down and this shirt was still enormous. I liked the fabric... but I wouldn't be able to recommend this rental to anyone.

links_reviews_title: This top was so cute, but it was very big; I could have prob gone 2 sizes down.
links_reviews_text: This top was so cute, but it was very big; I could have prob gone 2 sizes down.

My boyfriend says I dress like a witchy colonial woman (he's right), and this dress 100% fits that style, in the best way. I LOVED this dress - it's a thick black denim, which I didn't realize from the photos on the site, and I was really excited about the statement sleeve. I usually wear a 4 and wore a 4 in this dress, but I probably could have fit into a 2 if I wanted it to be more form fitting.
Cute and thick denim material. Runs a little big
This dress was way out of my comfort zone but I enjoyed wearing it. The sleeves are pretty puffy and the material is a thick black denim. The v-neck is very deep so I wore a cami under and it worked.

Low-cut on my frame. You think I would learn that 99% of the models are 5'10" and have torsos that are proportional. On me, kind of frumpy and sexy. Not what I was looking for. I sized down without having one read review because it did not look like it was a kind of dress that would look good big. It is heavy denim fabric. It will be cute on someone. Not me.

V neck is too low. The poofy sleeves were very tight on my arms, which aren't big. The fabric isn't black, its a very washed out grey. And the fabric was all rumpled like how jeans get when they are very very worn out and won't hold their shape anymore. I liked the small empire waist and the idea of the zipper but overall it was a big unflattering mess.

I couldn't wear this dress because of my curves and athletic arms. The band on the sleeve runs tight as well does the bust. I'd recommend this dress for the less curvy person! It really is a very cute dress though!
I was so excited about this dress that I was even thinking about buying it. Thus far on RTR I've been a perfect size 20 except a little smaller in the bust. This didn't even zip up on me

This dress is fantastic and I can't wait for warmer weather so I can rent again. Great details and tailoring. Can be dressed up with shoes and jewelry, or just as cute with some sneakers. Just an FYI this dress is pretty low cut.
Very big, went down 2 sizes and V cut was still way lower than shown on model. Couldn't wear bra as it was visible because of the low cut. 2 way zipper, very versatile.
I am usually a 22 but I chose the 20 but I don't think a 22 would have fit either.

links_reviews_title: The dress was well made but too big
links_reviews_text: The dress was too large. However, the details on the dress were nice. It has a zipper on the front and the length of the slit can be adjusted

links_reviews_title: Great dress with small arm holes
links_reviews_text: The arm holes are really small. The dress itself was good I just have chicken fat arms and they did not work with this dress
Sometimes I size up in Mara (especially the linen bottoms or fitted dresses) but this one does not call for it! Rented a 2 and it was far too big in the waist, luckily was able to reorder a 0!!
Loved this purse. I fit enough in it for my essentials and even a small water bottle. The perfect pop of color for all of my outfits for my Miami vacation
So comfortable! True to size!
Fit perfectly- length hit just at the ankle and I didn't need to wear a bra bc of the thick fabric on top! And provided support! Wanted to buy this, will rent again!

Wore this to the Phoenix Open and it was perfect! Kept me warm enough in the morning and was still comfortable when the sun was out during the afternoon! The chest area ran big on me but that's not saying much- still didn't have to wear a bra which is always a plus!
Great fit. A bit short on the legs if your tall and the straps do fall down a bit - but otherwise it was perfect and I got a ton of compliments

I loved this jumper for a day on the boat. It was warm out and it got wet a few times. dried quickly and looked great. Only thing is the straps are a little long and it would've been better if I had some pins.

I loved everything about this look! It was comfy, fit like a glove, beautiful fabric, and flirty details like the bows. Pants hit right at the ankle so there were no issues with length.
