I wore to a music festival and could not have been happier with my choice. Wish I could buy this piece - will definitely rent again!!!

I'm 5'3, 34D in VS, and 125 pounds. I found this jumpsuit quite unflattering from the side and was pulling it down and messing with it all day. Cute from the front and I wore with a black fedora and black slides until my feet hurt and had to change to flops :)

Thought the jumpsuit fit TTS. Only issue as others mentioned the straps were a little big so they would sometimes slip down and they aren't adjustable. Besides that the fit and material were very nice. I'm 5'9" and the jumpsuit didn't pull or ride up. Also it was a good length. This might be very long on shorter girls.

links_reviews_title: Fun for a day with the girls.
links_reviews_text: Good material, comfortable. Only complaint is that I felt the butt could have been more fitted. Other than that I loved it!
So comfortable and chic. Wore it a few times and was complimented by many. Could be dressed up or down. Loved this rental!
Loved this and wore it with friends for a movie night in the park! Super comfortable and a little sexy at the same time with front ties. A little big in the straps, but not enough to be annoying.

This fits very well for what I thought wouldn't fit me. I wore it to work with a cami under so the toes didn't reveal to much and then I wore it to a bbq. Lots of compliments. The leg is a little long for me.

This fit so incredible, honestly contemplated keeping. I'm 5'2 and this was not at all too long on me in the legs, the shoulders straps were a bit loose, but they have buttons in the back that allow for adjustment! Also the bust has some give, so the fabric isn't super still and you don't look stuffed in. Seriously contemplated keeping this one.

links_reviews_title: 4R perfect on torso, big on top
links_reviews_text: Absolutely a light weight and easy jumpsuit for everyday! I could have done with a size smaller so it better fitted my top (I'm not very busty). It was fine in the end, but I had to wear a top underneath so the straps and top wouldn't slip as much.

links_reviews_title: Second Review! FUN JUMPSUIT - RUNS LARGE
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 10 and looked terrible in the 10 - got around to ordering the 8 and fell in love. It was still a bit baggy but super cute. Got lots of compliments, wore it to work in the summer. Highly recommend sizing down - even for bustier gals!
Light material, sexy chest cuts outs but not too much. Only qualm is that the straps are long and you can't adjust and have to pin them.

Adorably-styled gingham jumpsuit. Lightweight, comfy (pockets!) and flattering. PROS: style, print, tailoring/construction + fabric. CONS: runs large, straps too long and not adjustable (I tucked them in entirely). Would definitely rent again in proper size!

links_reviews_title: So fun & flirty, with a hint of edge.
links_reviews_text: I loved this so much more than I thought I would. I wore it for my SIL's engagement party and got so many compliments. The fabric wasn't too heavy to wear in summer - the back panel is stretchy, so I think this could work for a variety of chest sizes. I did think it ran a little bit - I probably would have worn the size down if I ordered it. Overall, such a fun, standout jumpsuit.
Fit so well with 3" heels. The straps were a little big but never falling down. Very cute and comfortable!
Not the most flattering jumper but super cute. Issues with the mid area - looked like a pooch

I'm usually a 10 on the bottom and an 8 on the top and the 10R was perfect. Jumpsuits NEVER fit me right and even though it was just slightly looser up top it was so slimming around the waste. I received so many compliments. Tanya Taylor makes exquisite clothes for real women. Will tent again and look forward to trying more of the brand on RTR.

Very comfortable, well-fitting jumper but a little too much cleavage for me so I wore it with a shirt underneath. Wore it on a trip to Southern France and received a lot of compliments during and after the trip. Definitely a unique piece, fun to wear. Probably better for taller women but at 5'4 it fit me okay.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments for such a cute outfit!!!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this. I usually struggle with 1 pieces as I have a longer torso, but this romper fit perfectly. The top did show a bit of my bra but wasn't problematic. Overall, loved this piece! I couldn't believe how comfortable it was for such a chic outfit.
I wore this to my birthday dinner and absolutely loved it. I'm usually a size 2 but only the 0 was available. It was a little tight but still looked great!

links_reviews_title: The perfect day time outfit. I rented it to celebrate my birthday.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and wore it with a strapless bra, but wished the straps could have been a little tighter. I didn't need to size down from the normal size at all! Good with sandals.
Everyone I've seen wear this has loved it! I layered it because the straps weren't quite the right length for me.

Rented this for #datenight. Loved the look and feel! It was a bit large so I felt a little like I was swimming in it. But, I really liked it so I wore a the larger size. It's something i would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and casual jumper with flare
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 10 but ordered a 12. Plenty of room for my c/d boobs. The back panel has stretch so it's great! The straps have two lengths. Absolutely loved wearing this in Cuba! The fabric is light like seer sicker so don't be scared of wearing all summer.

links_reviews_title: Comfy cute, perfect for touring a city
links_reviews_text: Slightlyyy loose, but it actually made it very comfortable and perfect for a day of exploration.

I loved this jumpsuit. At first I thought it might be too bold but I was shocked how comfortable it was and how easily I could dress it down with a jean jacket and white tennis shoes. I loved the pockets. Perfect thing to rent. I didn't realize you can unbutton the straps and cross for a tighter fit until after I wore it, so keep that in mind.

links_reviews_title: So cute and comfy!!! Danced all night in this!
links_reviews_text: Typically wear either a 2 or 4, deff size up to your larger size in this!

Loved this jumpsuit and wish I had stuck to my normal size (6) instead of sizing up to what was available when I placed my order (size 8). As a 5'2" lady, this looked better with heels. If I owned the jumpsuit, I would have created more holes for the somewhat adjustable straps to make them shorter than you can make them as designed. Fun to wear! Light fabric that's perfect for spring weather.

links_reviews_title: So freaking cute, wish i could keep!!
links_reviews_text: Fit is great, it's so cute, feels expensive.

Love this jumpsuit - it is a perfect weight for vacation and doesn't wrinkle so great for the suitcase. Can be worn casually with sandals or dressed up with statement earrings and heels. Fit was straightforward with room in the bust and hips. If you wanted it more form fitting, I recommend sizing down.

Runs large, could have definitely worn a zero. Anyone with a short torso will struggle with this as the straps are long. I also had to use fashion tape on the legs to hem them about 3 inches. Otherwise very cute and fun! Loved it!
Loved everything about this outfit!!

links_reviews_title: Greet jumper for comfy, cute look
links_reviews_text: Great for everyday or cute day time event.
I had to use fashion tape to make it a little shorter because I'm 5 1 but other than that this jumpsuit is incredible!
It fit a little big. The straps were insanely long. I wish they would have added a way to make the stars more adjustable.

Loved this jumpsuit. I had several people tell me how cute it was. I wore a shirt underneath cause without the top is pretty low cut. I found the straps to be a bit long which didn't matter cause I wore the collared shirt underneath. I'm generally between a size 2-4 but the 4 was the only size available. I thought it fit well with a little room to spare. The length hit just at tops of my feet. Could've worn flats. Side zipper made it pretty easy to get it on and off.
